   (PSP1: 1) Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā prajñāpāramitā	(PSP1: 1) PaQcaviMSati sAhasrikA prajQApAramitA
   namo bhagavadyai āryaprajñāpāramitāyai	namaH Bagavat yEH Arya prajQApAramitAyE
   nirvikalpe namas tubhyaṃ prajñāpāramite 'mite yā tvaṃ sarvān avadyāṅgi	nirvikalpe namaH tuByam prajQApAramite amite yA tvam sarvAn avadya aFgi
   niravadyair nirīkṣyase ākāśam iva nirlepāṃ niṣprapañcāṃ nirakṣarām yas	niravadyEH nirIkzyase AkASam iva nirlepAm nizprapaQcAm nirakzarAm yaH 
   tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam tava cāryaguṇādyāyā buddhasya	tvAm paSyati BAvena sa paSyati taTAgatam tava ca Arya guNa AdyAyAH budDasya
   ca jagadguroḥ na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva kṛpātmakāḥ	ca jagadguroH na paSyanti antaram santaH candra candrikayoH iva kRpA AtmakAH
   prapadya tvāṃ buddhadharmapuraḥsarām sukhenāyānti māhātmām atulaṃ	prapadya tvAm budDa Darma puraHsarAm suKena AyAnti mAhAtmAm atulam
   bhaktivatsale sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate tenāpi	Bakti vatsale sakRt api ASaye SudDe yaH tvAm viDivat Ikzate tena api
   niyataṃ siddhiḥ prāpyate 'moghadarśane (PSP1: 2) sarveṣām api vīrāṇāṃ	niyatam sidDiH prApyate amoGa darSane (PSP1: 2) sarvezAm api vIrANAm
   parārthe niyatātmanām poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā yad buddhā	para arTe niyata AtmanAm pozikA janayitrI ca mAtA tvam asi vatsalA yat budDA
   lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ tena tvam asi kalyāṇi	loka guravaH putrAH tava kRpA lavaH tena tvam asi kalyANi
   sarvasattvapitāmahī sarvapāramitābhis tvaṃ nirmalābhir anindite	sarva sattva pitAmahI sarva pAramitABiH tvam nirmalABiH anindite
   candralekheva tārābhir anuyātāsi sarvadā vineyaṃ janamāsādya tatra tatra	candra leKA iva tArABiH anuyAtA asi sarvadA vineyam janam AsAdya tatra tatra
   tathāgathaiḥ bahurūpā tvam evaikā nānānāmabhir īḍyase prabhāṃ prāpyeva	taTA gaTEH bahu rUpA tvam eva ekAH nAnA nAmaBiH Ixyase praBAm prApya iva
   dīptāṃśor avaśyāyodabindavaḥ tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca	dIptAMSoH avaSyAya uda bindavaH tvAm prApya pralayam yAnti dozAH vAdAH ca
   vādinām tvam eva trāsajananī bālānāṃ bhīmadarśanā āśvāsajananī cāsi	vAdinAm tvam eva trAsa jananI bAlAnAm BIma darSanA ASvAsa jananI ca asi
   viduṣāṃ saumyadarśanā yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate	viduzAm sOmya darSanA yasya tvayi api aBizvaFgaH tvad nATasya na vidyate
   tasyāṃba katham anyatra rāgadveṣau bhaviṣyataḥ nāgacchasi kutaś cittaṃ na	tasya aMba kaTam anyatra rAga dvezO BavizyataH na AgacCasi kutas cittam na
   ca kvacana gacchasi sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase ye	ca kvacana gacCasi sTAnezu api ca sarvezu vidvadBiH na upalaByase ye
   tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ prapadya ca vimucyante tad	tvAm evam na paSyanti prapadyante ca BAvataH prapadya ca vimucyante tat 
   idaṃ mahad adbhutam (PSP1: 3) tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api	idam mahat adButam (PSP1: 3) tvAm eva baDyate paSyan apaSyan api
   badhyate tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate aho vismayanīyāsi	baDyate tvAm eva mucyate paSyan apaSyan api mucyate aho vismayanIyA asi
   gambhīrāsi yaśasvinī sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase buddhaiḥ	gamBIrA asi yaSasvinI su durboDA asi mAyA iva dRSyase na ca dRSyase budDEH
   prayekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā mārgas tvam eko mokṣasya nāsty	prayeka budDEH ca SrAvakEH ca nizevitA mArgaH tvam ekaH mokzasya na asti 
   anya iti niścayaḥ vyavahāraṃ puraskṛtya prajñaptyarthaṃ śarīriṇām kṛpayā	anyaH iti niScayaH vyavahAram puraskRtya prajQapti arTam SarIriNAm kRpayA
   lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ	lokanATEH tvam ucyase ca na ca ucyase SaktaH kaH tvAm iha stotum
   nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām sarvavāgvisayātītā yā tvaṃ kvacid aniḥśritā saty	nirnimittAm niraQjanAm sarva vAc visaya atItA yA tvam kvacid aniHSritA saty
   evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ tvām astutyām api stutvā	evam api saMvRtyA vAc paTEH vayam IdRSEH tvAm astutyAm api stutvA
   tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ stutvā yan mayopacitaṃ śubham tenās	tuzwUzantaH su nirvRtAH prajQApAramitAm stutvA yat mayA upacitam SuBam tena as
   tv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam (PSP1: 4) evaṃ mayā śrutam	tu ASu jagat kRtsnam prajQApAra parAyaNam (PSP1: 4) evam mayA Srutam
   ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā	ekasmin samaye BagavAn rAjagRhe viharati sma gRDrakUwe parvate mahatA
   bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ	Bikzu saMGena sArDam paQca mAtrEH Bikzu sahasrEH sarvEH arhadBiH
   kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair	kzINa AsravEH nizkleSEH vaSIBUtEH su vimukta cittEH su vimukta prajQEH 
   ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair	AjAneyEH mahA nAgEH kRtakRtyEH kRta karaNIyEH apahRta BArEH 
   anuprāprasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ	anuprAprasvaka arTEH parikzINa Bava saMyojanEH samyak AjQA su vimukta cittEH
   sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ, pañcamātrair bhikṣuṇīśatair upāsakair	sarva cetaH vaSi parama pAramitA prAptEH, paQca mAtrEH BikzuNI SatEH upAsakEH 
   upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair aparimāṇairś ca	upAsikABiH ca sArDam sarvEH dRzwa DarmEH aparimANEH H ca
   bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ	boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH sArDam sarvEH DAraNI pratilabDEH
   śūnyatāvihāribhir animittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ	SUnyatA vihAriBiH animitta gocarEH praNiDAna akalpitEH
   kṣāntisamatāpratilabdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair	kzAnti samatA pratilabDEH asaFga DAraNI pratilabDEH acyuta aBijQEH 
   ādeyavacanair akuhakair alapakair arapagatajñātralābhacittair	Adeya vacanEH akuhakEH alapakEH arapa gata jQAtra lABa cittEH 
   nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gaṃbhīradharmakṣāntipāraṃgatair vaiśāradyaprāptair	nirAmiza Darma deSakEH gaMBIra Darma kzAnti pAraMgatEH vESAradya prAptEH 
   mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhair	mAra karma samatikrAntEH karma AvaraNa pratiprasrabDEH 
   dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalair	Darma pravicaya viBakti nirdeSa kuSalEH 
   asaṃkhyeyakalpapraṇidhānasusamārabdhaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ pūrvālāpibhir	asaMKyeya kalpa praNiDAna su samArabDEH smita muKEH pUrva AlApiBiH 
   vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair	vigata BRkuwI muKEH gATABiH gIta Alapana kuSalEH apagata lIna cittEH 
   anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgair	anAcCedya pratiBAnEH ananta parzad aBiBavana vESAradya samanvAgEH 
   anantakalpakoṭīniḥsaraṇakuśalair	ananta kalpa kowI niHsaraNa kuSalEH 
   māyāmarīcidakacandrasvapnapratiśrutkāpratibhāsapratibimbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktaiḥ	mAyA marIci daka candra svapna pratiSrutka apratiBAsa pratibimba nirmANa upama Darma aDimuktEH
   (PSP1: 5) sattvagaticaritasūkṣmanānādhimuktyavatārakuśalair	(PSP1: 5) sattva gati carita sUkzma nAnA aDimukti avatAra kuSalEH 
   apratihatacittair adhimātraksāntisamanvāgatair yāthātmāvatāraṇakuśalaiḥ	apratihata cittEH aDimAtraksAnti samanvAgatEH yATA AtmA avatAraNa kuSalEH
   sarvabuddhakṣetrānantavyūhapraṇidhānaprasthānaparigṛhītair	sarva budDa kzetra ananta vyUha praNiDAna prasTAna parigRhItEH 
   asaṃkhyeyalokadhātubuddhānusmṛtisamāhitasatatasamitābhimukhībhūtair	asaMKyeya loka DAtu budDa anusmRti samAhita satata samita aBimuKIBUtEH 
   aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair	aparimita budDa aDyezaNa kuSalEH 
   nānādṛṣṭyanuśayaparyavasthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ	nAnA dRzwi anuSaya paryavasTAna kleSa praSamana kuSalEH
   samādhivikrīḍitaśatasahasranirhārakuśalaiḥ tad yathā bhadrapālena ca	samADi vikrIxita Sata sahasra nirhAra kuSalEH tat yaTA BadrapAlena ca
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca naradattena ca	boDisattvena mahAsattvena ratna AkareNa ca sArTavAhena ca naradattena ca
   varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca	varuNa dattena ca SuBaguptena ca indra dattena ca uttara matinA ca
   viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susamprasthitena ca	viSeza matinA ca varDamAna matinA ca amoGa darSinA ca su samprasTitena ca
   suvikrāntavikramiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa	su vikrAnta vikramiNA ca nitya udyuktena ca anikzipta DureNa ca sUrya garBeNa
   ca anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā	ca anupama cintinA ca avalokita ISvareNa ca mahA sTAma prAptena ca maQju SriyA
   ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityokṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca	ca vajra matinA ca ratnamudrA hastena ca nitya ukzipta hastena ca mEtreyeNa ca
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evam pramukhair anekair	boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam pramuKEH anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdham atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva	boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH sArDam aTa Kalu BagavAn svayam eva
   siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya	siMhAsanam prajQapya nyazIdat paryaFkam badDvA Rju kAyam praNiDAya
   abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma	aBimuKIm smRtim upasTApya samADi rAjam nAma samADim samApadyate sma
   yatra sarvasamādhayo 'ntargamān saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti atha	yatra sarva samADayaH antargamAn saMgraham samavasaraNam gacCanti aTa
   khalu bhagavān smṛtimān samprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya (PSP1: 6)	Kalu BagavAn smRtimAn samprajAnan tasmAt samADeH vyutTAya (PSP1: 6)
   divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot	divyena cakzuzA sarva loka DAtum vyavalokya sarva kAyAt smitam akarot 
   tasyādhastāt pādatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ	tasya aDastAt pAda talayoH sahasrArAByAm cakrAByAm
   ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ daśabhyaḥ pādāṅgulibhyaḥ	zazwi zazwI raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH daSaByaH pAda aFguliByaH
   ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigulphābhyāṃ	zazwi zazwI raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH evam zazwi zazwi gulPAByAm
   ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṃghābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām evaṃ dvābhyām	zazwizazwiH jaMGAByAm zazwizazwiH jAnu maNxalAByAm evam dvAByAm
   ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ hṛdayaśrīvatsāt	UruByAm kawinA aBimaNxalAByAm dvAByAm pArSvAByAm hRdaya SrIvatsAt 
   mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir	mahApuruza lakzaNAt evam zazwizazwiH daSaByaH hasta aFguliByaH zazwi zazwiH 
   dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām aṃśābhyām evaṃ grīvāyāś	dvAByAm bAhuByAm zazwizazwiH dvAByAm aMSAByAm evam grIvAyAH 
   catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ	catvAriMSadByaH danteByaH dvAByAm GrANAByAm dvAByAm SrotrAByAm
   dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyādūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī	dvAByAm cakzurByAm maDyA t UrNAyAH uparizwAt uzNIzAt zazwizazwI
   raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ yai raśmibhir ayaṃ	raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH yEH raSmiBiH ayam
   trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāur avabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ pūrvasyāṃ	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAuH avaBAsitaH aBUt parisPuwaH pUrvasyAm
   diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā	diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena mahatA raSmi avaBAsena sPuwA
   avabhāsitāś cābhūvan evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām	avaBAsitAH ca aBUvan evam dakziNasyAm diSi paScimAyAm uttarasyAm
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām	uttara pUrvasyAm pUrva dakziNasyAm dakziNa paScimAyAm paScima uttarasyAm
   adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā	aDastAt uparizwAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena mahatA
   raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan ye ca sattvās tena mahatā	raSmi avaBAsena sPuwAH avaBAsitAH ca aBUvan ye ca sattvAH tena mahatA
   raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ	raSmi avaBAsena sPuwAH avaBAsitAH te sarve niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm
   samyaksambodhau (PSP1: 7) atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ	samyaksamboDO (PSP1: 7) aTa Kalu BagavAn punar eva sarva romakUpeByaH
   smitam akarot evakikataś ca romakūpāt	smitam akarot evakikataH ca romakUpAt 
   ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ yair ayaṃ	zazwi zazwI raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH yEH ayam
   trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt taiś ca	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH avaBAsitaH sPuwaH aBUt tEH ca
   pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāḥ sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ	pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH sarva loka DAtavaH avaBAsena avaBAsitAH
   sphuṭāś cābhūvan evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām	sPuwAH ca aBUvan evam dakziNasyAm diSi paScimAyAm uttarasyAm
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām	uttara pUrvasyAm pUrva dakziNasyAm dakziNa paScimAyAm paScima uttarasyAm
   adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā	aDastAt uparizwAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena mahatA
   raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan ye ca sattvās tena mahatā	raSmi avaBAsena sPuwAH avaBAsitAH ca aBUvan ye ca sattvAH tena mahatA
   raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ	raSmi avaBAsena sPuwAH avaBAsitAH te sarve niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm
   samyaksambodhau atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu BagavAn punar eva yA sA budDAnAm BagavatAm
   prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum	prakRti praBA tayA praBayA tri sAhasra mahA sAhasram lokaDAtum
   avabhāsayāmāsa yāvat sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi	avaBAsayAmAsa yAvat sarvAsu daSasu dikzu ekEkasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavayas tā prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan ye ca	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH loka DAtavayaH tA praBayA avaBAsitAH aBUvan ye ca
   sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ	sattvAH tayA praBayA spRzwAH te sarve niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm
   samyaksambodhau atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ	samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu BagavAn tasyAm velAyAm jihvA indriyam
   nirṇāmayāmāsa yenemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ	nirNAmayAmAsa yena imam tri sAhasra mahA sAhasram lokaDAtum
   jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa	jihvA indriyeNa AcCAdayAmAsa tri sAhasra mahA sAhasram lokaDAtum jihvA indriyeNa
   sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt smitam akarot yato 'nekāni	sPuritvA tasmAt jihvA indriyAt smitam akarot yatas anekAni
   raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ raśmimukhe caikaikasminn	raSmi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi niSceruH raSmimuKe ca ekEkasmin= 
   uttamaratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāny utpannāny	uttama ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni utpannAni 
   abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇāḥ saṃsthitāś cābhūvan dharmaṃ	aBUvan tezu ca padmezu budDa vigrahAH nizaNAH saMsTitAH ca aBUvan Darmam
   deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām te	deSayantaH yat uta imAm eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm te
   pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā	pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlu kopama vyativRtta asaMKyezu lokaDAtuzu gatvA
   sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām (PSP1: 8)	sattvAnAm Darmam deSayanti smaH evam dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm (PSP1: 8)
   uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu evakikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu	uttarasyAm aDastAt UrDvam diS vidikzu evakikasyAm ca diSi daSasu dikzu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu aparimANezu lokaDAtuzu gatvA sattvAnAm Darmam
   deśayanti sma yad uta imām eva ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām	deSayanti sma yat uta imAm eva ca zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm
   ye ca sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ	ye ca sattvAH tAm Darma deSanAm SRNvanti te niyatAH Bavanti anuttarAyAm
   samyaksambodhau atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ	samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu BagavAn tasmin eva siMhAsane nizaNaH
   siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede tathārupaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram	siMha vikrIxitam nAma samADim samApede taTA arupam ca Rdhi aBisaMskAram
   abhisaṃskaroti sma yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ	aBisaMskaroti sma yaTArUpeNa RdDi aBisaMskAreNa aBisaMskRtena ayam
   trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH zaz vikAram akampata prAkampata
   saṃprākampata acalat prācalat saṃprācalat avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat	saMprAkampata acalat prAcalat saMprAcalat aveDat prAveDat saMprAveDat 
   araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat agarjat	araNat prAraNat saMprAraNat akzuByat prAkzuByat saMprAkzuByat agarjat

   ante avanamati mṛdukaḥ snigdhaḥ sarvasattvamukhajanano 'bhūt atha khalu	ante avanamati mRdukaH snigDaH sarva sattva muKa jananaH aBUt aTa Kalu
   tena kṣaṇalavamuhvartena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirayā	tena kzaNa lavam uhvartena ye asmin tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO nirayA
   vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan	vA tiryagyonayaH vA yama lokAH vA te sarve samucCinnAH SUnyAH aBUvan
   sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan ye ca sattvās tābhyo	sarva akzaNAH ca astamitAH aBUvan ye ca sattvAH tAByaH 
   nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyūtās te sarvae tenaiva prītiprāmodyena	niraya tiryagyoni yama loka gatiByaH cyUtAH te sarvae tena eva prIti prAmodyena
   manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan evaṃ cāturmahārāajikānāṃ	manuzyANAm saBA gatAyAm upapannAH ca aBUvan evam cAturmahArAa jikAnAm
   devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ	devAnAm trayastriMSAnAm yAmAnAm tuzitAnAm nirmANa ratInAm
   paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan (PSP1: 9)	paranirmita vaSavartinAm devAnAm saBA gatAyAm upapannAH ca aBUvan (PSP1: 9)
   atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny	aTa Kalu te manuzyAH te ca devAH BagavataH eva anuBAvena pUrva janmAni

   bhagavantaṃ prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma evaṃ pūrvasyṃ diśi	Bagavantam prAQjalayaH BUtvA namasyanti smaH evam pUrvasym diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm
   vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣvaikasmin digbhāge	vidikzu UrDvam aDas samantAt daSasu dikzva ekasmin digBAge
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarve nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarve nirayAH sarvAH tiryagyonayaH sarve
   yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan ye ca	yama lokAH samucCinnAH SUnyAH aBUvan sarva akzaNAH ca astamitAH aBUvan ye ca
   sattvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve	sattvAH tAByaH niraya tiryagyoni yama loka gatiByaH cyutAH te sarve
   devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma te ca devam anuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata	deva manuzyezu upapadyante sma te ca devam anuzyezu upapannA Bagavata
   evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam anusmaranti sma anusmṛtya ca tenaiva	eva anuBAvena pUrva nivAsam anusmaranti sma anusmRtya ca tena eva
   prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta	prIti prAmodyena sva ka svakezu budDa kzetrezu ye tatra budDAH Bagavanta
   utpannās teṣām antikam upasaṃkrāntāḥ upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ	utpannAH tezAm antikam upasaMkrAntAH upasaMkramya tezAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ pādavandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti	BagavatAm pAda vandanAm kRtvA sarve prAQjalayaH BUtvA BagavataH namasyanti
   sma atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ	sma aTa Kalu ye asmin tri sAhasra mahA sAhasre lokaDAtO jAti anDAH
   sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān	sattvAH te cakzuzA rUpANi paSyanti sma vaDirAH sattvAH SrotreNa SabdAn
   śṛṇvanti sma unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma vikṣiptacittā ekāgracittā	SRNvanti smaH unmattAH smRtim pratilaBante sma vikzipta cittA ekAgra cittA
   bhavanti sma jighatsitāḥ pūrṇapātrā bhavanti sma tṛṣitā vigatapipāsā	Bavanti sma jiGatsitAH pUrNa pAtrAH Bavanti sma tRzitA vigata pipAsA
   bhavanti sma rogaspṛṣṭā viagatarogā bhavanti sma hīnendriyāḥ	Bavanti sma roga spRzwAH viagata rogAH Bavanti sma hIna indriyAH
   paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti sma avirahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvā	paripUrNa indriyAH Bavanti sma avirahita akuSala kAya vAc manaskarma antA jIvA
   virahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvāś ca (PSP1: 10) bhavanti sma	virahita akuSala kAya vAc manaskarma antAjIvAH ca (PSP1: 10) Bavanti sma
   sarvasattvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma, bhrātṛbhaginīsamacittā	sarva sattvAH ca mAtA pitR sama cittAH Bavanti sma, BrAtR BaginI sama cittA
   mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś ca bhavanti	mitra amAtya jQAti sAlohita sama cittAH daSa kuSala karma paTa sevinaH ca Bavanti
   sma brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ sarvasattvāś ca	sma brahmacAriNaH SucayaH nirAmaya ganDAH sarva sattvAH ca

   tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā	tRtIya DyAna samApannasya BikzoH tasmin eva ca samaye evaMrUpayA prajQayA
   te samanvāgatā bhavanti sma yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta	te samanvAgatAH Bavanti sma yat anya budDa kzetra sTAH budDAH Bagavanta
   evam udānayanti sma   sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu vīrṇo	evam udAnayanti sma  sADu damaH sADu saMyamaH sADu vIrNaH 
   brahmacaryyāvāsaḥ sādhu prāṇibhūteṣv avihiṃseti atha khalu bhagavāṃs	brahmacaryyAvAsaH sADu prANi BUtezu avihiMsa iti aTa Kalu BagavAn=

   abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena	aBiBUya taTAgataH tizWati BAsate tapati virocate smaH ABayA varNena
   śriyā tejasā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād	SriyA tejasA ca pUrvasyAm diSi dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm aDastAt 
   ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgatas	UrDvam diS vidikzu gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn aBiBUya taTAgata s
   tiṣṭhati bhāsate tad yathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatān	tizWati BAsate tat yaTA api nAma sumeruH parvata rAjaH sarva parvatAn
   abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā	aBiBUya tizWati BAsate tapati virocate smaH ABayA varNena SriyA tejasA

   taṃ tathāgasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāḥ	tam taTAgasya Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA divyAH

   śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	SAkya munim ca taTAgatam sArDam Bikzu saMGena evam dakziNasyAm diSi

   sarvāvasāniko lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato	sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH ratnAvatI nAma tatra ratnAkaraH nAma taTAgataH

   prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau	prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO
   samantaraśmir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā	samantaraSmiH nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA
   tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā	taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA
   yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad	yena BagavAn ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAma d
   upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram	upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratnAkaram
   etad avocat ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ (PSP1: 13) pratyayo 'sya mahato	etat avocat kaH Bagavan hetuH kaH (PSP1: 13) pratyayaH asya mahataH 
   'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca	avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca
   tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras	taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya san darSanAya evam ukte ratna Akaras
   tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat asti kulaputra itaḥ	taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam etat avocat asti kula putraH itas 
   paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma	paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma
   lokadhatus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati	lokaDatuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksambudDaH tizWati
   dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm
   samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha khalu samantaraśmir	samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa Kalu samantara Smir
   bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ	boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi aham Bagavan tAm
   sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya	sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya vandanAya
   paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena kumārabhūtān	paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena kumAra BUtAn
   dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṃ gatān	DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAm gatAn
   bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase atha khalu	BagavAn Aha gacCa tvam kula putra yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu
   ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi	ratna AkaraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi
   padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya prādāt etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais	padmAni samantaraSmaye boDisattvAya prAdAt etEH tvam kula putra padmEH 
   taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān	tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH evan ca vadeH ratna AkaraH BagavAn
   bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ	Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm
   balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā	balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA
   ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata	ratna AkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena padmAni prahitAni Bagavata
   iti samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetor	iti samprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra budDa kzetre BUyAH tat kasya hetoH 
   durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ (PSP1:	durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra sahAyAm lokaDAtO upapannAH (PSP1:
   14) atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt	14) aTa Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akarasya taTAgatasya sakASAt 
   tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāniḥsahasrapatrāṇi	tAni nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA suvarNa nirBAsA niHsahasra patrANi
   anekair bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca	anekEH boDisattva kowi niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca
   dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArakEH dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH pUrvasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavataḥ satkurvan	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAnAm BagavataH satkurvan
   gurūkurvan mānayan pūjayan	gurUkurvan mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam sahA lokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat ekAnte sTitaH ca samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā	BagavataH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA
   yena te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat	yena te pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena prAkzipat 
   taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu	tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām	budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ	eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm yEH ca sattvEH sa DarmaH
   śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau atha khalu te	SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu te
   bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan (PSP1: 15)	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan (PSP1: 15)
   atha khalu dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya	aTa Kalu dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya
   tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ sarvaśokāpagato nāma tatrāśokaśrīr	teByaH yaH sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH sarva Soka apagataH nAma tatra aSoka SrIH 
   nāma tathāgataḥ 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām	nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau	eva prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO
   vigataśoko nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ	vigata SokaH nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ
   ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā	ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA
   yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad	yena BagavAn ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAma d
   upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram	upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratnAkaram

   paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ	paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH yaH
   sarvāsāniko lokadhātur upaśāntā nāma tatra ratnārcir nāma tahtāgataḥ 'rhan	sarvAsAnikaH lokaDAtuH upaSAntA nAma tatra ratnArciH nAma tahtAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ	samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau cāritramatir nāma	boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO cAritramatiH nAma
   bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam
   pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān	pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn
   ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya	ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya
   tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat ko	tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratna Akaram etat avocat kaH 
   bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya	Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya
   asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya	asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya
   sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam	san darSanAya evam ukte ratna AkaraH taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam
   etad avocat asti kulaputra itaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	etat avocat asti kula putraH itas pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato	lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ	arhan samyaksambudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi 
   ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya
   vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena	vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena
   kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn
   sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṃ gatān bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra	sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAm gatAn BagavAn Aha gacCa tvam kula putra
   yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni	yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu ratna AkaraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni
   suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya	suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni samantaraSmaye boDisattvAya
   prādāt etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ	prAdAt etEH tvam kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH
   evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty	evan ca vadeH ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati 
   alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati	alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm paripRcCati
   imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena
   padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra	padmAni prahitAni BagavataH iti samprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetor durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH tat kasya hetoH durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo	sahAyAm lokaDAtO upapannAH aTa Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH 
   ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā	ratna Akarasya taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA
   suvarṇanirbhāsāniḥsahasrapatrāṇi anekair	suvarNa nirBAsA niHsahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowi niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH pUrvasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavataḥ satkurvan	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAnAm BagavataH satkurvan
   gurūkurvan mānayan pūjayan	gurUkurvan mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam sahA lokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat ekAnte sTitaH ca samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā	BagavataH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA
   yena te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat	yena te paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena prAkzipat 
   taiś ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu	tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām	budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ	eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm yEH ca sattvEH sa DarmaH
   śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau atha khalu te	SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu te
   bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalu	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu
   uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ	uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH yaH
   sarvāsāniko lokadhātur jayā nāma tatra jayendro nāma tathāgataḥ 'rhan	sarva AsAnikaH lokaDAtuH jayA nAma tatra jaya indraH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ	samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau jayadatto nāma	boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO jayadattaH nAma
   bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam
   pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān	pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn
   ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya	ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya
   tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat ko	tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratna Akaram etat avocat kaH 
   bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya	Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya
   asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya	asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya
   sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam	san darSanAya evam ukte ratna AkaraH taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam
   etad avocat asti kulaputra ito dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	etat avocat asti kula putraH itas dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato	lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ	arhan samyaksambudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi 
   ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya

   bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavān (PSP1: 16) śākyamuniḥ tathāgatas tāni	BagavataH aTa Kalu BagavAn (PSP1: 16) SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni
   padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas	padmAni gRhItvA yena te uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH loka DAtavaH 
   tena prākṣipat taiś ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca	tena prAkzipat tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca
   padmeṣu buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti	padmezu budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti
   yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām yaiś ca sattvaiḥ	yat uta imAm eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm yEH ca sattvEH
   sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau atha khalu	sa DarmaH SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu
   te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	te boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalu	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ	uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH yaH
   sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ samādhyalaṅkṛtā nāma tatra samādhihastyuttaraśrīr	sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH samADi alaFkRtA nAma tatra samADi hasti uttara SrIH 
   nāma tathāgataḥ 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām	nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau	eva prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO
   vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā	vijaya vikrAmI nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA
   tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā	taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA
   yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad	yena BagavAn ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAma d
   upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram	upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratnAkaram
   etad avocat ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke	etat avocat kaH Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke
   prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca	prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca
   tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras	taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya san darSanAya evam ukte ratna Akaras
   tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat asti kulaputra ito	taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam etat avocat asti kula putraH itas 
   dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma	dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma
   lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati	lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksambudDaH tizWati
   dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ	Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm
   samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha khalu samantaraśmir	samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa Kalu samantara Smir
   bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ	boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi aham Bagavan tAm
   sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya	sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya vandanAya
   paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena kumārabhūtān	paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena kumAra BUtAn
   dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṃ gatān	DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAm gatAn
   bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase atha khalu	BagavAn Aha gacCa tvam kula putra yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu
   ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi	ratna AkaraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi
   padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya prādāt etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais	padmAni samantaraSmaye boDisattvAya prAdAt etEH tvam kula putra padmEH 
   taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān	tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH evan ca vadeH ratna AkaraH BagavAn
   bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ	Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm
   balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā	balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA
   ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata	ratna AkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena padmAni prahitAni Bagavata
   iti samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetor	iti samprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra budDa kzetre BUyAH tat kasya hetoH 
   durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ atha	durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra sahAyAm lokaDAtO upapannAH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akarasya taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni
   nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāniḥsahasrapatrāṇi anekair	nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA suvarNa nirBAsA niHsahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowi niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH pUrvasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavataḥ satkurvan	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAnAm BagavataH satkurvan
   gurūkurvan mānayan pūjayan	gurUkurvan mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam sahA lokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat ekAnte sTitaH ca samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā	BagavataH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA
   yena te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena	yena te uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena
   prākṣipat taiś ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu	prAkzipat tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām	budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ	eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm yEH ca sattvEH sa DarmaH
   śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau atha khalu te	SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu te
   bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalu	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu
   pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ	pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH yaH
   sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur bodhimaṇḍalākārasurucirā nāma tatra	sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH boDimaNxala AkArasurucirA nAma tatra
   padmottaraśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate	padmottaraSrIH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate
   yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha	yApayati saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa
   tatra lokadhātau padmahasto nāma tatra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ	tatra lokaDAtO padma hastaH nAma tatra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam
   mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata	mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca Bagavata
   āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan	Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan
   samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv	samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO= 
   abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ	aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratna Akaram etat avocat kaH Bagavan hetuH kaH
   pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ	pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahataH
   pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya sandarśanāya evam	pRTivI cAlasya asya ca taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya san darSanAya evam
   ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat asti	ukte ratna AkaraH taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam etat avocat asti
   kulaputra itaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn	kula putraH itas paScima uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan	atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ	samyaksambudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi 
   ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya
   vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena	vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena
   kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn
   sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṃ gatān bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra	sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAm gatAn BagavAn Aha gacCa tvam kula putra
   yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni	yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu ratna AkaraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni
   suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya	suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni samantaraSmaye boDisattvAya
   prādāt etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ	prAdAt etEH tvam kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH
   evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty	evan ca vadeH ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati 
   alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati	alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm paripRcCati
   imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena
   padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra	padmAni prahitAni BagavataH iti samprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetor durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH tat kasya hetoH durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo	sahAyAm lokaDAtO upapannAH aTa Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH 
   ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā	ratna Akarasya taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA
   suvarṇanirbhāsāniḥsahasrapatrāṇi anekair	suvarNa nirBAsA niHsahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowi niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH pUrvasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavataḥ satkurvan	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAnAm BagavataH satkurvan
   gurūkurvan mānayan pūjayan	gurUkurvan mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam sahA lokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat ekAnte sTitaH ca samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā	BagavataH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA
   yena te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena	yena te pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena
   prākṣipat taiś ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu	prAkzipat tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām	budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ	eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm yEH ca sattvEH sa DarmaH
   śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau atha khalu te	SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu te
   bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalu	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu
   dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo	dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH 
   yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vigatarajaḥsañcayā nāma tatra	yaH sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH vigata rajaH saQcayA nAma tatra
   sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas	sUryamaNxalapraBAsottamaSrIH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDas
   tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ	tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm
   dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau sūryaprabhāso nāma bodhisattvaḥ	Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO sUryapraBAsaH nAma boDisattvaH
   mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ	mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ
   ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān ratnākaras	ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn ratna Akaras
   tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya	taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya
   bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat ko	BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratna Akaram etat avocat kaH 
   bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya	Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya
   asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya	asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya
   sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam	san darSanAya evam ukte ratna AkaraH taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam
   etad avocat asti kulaputra ita uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	etat avocat asti kula putraH itas uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato	lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ	arhan samyaksambudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi 
   ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya
   vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena	vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena
   kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn
   sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṃ gatān bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra	sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAm gatAn BagavAn Aha gacCa tvam kula putra
   yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni	yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu ratna AkaraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni
   suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya	suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni samantaraSmaye boDisattvAya
   prādāt etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ	prAdAt etEH tvam kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH
   evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty	evan ca vadeH ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati 
   alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati	alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm paripRcCati
   imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena
   padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra	padmAni prahitAni BagavataH iti samprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetor durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH tat kasya hetoH durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo	sahAyAm lokaDAtO upapannAH aTa Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH 
   ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā	ratna Akarasya taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA
   suvarṇanirbhāsāniḥsahasrapatrāṇi anekair	suvarNa nirBAsA niHsahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowi niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH pUrvasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavataḥ satkurvan	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAnAm BagavataH satkurvan
   gurūkurvan mānayan pūjayan	gurUkurvan mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam sahA lokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat ekAnte sTitaH ca samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā	BagavataH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA
   yena te dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena	yena te dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena
   prākṣipat taiś ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu	prAkzipat tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām	budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ	eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm yEH ca sattvEH sa DarmaH
   śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau atha khalu te	SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu te
   bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalu	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu
   paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ	paScima uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH yaH
   sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vaśībhutā nāma tatraikacchattro nāma tathāgataḥ	sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH vaSIButA nAma tatra ekacCattraH nAma taTAgataH
   'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva	arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm eva
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau	prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO
   ratnottamo nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ	ratnottamaH nAma boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ
   ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā	ca mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA
   yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad	yena BagavAn ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAma d
   upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram	upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratnAkaram
   etad avocat ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke	etat avocat kaH Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke
   prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca	prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca
   tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras	taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya san darSanAya evam ukte ratna Akaras
   tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat asti kulaputra (PSP1:	taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam etat avocat asti kula putraH (PSP1:
   17) itaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya	17) itas pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya
   sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan	sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ	samyaksambudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi 
   ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya

   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalv	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu 
   adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ	aDastAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH yaH
   savāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ padmā nāma tatra padmaśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ 'rhan	savAvasAnikaH lokaDAtuH padmA nAma tatra padmaSrIH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ	samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau padmottaro nāma	boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO padmottaraH nAma
   bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam
   pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān	pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn
   ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya	ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya
   tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat ko	tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratna Akaram etat avocat kaH 
   bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya	Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya
   asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya	asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya
   sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam	san darSanAya evam ukte ratna AkaraH taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam
   etad avocat asti kulaputra ita upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	etat avocat asti kula putraH itas uparizwAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato	lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ	arhan samyaksambudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi 
   ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya
   vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena	vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena
   kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn

   yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni	yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu ratna AkaraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni
   suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya	suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni samantaraSmaye boDisattvAya
   prādāt etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ	prAdAt etEH tvam kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH
   evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty	evan ca vadeH ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati 
   alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati	alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm paripRcCati
   imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena
   padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra	padmAni prahitAni BagavataH iti samprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra
   buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetor durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra	budDa kzetre BUyAH tat kasya hetoH durAsadAH hi te boDisattvAH ye tatra
   sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo	sahAyAm lokaDAtO upapannAH aTa Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH 
   ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā	ratna Akarasya taTAgatasya sakASAt tAni nAnA ratna mayAni padmAni gRhItvA
   suvarṇanirbhāsāniḥsahasrapatrāṇi anekair	suvarNa nirBAsA niHsahasra patrANi anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair	boDisattva kowi niyuta Sata sahasrEH gRhasTEH pravrajitEH ca dArakEH 
   dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu	dArikABiH ca sArDam parivRtaH puraskRtaH pUrvasyAm diSi tezu
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavataḥ satkurvan	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAnAm BagavataH satkurvan
   gurūkurvan mānayan pūjayan	gurUkurvan mAnayan pUjayan
   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Cattra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIBiH 
   yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas	yena iyam sahA lokaDAtuH tena saMprAptaH yena ca SAkya muniH taTAgata s
   tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte	tena upasaMkrAntaH upasaMkramya BagavataH pAdO SirasA aBivandya ekAnte
   'tiṣṭhat ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ	atizWat ekAnte sTitaH ca samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH Bagavantam
   śākyamunim etad avocat ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ	SAkya munim etat avocat ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm
   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni
   bhagavataḥ atha kahlu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā	BagavataH aTa kahlu BagavAn SAkya muniH taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA
   yena te adhas tād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat	yena te aDas tAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena prAkzipat 
   taiś ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu	tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām	budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm
   eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ	eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSanAm yEH ca sattvEH sa DarmaH
   śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau atha khalu te	SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO aTa Kalu te
   bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalu	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu
   upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ	uparizwAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya teByaH yaH
   sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur nandā nāma tatra nandaśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ 'rhan	sarva avasAnikaH lokaDAtuH nandA nAma tatra nandaSrIH nAma taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ	samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau nandadatto nāma	boDisattvAnAm Darmam deSayati aTa tatra lokaDAtO nandadattaH nAma
   bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca mahAntam
   pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān	pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena BagavAn
   ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya	ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya
   tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat ko	tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratna Akaram etat avocat kaH 
   bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya	Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke prAdurBAvAya
   asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya	asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya
   sandarśanāya evam ukte ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam	san darSanAya evam ukte ratna AkaraH taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam
   etad avocat asti kulaputra ito 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	etat avocat asti kula putraH itas aDastAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato	lokaDAtUn atikramya sahA nAma lokaDAtuH tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH 
   'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa bodhisattvānāṃ	arhan samyaksambudDaH tizWati Driyate yApayati sa boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ atha	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH aTa
   khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat gamisyāmy	Kalu samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat gamisyAmi 
   ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	aham Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya
   vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena	vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena
   kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn
   sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṃ gatān bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra	sarva samADi vaSi pAramitAm gatAn BagavAn Aha gacCa tvam kula putra
   yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni	yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu ratna AkaraH taTAgataH nAnA ratna mayAni
   suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya	suvarNa avaBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni samantaraSmaye boDisattvAya
   prādāt etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ	prAdAt etEH tvam kula putra padmEH tam SAkya munim taTAgatam aByavakireH
   evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty	evan ca vadeH ratna AkaraH BagavAn Bagavantam alpa AbADa tAm paripRcCati 
   alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchati	alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm paripRcCati
   imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena	imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena
   padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra	padmAni prahitAni BagavataH iti samprajAna kArI ca tvam kula putra

   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm

   yena te upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat	yena te uparizwAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena prAkzipat 
   taiś ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu	tEH ca padmEH te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan tezu ca padmezu
   buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām	budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti yat uta imAm
