   bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca	boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH tAH ca
   dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan atha khalu	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte nyazIdan aTa Kalu
   tena kṣaṇalavamurhvartena ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ	tena kzaNa lava murhva rtena ayam tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH
   saptaratnamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt puṣpābhikīrnaḥ avasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaḥ	sapta ratna mayaH saMsTitaH aBUt puzpa aBikIrnaH avasakta pawwa dAma kalApaH
   kalpavṛkṣair nānālaṅkāraphalāvanatāgraviṭapaiḥ puṣpavṛkṣaiḥ phalavṛkṣair	kalpavRkzEH nAnA alaFkAra Pala avanata agra viwapEH puzpa vRkzEH Pala vRkzEH 
   gandhavṛkṣair mālyavṛkṣaiś copaśobhito 'bhūt tad yathāpi nāma padmāvatī	ganDa vRkzEH mAlya vRkzEH ca upaSoBitaH aBUt tat yaTA api nAma padmAvatI
   lokadhātuḥ samantakusumasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yatra mañjuśrīḥ	lokaDAtuH samantakusumasya taTAgatasya budDa kzetram yatra maQjuSrIH
   kumārabhūtaḥ prativasati susthitamatiś ca bodhisattvaḥ anye ca mahaujaskā	kumAra BUtaH prativasati susTita matiH ca boDisattvaH anye ca mahA ojaskA
   bodhisattvāḥ bhagavāṃś cādrākṣīt sadevalokaṃ sannipatitaṃ samārakaṃ	boDisattvAH BagavAn ca adrAkzIt sa deva lokam sannipatitam samArakam
   sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāṃ prajāṃ sannipatitāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisattvān	sa brahmakam sa SramaNa brAhmaNikAm prajAm sannipatitAn tAn ca boDisattvAn
   kumārabhūtān iti nidānam tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram	kumAra BUtAn iti nidAnam tatra Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram
   āmantrayāmāsa sarvākāraṃ (PSP1: 18) śāriptura	AmantrayAmAsa sarva AkAram (PSP1: 18) SAriptuH a
   sarvadharmānabhisamboddhukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	sarva Darma anaBisamba udDu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ iti samāsataḥ sambodhikāmanāsahagataś	prajQApAramitAyAm yogaH karaNIyaH iti samAsatas samboDikA manA sahagata S
   cittotpādaḥ evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad acovat kathaṃ	citta utpAdaH evam ukte AyuzmAn SAriputraH Bagavantam etat acovat kaTam
   bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākāraṃ	Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena sarva AkAram
   sarvadharmānabhisamboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam	sarva Darma anaBisamba udDu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm yogaH karaNIyaH evam
   ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evad avocat iha śāriputra	ukte BagavAn Ayuzmantam SAriputram evat avocat iha SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā 'sthānayogena	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA asTAna yogena
   dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā aparityāgayogena	dAna pAramitA paripUrayitavyA aparityAga yogena
   deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya śīlapāramitā paripūrayitavyā	deya dAyaka pratigrAhaka an upalabDi tAm upAdAya SIla pAramitA paripUrayitavyA
   āpattyanāpattyanadhyāpattitām upādāya kṣāntipāramitā paripūrayitavyā	Apatti anApatti anaDyApatti tAm upAdAya kzAnti pAramitA paripUrayitavyA
   akṣobhaṇatām upādāya vīryapāramitā paripūrayitavyā	akzoBaNa tAm upAdAya vIrya pAramitA paripUrayitavyA
   kāyikacaitasikavīryāsraṃsanatām upādāya dhyānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā	kAyika cEtasika vIrya AsraMsana tAm upAdAya DyAna pAramitA paripUrayitavyA
   anāsvādanatām upādāya prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā	anAsvAdana tAm upAdAya prajQApAramitA paripUrayitavyA
   prajñādauṣprajñānupalabdhitām upadāya iti vyāsataḥ sambodhikāmanāsahagataś	prajQA dOzprajQA anupalabDi tAm upadAya iti vyAsataH samboDikA manA sahagata S
   cittotpādaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra daśadikṣu pratyekaṃ	citta utpAdaH punar aparam SAriputra daSa dikzu pratyekam
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu ye sattvAH tAn sarvAn
   anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	anupaDi Seza nirvANa DAtO parinirvApayitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti samāsataḥ parārthālambanaś cittotpādaḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti samAsatas para arTa AlambanaH citta utpAdaH
   evaṃ matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena duḥśīlān śīle	evam matsariNaH sattvAn dAne pratizWApayitu kAmena duHSIlAn SIle
   vyāpādabahulān kṣāntau kuśīdān vīrye vikṣiptacittān dhyāne (PSP1: 19)	vyApAda bahulAn kzAntO kuSIdAn vIrye vikzipta cittAn DyAne (PSP1: 19)
   duṣprajñān prajñāsampadi pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	duzprajQAn prajQA sampadi pratizWA payitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vyāsataḥ parārthālambanaś cittotpādaḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti vyAsataH para arTa AlambanaH citta utpAdaH
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisamboddhukāmena	punar aparam SAriputra sarva AkAram sarva DarmAn aBisambA udDu kAmena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyṃ sthātavyam iti	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAym sTAtavyam iti
   cchandasahagataḥ pṛthivyupamaḥ evam iha śāriputra bodhisattvena	cCanda sahagataH pRTivI upamaH evam iha SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā'sthānayogena dānapāramitā	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA asTAna yogena dAna pAramitA
   paripūrayitavyā deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya evaṃ	paripUrayitavyA deya dAyaka pratigrAhaka an upalabDi tAm upAdAya evam
   śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā	SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA
   paripūrayitavyā prajñādauṣprajñānupalabdhitām upādāya ity āśayasahagataḥ	paripUrayitavyA prajQA dOzprajQA anupalabDi tAm upAdAya iti ASaya sahagataH
   kalyāṇasuvarṇopamaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śāriputra sthitvā bodhisattvena	kalyANa suvarNa upamaH evam prajQApAramitAyAm SAriputra sTitvA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni catvāri	mahAsattvena catvAri smRti upasTAnAni paripUrayitavyAni catvAri
   samyakprahāṇāni catvāri ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta	samyak prahANAni catvAri RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi paQca balAni sapta
   bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ śūnyatāsamādhir	boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFga mArgaH paripUrayitavyaH SUnyatA samADiH 
   bhāvayitavyaḥ animittasamādhir bhāvayitavyaḥ apraṇihitasamādhir	BAvayitavyaH animitta samADiH BAvayitavyaH apraNihita samADiH 
   bhāvayitavyaḥ evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra	BAvayitavyaH evam catvAri DyAnAni catvAri apramANAni catasra
   ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ navāśubhāḥ	ArUpya samApattayaH azwO vimokzAH nava anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH nava aSuBAH
   saṃjñā bhāvayitavyāḥ katamā nava yad uta ādhmātakasaṃjñā vidhūtakasaṃjñā	saMjQA BAvayitavyAH katamA nava yat uta ADmAtaka saMjQA viDUtaka saMjQA
   vipūyakasaṃjñā vilohitakasaṃjñā (PSP1: 20) vinīlakasaṃjñā	vipUyaka saMjQA vilohitaka saMjQA (PSP1: 20) vinIlaka saMjQA
   vikhāditakasaṃjñā vikṣiptakasaṃjñā vidagdhakasaṃjñā asthisaṃjñā āhāre	viKAditaka saMjQA vikziptaka saMjQA vidagDaka saMjQAH asTi saMjQA AhAre
   pratikūlasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā buddhānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā saṃghānusmṛtir	pratikUla saMjQA BAvayitavyA budDa anusmRtiH BAvayitavyA saMGa anusmRtiH 
   bhāvayitavyā śīlānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā tyāgānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā	BAvayitavyA SIla anusmRtiH BAvayitavyA tyAga anusmRtiH BAvayitavyA
   devatānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā ānāpānānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā udvegānusmṛtir	devatA anusmRtiH BAvayitavyA AnA pAna anusmRtiH BAvayitavyA udvega anusmRtiH 
   bhāvayitavyā maraṇānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā anityasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā	BAvayitavyA maraNa anusmRtiH BAvayitavyA anitya saMjQA BAvayitavyA
   duḥkhasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā anātmasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā aśucisaṃjñā	duHKa saMjQA BAvayitavyA anAtma saMjQA BAvayitavyA aSuci saMjQA
   bhāvayitavyā maraṇasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā sarvaloke anabhiratisaṃjñā	BAvayitavyA maraNa saMjQA BAvayitavyA sarva loke anaBirati saMjQA
   bhāvayitavyā sarvaloke aviśvāsasaṃjñā bhāvayitavyā parijayasaṃjñānam	BAvayitavyA sarva loke aviSvAsa saMjQA BAvayitavyA parijaya saMjQAnam
   bhāvayitavyam saṃvṛtisaṃjñānam bhāvayitavyam yathārutasaṃjñānam	BAvayitavyam saMvRti saMjQAnam BAvayitavyam yaTA aruta saMjQAnam
   bhāvayitavyam savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir bhāvayitavyaḥ	BAvayitavyam savitarkaH sa vicAraH samADiH BAvayitavyaH
   avitarko'vicāramātraḥ samādhir bhāvayitavyaḥ avitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhir	avitarkaH avicAra mAtraH samADiH BAvayitavyaH avitarkaH avicAraH samADiH 
   bhāvayitavyaḥ anājñātam ājñāsyāmīndriyam bhāvayitavyam ājñendriyam	BAvayitavyaH anAjQAtam AjQAsyAmi indriyam BAvayitavyam AjQa indriyam
   bhāvayitavyam ājñātāvīndriyam bhāvayitavyam abhibhvāyatanam bhāvayitavyam	BAvayitavyam AjQAta avi indriyam BAvayitavyam aBiBva Ayatanam BAvayitavyam
   kṛtsnāyatanam bhāvayitavyam sarvajñajñānam bhāvayitavyam śamathavipaśyane	kRtsnA Ayatanam BAvayitavyam sarvajQa jQAnam BAvayitavyam SamaTa vipaSyane
   bhāvayitavye tisro vidyā bhāvayitavyāḥ catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayitavyāḥ	BAvayitavye tisraH vidyAH BAvayitavyAH catasraH pratisaMvidaH BAvayitavyAH
   catvāri caiśāradyāni bhāvayitavyāni acyutāḥ pañcābhijñā (PSP1: 21)	catvAri ca ESAradyAni BAvayitavyAni acyutAH paQca aBijQA (PSP1: 21)
   bhāvayitavyāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvayitavyāḥ sapta dhanāni bhāvayitavyāni	BAvayitavyAH zaw pAramitAH BAvayitavyAH sapta DanAni BAvayitavyAni
   aṣṭau mahāpuruṣavitarkā bhāvayitavyāḥ daśa tathāgatabalāni bhāvayitavyāni	azwO mahApuruza vitarkAH BAvayitavyAH daSa taTAgata balAni BAvayitavyAni
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ mahāmaitrī bhāvayitavyā	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmA BAvayitavyAH mahA mEtrI BAvayitavyA
   mahākaruṇā bhāvayitavyā mahāmuditā bhāvayitavyā mahopekṣā bhāvayitavyā ity	mahA karuNA BAvayitavyA mahA muditAH BAvayitavyAH mahA upekzAH BAvayitavyAH iti 
   adhyāśayasahagato navacandropamaḥ sarvajñatāṃ jñānena darśanena	aDyASaya sahagataH nava candra upamaH sarvajQa tAm jQAnena darSanena
   cāvalokyātikramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā	ca avalokya atikramitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA
   bhāvayitavyā mārgajñatāṃ paripūrayitukāmena sarvākārajñatām	BAvayitavyA mArga jQa tAm paripUrayitu kAmena sarva AkAra jQa tAm
   anuprāptukāmena sarvasattvacittacaritajñānākāratāṃ paripūrayitukāmena	anuprAptu kAmena sarva sattva citta carita jQAna AkAra tAm paripUrayitu kAmena
   sarvavāsanānusandhikleśānutpāṭayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	sarva vAsanA anusanDi kleSa an utpAwayitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm yogaH karaNIyaH evam boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam bodhisattvanyāmabhavakramitukāmena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam boDisattvanyAma Bava kramitu kAmena
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramitukāmena avinivartanīyabhūmau	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmim atikramitu kAmena avinivartanIya BUmO
   sthātukāmena kumārabhūmiṃ samatikramitukāmena ṣaḍabhijñāḥ prāptukāmena	sTAtu kAmena kumAra BUmim samatikramitu kAmena zaxaBijQAH prAptu kAmena
   sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditāni vijñātukāmena	sarva sattva citta carita vispanditAni vijQAtu kAmena
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānam abhibhavitukāmena	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm jQAnam aBiBavitu kAmena
   dhāraṇīsamādhisukhaṃ pratilabdhukāmena iti prayogasahagato jvalanopamaḥ	DAraNI samADi suKam pratilabDu kAmena iti prayoga saha gataH jvalana upamaH
   matsariṇaḥ sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	matsariNaH sattvAn dAne pratizWApayitu kAmena
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo dānāni dīyamānāni ekenānumodanāsahagatena	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDeByaH dAnAni dIyamAnAni ekena anumodanA sahagatena
   cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	citta utpAdena aBiBavitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam iti dānapāramitāsahagato mahānidhānopamaḥ (PSP1: 22) duḥśīlān	Sikzitavyam iti dAna pAramitA sahagataH mahA niDAna upamaH (PSP1: 22) duHSIlAn
   śīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām śīlam	SIle pratizWApayitu kAmena sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm SIlam
   ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena	ekena anumodanA sahagatena citta utpAdena aBiBavitu kAmena boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti śīlapāramitāsahagato	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti SIla pAramitA sahagataH 
   ratnākaropamaḥ vyāpannacittān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	ratnAkara upamaH vyApanna cittAn kzAntO pratizWApayitu kAmena
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām kṣāntim ekenānumodanāsahagatena	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm kzAntim ekena anumodanA sahagatena
   cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	citta utpAdena aBiBavitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam iti kṣāntisahagato mahārṇavopamaḥ kuśīdān vīrye	Sikzitavyam iti kzAnti saha gataH mahA arNava upamaH kuSIdAn vIrye
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām vīryam	pratizWA payitu kAmena sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm vIryam
   ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena	ekena anumodanA sahagatena citta utpAdena aBiBavitu kAmena boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vīryasahagato vajropamaḥ	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti vIrya sahagataH vajra upamaH
   vikṣiptacittān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām	vikzipta cittAn DyAne pratizWApayitu kAmena sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm
   dhyānam ekenānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena	DyAnam ekena anumodanA sahagatena citta utpAdena aBiBavitu kAmena boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti dhyānapāramitāsahagataḥ	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti DyAna pAramitA sahagataH
   parvatopamaḥ duṣprajñān sattvān prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	parvata upamaH duzprajQAn sattvAn prajQAyAm pratizWApayitu kAmena
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām prajñām ekenānumodanāsahagatena	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm prajQAm ekena anumodanA sahagatena
   cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	citta utpAdena aBiBavitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam iti prajñāsahagato mahābhaiṣajyopamaḥ ekam api	Sikzitavyam iti prajQA sahagataH mahA BEzajya upamaH ekam api
   kuśalacittotpādaṃ sarvākārajñatāyām upādāya kauśalyena	kuSala citta utpAdam sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm upAdAya kOSalyena
   pariṇāmanayā'prameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	pariNAmanayA aprameyam asaMKyeyam kartu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam alpam api dānaṃ dadatā alpam api śīlaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam alpam api dAnam dadatA alpam api SIlam
   rakṣatā alpām api kṣāntiṃ bhāvayatā alpam api vīryam ārabhamāṇena alpam	rakzatA alpAm api kzAntim BAvayatA alpam api vIryam AraBamANena alpam
   api dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānenālpām api prajñāṃ bhāvayatā sarvasattvebhyaḥ	api DyAnam samApadyamAnena alpAm api prajQAm BAvayatA sarva sattveByaH
   sarvākārajñatāyām upādāya kauśalyena pariṇāmanayā'prameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm upAdAya kOSalyena pariNAmanayA aprameyam asaMKyeyam
   kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar	kartu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā	aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena dAna pAramitAyAm caratA
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāñ caratā	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam SIla pAramitAyAn caratA
   kṣāntipāramitāyāñ caratā vīryapāramitāyāñ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāñ caratā	kzAnti pAramitAyAn caratA vIrya pAramitAyAn caratA DyAna pAramitAyAn caratA
   prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAn caratA boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam sarvasattvānām (PSP1: 23) arthāya	Sikzitavyam sarva sattvAnAm (PSP1: 23) arTAya
   narakatiryagyoniyamalokaduḥkhāny utsoḍhukāmena kalpaśatasahasrasañcitam	naraka tiryagyoni yama loka duHKAni utsoXu kAmena kalpa Sata sahasra saQcitam
   api śīlaṃ sattvāpekṣayā tyaktukāmena buddhakule upapattukāmena	api SIlam sattva apekzayA tyaktu kAmena budDa kule upapattu kAmena
   aśītyanuvyañjanāni dvātriṃśatmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ca niṣpādayitukāmena	aSIti anuvyaQjanAni dvAtriMSatmahApuruza lakzaNAni ca nizpAdayitu kAmena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ity upāyasahagato	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti upAya sahagataH 
   mitropamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena	mitra upamaH punar aparam SAriputra budDa kAyam nizpAdayitu kAmena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam kumārabhūmim	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam kumAra BUmim
   ākramitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	Akramitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   buddhabodhisattvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	budDa boDisattvEH avirahitena Bavitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena ekena svarena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn	mahAsattvena ekena svarena pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   vijñāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ	vijQApayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam dakziNasyAm
   paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣu adha ūrdhvam ekena svareṇa	paScimAyAm uttarasyAm vidikzu aDas UrDvam ekena svareNa
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn vijñāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn vijQApayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   triratnavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthātukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	tri ratna vaMSasya anupacCedAya sTAtu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaiḥ yaiḥ kuśalamūlair	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yEH yEH kuSala mUlEH 
   ākāṅkṣati tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkartuṃ gurūkartuṃ	AkAFkzati taTAgatAn arhataH samyaksaMbudDAn satkartum gurUkartum
   mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tāni me kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyantām iti	mAnayitum pUjayitum tAni tAni me kuSala mUlAni samRDyantAm iti
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti
   praṇidhisahagataś cintāmaṇisadṛśaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	praNiDi saha gataH cintAmaNi sadRSaH punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāṃ manorathān paripūrayitukāmena	mahAsattvena sarva sattvAnAm manoraTAn paripUrayitu kAmena

   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lakadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān śīlaskhandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	lakaDAtuzu ye sattvAH tAn SIla sKanDe pratizWApayitu kAmena
   samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe	samADi skanDe pratizWApayitu kAmena vimukti jQAna darSana skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	pratizWApayitu kAmena srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayitu kAmena
   sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	sakRdAgAmi Pale pratizWApayitu kAmena anAgAmi Pale pratizWApayitu kAmena
   arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena yāvad	arhat tve pratizWApayitu kAmena pratyeka boDO pratizWApayitu kAmena yAvat 
   anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	anupaDi Seza nirvANa DAtO pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ	Sikzitavyam yaTA pUrvasyAm diSi evam dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm
   vadikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu (PSP1: 29)	vadikzu aDas UrDvam pratyekam gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu (PSP1: 29)
   lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās tān yāvad anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhāatau	lokaDAtuzu ye sattvAH tAn yAvat anupaDi Seza nirvANa DAatO
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena māhāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	pratizWA payitu kAmena boDisattvena mAhAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam iti puṇyajñānasahagataḥ koṣṭhāgāropamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra	Sikzitavyam iti puNya jQAna sahagataH kozWAgAra upamaH punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm
   buddhaguṇān anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ	budDa guNAn anuprAptu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena saMskRta AsaMskRtAnAm DarmANAm pAram
   gantukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	gantu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇām atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena sarva DarmANAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm
   tathāgatānām avaboddhukāmena dharmāṇām anutpādakoṭim anuprāptukāmena	taTAgatAnAm avabodDu kAmena DarmANAm anutpAda kowim anuprAptu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti bodhipakṣasahagato mahāmārgopamaḥ punar	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti boDi pakza sahagataH mahA mArga upamaH punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ	aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm
   pūrvaṅgamena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ	pUrvaFgamena Bavitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāpakena	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena budDAnAm BagavatAm upasTApakena
   bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	Bavitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa	boDisattvena mahAsattvena budDAnAm BagavatAm aByantara parivAreNa
   bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	Bavitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena	boDisattvena mahAsattvena mahA parivAreNa Bavitu kAmena
   bodhisattvaparivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar	boDisattva parivAram pratilabDu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dakṣiṇāṃ pariśodhayitukāamena	aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena dakziNAm pariSoDayitu kAamena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena mātsaryacittaṃ nigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mahAsattvena mAtsarya cittam nigrahItu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauḥśīlyacittam	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena dOHSIlya cittam
   anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	anutpAdayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyāpādacittam anutpādayitukāmena	boDisattvena mahAsattvena vyApAda cittam anutpAdayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena kauśīdyacittam utsraṣṭakāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mahAsattvena kOSIdya cittam utsrazwakAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   punar aparaṃ śāriptura bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vikṣiptacittaṃ	punar aparam SAriptura boDisattvena mahAsattvena vikzipta cittam
   niścitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	niScitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dauṣprajñacittam aprapañcitukāmena	boDisattvena mahAsattvena dOzprajQa cittam aprapaQcitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	mahAsattvena sarva sattvAn dAna maya puNya kriyA vastuni pratizWA payitu kAmena
   śīlamayapuṇyakriyāvastuni (PSP1: 30) pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena	SIla maya puNya kriyA vastuni (PSP1: 30) pratizWApayitu kAmena
   bhāvanāmayapuṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena vaiyāvṛtyasahagate	BAvanA maya puNya kriyA vastuni pratizWA payitu kAmena vEyAvRtya sahagate
   caupadhike puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ca OpaDike puNya kriyA vastuni pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañca	Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena paQca
   cakṣūṃṣy utpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam katamāni pañca yad	cakzUMzi utpAdayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam katamAni paQca yat 
   uta māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur	uta mAMsa cakzuH divya cakzuH prajQAcakzuH Darma cakzuH budDacakzuH 
   utpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	utpAdayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā	boDisattvena mahAsattvena pUrvasyAm diSi divyena cakzuzA
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   evaṃ dakṣīṇasyāṃ diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān	evam dakzINasyAm diSi divyena cakzuzA gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn
   bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ evaṃ paścimāyām diśi	BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam paScimAyAm diSi
   divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena	divyena cakzuzA gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn BagavataH drazwu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ evam uttarasyām diśi divyena cakṣuṣā	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam uttarasyAm diSi divyena cakzuzA
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyaṃ evam uttarapūrvasyām diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	Sikzitavyam evam uttara pUrvasyAm diSi divyena cakzuzA gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ evaṃ	budDAn BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam
   pūrvadakṣiṇasyām diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān	pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi divyena cakzuzA gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn
   bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ evaṃ	BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam
   dakṣiṇapaścimāyām diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān	dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi divyena cakzuzA gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn
   bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ evaṃ paścimottarasyām	BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam paScima uttarasyAm
   diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena	diSi divyena cakzuzA gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn BagavataH drazwu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ evam adhastād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam aDastAt diSi divyena cakzuzA
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn budDAn BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyaṃ evam upariṣṭād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	Sikzitavyam evam uparizwAt diSi divyena cakzuzA gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yāṃś ca te	budDAn BagavataH drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAn ca te
   buddhānāṃ bahgavanto dharmān bhāṣante tān dharmān divyena śrotreṇa	budDAnAm bahgavantaH DarmAn BAzante tAn DarmAn divyena SrotreNa
   śrotukāmena teṣāñ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavataṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ	Srotu kAmena tezAn ca budDAnAm Bagavatam cetasA eva cittam yaTABUtam
   parijñātukāmena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ	parijQAtu kAmena tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm pUrva yoga saha gatAm
   bodhisattvatām anusmartukāmena teṣāñ ca buddhānām ṛddhivikurvitaṃ	boDisattva tAm anusmartu kAmena tezAn ca budDAnAm RdDi vikurvitam
   draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāṃs te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād daśasu	boDisattvena mahAsattvena yAn te budDAH BagavantaH samantAt daSasu
   dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu dharmān bhāṣante tāñ śrutvā anācchedyena	dikzu sarva loka DAtuzu DarmAn BAzante tAn SrutvA anAcCedyena
   smṛtibalādhānena sarvān sandhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim	smRti bala ADAnena sarvAn sanDArayitu kAmena yAvat anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   abhisaṃbuddha iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	aBisaMbudDaH iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena atītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi	boDisattvena mahAsattvena atItAnAm budDAnAm BagavatAm budDa kzetrANi
   draṣtukāmena anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi	draztu kAmena anAgatAnAm api budDAnAm BagavatAm budDa kzetrANi
   draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye (PSP1: 31) caitarhi samantād	drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye (PSP1: 31) ca etarhi samantAt 
   daśadiśi loke buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti teṣām api	daSa diSi loke budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante yApayanti tezAm api
   buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	budDAnAm BagavatAm budDa kzetrANi drazwu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam iti śamathavipaśyanāsahagato yānopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra	Sikzitavyam iti SamaTa vipaSyanA sahagataH yAna upamaH punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yat kiñcid daśasu dikṣu buddhair bhagavadbhir	boDisattvena mahAsattvena yat kiQcid daSasu dikzu budDEH BagavadBiH 
   bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca yad idaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā	BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca yat idam sUtram geyam vyAkaraNam gATA
   udānaṃ nidānam itivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyādbhutā dharmā avadānam upadeśāḥ	udAnam nidAnam iti vRttakam jAtakam vEpulya adButAH DarmAH avadAnam upadeSAH
   yac ca śrāvakair na śrutaṃ tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena	yat ca SrAvakEH na Srutam tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena
   vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa	vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa
   samprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	samprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yat kiñcit pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir	boDisattvena mahAsattvena yat kiQcid pUrvasyAm diSi budDEH BagavadBiH 
   bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena	BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena
   vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa	vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa
   saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid dakṣiṇasyāṃ	saMprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid dakziNasyAm
   diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam	diSi budDEH BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca tat sarvam
   udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena	udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena
   parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   yat kiñcid paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate	yat kiQcid paScimAyAm diSi budDEH BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate
   bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena	BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena
   tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena	taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhair	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid uttarasyAm diSi budDEH 
   bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena	BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena
   dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca	DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca
   vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid	vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid 
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca	uttara pUrvasyAm diSi budDEH BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca
   tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya	tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya
   pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena	pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhair	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi budDEH 
   bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena	BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena
   dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca	DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca
   vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid	vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid 
   dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate	dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi budDEH BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate
   ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya	ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya
   pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena	pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid paścimottarasyāṃ diśi buddhair	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid paScima uttarasyAm diSi budDEH 
   bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena	BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena
   dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca	DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca
   vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid	vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid 
   adhastād diśi buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat	aDastAt diSi budDEH BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca tat 
   sarvam udgrahītukāmena dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya	sarvam udgrahItu kAmena DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya
   pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena	pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yat kiñcid ūrdhvaṃ diśi buddhair	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yat kiQcid UrDvam diSi budDEH 
   bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca tat sarvam udgrahītukāmena	BagavadBiH BAzitam BAzyate BAzizyate ca tat sarvam udgrahItu kAmena
   dhārayitukāmena vācayitukāmena tathatvāya pratipattukāmena parebhyaś ca	DArayitu kAmena vAcayitu kAmena taTatvAya pratipattu kAmena pareByaH ca
   vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti	vistareNa saMprakASayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti
   dhāraṇīpratibhānasahagataḥ prasnavaṇopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra	DAraNI pratiBAna sahagataH prasnavaNa upamaH punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāni pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	boDisattvena mahAsattvena yAni pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir	lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH 
   nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni	na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni
   dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi	dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi
   yatra sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti tāni sarvāṇy	yatra sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH na asti tAni sarvANi 
   avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni paścimāyāṃ diśi	avaBAsayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra
   sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena	sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir	lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH 
   nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni	na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi	uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi
   yatra sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti tāni sarvāṇy	yatra sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH na asti tAni sarvANi 
   avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ	avaBAsayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni pUrva dakziNasyAm
   diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra	diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra
   sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena	sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra
   sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena	sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni paścimottarasyāṃ diśi	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni paScima uttarasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra
   sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena	sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni aDastAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir	lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH 
   nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam yāni	na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam yAni
   upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu andhakāratamisrāṇi yatra	uparizwAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu anDakAra tamisrANi yatra
   sūryācandramasor api prabhāyā gatir nāsti tāni sarvāṇy avabhāsayitukāmena	sUryAcandramasoH api praBAyAH gatiH na asti tAni sarvANi avaBAsayitu kAmena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā	mahAsattvena ye pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvA
   nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ	nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam
   saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ (PSP1: 32)	saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm (PSP1: 32)
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye dakziNasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn
   sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca	sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca
   sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   ye paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā	ye paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvA
   nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ	nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam
   saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ	saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye uttarasyāṃ diśi	pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye uttarasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn
   sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca	sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca
   sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā	ye uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvA
   nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ	nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam
   saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ	saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ	pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye pUrva dakziNasyAm
   diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās	diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH 
   tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś	tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmS
   ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam ye dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	Sikzitavyam ye dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   sattvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ	sattvAH nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam
   saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ	saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye paścimottarasyām	pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye paScima uttarasyAm
   diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās	diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH 
   tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś	tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmS
   ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam ye adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā	Sikzitavyam ye aDastAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvA
   nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ	nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam
   saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ	saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye upariṣṭād diśi	pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye uparizwAt diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH nAnA budDa kzetrezu upapannAH tAn
   sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṅghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena tāmś ca	sarvAn budDa Sabdam Darma Sabdam saFGa Sabdam saMSrAvayitu kAmena tAmH ca
   sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	sattvAn samyak dRzwyAm pratizWA payitu kAmena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   iti dharmoddānasahagata ānandaśabdopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra	iti Darma uddAna sahagataH Ananda Sabda upamaH punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu	boDisattvena mahAsattvena ye pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā	lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te mama anuBAvena cakzuzA
   rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa	rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam vaDirAH SrotreNa
   śabdān śroṣyantīti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante iti nagnāś cailāni	SabdAn Srozyanti iti unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante iti nagnAH ca elAni
   pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā bhviṣyantīti	pratilapsyante iti jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa pAtrAH Bvizyanti iti
   apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca	apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante manuzya Atma BAvan ca
   pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti asamāhitān	pratilapsyante iti duHSIlAn SIla skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti asamAhitAn
   samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe	samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktān vimutiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimuktAn vimuti skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSan skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti sakṛdāgāmiphale	awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti sakRdAgAmi Pale
   anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pratyekabodhau	anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye dakziNasyAm diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante	evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante
   iti nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā	iti nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa pAtrA
   bhviṣyantīti apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante	Bvizyanti iti apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante
   manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktān vimutiskandhe	duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimuktAn vimuti skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanskandhe	pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSan skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pratyekabodhau	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye paścimāyāṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante	evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante
   iti nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā	iti nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa pAtrA
   bhviṣyantīti apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante	Bvizyanti iti apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante
   manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktān vimutiskandhe	duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimuktAn vimuti skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanskandhe	pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSan skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pratyekabodhau	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye uttarasyāṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye uttarasyAm diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante	evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante
   iti nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā	iti nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa pAtrA
   bhviṣyantīti apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante	Bvizyanti iti apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante
   manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktān vimutiskandhe	duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimuktAn vimuti skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanskandhe	pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSan skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pratyekabodhau	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye uttara pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante	evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante
   iti nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā	iti nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa pAtrA
   bhviṣyantīti apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante	Bvizyanti iti apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante
   manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktān vimutiskandhe	duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimuktAn vimuti skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanskandhe	pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSan skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pratyekabodhau	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam

   iti nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā	iti nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa pAtrA
   bhviṣyantīti apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante	Bvizyanti iti apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante
   manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti

   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti

   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te

   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ye ūrdhvaṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam ye UrDvam diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante	evam vaDirAH SrotreNa SabdAn Srozyanti iti unmattAH smRtim pratilapsyante
   iti nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā	iti nagnAH ca elAni pratilapsyante iti jiGatsitAH sattvAH pUrNa pAtrA
   bhviṣyantīti apāyopapannāś ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante	Bvizyanti iti apAya upapannAH ca sattvAH sarva apAyeByaH vimokzyante
   manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān śīlaskandhe	manuzya Atma BAvan ca pratilapsyante iti duHSIlAn SIla skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti asamāhitān samādhiskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti asamAhitAn samADi skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   duṣprajñān prajñāskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktān vimutiskandhe	duzprajQAn prajQA skanDe pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimuktAn vimuti skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanskandhe	pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSan skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pratyekabodhau	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti ekāyanamārgasahagato	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti ekAyana mArga sahagataH 
   nadīsrotopamaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	nadI srota upamaH punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   tathāgateryāpathe śikṣitumāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ	taTAgateH yApaTe Sikzitum Amena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA evam
   upaparīkṣitavyam kadā nv ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam (PSP1: 33) avalokayiṣyāmīti	upaparIkzitavyam kadA nu aham nAga avalokitam (PSP1: 33) avalokayizyAmi iti
   kim ity ahaṃ pṛthivīṃ caturaṅgulam aspṛśan padbhyāṃ gaccheyam iti	kim iti aham pRTivIm catur aFgulam aspRSan padByAm gacCeyam iti
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam kim ity ahaṃ	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA evam upaparIkzitavyam kim iti aham
   cāturmahārājakāyikais trayastriṃśair yāmairs tuṣitair nirmāṇaratibhiḥ	cAturmahArAja kAyikEH trayastriMSEH yAmEH H tuzitEH nirmANa ratiBiH
   paranirmitavaśavartibhir brahmakāyikair brahmapurohitair brahmapāriṣadyaiḥ	paranirmita vaSavartiBiH brahmakAyikEH brahma purohitEH brahma pArizadyEH
   parīttābhaiḥ apramāṇābhair ābhāsvaraiḥ parīttaśubhair apramāṇaśubhaiḥ	parItta ABEH apramANa ABEH ABAsvarEH parItta SuBEH apramANa SuBEH
   śubhakṛtsnair anabhrakaiḥ puṇyaprasavair bṛhatphalair asaṃjñisattvaiḥ	SuBa kRtsnEH anaBrakEH puNya prasavEH bRhat PalEH asaMjQi sattvEH
   śuddhāvāsair aspṛhair atapaiḥ sadṛśaiḥ sudarśanair akaniṣṭhaiś ca	SudDAvAsEH aspRhEH atapEH sadRSEH sudarSanEH akanizWEH ca
   parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'nekadevaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair	parivRtaH puraskRtaH aneka deva putra kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH 
   bodhimaṇḍadrumamūlam upasaṃkrameyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	boDimaNxa druma mUlam upasaMkrameyam iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   evam upaparīkṣitavyam kim iti ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā	evam upaparIkzitavyam kim iti ye cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH trayastriMSA
   yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā	yAmAH tuzitA nirmANaratayaH paranirmitavaSavartinaH brahmakAyikA
   brahmapurohitā brahmapāriṣadyāḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ	brahma purohitAH brahma pArizadyAH parItta ABAH apramANa ABAH ABAsvarAH
   parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā	parItta SuBAH apramANa SuBAH SuBa kRtsnA anaBrakAH puNya prasavA bRhatPalA
   asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā aspṛhā atapāḥ sadṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca	asaMjQi sattvAH SudDAvAsAH aspRhAH atapAH sadRSAH sudarSanAH akanizWAH ca
   devāḥ bodhimaṇḍadrumamūlaṃ pratisaṃstareyur iti prajñāpāramitāyām	devAH boDimaNxa druma mUlam pratisaMstareyuH iti prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāPāramitāYāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ	prajQAPAra mita aYAm caratA evam upaparIkzitavyam kim iti me anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato vā tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇasya	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya gacCataH vA tizWataH vA nizaNasya
   śayānasya vā sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ santiṣṭhate iti	SayAnasya vA sa pRTivI pradeSaH vajra mayaH santizWate iti
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāPāramitāYāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam kim ity ahaṃ	mahAsattvena prajQAPAra mita aYAm caratA evam upaparIkzitavyam kim iti aham
   yatraiva divase niṣkrāmeyaṃ (PSP1: 34) tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ	yatra eva divase nizkrAmeyam (PSP1: 34) tatra eva divase anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam iti tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyeyam iti tatra eva divase Darma cakram
   pravartayeyam iti dharmacakraṃ ca me pravartayamānasyāsaṃkhyeyānām	pravartayeyam iti Darma cakram ca me pravartayamAnasya asaMKyeyAnAm
   aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cirajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur vimucyed	aprameyANAm sattvAnAm cira jaH vigata malam Darmezu Darma cakzuH vimucyet 
   iti asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni	iti asaMKyeyAnAm aprameyANAm sattvAnAm anupAdAya AsraveByaH cittAni
   vimucyeyur iti asaṃkhyeyā aprameyāḥ sattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyur	vimucyeyuH iti asaMKyeyAH aprameyAH sattvAH avinivartanIyAH BaveyuH 
   anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ	anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evam	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm evam
   upaparīkṣitavyam kim iti me 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvakasaṃṅhaḥ syād ity	upaparIkzitavyam kim iti me aprameyaH asaMKyeyaH SrAvaka saMFhaH syAt iti 
   aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ekadharmadeśanāyā ekāsanikā bodhisattvā	aprameyAH asaMKyeyAH sattvAH eka Darma deSanAyAH eka AsanikA boDisattvA
   bhaveyur avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti asaṃkhyeyaś	BaveyuH avinivartanIyAH anuttarAyAH samyaksaMboDeH iti asaMKyeyaS
   cāprameyaś ca bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaved iti aparimitaṃ cāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaved	ca aprameyaH ca boDisattva saMGaH Bavet iti aparimitam ca AyuH pramANam Bavet 
   iti aparimitā ca prabhāsampad bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	iti aparimitA ca praBA sampad Bavet iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evam	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm evam
   upaparīkṣitavyam kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya	upaparIkzitavyam kim iti me anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya
   tasmin buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohāyatanāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ	tasmin budDa kzetre rAga dveza moha AyatanAni sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam
   na bhaveyur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra	na BaveyuH iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evam upaparīkṣitavyam kim iti	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm evam upaparIkzitavyam kim iti
   me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpayā prajñayā sattvāḥ	me anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya evaMrUpayA prajQayA sattvAH
   samanvāgatā bhaveyur yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavantaḥ evam	samanvAgatAH BaveyuH yat anya budDa kzetra sTAH budDAH BagavantaH evam
   udānam udānayeyuḥ sādhu śamaḥ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu	udAnam udAnayeyuH sADu SamaH sADu damaH sADu saMyamaH sADu

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvena
