   tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran	tat kasya hetoH na hi boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran
   kasyacid dharmasya saṃbhedaṃ samanupaśyati evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo	kasyacid Darmasya saMBedam samanupaSyati evam SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛtaśaḥ	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran na divyasya cakzuzaH kRtaSas 
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na divyasya śrotrasya kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm carati na divyasya Srotrasya kRtaSas prajQApAramitAyAm
   carati na paracittajñānasya kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati (PSP1: 54) na	carati na para citta jQAnasya kRtaSas prajQApAramitAyAm carati (PSP1: 54) na
   pūrvanivāsānusmṛteḥ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na ṛddhividheḥ	pUrva nivAsa anusmRteH kRtaSas prajQApAramitAyAm carati na RdDi viDeH
   kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	kRtaSas prajQApAramitAyAm carati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyati kuta eva	prajQApAramitAyAm caran prajQApAramitAm eva na samanupaSyati kutas eva
   bodhisattvaṃ kuta eva sarvākāraṃ sarvābhijñāḥ evaṃ hi śāriptura	boDisattvam kutas eva sarva AkAram sarva aBijQAH evam hi SAriptuH a
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ punar	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran yuktaH iti vaktavyaH punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato	aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH 
   naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	na evam Bavati aham divyena cakzuzA pUrvasyam diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān	lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn
   śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam	SrozyAm iti tezAm eva ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam
   anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya	anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA Darmam deSayizyAmi iti evam SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati aham divyena cakzuzA dakziNasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti
   divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti	divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn SrozyAm iti tezAm eva ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti
   teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti	tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA Darmam deSayizyAmi iti
   evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ divyena	evam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati aham divyena
   cakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ	cakzuzA paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva	cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn SrozyAm iti tezAm eva
   ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā	ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA
   dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ	Darmam deSayizyAmi iti evam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam
   bhavati ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	Bavati aham divyena cakzuzA uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān	lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn
   śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam	SrozyAm iti tezAm eva ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam
   anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya	anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA Darmam deSayizyAmi iti evam SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi	mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati aham divyena cakzuzA uttara pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti
   divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti	divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn SrozyAm iti tezAm eva ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti
   teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti	tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA Darmam deSayizyAmi iti
   evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ divyena	evam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati aham divyena
   cakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ	cakzuzA pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva	cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn SrozyAm iti tezAm eva
   ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā	ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA
   dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ	Darmam deSayizyAmi iti evam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam
   bhavati ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	Bavati aham divyena cakzuzA dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān	lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn
   śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam	SrozyAm iti tezAm eva ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam
   anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya	anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA Darmam deSayizyAmi iti evam SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paścimottarasyām diśi	mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati aham divyena cakzuzA paScima uttarasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti
   divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti	divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn SrozyAm iti tezAm eva ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti
   teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti	tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA Darmam deSayizyAmi iti
   evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ divyena	evam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam Bavati aham divyena
   cakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ	cakzuzA aDastAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān śroṣyāmiti teṣām eva	cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn SrozyAm iti tezAm eva
   ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā	ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA
   dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ	Darmam deSayizyAmi iti evam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na evam
   bhavati ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	Bavati aham divyena cakzuzA UrDvam diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ jñāsyāmīti divyena śrotreṇaiṣāṃ śabdān	lokaDAtuzu sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam jQAsyAmi iti divyena SrotreNa ezAm SabdAn
   śroṣyāmīti teṣām eva ca cittāni jñāsyāmīti teṣām eva ca pūrvanivāsam	SrozyAmi iti tezAm eva ca cittAni jQAsyAmi iti tezAm eva ca pUrva nivAsam
   anusmṛtya ṛddhyā gatvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti (PSP1: 55) evaṃ hi śāriputra	anusmRtya RdDyA gatvA Darmam deSayizyAmi iti (PSP1: 55) evam hi SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran aprameyAn asaMKyeyAn
   aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayan yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ hi śāriputa	aparimANAn sattvAn parinirvApayan yuktaH iti vaktavyaH evam hi SAriputa
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH mAraH pApIyAn
   avatāraṃ na labhate sarve cāsyānye 'pi laukikā ye kecit kleśās te sarve	avatAram na laBate sarve ca asya anye api lOkikAH ye kecid kleSAH te sarve
   dalitā bhavanti ye 'pi te śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto	dalitAH Bavanti ye api te SAriputra pUrvasyAm diSi budDAH BagavantaH 
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu tizWanti Driyante yApayanti Darmam ca
   deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca	deSayanti ye ca tezAm SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye ca
   cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ	cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH trayastriMSAH yAmAH tuzitAH nirmANaratayaH
   paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ	paranirmitavaSavartinaH brahmapArzadyAH brahma purohitAH mahAbrahmANaH
   parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā	parItta ABAH apramANa ABAH ABAsvarAH parItta SuBAH apramANa SuBAH SuBa kRtsnA
   anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ	anaBrakAH puNya prasavAH bRhat PalAH asaMjQi sattvAH SudDAvAsAH avRhAH atapAH
   sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	sudRSAH sudarSanAH akanizWAH devAH te api tam boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   rakṣanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṃ	rakzanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kaScid antarAyam
   kārṣīt ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti	kArzIt ye api asya kecid kAyikAH dozAH te api asya dRzwa DArmikAH Bavanti
   tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati ye 'pi te	tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sa sarva sattvAt mEtryA sParati ye api te
   śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	SAriputra dakziNasyAm diSi budDAH BagavantaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ	lokaDAtuzu tizWanti Driyante yApayanti Darmam ca deSayanti ye ca tezAm
   śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā	SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye ca cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH trayastriMSA
   yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā	yAmAH tuzitAH nirmANaratayaH paranirmitavaSavartinaH brahmapArzadyA
   brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ	brahma purohitAH mahA brahmANaH parItta ABAH apramANa ABAH ABAsvarAH
   parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā	parItta SuBAH apramANa SuBAH SuBa kRtsnA anaBrakAH puNya prasavA bRhatPalA
   asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās	asaMjQi sattvAH SudDAvAsAH avRhAH atapAH sudRSAH sudarSanA akanizWA devAH 
   te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ rakṣanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya	te api tam boDisattvam mahAsattvam rakzanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṃ kārṣīt ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te	mahAsattvasya kaScid antarAyam kArzIt ye api asya kecid kAyikAH dozAH te
   'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa sarvasattvān	api asya dRzwa DArmikAH Bavanti tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sa sarva sattvAn
   maitryā spharati ye 'pi te śāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto	mEtryA sParati ye api te SAriputra paScimAyAm diSi budDAH BagavantaH 
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu tizWanti Driyante yApayanti Darmam ca
   deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca	deSayanti ye ca tezAm SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye ca
   cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ	cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH trayastriMSAH yAmAH tuzitAH nirmANaratayaH
   paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ	paranirmitavaSavartinaH brahmapArzadyAH brahma purohitAH mahAbrahmANaH
   parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā	parItta ABAH apramANa ABAH ABAsvarAH parItta SuBAH apramANa SuBAH SuBa kRtsnA
   anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ	anaBrakAH puNya prasavAH bRhat PalAH asaMjQi sattvAH SudDAvAsAH avRhAH atapAH
   sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	sudRSAH sudarSanAH akanizWAH devAH te api tam boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   rakṣanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṃ	rakzanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kaScid antarAyam
   kārṣīt ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te 'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti	kArzIt ye api asya kecid kAyikAH dozAH te api asya dRzwa DArmikAH Bavanti
   tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa sarvasattvān maitryā spharati (PSP1: 56) ye	tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sa sarva sattvAt mEtryA sParati (PSP1: 56) ye
   'pi te śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	api te SAriputraH uttarasyAm diSi budDAH BagavantaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ	lokaDAtuzu tizWanti Driyante yApayanti Darmam ca deSayanti ye ca tezAm
   śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā	SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye ca cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH trayastriMSA
   yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā	yAmAH tuzitAH nirmANaratayaH paranirmitavaSavartinaH brahmapArzadyA
   brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ	brahma purohitAH mahA brahmANaH parItta ABAH apramANa ABAH ABAsvarAH
   parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā	parItta SuBAH apramANa SuBAH SuBa kRtsnA anaBrakAH puNya prasavA bRhatPalA
   asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās	asaMjQi sattvAH SudDAvAsAH avRhAH atapAH sudRSAH sudarSanA akanizWA devAH 
   te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ rakṣanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya	te api tam boDisattvam mahAsattvam rakzanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kaścid antarāyaṃ kārṣīt ye 'py asya kecit kāyikā doṣās te	mahAsattvasya kaScid antarAyam kArzIt ye api asya kecid kAyikAH dozAH te
   'py asya dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa sarvasattvān	api asya dRzwa DArmikAH Bavanti tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sa sarva sattvAn
   maitryā spharati ye'pi te śāriputra uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi	mEtryA sParati ye api te SAriputraH uttara pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante
   yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye	yApayanti Darmam ca deSayanti ye ca tezAm SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye
   ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya	ca cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH yAvat akanizWAH devAH te api tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya rakzAm kurvanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāntarāyo bhūd iti ye'pi te śāriputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	mahAsattvasya antarAyaH BUt iti ye api te SAriputra pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante
   yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye	yApayanti Darmam ca deSayanti ye ca tezAm SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye
   ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya	ca cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH yAvat akanizWAH devAH te api tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya rakzAm kurvanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāntarāyo bhūd iti ye'pi te śāriputra dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi	mahAsattvasya antarAyaH BUt iti ye api te SAriputra dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante
   yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye	yApayanti Darmam ca deSayanti ye ca tezAm SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye
   ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya	ca cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH yAvat akanizWAH devAH te api tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya rakzAm kurvanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāntarāyo bhūd iti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvasya antarAyaH BUt iti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāntarāyo bhūd iti ye'pi te śāriputra paścimottarasyāṃ diśi	mahAsattvasya antarAyaH BUt iti ye api te SAriputra paScima uttarasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante
   yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye	yApayanti Darmam ca deSayanti ye ca tezAm SrAvakAH ye ca pratyekabudDAH ye
   ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya	ca cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH yAvat akanizWAH devAH te api tasya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ kurvanti mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya rakzAm kurvanti mA Kalu asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāntarāyo bhūd iti ye'pi te śāriputra adhastād diśi	mahAsattvasya antarAyaH BUt iti ye api te SAriputra aDastAt diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu budDAH BagavantaH tizWanti Driyante

   niṣpādayanti pāramitāsu ca caranti tena ca dhyānalābhena dīrghāyuṣkeṣu	nizpAdayanti pAramitAsu ca caranti tena ca DyAna lABena dIrGa Ayuzkezu
   deveṣūpapadyante sacet tataś cyutvā manuṣyeṣu deveṣu vā upapadyante	devezu upapadyante saced tatas cyutvA manuzyezu devezu vE upapadyante
   buddhāṃś ca bhagavata ārāgayiṣyanti (PSP1: 62) teṣām api dhanvānīndriyāṇi	budDAn ca BagavataH ArAgayizyanti (PSP1: 62) tezAm api DanvAni indriyANi
   bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānāni ca	Bavanti na tIkzNAni santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH DyAnAni ca
   samāpadyante prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca caranti te cānupāyakauśalyena dhyānāny	samApadyante prajQApAramitAyAm ca caranti te ca anupAya kOSalyena DyAnAni 
   utsṛjya kāmadhātāv upapadyante teṣām api śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ	utsRjya kAmaDAtO upapadyante tezAm api SAriputra boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni iti	mahAsattvAnAm DanvAni indriyANi Bavanti na tIkzNAni iti
   dvitīyatṛtīyaphalapratipannakaḥ śraddhādhimuktaḥ santi śāriputra	dvitIya tRtIya Pala pratipannakaH SradDA aDimuktaH santi SAriputra
   bodhisattvā mahasattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpādya catvāryapramāṇāni	boDisattvAH mahasattvAH catvAri DyAnAni utpAdya catvAri apramANAni
   samāpadyante catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ	samApadyante catasraH ArUpya samApattIH
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇaṛddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān samāpadyante	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAn samApadyante
   mahākāruṇikā upāyakauśalyena copapadyante na dhyānavaśena nāpramāṇavaśena	mahA kAruNikAH upAya kOSalyena ca upapadyante na DyAna vaSena na apramANa vaSena
   nārūpyasamāpattivaśena tatra copapadyante yatra tathāgatān arhataḥ	na arUpya samApatti vaSena tatra ca upapadyante yatra taTAgatAn arhataH
   samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti te punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitā	samyaksaMbudDAn ArAgayizyanti te punar prajQApAramitA vihAreNa avirahitA
   ihaiva bhadrakalpe anuttarāṃ samykasaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante iti	iha eva Badra kalpe anuttarAm samyka saMboDim aBisaMBotsyante iti
   dvitīyatṛtīyaphalapratipannako dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā	dvitIya tRtIya Pala pratipannakaH dRzwi prAptaH santi SAriputra boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena	mahAsattvAH eka jAti pratibadDAH ye prajQApAramitAyAm carantaH upAya kOSalyena
   catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārupyasamāpattīḥ	catvAri DyAnAni samApadyante catvAri apramANAni catasraH Arupya samApattIH
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayanti	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAn BAvayanti
   śūnyatāsamādhiṃ samāpadyante animittasamādhiṃ samāpadyante	SUnyatA samADim samApadyante animitta samADim samApadyante
   apraṇihitasamādhiṃ samāpadyante (PSP1: 63) na ca teṣāṃ vaśena gacchanti	apraNihita samADim samApadyante (PSP1: 63) na ca tezAm vaSena gacCanti
   saṃmukhībhūtāṃś ca buddhān bhagavata ārāgayitvā tatra brahmacaryaṃ caritvā	saMmuKIBUtAn ca budDAn BagavataH ArAgayitvA tatra brahmacaryam caritvA
   punar eva tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgagatāyai upapadyante te tatra yāvad āyus	punar eva tuzitAnAm devAnAm sa BAga gatAyE upapadyante te tatra yAvat AyuH 
   tiṣṭhanti te tatra yāvad āyuḥ sthitvā ahīnendriyāḥ smṛtimantaḥ	tizWanti te tatra yAvat AyuH sTitvA ahIna indriyAH smRtimantaH
   saṃprajānanto anekair devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā	saMprajAnantaH anekEH deva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH parivRtAH puraskRtA
   ihopapattiṃ sarśayitvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim	iha upapattim sarSayitvA nAnA budDa kzetrezu anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   abhisaṃbuddhyante iti sakṛdāgāmī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ	aBisaMbudDi ante iti sakRdAgAmI santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH
   ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhino ye na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātāv	zaNNAm aBijQAnAm lABinaH ye na kAmaDAtO na rUpa DAtO na ArUpya DAtO= 
   upapadyante api tu buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti tathāgatān	upapadyante api tu budDa kzetreNa budDa kzetram saMkrAmanti taTAgatAn
   arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvanto gurūkurvanto mānayantaḥ pūjayantaḥ	arhataH samyaksaMbudDAn satkurvantaH gurUkurvantaH mAnayantaH pUjayantaH
   santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te	santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH zaNNAm aBijQAnAm lABinaH te
   tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti	tABiH aBijQABiH vikrIxantaH budDa kzetreNa budDa kzetram saMkrAmanti
   yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya prajñaptir apy asti	yezu budDa kzetrezu na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa yAnasya prajQaptiH api asti
   santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te	santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH zaNNAm aBijQAnAm lABinaH te
   tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti	tABiH aBijQABiH vikrIxantaH budDa kzetreNa budDa kzetram saMkrAmanti
   yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv amitam (PSP1: 64) āyuḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā	yezu budDa kzetrezu amitam (PSP1: 64) AyuH santi SAriputra boDisattvA
   mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ ye lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ	mahAsattvAH zaNNAm aBijQAnAm lABinaH ye lokaDAtoH lokaDAtum
   saṃkrāmanti te tatropasaṃkramya yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na	saMkrAmanti te tatra upasaMkramya yatra na budDa SabdaH na Darma SabdaH na
   saṅghaśabdas tatrāvasthitāḥ buddhaśabdaṃ ca dharmaśabdaṃ ca saṅghaśabdaṃ	saFGa SabdaH tatra avasTitAH budDa Sabdam ca Darma Sabdam ca saFGa Sabdam
   ca sattvānāṃ saṃśrāvayanti trayāṇāṃ ca ratnānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante te tena	ca sattvAnAm saMSrAvayanti trayANAm ca ratnAnAm varNam BAzante te tena
   buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṅghaśabdena tataś cyutā yatra yatra buddhā	budDa Sabdena Darma Sabdena saFGa Sabdena tatas cyutA yatra yatra budDA
   bhagavanto bhavanti te tatra tatropapadyante iti anāgāmī santi śāriputra	BagavantaH Bavanti te tatra tatra upapadyante iti anAgAmI santi SAriputra
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni utpādya catvāry apramāṇāni	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH catvAri DyAnAni utpAdya catvAri apramANAni
   catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante te copāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ	catasraH ArUpya samApattIH samApadyante te ca upAya kOSalyena samanvAgatAH
   samādhisamāpattibhyo nivṛtya kāmadhātāv upapadyante kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu	samADi samApattiByaH nivRtya kAmaDAtO upapadyante kzatriya mahASAla kulezu
   vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu vā upapadyante	vA brAhmaNa mahASAla kulezu vA gRhapati mahA SAla kulezu vA upapadyante
   sattvaparipākāya iti ayaṃ manuṣyakulaṃ kulaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā	sattva paripAkAya iti ayam manuzya kulam kulaH santi SAriputra boDisattvA
   mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante catvāry apramāṇāni catasra	mahAsattvAH catvAri DyAnAni samApadyante catvAri apramANAni catasra
   ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante te 'py upāyakauśalyabalena	ArUpya samApattIH samApadyante te api upAya kOSalya balena
   dhyānasamādhisamāpattivaśena vā cāturmahārājakāyikānām api devānāṃ	DyAna samADi samApatti vaSena vA cAturmahArAja kAyikAnAm api devAnAm
   sabhāgatāyai upapadyante trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ	saBA gatAyE upapadyante trayastriMSAnAm yAmAnAm tuzitAnAm nirmANa ratInAm
   paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante te (PSP1: 65) tatra	paranirmita vaSavartinAm saBA gatAyE upapadyante te (PSP1: 65) tatra
   sthitvā sattvān paripācayanti buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti buddhāṃś ca	sTitvA sattvAn paripAcayanti budDa kzetram ca pariSoDayanti budDAn ca
   bhagavata ārāgayanti santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri	BagavataH ArAgayanti santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH catvAri
   dhyānāni utpādya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante	DyAnAni utpAdya catvAri apramANAni catasraH ArUpya samApattIH samApadyante
   te tataś cyutāḥ santa upāyakauśalyena brahmaloke yāvad akaniṣṭhe	te tatas cyutAH santaH upAya kOSalyena brahma loke yAvat akanizWe
   upapadyante te tatra bhavanti brahmāṇo mahābrahmāṇas teṣu brahmabhavaneṣu	upapadyante te tatra Bavanti brahmANaH mahAbrahmANaH tezu brahma Bavanezu
   tiṣṭhanti te tatra sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti ye ca	tizWanti te tatra sTitvA budDa kzetreNa budDa kzetram saMkrAmanti ye ca
   teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tāṃs tathāgatān	tezu budDa kzetrezu taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH tAn taTAgatAn
   dharmacakrapravartanāyādhyeṣayanti iti devakulaṃ kulaḥ santi śāriputra	Darma cakra pravartanAya aDyezayanti iti devakulam kulaH santi SAriputra
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino yāvad aṣṭādaśānām	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye caturNAm DyAnAnAm lABinaH yAvat azwAdaSAnAm
   āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhinas teṣāṃ cānurodhāya caranti caturṇām	AveNikAnAm budDa DarmANAm lABinaH tezAm ca anuroDAya caranti caturNAm
   āryasatyānāṃ lābhino na ca tāni pratividhyanti te punar bodhisattvā	Arya satyAnAm lABinaH na ca tAni prativiDyanti te punar boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā veditavyāḥ ity akavīcikaḥ santi śāriputra	mahAsattvAH eka jAti pratibadDAH veditavyAH iti akavIcikaH santi SAriputra
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya caturNAm DyAnAnAm
   lābhino bhavanti caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ lābhino bhavanti catasṛṇām	lABinaH Bavanti caturNAm apramANAnAm lABinaH Bavanti catasRNAm
   ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhino bhavanti	ArUpya samApattInAm lABinaH Bavanti
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayanti	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAn BAvayanti
   balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān (PSP1: 66) pratilabhante	bala vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNika budDa DarmAn (PSP1: 66) pratilaBante
   upāyakauśalyena brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyante	upAya kOSalyena brahmakAyikezu devezu yAvat akanizWezu devezu upapadyante
   tatra cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ kurvanti	tatra ca anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya sattvAnAm arTam kurvanti
   ity antarāparinirvāyī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye	iti antara aparinirvAyI santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye
   prathamacittotpādenaivānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante	praTama citta utpAdena eva anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante
   dharmacakraṃ pravartayanty aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ	Darma cakram pravartayanti aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm sattvAnAm ca arTam
   kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti teṣāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kalpaṃ	kRtvA nirupaDi Seze nirvANa DAtO parinirvAnti tezAm parinirvRtAnAm kalpam
   vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā saddharmas tiṣṭhati ity upapadyaparinirvāyī santi	vA kalpa avaSezam vA sadDarmaH tizWati iti upapadi a parinirvAyI santi
   śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto lokadhātor	SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye zaz pAramitAsu carantaH loka DAtoH 
   lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti tatra ca sattvān bodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti te	lokaDAtum saMkrAmanti tatra ca sattvAn boDaye pratizWApayizyanti te
   nityam udyuktāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo na kadācid anarthasaṃhitāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante	nityam udyuktAH sattvAnAm kRtaSas na kadAcid anarTa saMhitAm vAcam BAzante
   sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo nityam udyuktā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti	sattvAnAm kRtaSas nityam udyuktAH budDa kzetreNa budDa kzetram saMkrAmanti
   te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'saṃkhyeyair aprameyaiḥ	te api boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sattvAnAm kRtaSas asaMKyeyEH aprameyEH
   kalpair jānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante ity	kalpEH jAna abudDa kzetrezu anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante iti 
   abhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye	aBisaMskAra parinirvAyI santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye
   prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvanyāsam avakrāmanti avinivartanīyabhūmau	praTama citta utpAdena eva boDisattva nyAsam avakrAmanti avinivartanIya BUmO
   vā avatiṣṭhante sarvabuddhadharmān (PSP1: 67) vā samudānayanti santi	vA avatizWante sarva budDa DarmAn (PSP1: 67) vA samudAnayanti santi
   śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādenaiva	SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye praTama citta utpAdena eva
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyante te 'nekair	prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apadyante te anekEH 
   bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ	boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH sArDam budDa kzetreNa budDa kzetram
   svabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya saṃkrāmanti nānābuddhakṣetreṣu cānuttarāṃ	sva budDa kzetra pariSoDanAya saMkrAmanti nAnA budDa kzetrezu ca anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante ity anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī santi	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante iti anaBisaMskAra parinirvAyI santi
   śāriputra bodhisattvā mahasattvā ye ṣaṭsu parimitāsu carantaś cakravartino	SAriputra boDisattvAH mahasattvAH ye zawsu parimitAsu carantaH cakravartinaH 
   bhūtvā dānapāramitāṃ puraskṛtya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānāny	BUtvA dAna pAramitAm puraskRtya sarva sattvAnAm sarva suKa upaDAnAni 
   upasaṃhariṣyanti annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyaḥ evaṃ	upasaMharizyanti annam anna arTikeByaH pAnam pAna arTikeByaH evam
   gandhamālyavilepanacūrṇadhūpaśayanāsanopāśrayagṛhadhanadhānyamaṇimuktāsuvarṇarūpyapravāḍābharaṇāni	ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa DUpa Sayana Asana upASraya gRha Dana DAnya maNi muktA suvarNa rUpya pravAxa ABaraNAni
   jīvitopakaraṇāni upasaṃhariṣyanti yāvad daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu sattvān	jIvita upakaraNAni upasaMharizyanti yAvat daSa kuSala karma paTezu sattvAn
   pratiṣṭhāpya brahmakāyikeṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyamānā	pratizWApya brahmakAyikezu yAvat akanizWezu devezu upapadyamAnA
   nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante ity	nAnA budDa kzetrezu anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante iti 
   akaniṣṭhaparamaḥ santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye catvāri	akanizWa paramaH santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye catvAri
   dhyānāni niṣpādya dhyānebhyaḥ parihīṇāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam āsādya	DyAnAni nizpAdya DyAneByaH parihINAH praTamam DyAnam AsAdya
   brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyante te punar dhyānāni	brahmakAyikezu devezu upapadyante te punar DyAnAni
   niṣpādyākaniṣṭheṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim	nizpAdya akanizWezu upapadya nAnA budDa kzetrezu anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   abhisaṃbudhyante iti plutaḥ (PSP1: 68) santi śāriputra bodhisattvā	aBisaMbuDyante iti plutaH (PSP1: 68) santi SAriputra boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā ye brahmalokāc cyutvā śuddhāvāseṣūpapadyante te śuddhāvāsānām	mahAsattvAH ye brahma lokAt cyutvA SudDAvAsezu upapadyante te SudDAvAsAnAm
   ekaṃ vā dve vā sthāne vilaṃdhyākaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadya nānābuddhakṣetreṣv	ekam vA dve vA sTAne vilaMDyA kanizWezu devezu upapadya nAnA budDa kzetrezu 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante ity ardhaplutaḥ santi śāriputra	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante iti arDa plutaH santi SAriputra
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathāgatasadṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye taTAgata sadRSam Atma BAvam aBinirmAya
   tuṣitabhavanaṃ pariśodhya brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu	tuzita Bavanam pariSoDya brahmakAyikezu devezu yAvat akanizWezu
   deveṣūpapadyopāyakauśalyena nairayikāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti	devezu upapadya upAya kOSalyena nErayikANAm sattvAnAm Darmam deSayanti
   tiryagyonigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti yamalaukikānāṃ sattvānāṃ	tiryagyoni gatAnAm sattvAnAm Darmam deSayanti yama lOkikAnAm sattvAnAm
   dharmaṃ deśayanti santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu	Darmam deSayanti santi SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye zawsu
   parimitāsu sthitvā yādṛśas tathāgatakāyas tādṛśam ātmabhāvam abhinirmāya	parimitAsu sTitvA yAdRSaH taTAgata kAyaH tAdRSam Atma BAvam aBinirmAya
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAni budDa kzetrANi upasaMkramya sattvAnAm Darmam
   deśayanti tathāgatāṃś ca paryupāsate buddhakṣetraṃ ca niṣpādayanti dharmaṃ	deSayanti taTAgatAn ca paryupAsate budDa kzetram ca nizpAdayanti Darmam
   ca śṛṇvanti evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām	ca SRNvanti evam pUrvasyAm diSi dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm

   adhaḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	aDas sarvAsu daSasu dikzu ekEkasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu

   mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto	mahAsattvAH ye zaz pAramitAsu carantaH

   70) nātmānam utkarṣayanti na parān peṣayanti santi śāriputra bodhisattvā	70) na AtmAnam utkarzayanti na parAn pezayanti santi SAriputra boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ	mahAsattvAH ye praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya dAna pAramitAyAm SIla pAramitAyAm
   sthitvā naivaṃ kadācid apāyadurgativinipāteṣūpapadyante yāvad	sTitvA na evam kadAcid apAya durgati vinipAtezu upapadyante yAvat

   sattvebhyo dattvā tān eva daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu patiṣṭhāpayanti santi	sattveByaH dattvA tAn eva daSa kuSala karma paTezu patizWApayanti santi

   dhyānānāṃ lābhinaś catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinas te tābhir	DyAnAnAm lABinaH catasRNAm ArUpya samApattInAm lABinaH te tABiH

   mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya daśa kuśalā karmapathā	mahAsattvasya praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya daSa kuSalA karma paTA

   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kāyam	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran na kAyam
   upalabhate na vācam upalabhate na mana upalabhate na dānapāramitām	upalaBate na vAcam upalaBate na manaH upalaBate na dAna pAramitAm
   upalabhate na śīlapāramittām upalabhate na kṣāntipāramitām upalabhate na	upalaBate na SIla pAramittAm upalaBate na kzAnti pAramitAm upalaBate na
   vīryapāramitām upalabhate na dhyānapāramitām upalabhate na prajñāpāramitām	vIrya pAramitAm upalaBate na DyAna pAramitAm upalaBate na prajQApAramitAm
   upalabhate na śrāvakam upalabhate na pratyekabuddham upalabhate na	upalaBate na SrAvakam upalaBate na pratyekabudDam upalaBate na
   bodhisattvam upalabhate na buddham upalabhate ayaṃ śāriputra	boDisattvam upalaBate na budDam upalaBate ayam SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yad uta sarvadharmānupalambho	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya boDi mArgaH yat uta sarva Darma anupalamBaH 
   'nena mārgeṇa gacchan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran na	anena mArgeNa gacCan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu caran na
   śakyo 'vamarditum ity aśaktyavavādaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo	SakyaH avamarditum iti aSakti avavAdaH punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran (PSP1: 75) na rūpam manyate na vedanāṃ	mahAsattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu caran (PSP1: 75) na rUpam manyate na vedanAm
   manyate na saṃjñāṃ manyate na saṃskārān manyate na vijñānaṃ manyate na	manyate na saMjQAm manyate na saMskArAt manyate na vijQAnam manyate na
   pṛthivīdhātuṃ manyate nābdhātuṃ manyate na tejodhātuṃ manyate na	pRTivI DAtum manyate na abDAtum manyate na tejaH DAtum manyate na
   vāyudhātuṃ manyate nākāśadhātuṃ manyate na vijñānadhātuṃ manyate na	vAyuDAtum manyate na AkASa DAtum manyate na vijQAna DAtum manyate na
   cakṣurdhātuṃ manyate na rūpadhātuṃ manyate na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ manyate	cakzuH DAtum manyate na rUpa DAtum manyate na cakzuH vijQAna DAtum manyate
   na śrotradhātuṃ manyate na śabdadhātuṃ manyate na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ	na Srotra DAtum manyate na SabdaDAtum manyate na Srotra vijQAna DAtum
   manyate na ghrāṇadhātuṃ manyate na gandhadhātuṃ manyate na	manyate na GrANa DAtum manyate na ganDaDAtum manyate na
   ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ manyate na jihvādhātuṃ manyate na rasadhātuṃ manyate	GrANa vijQAna DAtum manyate na jihvA DAtum manyate na rasaDAtum manyate
   na jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ manyate na kāyadhātuṃ manyate na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ	na jihvA avijQAna DAtum manyate na kAya DAtum manyate na sprazwavya DAtum
   manyate na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manyate na manodhātuṃ manyate na dharmadhātuṃ	manyate na kAya vijQAna DAtum manyate na manaH DAtum manyate na DarmaDAtum
   manyate na manoviñānadhātuṃ manyate na smṛtyupasthānāni manyate na	manyate na manaH viQAna DAtum manyate na smRti upasTAnAni manyate na
   samyakprahāṇāni manyate na ṛddhipādān manyate nendriyāṇi na balāni manyate	samyak prahANAni manyate na RdDi pAdAt manyate na indriyANi na balAni manyate
   na bodhyaṅgāni manyate na mārgaṃ manyate na dānapāramitāṃ manyatena	na boDi aFgAni manyate na mArgam manyate na dAna pAramitAm manyatena
   śīlapāramitāṃ manyate na kṣāntipāramitāṃ manyate na vīryapāramitāṃ manyate	SIla pAramitAm manyate na kzAnti pAramitAm manyate na vIrya pAramitAm manyate
   na dhyānapāramitāṃ manyate na prajñāpāramitāṃ manyate na vaiśāradyāni	na DyAna pAramitAm manyate na prajQApAramitAm manyate na vESAradyAni
   manyate na patisaṃvidaḥ manyate na daśatathāgatabalāni manyate	manyate na pati saMvidaH manyate na daSa taTAgata balAni manyate
   nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān manyate na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na	na azwAdaSa AveNikAn budDa DarmAt manyate na srotaApatti Palam na
   sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ manyate nārhattvaṃ manyate na	sakRdAgAmi Palam nAnA gAmi Palam manyate na arhat tvam manyate na
   pratyekabodhiṃ manyate na bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ manyate nānuttarāṃ	pratyeka boDim manyate na boDisattvam mahAsattvam manyate na anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhiṃ manyate evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭbhiḥ	samyaksaMboDim manyate evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH zawBiH
   pāramitābhir vardhate na ca kenacid avamṛdyate santi śāriputra bodhisattvā	pAramitABiH varDate na ca kenacid avamRdyate santi SAriputra boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvajñānaṃ paripūrayanti yena	mahAsattvAH ye prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA sarva jQAnam paripUrayanti yena
   jñānena samanvāgatānāṃ sarvāṇy apāyadvārāṇi pithitāni (PSP1: 76) bhavanti	jQAnena samanvAgatAnAm sarvANi apAya dvArANi piTitAni (PSP1: 76) Bavanti
   nāpi manuṣyadāridryavipattim anubhavanti nāpi tādṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ	na api manuzya dAridrya vipattim anuBavanti na api tAdRSam Atma BAvam
   parigṛhṇanti yena nindanīyā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya ity	parigRhNanti yena nindanIyAH Bavanti sa devakasya lokasya iti 
   apariśrāntyavavādaḥ śāriputra āha katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya	apariSrAnti avavAdaH SAriputraH Aha katamat Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya sarvajñajñānam bhagavān āha yena jñānena samanvāgato	mahAsattvasya sarvajQa jQAnam BagavAn Aha yena jQAnena samanvAgataH 
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃs tathāgatān	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn taTAgatAn
   arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paśyati teṣāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti saṃghaṃ ca	arhataH samyaksaMbudDAn paSyati tezAm Darma deSanAm SRNoti saMGam ca
   paryupāste buddhakṣetraviśuddhiṃ ca paśyati evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām	paryupAste budDa kzetra viSudDim ca paSyati evam dakziNasyAm paScimAyAm
   uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃs tathāgatān	uttarasyAm vidikzu aDas UrDvam diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn taTAgatAn
   arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paśyati teṣāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti saṃghaṃ ca	arhataH samyaksaMbudDAn paSyati tezAm Darma deSanAm SRNoti saMGam ca
   paryupāste buddhakṣetraviśuddhiṃ ca paśyati yena jñānena samanvāgatānāṃ	paryupAste budDa kzetra viSudDim ca paSyati yena jQAnena samanvAgatAnAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ na buddhasaṃjñā bhavati na bodhisaṃjñā	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm na budDa saMjQA Bavati na boDi saMjQA
   bhavati na śrāvakasaṃjñā bhavati na pratyekabuddhasaṃjñā bhavati	Bavati na SrAvaka saMjQA Bavati na pratyekabudDa saMjQA Bavati
   nātmasaṃjñā bhavati na parasaṃjñā bhavati na buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā bhavati	na Atma saMjQA Bavati na para saMjQA Bavati na budDa kzetra saMjQA Bavati
   yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati	yena jQAnena samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH dAna pAramitAyAm carati
   śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati	SIla pAramitAyAm carati kzAnti pAramitAyAm carati vIrya pAramitAyAm carati
   dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na ca pāramitām	DyAna pAramitAyAm carati prajQApAramitAyAm carati na ca pAramitAm
   upalabhate yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	upalaBate yena jQAnena samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   smṛtyupashtānāni bhāvayati na ca smṛtyupasthānāny upalabhate	smRti upashtAnAni BAvayati na ca smRti upasTAnAni upalaBate
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayati na ca	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAn BAvayati na ca
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṃgamārgān upalabhate	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aMga mArgAn upalaBate
   balavaiśāradyāveṇikān buddhadharmān samudānayati na ca	bala vESAradyA veNikAn budDa DarmAn samudAnayati na ca

   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya jñānaṃ yena jñānena samanvāgato bodhisattvo	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya jQAnam yena jQAnena samanvAgataH boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmāṃś ca paripūrayati na ca sarvabuddhadharmāṃś	mahAsattvaH sarva budDa DarmAn ca paripUrayati na ca sarva budDa Darma an= 
   ca manyate iti pratipatsaṃparigrahāvavādaḥ (PSP1: 77) santi śāriputra	ca manyate iti pratipad saMparigraha avavAdaH (PSP1: 77) santi SAriputra
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye pañcacakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante pariśodhayanti	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH ye paQca cakzUMzi pratilaBante pariSoDayanti
   katamāni pañca yad uta māṃsacakṣuḥ divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ	katamAni paQca yat uta mAMsa cakzuH divya cakzuH prajQAcakzuH Darma cakzuH
   buddhacakṣuḥ śāriputra āha katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	budDacakzuH SAriputraH Aha katamat Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   pariśuddhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ bhagavān āha asti śāriputra bodhisattvasya	pariSudDam mAMsa cakzuH BagavAn Aha asti SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣuḥ yat yojanaśataṃ paśyati asti śāriputra	mahAsattvasya mAMsacakzuH yat yojana Satam paSyati asti SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yat yojanaśatadvayaṃ paśyati asti	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mAMsacakzuH yat yojana Sata dvayam paSyati asti
   śāriptutra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yat jambudvīpaṃ	SAriptutra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mAMsacakzuH yat jambudvIpam
   paśyati asti śāriptutra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māṃsacakṣur yat	paSyati asti SAriptutra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mAMsacakzuH yat 
   cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati asti śāriptutra bodhisattvasya	cAturdvIpakam lokaDAtum paSyati asti SAriptutra boDisattvasya

   mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ śāriputra āha katamad bhagavan	mahAsattvasya pariSudDam mAMsacakzuH SAriputraH Aha katamat Bagavan

   chāriputra cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ divyacakṣus tad bodhisattvaḥ	CAriputra cAturmahArAja kAyikAnAm devAnAm divya cakzuH tat boDisattvaH
   prajānīte yat trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ divyacakṣuḥ tad bodhisattvaḥ	prajAnIte yat trayastriMSAnAm devAnAm divya cakzuH tat boDisattvaH
   prajānīte yad yāmānāṃ devānāṃ divyacakṣuḥ tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte yad	prajAnIte yat yAmAnAm devAnAm divya cakzuH tat boDisattvaH prajAnIte yat

   śuddhāvāsānāṃ devānāṃ divyacakṣuḥ tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte yad aspṛhāṇāṃ	SudDAvAsAnAm devAnAm divya cakzuH tat boDisattvaH prajAnIte yat aspRhANAm

   divyacakṣuḥ tad bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte yad sadṛśānāṃ devānāṃ divyacakṣuḥ	divya cakzuH tat boDisattvaH prajAnIte yat sadRSAnAm devAnAm divya cakzuH

   bodhisattvaḥ prajānīte (PSP1: 78) yat punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya	boDisattvaH prajAnIte (PSP1: 78) yat punar SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya divyacakṣuḥ tac cāturmahārājakāyikā devā na prajānanti na	mahAsattvasya divya cakzuH tat cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH na prajAnanti na

   prajānanti na nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajānanti na paranirmitavaśavartino	prajAnanti na nirmANa ratayaH devAH prajAnanti na paranirmitavaSavartinaH

   cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	cakzuzA pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA
   dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA
   paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA
   uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA
   pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA
   dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm
   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA
   paścimottarasyām diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ	paScima uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sarva sattvAnAm

   cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tenaiva pariśuddhena divyena cakṣuṣā	cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti tena eva pariSudDena divyena cakzuzA

   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	yaTABUtam prajAnAti idam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   pariśuddhaṃ divyacakṣuḥ śāriputra āha katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya	pariSudDam divya cakzuH SAriputraH Aha katamat Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ bhagavān āha yena śāriputra	mahAsattvasya pariSudDam prajQAcakzuH BagavAn Aha yena SAriputra
   prajñācakṣuṣā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kañcid dharmaṃ	prajQAcakzuzA samanvAgataH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na kaQcid Darmam
   prajānāti saṃskṛtaṃ vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā sāvadyaṃ vā	prajAnAti saMskRtam vA asaMskRtam vA kuSalam vA akuSalam vA sAvadyam vA
   anavadyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vā anāsravaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā niṣkleśaṃ laukikaṃ vā	anavadyam vA sa Asravam vA anAsravam vA saMkleSam vA nizkleSam lOkikam vA
   lokottaraṃ vā saṃkliṣṭaṃ vā vyavadānam vā yena prajñācakṣuṣā bodhisattvena	loka uttaram vA saMklizwam vA vyavadAnam vA yena prajQAcakzuzA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena kaścid dharmo na dṛṣṭo na śruto na mato na vijñātaḥ idam	mahAsattvena kaScid DarmaH na dRzwaH na SrutaH na mataH na vijQAtaH idam
   śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ (PSP1: 79)	SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pariSudDam prajQAcakzuH (PSP1: 79)
   śāriputra āha katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ	SAriputraH Aha katamat Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pariSudDam
   dharmacakṣuḥ bhagavān āha iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	Darma cakzuH BagavAn Aha iha SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   dharmacakṣuṣaiva jānāti ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śraddhānusārī ayaṃ pudgalo	Darma cakzuzA eva jAnAti ayam pudgalaH SradDA anusArI ayam pudgalaH 
   dharmānusārī ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śūnyatāvihārī ayaṃ pudgalo 'nimittavihārī ayaṃ	Darma anusArI ayam pudgalaH SUnyatA vihArI ayam pudgalaH animitta vihArI ayam
   pudgalo 'praṇihitavihārī ayaṃ pudgalaḥ śūnyatāvihārī asya pudgalasya	pudgalaH apraNihita vihArI ayam pudgalaH SUnyatA vihArI asya pudgalasya
   śūnyatāvimokṣamukhena pañcendriyāṇy utpatsyante pañcabhir indriyair	SUnyatA vimokza muKena paQca indriyANi utpatsyante paQcaBiH indriyEH 
   ānantaryasamādhiṃ prekṣate ānantaryeṇa samādhinā vimuktijñānadarśanam	Anantarya samADim prekzate AnantaryeNa samADinA vimukti jQAna darSanam
   utpādayiṣyati vimuktijñānadarśanena trīṇi saṃyojanāni prahāsyati	utpAdayizyati vimukti jQAna darSanena trINi saMyojanAni prahAsyati
   satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsāṃ ceti ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ	sat kAya dRzwim SIla vrata parAmarSa vicikitsAm ca iti ayam ucyate pudgalaH
   srotaāpannaḥ sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya kāmarāgavyāpādatanutvād ayam	srotaApannaH sa BAvanA mArgam pratilaBya kAma rAga vyApAda tanu tvAt ayam
   ucyate pudgalaḥ sakṛdāgāmī sa tenaiva bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena	ucyate pudgalaH sakRdAgAmI sa tena eva BAvanA mArgeNa aDimAtra BAvitena
   kāmarāgavyāpādaprahāṇādayam ucyate pudgalo 'nāgāmī sa tenaiva	kAma rAga vyApAda prahANAt ayam ucyate pudgalaH anAgAmI sa tena eva
   bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena rūparāgam ārūpyarāgam avidyāṃ	BAvanA mArgeNa aDimAtra BAvitena rUpa rAgam ArUpya rAgam avidyAm
   mānamauddhatyaṃ ca prahāyām ucyate pudgalo 'rhan ayaṃ pudgalo	mAnam OdDatyam ca prahAyAm ucyate pudgalaH arhan ayam pudgalaH 
   'nimittavihārī asya pudgalasyānimittavimokṣamukheṇa pañcendriyāṇi	animitta vihArI asya pudgalasya animitta vimokza muKeNa paQca indriyANi
   utpatsyante pañcabhir indriyair ānantaryasamādhiṃ prekṣate ānantaryeṇa	utpatsyante paQcaBiH indriyEH Anantarya samADim prekzate AnantaryeNa
   samādhinā vimuktijñānadarśanam utpādayiṣyati vimuktijñānadarśanena trīṇi	samADinA vimukti jQAna darSanam utpAdayizyati vimukti jQAna darSanena trINi
   saṃyojanāni prahāsyati satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsāṃ ceti	saMyojanAni prahAsyati sat kAya dRzwim SIla vrata parAmarSa vicikitsAm ca iti
   ayam ucyate pudgalaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sa bhāvanāmārgaṃ pratilabhya	ayam ucyate pudgalaH srotaApannaH sa BAvanA mArgam pratilaBya

   bhāvanāmārgeṇādhimātrabhāvitena kāmarāgavyāpādaprahāṇādayam ucyate pudgalo	BAvanA mArgeNa aDimAtra BAvitena kAma rAga vyApAda prahANAt ayam ucyate pudgalaH

   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ (PSP1: 80) punar	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pariSudDam Darma cakzuH (PSP1: 80) punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ jānāti yat kiñcit	aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam jAnAti yat kiQcid

   pañcendriyāṇi prāpnoti idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	paQca indriyANi prApnoti idam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	pariSudDam Darma cakzuH punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   evaṃ jānāti ayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādiko yo dānapāramitāyāṃ vā	evam jAnAti ayam boDisattvaH praTama citta utpAdikaH yaH dAna pAramitAyAm vA
   carati śīlapāramitāyāṃ vā carati sa tataḥ śraddhendriyaṃ pratilabhate	carati SIla pAramitAyAm vA carati sa tatas SradDA indriyam pratilaBate
   vīryendiryaṃ ca sa upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ	vIrya indiryam ca saH upAya kOSalyena samanvAgataH saMcintya Atma BAvam
   parigṛhṇāti kuśalamūlopalambhaś ca bhavati ayaṃ bodhisattvo	parigRhNAti kuSala mUla upalamBaH ca Bavati ayam boDisattvaH 
   brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣūpapatsyate ayaṃ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣūpapatsyate	brAhmaNa mahASAla kulezu upapatsyate ayam kzatriya mahASAla kulezu upapatsyate
   ayaṃ gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣūpapatsyate ayaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu	ayam gRhapati mahASAla kulezu upapatsyate ayam cAturmahArAja kAyikezu
   deveṣūpapatsyate ayaṃ trayastriṃśeṣu deveṣupapatsyate ayaṃ yāmeṣu	devezu upapatsyate ayam trayastriMSezu devezu papatsyate ayam yAmezu
   deveṣupapatsyate ayan tuṣiteṣu deveṣūpapatsyate ayaṃ nirmāṇaratiṣu	devezu papatsyate ayan tuzitezu devezu upapatsyate ayam nirmANaratizu
   deveṣūpapatsyate ayaṃ paranirmitavaśavartiṣū deveṣūpapatsyate ayaṃ yāvad	devezu upapatsyate ayam paranirmita vaSavartizU devezu upapatsyate ayam yAvat 
   akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapatsyate sa tatra sthitvā sattvān paripācayiṣyati	akanizWezu devezu upapatsyate sa tatra sTitvA sattvAn paripAcayizyati
   sarvamukhopadhānena ca sattvān pratyupasthāsyati buddhakṣetraṃ ca	sarva muKa upaDAnena ca sattvAn pratyupasTAsyati budDa kzetram ca
   pariśodhayiṣyati tathāgatāṃś cārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyati	pariSoDayizyati taTAgatAn ca arhataH samyaksaMbudDAn ArAgayizyati
   satkariṣyati gurūkariṣyati mānayiṣyati na ca śrāvakabhūmau vā	satkarizyati gurUkarizyati mAnayizyati na ca SrAvaka BUmO vA
   pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahasattvo na nivartate	pratyekabudDa BUmO vA patizyati ayam boDisattvaH mahasattvaH na nivartate
   yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha iti idaṃ śāriputra	yAvat na anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH iti idam SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ (PSP1: 81) punar	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pariSudDam Darma cakzuH (PSP1: 81) punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti amī bodhisattvā	aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam jAnAti amI boDisattvA
   mahāsattvā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau amī bodhisattvā na vyākṛtāḥ	mahAsattvAH vyAkRtAH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO amI boDisattvAH na vyAkRtAH
   amī bodhisattvā avinivartanīyāḥ amī bodhisattvā na avinivartanīyāḥ eṣāṃ	amI boDisattvAH avinivartanIyAH amI boDisattvAH na avinivartanIyAH ezAm
   bodhisattvānām abhijñāḥ paripūrṇāḥ eṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na paripūrṇāḥ ayaṃ	boDisattvAnAm aBijQAH paripUrNAH ezAm boDisattvAnAm na paripUrNAH ayam
   bodhisattvo 'bhijñāparipūrṇaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvad upariṣṭhād diśi	boDisattvaH aBijQA paripUrNaH pUrvasyAm diSi yAvat uparizWAt diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gatvā tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn gatvA taTAgatAn arhataH samyaksaMbudDAn
   satkaroti gurūkaroti mānayati pūjayati ayaṃ bodhisattvo nābhijñāparipūrṇo	satkaroti gurUkaroti mAnayati pUjayati ayam boDisattvaH na aBijQA paripUrNaH 
   yāvan na pūjayati ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'bhijñānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati ayaṃ	yAvat na pUjayati ayam boDisattvaH aBijQAnAm lABI Bavizyati ayam
   bodhisattvo nābhijñānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	boDisattvaH na aBijQAnAm lABI Bavizyati asya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati asya bodhisattvasya	pariSudDam budDa kzetram Bavizyati asya boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāpariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati anena bodhisattvena	mahAsattvasya apariSudDam budDa kzetram Bavizyati anena boDisattvena
   sattvāḥ pariśodhitāḥ asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpariśuddhaṃ	sattvAH pariSoDitAH asya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya apariSudDam
   buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati anena bodhisattvena sattvāḥ na pariśodhitāḥ asya	budDa kzetram Bavizyati anena boDisattvena sattvAH na pariSoDitAH asya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante asya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya budDAH BagavantaH varNam BAzante asya
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ na bhāṣante amī	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya budDAH BagavantaH varNam na BAzante amI
   bodhisattvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyanti amī	boDisattvAH budDAnAm BagavatAm Asanna sTAyinaH Bavizyanti amI
   bodhisattvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām nāsannasthāyino bhaviṣyanti asya	boDisattvAH budDAnAm BagavatAm na Asanna sTAyinaH Bavizyanti asya
   bodhisattvasya parimitam āyur bhaviṣyati asya bodhisattvasya aparimitam	boDisattvasya parimitam AyuH Bavizyati asya boDisattvasya aparimitam
   āyur bhaviṣyati asya bodhisattvasya parimitaḥ saṃgho bhaviṣyati asya	AyuH Bavizyati asya boDisattvasya parimitaH saMGaH Bavizyati asya
   bodhisattvasya aparimitaḥ saṃgho bhaviṣyati asya bodhisattvasyānuttarāṃ	boDisattvasya aparimitaH saMGaH Bavizyati asya boDisattvasya anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati asya	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya boDisattva saMGaH Bavizyati asya
   bodhisattvasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na	boDisattvasya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDasya na
   bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati (PSP1: 82) ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	boDisattva saMGaH Bavizyati (PSP1: 82) ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   duṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na duṣkaracaryāṃ	duzkara caryAm carizyati ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na duzkara caryAm
   cariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvaś caramabhavikaḥ ayaṃ bodhisattvo na	carizyati ayam boDisattvaH carama BavikaH ayam boDisattvaH na
   caramabhavikaḥ ayaṃ bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyate ayaṃ bodhisattvo	carama BavikaH ayam boDisattvaH boDimaNxe nizatsyate ayam boDisattvaH 
   bodhimaṇḍe na niṣatsyate asya bodhisattvasya māro bhaviṣyati asya	boDimaNxe na nizatsyate asya boDisattvasya mAraH Bavizyati asya
   bodhisattvasya na māro bhaviṣyati evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya	boDisattvasya na mAraH Bavizyati evam hi SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ śāriputra āha katamad bhagavan	mahAsattvasya pariSudDam Darma cakzuH SAriputraH Aha katamat Bagavan
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhacakṣuḥ bhagavān āha yac	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pariSudDam budDacakzuH BagavAn Aha yat 
   chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicittānantaraṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ	CAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH boDi citta anantaram vajra upamam samADim
   samāpadya ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti	samApadya eka cit takzaNa samAyuktayA prajQayA sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApnoti
   daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataḥ caturbhir vaiśāradhyaiś catasṛbhiḥ	daSaBiH taTAgata balEH samanvAgataH caturBiH vESAraDyEH catasRBiH
   pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikabuddhadharmair mahāmaitryā	pratisaMvidBiH azwAdaSaBiH AveNika budDa DarmEH mahAmEtryA
   mahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgataḥ yena ca cakṣuṣā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	mahA karuNayA ca samanvAgataH yena ca cakzuzA boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   nāsti kiñcid adṛṣṭaṃ vā 'śrutaṃ vā 'mataṃ vā 'vijñātaṃ vā sarvair ākārair	na asti kiQcid adRzwam vA aSrutam vA amatam vA avijQAtam vA sarvEH AkArEH 
   evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhaśakṣuḥ	evam hi SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pariSudDam budDa SakzuH

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānaṃ śodhayanti	prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA sarva AkAra jQa tA panTAnam SoDayanti

   śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ ṣaṭsu	SAriputra boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH prajQApAramitAyAm carantaH zawsu
   pāramitāsu sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthāanaṃ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatām	pAramitAsu sTitvA sarva AkAra jQa tA panTAanam SoDayanti atyanta SUnyatAm
   upādāya dānaṃ parigrahatām upādāya prajñapyate śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyam upādāya	upAdAya dAnam parigraha tAm upAdAya prajQapyate SIlam dOHSIlyam upAdAya
   prajñapyate kṣāntir akṣāntitām upādāya prajñapyate vīryaṃ kauśīdyam	prajQapyate kzAntiH akza anti tAm upAdAya prajQapyate vIryam kOSIdyam
   upādāya prajñapyate samādhir asamāhitatām upādāya prajñapyate prajñā	upAdAya prajQapyate samADiH asamAhita tAm upAdAya prajQapyate prajQA
   dauṣprajñam upādāya prajñapyate sa tīrṇa iti na manyate atīrṇa iti na	dOzprajQam upAdAya prajQapyate sa tIrNaH iti na manyate atIrNaH iti na
   manyate dānaṃ parigraha iti na manyate śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyam iti na manyate	manyate dAnam parigrahaH iti na manyate SIlam dOHSIlyam iti na manyate
   kṣāntiḥ kṣobha iti na manyate vīryyaṃ kauśīdyam (PSP1: 90) iti na manyate	kzAntiH kzoBaH iti na manyate vIryyam kOSIdyam (PSP1: 90) iti na manyate
   samādhir asamāhita iti na manyate prajñā dauṣprajñam iti na manyate	samADiH asamAhitaH iti na manyate prajQA dOzprajQam iti na manyate
   ākruṣṭo 'ham iti na manyate vandito 'ham iti na manyate satkṛto 'ham iti	AkruzwaH aham iti na manyate vanditaH aham iti na manyate satkRtaH aham iti
   na manyate asatkṛto 'ham iti na manyate tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śāriputra	na manyate asatkRtaH aham iti na manyate tat kasya hetoH na hi SAriputra
   anutpāda ākruṣṭo 'ham iti manyate vandito 'ham iti na manyate satkṛto 'ham	anutpAdaH AkruzwaH aham iti manyate vanditaH aham iti na manyate satkRtaH aham
   iti na manyate asatkṛto 'ham iti na manyate tat kasya hetos tathā hi	iti na manyate asatkRtaH aham iti na manyate tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   prajñāpāramitā sarvamananāḥ samucchinatti iha śāriputra bodhisattvasya	prajQApAramitA sarva mananAH samucCinatti iha SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato ye guṇā bhavanti na te sarve	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH ye guNAH Bavanti na te sarve
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyante sa imān guṇān paripūrayan sattvāṃś ca	SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm saMvidyante saH imAn guNAn paripUrayan sattvAn ca
   paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti	paripAcayati budDa kzetram ca pariSoDayati sarva AkAra jQa tAm ca anuprApnoti
   punar aparaṃ śāriputa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran	punar aparam SAriputa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran
   sarvasattvānām antike samacittatām utpādayati sarvasattvānām antike	sarva sattvAnAm antike sama citta tAm utpAdayati sarva sattvAnAm antike
   samacittatām utpādya sarvadharamsamatāṃ pratilabhate sarvadharamsamatāṃ	sama citta tAm utpAdya sarva Daramsama tAm pratilaBate sarva DaramsamatAm
   pratilabhya sarvasattvān sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sa dṛṣṭa eva	pratilaBya sarva sattvAn sarva Darma samatAyAm pratizWApayati sa dRzwaH eva
   dharme buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca sarvabodhisattvānāṃ	Darme budDAnAm BagavatAm priyaH Bavati manaApaH ca sarva boDisattvAnAm
   ca sarvaśrāvakānāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca sa	ca sarva SrAvakAnAm ca pratyekabudDAnAm ca priyaH Bavati manaApaH ca sa
   yatra yatropapadyate tatra tatra na jātu cakṣuṣā amanaāpāni rūpāṇi paśyati	yatra yatra upapadyate tatra tatra na jAtu cakzuzA amanaApAni rUpANi paSyati
   na śrotreṇāmanaāpān śabdān śṛṇoti na ghrāṇenāmanaāpān (PSP1: 91) gandhān	na SrotreNa Am anaApAn SabdAn SRNoti na GrANena Am anaApAn (PSP1: 91) ganDAn

   samyaksaṃbodheḥ asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdeśyamāne trīṇi	samyaksaMboDeH asmin Kalu punar prajQApAramitA nirdeSe nirdeSyamAne trINi
   bhikṣuṇīśatāni bhagavantaṃ yathāvṛtaiś cīvarair abhicchādayāmāsur	BikzuNI SatAni Bagavantam yaTA AvRtEH cIvarEH aBicCAdayAmAsuH

   hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ buddhā	hetuH kaH pratyayaH smitasya prAdurBAvAya na ahetukam na apratyayam budDA
   bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti bhagavān āha etāny ānanda trīṇi	BagavantaH smitam prAduzkurvanti BagavAn Aha etAni Ananda trINi
   bhikṣuṇīśatāni ekaṣaṣṭitame kalpe mahākeunāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ	BikzuNI SatAni ekazazwitame kalpe mahAkeu nAmAnaH taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpatsyante tārakopame kalpe itaś cyutāni santi	samyaksaMbudDAH loke utpatsyante tAraka upame kalpe itas cyutAni santi
   akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre	akzoByasya taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya budDa kzetre

   paripācitāni tāni (PSP1: 92) tāni maitreyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ	paripAcitAni tAni (PSP1: 92) tAni mEtreyasya taTAgatasya arhataH

   tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti sma catasraḥ	tasyAm velAyAm pUrvasyAm diSi budDa sahasram paSyanti sma catasraH
   pariṣado bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ parṣammaṇḍalāt evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	parizadaH BagavataH SAkyamuneH parzammaNxalAt evam dakziNasyAm diSi
   buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti uttarasyāṃ	budDa sahasram paSyanti paScimAyAm diSi budDa sahasram paSyanti uttarasyAm
   diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti	diSi budDa sahasram paSyanti uttara pUrvasyAm diSi budDa sahasram paSyanti

   buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti na ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tān	budDa kzetra guNa vyUhAn paSyanti na ca iha sahAyAm lokaDAtO tAn
   buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti yān daśasu daśasu dikṣu teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ	budDa kzetra guNa vyUhAn paSyanti yAn daSasu daSasu dikzu tezAm budDAnAm
   bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyāuhān paśyanti sma atha khalu bhagavataḥ	BagavatAm budDa kzetra guNa vyAuhAn paSyanti sma aTa Kalu BagavataH

   smitam akarot ānanda āha ko bhagavān hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya	smitam akarot AnandaH Aha kaH BagavAn hetuH kaH pratyayaH smitasya
   prādurbhāvāya bhagavān āha paśyasi tvam ānandemāni daśaprāṇisahasrāṇi	prAdurBAvAya BagavAn Aha paSyasi tvam Ananda imAni daSa prANi sahasrANi

   kadācit tathāgatavirahitāni bhaviṣyanti tataḥ paścād vyūharājanāmānas	kadAcid taTAgata virahitAni Bavizyanti tatas paScAt vyUha rAja nAmAnas

   hetoḥ bodhisattvaṃ hi śāriputrāgamya lokasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati	hetoH boDisattvam hi SAriputra Agamya lokasya loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati

   puṇyaprasavānāṃ devānāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ asaṃjñisattvānāṃ devānāṃ	puNya prasavAnAm devAnAm bRhat PalAnAm devAnAm asaMjQi sattvAnAm devAnAm
   śuddhāvāsānāṃ devānāṃ aspṛhāṇāṃ devānāṃ atapānāṃ devānāṃ sadṛśānāṃ devānāṃ	SudDAvAsAnAm devAnAm aspRhANAm devAnAm atapAnAm devAnAm sadRSAnAm devAnAm

   saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ loke (PSP1: 95) prādurbhāvo bhavati	saMjQAna asaMjQA Ayatana upagAnAm devAnAm loke (PSP1: 95) prAdurBAvaH Bavati
   srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ	srotaApannAnAm sakRdAgAminAm anAgAminAm arhatAm pratyekabudDAnAm

   velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirnāmayitvā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsahasraṃ lokadhātuṃ	velAyAm jihvA indriyam nirnAmayitvA imam tri sAhasram mahA sahasram lokaDAtum
   jihvendriyeṇāc chādayāmāsa atha khalu tato jihvendriyād anekavarṇā	jihvA indriyeNa At CAdayAmAsa aTa Kalu tatas jihvA indriyAt aneka varNA
   nānāvarṇā arciṣo niḥsṛtya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn	nAnA varNAH arcizaH niHsRtya pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhatūn	ABaya avaBAsayAmAsuH evam dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDatUn
   ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ (PSP1: 96) paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	ABayA avaBAsayAmAsuH (PSP1: 96) paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn
   lokadhatūn ābhayāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	lokaDatUn ABayA avaBAsayAmAsuH uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn

   yāvad ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo	yAvat UrDvam diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upameByaH budDa kzetreByaH 
   'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvās tān prabhāvyūhān dṛṣṭvā svakasvakeṣu	aprameya asaMKyeyAH boDisattvAH tAn praBA vyUhAn dRzwvA sva ka svakezu

   bodhisattvān mahāsattvān evam āhuḥ eṣa kulaputrāḥ paścimāyāṃ yāvad adho	boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn evam AhuH eza kula putrAH paScimAyAm yAvat aDas

   sarvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yāvad	sarvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH lokaDAtavaH avaBAsena sPuwIkRtAH yAvat

   sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśanāya	sPuwIkRtA yat uta boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm deSanAya
   saṃprakāśanāya te bodhisattvās tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhuḥ gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ	saMprakASanAya te boDisattvAH tAn taTAgatAn evam AhuH gamizyAmaH vayam
   bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ taṃ bahgavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ	Bagavan tAm saha AlokaDAtum tam bahgavantam SAkya munim taTAgatam
   darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca daśadiksannipatitān bodhisattvān	darSanAya vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca daSa diS sannipatitAn boDisattvAn

   puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantīr	puzpa DUpa ganDa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja patAkA vEjayantIH

   khalu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā devāḥ trayastriṃśā devā yāmā	Kalu cAturmahArAja kAyikAH devAH trayastriMSAH devAH trayastriMSAH devAH yAmA

   samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpatsyante puṣpākare kalpe iti ṣaḍabhijñāvavādaḥ	samyaksaMbudDAH loke utpatsyante puzpa Akare kalpe iti zaw aBijQA avavAdaH
   atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa	aTa Kalu BagavAn tasyAm velAyAm Ayuzmantam suBUtim AmantrayAmAsa

   teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāñ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāñ ca	tezAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm tezAn ca mahA SrAvakANAm tezAn ca

   śāriputram etad acovat yat kiñcid āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā	SAriputram etat acovat yat kiQcid Ayuzman SAriputra BagavataH SrAvakA
   bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti sarvaḥ sa tathāgatasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ	BAzante deSayanti upadiSanti sarvaH sa taTAgatasya puruzakAraH veditavyaH
   tat kasya hetoḥ yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ	tat kasya hetoH yaH hi taTAgatena DarmaH deSitaH tasyAm Darma deSanAyAm
   śikṣamāṇās tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tāṃ dharmatāṃ (PSP1: 99)	SikzamANAH tAm Darma tAm sAkzAtkurvanti tAm Darma tAm (PSP1: 99)
   sākṣātkṛtvā yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti sarvaṃ tad	sAkzAtkRtvA yat yat eva BAzante deSayanti upadiSanti sarvam tat 
   dharmatayā na virudhyate tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputra upāyayogena	Darma tayA na viruDyate taTAgataH eva eza SAriputraH upAya yogena
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyati aviṣayo 'tra	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm upadekzyati avizayaH atra
   śāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	SAriputra sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prajñāpāramitām upadeṣṭum iti darśanamārgāvavādopakṣepaḥ atha khalv	prajQApAramitAm upadezwum iti darSana mArgO= avAda upakzepaH aTa Kalu 
   āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat bodhisattva iti bhagavann ucyate	AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat boDisattvaH iti Bagavan ucyate
   katamasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti nāhaṃ	katamasya etat Bagavan Darmasya aDivacanam yat uta boDisattvaH iti na aham
   bhagavan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva iti so 'haṃ bhagavan	Bagavan Darmam samanupaSyAmi yat uta boDisattvaH iti saH aham Bagavan
   bodhisattvam asamanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ	boDisattvam asamanupaSyan prajQApAramitAm api anupalaBamAnaH katamam
   bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmi bhagavān āha	boDisattvam katamasyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi BagavAn Aha
   nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā iti bodhisattva iti ca tad	nAma mAtram idam suBUte yat uta prajQApAramitA iti boDisattvaH iti ca tat 
   api ca bodhisattvanāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate	api ca boDisattva nAma na aDyAtmam na bahirDA na uBayam antareNa upalaByate
   tad yathāpi nāma subhūte sattvaḥ sattva iti cocyate na ca kācit	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte sattvaH sattvaH iti ca ucyate na ca kAcid 
   sattvopalabdhiḥ yac ca tan nāma tat prajñaptimātraṃ prajñaptidharmaḥ	sattva upalabDiH yat ca tat nAma tat prajQapti mAtram prajQapti DarmaH
   prajñaptisat iti duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter	prajQaptisat iti duHKe Darma jQAna kzAntiH tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH 
   notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate evam	na utpAdaH na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate evam
   ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāḥ	Atma sattva jIva poza puruza pudgalam anujamAnavakAraka vedaka jAnaka paSyakAH
   (PSP1: 100) sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad	(PSP1: 100) sarve ete prajQapti DarmAH sarve ete anutpAdAH aniroDAH yAvat 
   eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyante evam eva subhūte yā ca prajñāpāramitā yaś ca	eva nAma mAtreNa vyavahriyante evam eva suBUte yA ca prajQApAramitA yaH ca
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yac ca bodhisattvanāma sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yat ca boDisattva nAma sarve ete prajQapti DarmAH
   sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyate tad yathāpi	sarve ete anutpAdAH aniroDAH yAvat eva nAma mAtreNa vyavahriyate tat yaTA api
   nāma subhūte idam ādhyātmikaṃ rūpam iti dharmaprajñaptimātraṃ tasyāś ca	nAma suBUte idam ADyAtmikam rUpam iti Darma prajQapti mAtram tasyAH ca
   dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṅketamātreṇa	Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa
   vyavahriyate vedaneti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca	vyavahriyate vedanA iti suBUte Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca
   dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa	Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa
   vyavahriyate saṃjñeti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca	vyavahriyate saMjQA iti suBUte Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca
   dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa	Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa

   dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa	Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa
   vyavahriyate evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā ca bodhisattvaś ca	vyavahriyate evam eva suBUte prajQApAramitA ca boDisattvaH ca
   bodhisattvanāma ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās teṣāñ ca prajñaptidharmāṇāṃ	boDisattva nAma ca sarve ete prajQapti DarmAH tezAn ca prajQapti DarmANAm
   notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate cakṣur iti	na utpAdaH na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate cakzuH iti
   subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na	suBUte Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na
   nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta cakṣur iti tac ca	niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate yat uta cakzuH iti tat ca
   cakṣur nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate śrotram	cakzuH na aDyAtmam na bahirDA na uBayam antareNa upalaByate Srotram
   itisubhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo	iti suBUte Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH 
   na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate yad uta śrotram iti	na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate yat uta Srotram iti
   tac ca śrotraṃ nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate ghrāṇam	tat ca Srotram na aDyAtmam na bahirDA na uBayam antareNa upalaByate GrANam
   iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo	iti suBUte Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH 
   na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate jihveti subhūte	na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate jihvA iti suBUte
   dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho	Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH

   dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho	Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH

   dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho	Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH

   'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś	anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate cakzuH DAtuH rUpa DAtu H 
   cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca	cakzuH vijQAna DAtuH iti suBUte Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca
   dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa	Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa
   vyavahriyate te ca nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante	vyavahriyate te ca na aDyAtmam na bahirDAH na uBayam antareNa upalaByante
   śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur iti subhūte	Srotra DAtuH Sabda DAtuH Srotra vijQAna DAtuH iti suBUte
   dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho	Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH na niroDaH 
   'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate te ca nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā	anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate te ca na aDyAtmam na bahirDA
   nobhayam antreṇopalabhyante ghrāṇadhātur gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur	na uBayam antreNa upalaByante GrANa DAtuH ganDaDAtuH GrANa vijQAna DAtuH 
   iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo	iti suBUte Darma prajQapti mAtram etat tasyAH ca Darma prajQapteH na utpAdaH 
   na nirodho 'nyatra nāma saṅketamātreṇa vyavahriyate te ca nādhyātmaṃ na	na niroDaH anyatra nAma saFketa mAtreNa vyavahriyate te ca na aDyAtmam na
