   subhūte arūpo bodhisattva iti avedanā bodhisattva iti asaṃjñā bodhisattva	suBUte arUpaH boDisattvaH iti avedanAH boDisattvaH iti asaMjQA boDisattva
   iti asaṃskārā bodhisattva iti avijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase	iti asaMskArAH boDisattvaH iti avijQAnam boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase
   subhūte cakṣur bodhisattvo 'nyatra cakṣuṣaś cakṣuṣi bodhisattvo	suBUte cakzuH boDisattvaH anyatra cakzuzaH cakzuzi boDisattvaH 
   bodhisattve cakṣur acakṣuṣko bodhisattva iti śrotraṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra	boDisattve cakzuH acakzuzkaH boDisattvaH iti Srotram boDisattvaH anyatra
   śrotrāc chrotre bodhisattvo bodhisattve śrotram aśrotro bodhisattva iti	SrotrAt Srotre boDisattvaH boDisattve Srotram aSrotraH boDisattvaH iti
   ghrāṇaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra ghrāṇāc ghrāṇe bodhisattvo bodhisattve ghrāṇam	GrANam boDisattvaH anyatra GrANAt GrANe boDisattvaH boDisattve GrANam
   aghrāṇo bodhisattva iti jihvā bodhisattvo 'nyatra jihvāyā jihvāyāṃ	aGrANaH boDisattvaH iti jihvA boDisattvaH anyatra jihvAyAH jihvAyAm
   bodhisattvo bodhisattve jihvā ajihvo bodhisattva iti kāyo bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH boDisattve jihvA ajihvaH boDisattvaH iti kAyaH boDisattvaH 
   'nyatra kāyāt kāye bodhisattvo bodhisattve kāyo 'kāyo bodhisattva iti mano	anyatra kAyAt kAye boDisattvaH boDisattve kAyaH akAyaH boDisattvaH iti manaH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra manaso manasi bodhisattvo bodhisattve mano 'mananā	boDisattvaH anyatra manasaH manasi boDisattvaH boDisattve manaH amananA
   bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdam bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ	boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim
   manyase subhūte rūpaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra rūpād rūpe bodhisattvo	manyase suBUte rUpam boDisattvaH anyatra rUpAt rUpe boDisattvaH 
   bodhisattve rūpam arūpo bodhisattva iti śabdo bodhisattvo 'nyatra śabdāt	boDisattve rUpam arUpaH boDisattvaH iti SabdaH boDisattvaH anyatra SabdAt 
   śabde bodhisattvo bodhisattve śabdo aśabdo bodhisattva iti gandho	Sabde boDisattvaH boDisattve SabdaH aSabdaH boDisattvaH iti ganDo
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra gandhād gandhe bodhisattvo bodhisattve gandho agandho	boDisattvaH anyatra ganDAt ganDe boDisattvaH boDisattve ganDaH aganDaH 
   bodhisattva iti raso bodhisattvo 'nyatra rasād rase bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH iti rasaH boDisattvaH anyatra rasAt rase boDisattvaH 
   bodhisattve raso araso bodhisattva iti sparśo bodhisattvo 'nyatra sparśād	boDisattve rasaH arasaH boDisattvaH iti sparSaH boDisattvaH anyatra sparSAt 
   sparśe bodhisattvo bodhisattve sparśo asparśo bodhisattva iti dharmo	sparSe boDisattvaH boDisattve sparSaH asparSaH boDisattvaH iti DarmaH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra dharmād dharme bodhisattvo bodhisattve dharmo adharmo	boDisattvaH anyatra DarmAt Darme boDisattvaH boDisattve DarmaH aDarmaH 
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānāni	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAnAni
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra ebhya eṣu saḥ etāni tasmin vinā	boDisattvaH anyatra eByaH ezu saH etAni tasmin vinA
   cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānair bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase (PSP1: 109)	cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAnEH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase (PSP1: 109)
   subhūte śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānāni bodhisattvo anyatra ebhya eṣu saḥ etāni	suBUte Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAnAni boDisattvaH anyatra eByaH ezu saH etAni
   tasmin vinā śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānair bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase	tasmin vinA Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAnEH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase
   subhūte ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānāni bodhisattvo anyatra ebhya eṣu saḥ	suBUte GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAnAni boDisattvaH anyatra eByaH ezu saH
   etāni tasmin vinā ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānānair bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ	etAni tasmin vinA GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAnAnEH boDisattvaH iti tat kim
   manyase subhūte jihvārasajihvāvijñānāni bodhisattvo anyatra ebhya eṣu saḥ	manyase suBUte jihvA rasa jihvA vijQAnAni boDisattvaH anyatra eByaH ezu saH
   etāni tasmin vinā jihvārasajihvāvijñānānair bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ	etAni tasmin vinA jihvA rasa jihvA vijQAnAnEH boDisattvaH iti tat kim
   manyase subhūte kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānāni bodhisattvo anyatra ebhya eṣu	manyase suBUte kAyasprazwavya kAya vijQAnAni boDisattvaH anyatra eByaH ezu
   saḥ etāni tasmin vinā kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānānair bodhisattva iti tat	saH etAni tasmin vinA kAya sprazwavya kAya vijQAnAnEH boDisattvaH iti tat 
   kiṃ manyase subhūte manodharmamanovijñānāni bodhisattvo anyatra ebhya eṣu	kim manyase suBUte manaH Darma manaH vijQAnAni boDisattvaH anyatra eByaH ezu
   saḥ etāni tasmin vinā manodharmamanovijñānānair bodhisattva iti subhūtir	saH etAni tasmin vinA manaH Darma manaH vijQAnAnEH boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH 
   āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte pṛthivīdhātur	Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte pRTivI DAtuH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra pṛthivīdhātos tatra bodhisattva bodhisattve	boDisattvaH anyatra pRTivI DAtoH tatra boDisattva boDisattve
   pṛthivīdhātur apṛthivīdhātuko bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte	pRTivI DAtuH apRTivI DAtukaH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte
   abdhātur bodhisattvo 'nyatra abdhātos tatra bodhisattva bodhisattve	abDAtuH boDisattvaH anyatra ap DAtoH tatra boDisattva boDisattve
   abdhātur anabdhātuko bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tejodhātur	abDAtuH anabDAtukaH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte tejaH DAtuH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra tejodhātos tatra bodhisattva bodhisattve tejodhātur	boDisattvaH anyatra tejaH DAtoH tatra boDisattva boDisattve tejaH DAtuH 
   atejodhātuko bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vāyudhātur	atejaH DAtukaH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte vAyuDAtuH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra vāyudhātos tatra bodhisattva bodhisattve vāyudhātur	boDisattvaH anyatra vAyuDAtoH tatra boDisattva boDisattve vAyuDAtuH 
   avāyudhātuko bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ākāśadhātur	avAyuDAtukaH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte AkASa DAtuH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra ākāśadhātos tatra bodhisattva bodhisattve ākāśadhātur	boDisattvaH anyatra AkASa DAtoH tatra boDisattva boDisattve AkASa DAtuH 
   anākāśadhātuko bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vijñānadhātur	anAkASa DAtukaH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte vijQAna DAtuH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra vijñānadhātos tatra bodhisattva bodhisattve	boDisattvaH anyatra vijQAna DAtoH tatra boDisattva boDisattve
   vijñānadhātur avijñānadhātuko bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ	vijQAna DAtuH avijQAna DAtukaH boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam
   bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte avidyā bodhisattvo	Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte avidyA boDisattvaH 
   'nyatrāvidyāyāḥ avidyāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisatte 'vidyā 'navidyā	anyatra avidyAyAH avidyAyAm boDisattvaH boDisatte avidyA anavidyA
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte saṃskārā bodhisattvo 'nyatra	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte saMskArAH boDisattvaH anyatra
   saṃskārebhyaḥ saṃskāreṣu bodhisattvo bodhisattve saṃskārā asaṃskārā	saMskAreByaH saMskArezu boDisattvaH boDisattve saMskArAH asaMskArA
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte vijñānaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte vijQAnam boDisattvaH anyatra
   vijñānād vijñāne bodhisattvo bodhisattve vijñānam avijñānaṃ bodhisattva	vijQAnAt vijQAne boDisattvaH boDisattve vijQAnam avijQAnam boDisattva
   iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte nāmarūpaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra nāmarūpād	iti tat kim manyase suBUte nAma rUpam boDisattvaH anyatra nAma rUpAt 
   nāmarūpe bodhisattvo bodhisattve nāmarūpaṃ anāmarūpaṃ bodhisattva iti tat	nAma rUpe boDisattvaH boDisattve nAma rUpam anAma rUpam boDisattvaH iti tat 
   kiṃ manyase subhūte ṣaḍāyatanāni bodhisattvo 'nyatra ṣaḍāyatanānebhyaḥ	kim manyase suBUte zaz AyatanAni boDisattvaH anyatra zaz Ayata nAneByaH
   ṣaḍāyatanāneṣu bodhisattvo bodhisattve ṣaḍāyatanāny aṣaḍāyatanāni	zaz Ayata nAnezu boDisattvaH boDisattve zaz AyatanAni azaz AyatanAni
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte sparśo bodhisattvo 'nyatra sparśāt	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte sparSaH boDisattvaH anyatra sparSAt 
   sparśe bodhisattvo bodhisattve sparśo 'sparśo bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ	sparSe boDisattvaH boDisattve sparSaH asparSaH boDisattvaH iti tat kim
   manyase subhūte vedanā bodhisattvo 'nyatra vedanāyā vedanāyāṃ bodhisattvo	manyase suBUte vedanA boDisattvaH anyatra vedanAyAH vedanAyAm boDisattvaH 
   bodhisattve vedanā avedanā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tṛṣṇā	boDisattve vedanA avedanAH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte tRzNA
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra tṛṣṇāyāḥ tṛṣṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve tṛṣṇā atṛṣṇā	boDisattvaH anyatra tRzNAyAH tRzNAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve tRzNA atRzNA
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte upādānaṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatra	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte upAdAnam boDisattvaH anyatra
   upādānād upādāne bodhisattvo bodhisattve upādānam anupādānaṃ bodhisattva	upAdAnAt upAdAne boDisattvaH boDisattve upAdAnam anupAdAnam boDisattva
   iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte bhavo bodhisattvo 'nyatra bhavād bhave	iti tat kim manyase suBUte BavaH boDisattvaH anyatra BavAt Bave
   bodhisattvo bodhisattve bhavo 'bhavo bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase	boDisattvaH boDisattve BavaH aBavaH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase
   subhūte jātir bodhisattvo 'nyatra jāter jātau bodhisattvo bodhisattve	suBUte jAtiH boDisattvaH anyatra jAteH jAtO boDisattvaH boDisattve
   jātir ajātir bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte jarāmaraṇaṃ	jAtiH ajAtiH boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte jarA maraNam
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra jarāmaraṇād jarāmaraṇe bodhisattvo bodhisattve	boDisattvaH anyatra jarA maraNAt jarA maraNe boDisattvaH boDisattve
   jarāmaraṇam ajarāmaraṇaṃ bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan	jarA maraNam ajara amaraNam boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan
   iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte 'pi nu	iti niroDe anvayajQAna kzAntiH BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte api nu
   yā rūpasya tathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra rūpatathatāyāṃ rūpatathatāyāṃ	yA rUpasya taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra rUpa taTatAyAm rUpa taTatAyAm
   bodhisattvo bodhisattve rūpatathatā arūpatathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ	boDisattvaH boDisattve rUpa taTatA arUpa taTatA boDisattvaH iti tat kim
   manyase subhūte yā vedanātathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra vedanātathatāyā	manyase suBUte yA vedanA taTa tA sA boDisattvaH anyatra vedanA taTatAyAH 
   vedanātathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vedanātathatā avedanātathatā	vedanA taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve vedanA taTa tA avedanA taTatA
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā saṃjñātathatā sā bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte yA saMjQA taTatA sA boDisattvaH 
   'nyatra saṃjñātathatāyā saṃjñātathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve	anyatra saMjQA taTatAyA saMjQA taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve
   saṃjñātathatā asaṃjñātathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā	saMjQA taTatA asaMjQA taTatA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte yA
   saṃskāratathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra saṃskāratathatāyā	saMskAra taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra saMskAra taTatAyAH 
   saṃskāratathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve saṃskāratathatā	saMskAra taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve saMskAra taTatA
   asaṃskāratathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā vijñānatathatā	asaMskAra taTatA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte yA vijQAna taTatA
   sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra vijñānatathatāyā vijñānatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo	sA boDisattvaH anyatra vijQAna taTatAyAH vijQAna taTatAyAm boDisattvaH 
   bodhisattve vijñānatathatā avijñānatathatā bodhisattva iti (PSP1: 110)	boDisattve vijQAna taTatA avijQAna taTatA boDisattvaH iti (PSP1: 110)
   subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadi	suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte yadi
   vyasteṣu na bodhisattvaḥ samasteṣu bhavatu yā skandhatathatā sā	vyastezu na boDisattvaH samastezu Bavatu yA skanDa taTatA sA
   bodhisattvo 'nyatra skandhatathatāyāḥ skandhatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH anyatra skanDa taTatAyAH skanDa taTatAyAm boDisattvaH 
   bodhisattve skandhatathatā askandhatathatā bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no	boDisattve skanDa taTatA askanDa taTatA boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no
   hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā	hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte yA
   cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra	cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAna taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra
   cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatāyāś cakṣurūpacakṣurvijñānatathatāyāṃ	cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAna taTatAyAH cakzu rUpa cakzuH vijQAna taTatAyAm
   bodhisattvo bodhisattve cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatā	boDisattvaH boDisattve cakzU ru upacakzuH vijQAna taTatA
   acakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatā bodhisattva iti evaṃ	acakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAna taTatA boDisattvaH iti evam
   śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānatathatā, ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānatathatā,	Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAna taTatA, GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAna taTatA,
   jihvārasajihvāvijñānatathatā kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānatathatā,	jihvA rasa jihvA vijQAna taTatA kAyasprazwavya kAya vijQAna taTatA,
   manodharmamamovijñānatathatā subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha	manaH Darmam amaH vijQAna taTatA suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha
   tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā pṛthivīdhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra	tat kim manyase suBUte yA pRTivI DAtu taTa tA sA boDisattvaH anyatra
   pṛthivīdhātutathatāyāḥ pṛthivīdhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve	pRTivI DAtu taTa tAyAH pRTivI DAtu taTa tAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve
   pṛthivīdhātutathatā apṛthivīdhātutathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase	pRTivI DAtu taTa tA apRTivI DAtu taTa tA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase
   subhūte yā abdhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra abdhātutathatāyā	suBUte yA abDAtu taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra abDAtu taTatAyAH 
   abdhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve abdhātutathatā anabdhātutathatā	ap DAtu taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve ap DAtu taTatA anabDAtu taTatA
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā tejodhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte yA tejaH DAtu taTa tA sA boDisattvaH 
   'nyatra tejodhātutathatāyāḥ tejodhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve	anyatra tejaH DAtu taTatAyAH tejaH DAtu taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve
   tejodhātutathatā atejodhātutathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte	tejaH DAtu taTa tA atejaH DAtu taTa tA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte
   yā vāyudhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra vāyudhātutathatāyāḥ	yA vAyu DAtu taTa tA sA boDisattvaH anyatra vAyu DAtu taTa tAyAH
   vāyudhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vāyudhātutathatā	vAyu DAtu taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve vAyuDAtu taTa tA
   avāyudhātutathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte	avAyu DAtu taTa tA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte
   yākāśadhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra ākāśadhātutathatāyāḥ	yAkASa DAtu taTa tA sA boDisattvaH anyatra AkASa DAtu taTatAyAH
   ākāśadhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve ākāśadhātutathatā	AkASa DAtu taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve AkASa DAtu taTatA
   anākāśadhātutathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte	anAkASa DAtu taTa tA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte
   vijñānadhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra vijñānadhātutathatāyāḥ	vijQAna DAtu taTa tA sA boDisattvaH anyatra vijQAna DAtu taTatAyAH
   vijñānadhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve vijñānadhātutathatā	vijQAna DAtu taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve vijQAna DAtu taTa tA
   avijñānadhātutathatā bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan	avijQAna DAtu taTa tA boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan
   bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadi vyasteṣu dhātuṣu na bodhisattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte yadi vyastezu DAtuzu na boDisattvaH
   samasteṣu bhavatu yā dhātutathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra dhātutathatāyāḥ	samastezu Bavatu yA DAtu taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra DAtu taTatAyAH
   dhātutathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve dhātutathatā adhātutathatā	DAtu taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve DAtu taTatA aDAtu taTatA
   bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ	boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim
   manyase subhūte yā cakṣustathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra cakṣustathatāyāś	manyase suBUte yA cakzuH taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra cakzuH taTatAya aS
   cakṣustathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve cakṣustathatā acakṣustathatā	cakzuH taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve cakzuH taTatA acakzuH taTatA
   bodhisattva iti evaṃ yā śrotratathatā ghrāṇatathatā jihvātathatā	boDisattvaH iti evam yA Srotra taTa tA GrANa taTatA jihvA taTatA
   kāyatathatā tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā manastathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra	kAya taTatA tat kim manyase suBUte yA manaH taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra
   manastathatāyā manastathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve manastathatā (PSP1:	manaH taTatAyAH manaH taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve manaH taTatA (PSP1:
   111) amanastathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā rūpatathatā	111) amanaH taTatA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte yA rUpa taTatA
   sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra rūpatathatāyā rūpatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo	sA boDisattvaH anyatra rUpa taTatAyAH rUpa taTatAyAm boDisattvaH 
   bodhisattve rūpatathatā arūpatathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase	boDisattve rUpa taTatA arUpa taTatA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase
   subhūte yā śabdatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra śabdatathatāyā	suBUte yA Sabda taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra Sabda taTatAyAH 
   śabdatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve śabdatathatā aśabdatathatā	Sabda taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve Sabda taTatA aSabda taTatA
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā gandhatathatā sā bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte yA ganDataTatA sA boDisattvaH 
   'nyatra gandhatathatāyā gandhatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve	anyatra ganDataTatAyAH ganDataTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve
   gandhatathatā agandhatathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā	ganDataTatA aganDa taTa tA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte yA
   rasatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra rasatathatāyā rasatathatāyāṃ	rasa taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra rasa taTatAyAH rasa taTatAyAm
   bodhisattvo bodhisattve rasatathatā arasatathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ	boDisattvaH boDisattve rasa taTatA arasa taTatA boDisattvaH iti tat kim
   manyase subhūte yā spraṣṭavyatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra	manyase suBUte yA sprazwavya taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra
   spraṣṭavyatathatāyā spraṣṭavyatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve	sprazwavya taTatAyAH sprazwavya taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve
   spraṣṭavyatathatā aspraṣṭavyatathatā bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase	sprazwavya taTatA asprazwavya taTatA boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase
   subhūte yā dharmatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatra dharmatathatāyā	suBUte yA Darma taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra Darma taTatAyAH 
   dharmatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve dharmatathatā adharmatathatā	Darma taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve Darma taTatA aDarma taTatA
   bodhisattva iti yadi subhūte vyasteṣv āyataneṣu na bodhisattvaḥ samasteṣu	boDisattvaH iti yadi suBUte vyastezu Ayatanezu na boDisattvaH samastezu
   bhavatu yā subhūte āyatanatathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatrāyatanatathatāyā	Bavatu yA suBUte Ayatana taTatA sA boDisattvaH anyatra Ayatana taTatAyAH 
   āyatanatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve āyatanatathatā anāyatanatathatā	Ayatana taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve Ayatana taTatA anAyatana taTatA
   bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhāgavān āha tat kiṃ	boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BAgavAn Aha tat kim
   manyase subhūte avidyātathatā sā bodhisattvo 'nyatrāvidyātathatāyā	manyase suBUte avidyA taTa tA sA boDisattvaH anyatra avidyA taTatAyAH 
   avidyātathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve avidyātathatā anavidyātathatā	avidyA taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve avidyA taTa tA anavidyA taTa tA
   bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ yā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā nāmarūpatathatā	boDisattvaH evam yA saMskAra taTatA vijQAna taTatA nAma rUpa taTatA
   ṣaḍāyatanatathatā sparśatathatā vedanātathatā tṛṣṇātathatā upādānatathatā	zaz Ayatana taTatA sparSa taTatA vedanA taTa tA tRzNA taTa tA upAdAna taTa tA
   bhavatathatā jātitathatā jarāmaraṇatathatā yadi vyasteṣu	BavataTatA jAti taTa tA jarA maraNa taTatA yadi vyastezu
   pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na bodhisattvaḥ samasteṣu bhavatu yā	pratItyasamutpAda aFgezu na boDisattvaH samastezu Bavatu yA
   pratītyasamutpādatathatā bodhisattvo 'nyatra pratītyasamutpādatathatāyāḥ	pratItyasamutpAda taTatA boDisattvaH anyatra pratItyasamutpAda taTatAyAH
   pratītyasamutpādatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattve	pratItyasamutpAda taTatAyAm boDisattvaH boDisattve
   pratītyasamutpādatathatā apratītyasamutpādatathatā bodhisattva iti	pratItyasamutpAda taTatA apratItya samutpAda taTatA boDisattvaH iti
   subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan kiṃ punas tvaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśam	suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan kim punar tvam suBUte arTa vaSam
   upādāyevaṃ vadasi na rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā	upAdAyevam vadasi na rUpam boDisattvaH iti na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArA
   na vijñānaṃ, na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātur	na vijQAnaM, na pRTivI DAtuH na abDAtuH na tejaH DAtuH na vAyuDAtuH 
   nākāśadhātur na vijñānadhātuḥ, na rūpāṇi na śabdā na gandhā na rasā na	na AkASa DAtuH na vijQAna DAtuH, na rUpANi na SabdAH na ganDAH na rasAH na
   spraṣṭavyāni na dharmāḥ, na cakṣur na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo	sprazwavyAni na DarmAH, na cakzuH na Srotram na GrANam na jihvA na kAyaH 
   na manaḥ, na cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānaṃ na śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānaṃ na	na manaH, na cakzu Uru upacakzuH vijQAnam na Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAnam na
   ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānaṃ na jihvārasajihvāvijñānaṃ na	GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAnam na jihvA rasa jihvA vijQAnam na
   kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānaṃ na manodharmamanovijñānaṃ nāvidyā evaṃ na	kAyasprazwavya kAya vijQAnam na manaH Darma manaH vijQAnam na avidyA evam na
   saṃskāravijñānanāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇaṃ	saMskAra vijQAna nAma rUpa zaz Ayatana sparSa vedanA tRzNA upAdAna Bava jAti jarA maraNam
   bodhisattva iti yāvan na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādo bodhisattva	boDisattvaH iti yAvat na skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdaH boDisattva
   iti na rūpatathatā (PSP1: 112) bodhisattva iti na vedanātathatā na	iti na rUpa taTatA (PSP1: 112) boDisattvaH iti na vedanA taTa tA na
   saṃjñātathatā na saṃskāratathatā na vijñānatathatā, na pṛthivīdhātutathatā	saMjQA taTatA na saMskAra taTatA na vijQAna taTatA, na pRTivI DAtu taTa tA
   nābdhātutathatā na tejodhātutathatā na vāyudhātutathatā nākāśadhātutathatā	na ap DAtu taTa tA na tejaH DAtu taTatA na vAyu DAtu taTa tA na AkASa DAtu taTatA
   na vijñānadhātutathatā, na cakṣūstathatā na śrotratathatā na ghrāṇatathatā	na vijQAna DAtu taTa tA, na cakzUH taTatA na Srotra taTa tA na GrANa taTatA
   na jihvātathatā na kāyatathatā na manastathatā na rūpatathatā na	na jihvA taTatA na kAya taTatA na manaH taTatA na rUpa taTatA na
   śabdatathatā na gandhatathatā na rasatathatā na spraṣṭavyatathatā na	Sabda taTatA na ganDataTatA na rasa taTatA na sprazwavya taTatA na
   dharmatathatā na cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatā na	Darma taTatA na cakzU ru upacakzuH vijQAna taTatA na
   śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānatathatā na ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānatathatā na	Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAna taTatA na GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAna taTatA na
   jihvārasajihvāvijñānatathatā na kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānatathatā na	jihvA rasa jihvA vijQAna taTatA na kAyasprazwavya kAya vijQAna taTatA na
   manodharmanomanovijñānatathatā nāvidyātathatā na saṃskāratathatā na	manaH DarmanaH manaH vijQAna taTatA na avidyA taTa tA na saMskAra taTatA na
   vijñānatathatā na nāmarūpatathatā na ṣaḍāyatanatathatā na sparśatathatā na	vijQAna taTatA na nAma rUpa taTatA na zaz Ayatana taTatA na sparSa taTatA na
   vedanātathatā na tṛṣṇātathatā na upādānatathatā na bhavatathatā na	vedanA taTa tA na tRzNA taTa tA naH upAdAna taTatA na BavataTatA na
   jātitathatā na jarāmaraṇatathatā, yāvan na skandhadhātvāyatanatathatā na	jAti taTa tA na jarA maraNa taTatA, yAvat na skanDa DAtu Ayatana taTatA na
   pratītyasamutpādatathatā bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha atyantatayā bhagavan	pratItyasamutpAda taTatA boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha atyanta tayA Bagavan
   bodhisattvo na vidyate nopalabhyate tat kuto rūpaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati	boDisattvaH na vidyate na upalaByate tat kutas rUpam boDisattvaH Bavizyati
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati atyantatayā	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam boDisattvaH Bavizyati atyanta tayA
   bhagavan bodhisattvo na vidyate nopalabhyate tat kutaḥ pṛthivīdhātu	Bagavan boDisattvaH na vidyate na upalaByate tat kutas pRTivI DAtu
   bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur	boDisattvaH Bavizyati evam abDAtuH tejaH DAtuH vAyuDAtuH AkASa DAtuH 
   vijñānadhātur bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati atyantatayā bhagavan bodhisattvo na	vijQAna DAtuH boDisattvaH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Bagavan boDisattvaH na
   vidyate nopalabhyate tat kuto rūpam bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati evaṃ śabdo	vidyate na upalaByate tat kutas rUpam boDisattvaH Bavizyati evam SabdaH 
   gandho raso spraṣṭavyam dharmo bodhisattvo bhaviṣyaty evañ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ	ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam DarmaH boDisattvaH Bavizyati evan cakzuH Srotram
   ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati tat kutaś	GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH boDisattvaH Bavizyati tat kutas 
   cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānāni bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati evaṃ	cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAnAni boDisattvaH Bavizyati evam
   śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānāni ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānāni	Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAnAni GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAnAni
   jihvārasajihvāvijñānāni kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānāni	jihvA rasa jihvA vijQAnAni kAyasprazwavya kAya vijQAnAni
   manodharmamanovijñānāni bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati avidyā bodhisattvo	manaH Darma manaH vijQAnAni boDisattvaH Bavizyati avidyA boDisattvaH 
   bhaviṣyati evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanāni sparśo vedanā	Bavizyati evam saMskArAH vijQAnam nAma rUpam zaz AyatanAni sparSaH vedanA
   tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātir jarāmaraṇaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati atyantatayā	tRzNA upAdAnam BavaH jAtiH jarA maraNam boDisattvaH Bavizyati atyanta tayA
   bhagavan bodhisattvo na vidyate nopalabhyate tat kutaḥ punar asya	Bagavan boDisattvaH na vidyate na upalaByate tat kutas punar asya
   rūpatathatā upalabhyate vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā	rUpa taTatA upalaByate vedanA taTa tA saMjQA taTatA saMskAra taTatA
   vijñānatathatā upalabhyate atyantatayā bhagavan bodhisattvo na vidyate	vijQAna taTatA upalaByate atyanta tayA Bagavan boDisattvaH na vidyate
   nopalabhyate tat kutaḥ pṛthivīdhātutathatopalabhyate evam	na upalaByate tat kutas pRTivI DAtu taTatA upalaByate evam
   abdhātutathatopalabhyate tejodhātutathatopalabhyate	abDAtu taTatA upalaByate tejaH DAtu taTatA upalaByate
   vāyudhātutathatopalabhyate ākāśadhātutathatopalabhyate	vAyu DAtu taTatA upalaByate AkASa DAtu taTatA upalaByate
   vijñānadhātutathatopalabhyate atyantatayā bhagavan bodhisattvo na vidyate	vijQAna DAtu taTatA upalaByate atyanta tayA Bagavan boDisattvaH na vidyate
   nopalabhyate tat kuto rūpatathatopalabhyate evaṃ śabdatathatopalabhyate	na upalaByate tat kutas rUpa taTatA upalaByate evam Sabda taTatA upalaByate
   gandharathatopalabhyate rasatathatopalabhyate spraṣṭavyatathatopalabhyate	ganDa raTatA upalaByate rasa taTatA upalaByate sprazwavya taTatA upalaByate
   dharmmatathatopalabhyate evaṃ cakṣustathatopalabhyate	Darmma taTatA upalaByate evam cakzuH taTatA upalaByate
   śrotratathatopalabhyate ghrāṇatathatopalabhyate jihvātathatopalabhyate	Srotra taTatA upalaByate GrANa taTatA upalaByate jihvA taTatA upalaByate
   kāyatathatopalabhyate manastathatopalabhyate evaṃ	kAyataTatA upalaByate manaH taTatA upalaByate evam
   cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānatathatopalapsyate (PSP1: 113)	cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAna taTatA upalapsyate (PSP1: 113)
   śrotraśabdaśrotravijñānatathatopalapsyate	Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAna taTatA upalapsyate
   ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānatathatopalapsyate	GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAna taTatA upalapsyate
   jihvārasajihvāvijñānatathatopalapsyate	jihvA rasa jihvA avijQAna taTatA upalapsyate
   kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānatathatopalapsyate	kAyasprazwavya kAya vijQAna taTatA upalapsyate
   manodharammanovijāñnatathatopalapsyate atyantatayā bhagavan bodhisattvo na	manaH Daram manaH vijAQna taTatA upalapsyate atyanta tayA Bagavan boDisattvaH na
   vidyate nopalabhyate tat kuto 'syāvidyātathatopalapsyate evaṃ	vidyate na upalaByate tat kutas asya avidyA taTatA upalapsyate evam
   saṃskāratathatopalapsyate vijñānatathatopalapsyate	saMskAra taTatA upalapsyate vijQAna taTatA upalapsyate
   nāmarūpatathatopalapsyate ṣaḍāyatanatathatopalapsyate	nAma rUpa taTatA upalapsyate zaz Ayatana taTatA upalapsyate
   sparśatathatopalapsyate vedanātathatopalapsyate tṛṣṇātathatopalapsyate	sparSa taTatA upalapsyate vedanA taTatA upalapsyate tRzNA taTatA upalapsyate
   upādānatathatopalapsyate bhavatathatopalapsyate jātitathatopalapsyate	upAdAna taTatA upalapsyate BavataTatA upalapsyate jAti taTatA upalapsyate
   jarāmaraṇatathatopalapsyate evam ekaikaśaḥ	jarA maraNa taTatA upalapsyate evam ekEkaSas 
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu vyastasamasteṣu atyantatayā	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu vyasta samastezu atyanta tayA
   bhagavan bodhisattvo na vidyate nopalabhyate tat kuto 'sya	Bagavan boDisattvaH na vidyate na upalaByate tat kutas asya
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādatathatopalapsyate naitat sthānaṃ	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAda taTatA upalapsyate na etat sTAnam
   vidyate bhagavān āha sādhu sādhu subhūte evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena	vidyate BagavAn Aha sADu sADu suBUte evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sattvānupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhau śikṣitavyam iti	mahAsattvena sattva anupalabDyA prajQApAramitA anupalabDO Sikzitavyam iti
   nirodhe 'nvayajñānam bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rupasyaitad	niroDe anvaya jQAnam BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte rupasya etat 
   adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyaitad	aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya etat 
   adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha	aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha
   tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rūpanityatāyā rūpānityatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ	tat kim manyase suBUte rUpa nityatAyAH rUpa anitya tAyAH etat aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti rūpasukhatāyā rūpaduḥkhatāyā rūpātmatāyā rūpātmatāyā	boDisattvaH iti rUpa suKa tAyAH rUpa duHKa tAyAH rUpa Atma tAyAH rUpa Atma tAyAH 
   rūpaśāntatāyā rūpaśāntatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ	rUpa SAnta tAyAH rUpa SAnta tAyAH etat aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti tat kim
   manyase subhūte vedanānityatāyā vedanā'nityatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ	manyase suBUte vedanA anitya tAyAH vedanA anitya tAyAH etat aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti vedanāsukhatāyā vedanāduḥkhatāyā vedanātmatāyā	boDisattvaH iti vedanA suKa tAyAH vedanA duHKa tAyAH vedanA Atma tAyA
   vedanā'nātmatāyā vedanāśāntatāyā vedanā'śāntatāyā evad adhivacanaṃ	vedanA anAtma tAyAH veda nASa anta tAyAH vedanA aSAnta tAyAH evat aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti saṃjñāsukhatāyā saṃjñāduḥkhatāyā saṃjñātmatāyā	boDisattvaH iti saMjQA suKa tAyA saMjQA duHKa tAyA saMjQA Atma tAyAH 
   saṃjñā'nātmatāyā saṃjñāśāntatāyā saṃjñā'śāntatāyā evad adhivacanaṃ	saMjQA anAtma tAyA saMjQA SAnta tAyA saMjQA aSAntatAyAH evat aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti saṃskārasukhatāyā saṃskāraduḥkhatāyā saṃskārātmatāyā	boDisattvaH iti saMskAra suKa tAyA saMskAra duHKa tAyA saMskAra Atma tAyA
   saṃskārānātmatāyā saṃskāraśāntatāyā saṃskārāśāntatāyā evad adhivacanaṃ	saMskAra an Atma tAyA saMskAra SAnta tAyA saMskAra ASAnta tAyAH evat aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti vijñānasukhatāyā vijñānaduḥkhatāyā vijñānātmatāyā	boDisattvaH iti vijQAna suKa tAyAH vijQAna duHKa tAyAH vijQAna Atma tAyA
   vijñānānātmatāyā vijñānaśāntatāyā vijñānāśāntatāyā evad adhivacanaṃ	vijQAnAn AtmatAyAH vijQAna SAnta tAyAH vijQAna aSAnta tAyAH evat aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti tat kiṃ manyase subhūte rūpaśūnyatāyā rūpāśūnyatāyā	boDisattvaH iti tat kim manyase suBUte rUpa SUnyatAyAH rUpa aSUnyatAyA
   rūpanimittatāyā rūpānimittatāyā rūpapraṇihitatāyā rūpāpraṇihitatāyā etad	rUpa nimitta tAyAH rUpa animitta tAyAH rUpa praNihita tAyAH rUpa apraNihita tAyAH etat 
   adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ tat kiṃ manyase	aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH tat kim manyase
   subhūte vijñānaśūnyatāyā vijñānāśūnyatāyā vijñānanimittatāyā	suBUte vijQAna SUnyatAyAH vijQAna aSUnyatAyAH vijQAna nimitta tAyAH 
   vijñānānimittatāyā vijñānapraṇihitatatāyā vijñānāpraṇihitatāyā etad	vijQAna animitta tAyAH vijQAna praNihita tatAyAH vijQAna apraNihita tAyAH etat 
   adhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavān āha	aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha
   kiṃ punas tvaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ pratītya evaṃ vadasi na rūpasya	kim punar tvam suBUte arTa vaSam pratItya evam vadasi na rUpasya
   nityatādhivacanaṃ anityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti evaṃ na	nitya tA aDivacanam anitya tA aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti evam na
   sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ (PSP1: 114) nātmādhivacanaṃ	suKa aDivacanam na duHKa aDivacanam (PSP1: 114) na Atma aDivacanam
   nānātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ na	nAnA Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam na SAnta aDivacanam na
   śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ	SUnyatA aDivacanam na aSUnyatA aDivacanam na nimitta aDivacanam
   nānimittādhivacanaṃ na rūpasya praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ	na animitta aDivacanam na rUpasya praNihita aDivacanam na apraNihita aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti na vedanāyā nityādhivacanaṃ anityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva	boDisattvaH iti na vedanAyAH nitya aDivacanam anitya tA aDivacanam boDisattva
   iti evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ	iti evam na suKa aDivacanam na duHKa aDivacanam na Atma aDivacanam
   nānātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ na	nAnA Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam na SAnta aDivacanam na
   śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ	SUnyatA aDivacanam na aSUnyatA aDivacanam na nimitta aDivacanam
   nānimittādhivacanaṃ na vedanāyā praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ	na animitta aDivacanam na vedanAyA praNihita aDivacanam na apraNihita aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti na saṃjñāyā nityādhivacanam anityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva	boDisattvaH iti na saMjQAyAH nitya aDivacanam anitya tA aDivacanam boDisattva
   iti evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ	iti evam na suKa aDivacanam na duHKa aDivacanam na Atma aDivacanam
   nānātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ na	nAnA Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam na SAnta aDivacanam na
   śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ	SUnyatA aDivacanam na aSUnyatA aDivacanam na nimitta aDivacanam
   nānimittādhivacanaṃ na saṃjñāyā praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ	na animitta aDivacanam na saMjQAyAH praNihita aDivacanam na apraNihita aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti na saṃskārāṇāṃ nityādhivacanam anityatādhivacanaṃ	boDisattvaH iti na saMskArANAm nitya aDivacanam anitya tA aDivacanam
   bodhisattva iti evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ	boDisattvaH iti evam na suKa aDivacanam na duHKa aDivacanam
   nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ na	na Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam na SAnta aDivacanam na
   śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ	SUnyatA aDivacanam na aSUnyatA aDivacanam na nimitta aDivacanam
   nānimittādhivacanaṃ na saṃskārāṇāṃ praṇihitādhivacanaṃ	na animitta aDivacanam na saMskArANAm praNihita aDivacanam
   nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti na vijñānasya nityādhivacanam	na apraNihita aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti na vijQAnasya nitya aDivacanam
   anityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na	anitya tA aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti evam na suKa aDivacanam na
   duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na	duHKa aDivacanam na Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam na
   śāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na	SAnta aDivacanam na SUnyatA aDivacanam na aSUnyatA aDivacanam na
   nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na vijñānasya praṇihitādhivacanaṃ	nimitta aDivacanam na animitta aDivacanam na vijQAnasya praNihita aDivacanam
   nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattva iti subhūtir āha atyantayā rūpaṃ na	na apraNihita aDivacanam boDisattvaH iti suBUtiH Aha atyantayA rUpam na
   vidyate nopalabhyate kutī rūpādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati	vidyate na upalaByate kutI rUpa aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati
   atyantatayā bhagavann anitayṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate kuto	atyanta tayA Bagavan anitaym na vidyate na upalaByate kuto
   vedanādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati atyantatayā bhagavann anitayṃ na	vedanA aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Bagavan anitaym na
   vidyate nopalabhyate kuto saṃjñādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati	vidyate na upalaByate kutas saMjQA aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati
   atyantatayā bhagavann anitayṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate kuto	atyanta tayA Bagavan anitaym na vidyate na upalaByate kuto
   saṃskārādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati atyantatayā bhagavann anitayṃ na	saMskAra aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Bagavan anitaym na
   vidyate nopalabhyate kuto vijñānādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati	vidyate na upalaByate kutas vijQAna aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati
   atyantatayā bhagavann anitayṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate atyantatayā bhagavan	atyanta tayA Bagavan anitaym na vidyate na upalaByate atyanta tayA Bagavan
   nityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate kuto rūpānityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo	nityam na vidyate na upalaByate kutas rUpa aniti a tA aDivacanam boDisattvaH 
   bhaviṣyati atyantatayā bhagavann anityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate kuto	Bavizyati atyanta tayA Bagavan anityam na vidyate na upalaByate kuto
   rūpānityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati evaṃ na sukhādhivacanaṃ na	rUpa aniti a tA aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati evam na suKa aDivacanam na
   duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ śāntādhivacanaṃ	duHKa aDivacanam na Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam SAnta aDivacanam
   nāśāntādhivacanaṃ na śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na	nASAnta aDivacanam na SUnyatA aDivacanam na aSUnyatA aDivacanam na
   nimittādhivacanaṃ nānimittādhivacanaṃ na praṇihitādhivacanaṃ	nimitta aDivacanam na animitta aDivacanam na praNihita aDivacanam
   nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ	na apraNihita aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
   atyantatayā bhagavan nityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate kuto	atyanta tayA Bagavat nityam na vidyate na upalaByate kuto
   vijñānanityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati atyantatayā bhagavan	vijQAna nityatA aDivacanam boDisattvaH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Bagavan
   nityaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate kuto vijñānānityatādhivacanaṃ bodhisattvo	nityam na vidyate na upalaByate kutas vijQAna aniti a tA aDivacanam boDisattvaH 
   bhaviṣyati evaṃ na skuhādhivacanaṃ na duḥkhādhivacanaṃ nātmādhivacanaṃ	Bavizyati evam na skuha aDivacanam na duHKa aDivacanam na Atma aDivacanam
   nānātmādhivacanaṃ nānātmādhivacanaṃ na śāntādhivacanaṃ na	nAnA Atma aDivacanam nAnA Atma aDivacanam na SAnta aDivacanam na
   śūnyatādhivacanaṃ nāśūnyatādhivacanaṃ na nimittādhivacanaṃ	SUnyatA aDivacanam na aSUnyatA aDivacanam na nimitta aDivacanam
   nānimittādhivacanaṃ na rūpasya praṇihitādhivacanaṃ nāpraṇihitādhivacanaṃ	na animitta aDivacanam na rUpasya praNihita aDivacanam na apraNihita aDivacanam
   bodhisattva bhaviṣyati bhagavān āha sādhu sādhu subhūte evaṃ hi subhūte	boDisattva Bavizyati BagavAn Aha sADu sADu suBUte evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpādhivacanam	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA rUpa aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena vedanādhivacanam anupalambhamānena saṃjñādhivacanam	anupalamBamAnena vedanA aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena saMjQA aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena saṃskārādhivacanam anupalambhamānena vijñānādhivacanam	anupalamBa mAnena saMskAra aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena vijQAna aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena rūpasya nityānityādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBamAnena rUpasya nitya aniti ADivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalambhamānena śāntāśāntādhivacanam	suKa duHKa aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena SAnta aSAnta aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena śūnyatāśūnyatādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBa mAnena SUnyatA SUnya tA aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalambhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam	nimitta animitta aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena praNihita apraNihita aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena vedanāyā nityānityādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBamAnena vedanAyAH nitya aniti ADivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalambhamānena śāntāśāntādhivacanam	suKa duHKa aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena SAnta aSAnta aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena śūnyatāśūnyatādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBa mAnena SUnyatA SUnya tA aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalambhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam	nimitta animitta aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena praNihita apraNihita aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena saṃjñāyā nityānityādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBamAnena saMjQAyAH nitya aniti ADivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalambhamānena śāntāśāntādhivacanam	suKa duHKa aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena SAnta aSAnta aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena śūnyatāśūnyatādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBa mAnena SUnyatA SUnya tA aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalambhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam	nimitta animitta aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena praNihita apraNihita aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānityādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBa mAnena saMskArANAm nitya aniti a aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalambhamānena śāntāśāntādhivacanam	suKa duHKa aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena SAnta aSAnta aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena śūnyatāśūnyatādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBa mAnena SUnyatA SUnya tA aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalambhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam	nimitta animitta aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena praNihita apraNihita aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena vijñānasya nityānityādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBamAnena vijQAnasya nitya aniti ADivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   sukhaduḥkhādhivacanam anupalambhamānena śāntāśāntādhivacanam	suKa duHKa aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena SAnta aSAnta aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena śūnyatāśūnyatādhivacanam anupalambhamānena	anupalamBa mAnena SUnyatA SUnya tA aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena
   nimittānimittādhivacanam anupalambhamānena praṇihitāpraṇihitādhivacanam	nimitta animitta aDivacanam anupalamBamAnena praNihita apraNihita aDivacanam
   anupalambhamānena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti mārge	anupalamBamAnena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam iti mArge
   dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ (PSP1: 115) yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi nāhaṃ taṃ	Darma jQAna kzAntiH (PSP1: 115) yat api suBUte evam vadasi na aham tam
   dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva iti na hi subhūte dharmo	Darmam samanupaSyAmi yat uta boDisattvaH iti na hi suBUte DarmaH 
   dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharamdhātur dharmaṃ samanupaśyati iti	DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DaramDAtuH Darmam samanupaSyati iti
   mārge dharmajñānam na subhūte rūpadhātu dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi	mArge Darma jQAnam na suBUte rUpa DAtu DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api
   dharmadhātū rūpadhātuṃ samanupaśyati na vedanādhātur dharmadhātuṃ	DarmaDAtuH rUpa DAtum samanupaSyati na vedanA DAtuH DarmaDAtum
   samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur vedanādhātuṃ samanupaśyati na saṃjñādhātur	samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH vedanA DAtum samanupaSyati na saMjQA DAtuH 
   dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur saṃjñādhātuṃ samanupaśyati na	DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH saMjQA DAtum samanupaSyati na
   saṃskāradhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur saṃskāradhātuṃ	saMskAra DAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH saMskAra DAtum
   samanupaśyati na vijñānadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi	samanupaSyati na vijQAna DAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api
   dharmadhātur vijñānadhātuṃ samanupaśyati na cakṣurdhātur dharmadhātuṃ	DarmaDAtuH vijQAna DAtum samanupaSyati na cakzuH DAtuH DarmaDAtum
   samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur cakṣurdhātuṃ samanupaśyati na śrotradhātur	samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH cakzuH DAtum samanupaSyati na Srotra DAtuH 
   dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur śrotradhātuṃ samanupaśyati na	DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH Srotra DAtum samanupaSyati na
   ghrāṇadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur ghrāṇadhātuṃ	GrANa DAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH GrANa DAtum
   samanupaśyati na jihvādhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur	samanupaSyati na jihvA DAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH 
   jihvādhātuṃ samanupaśyati na kāyadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi	jihvA DAtum samanupaSyati na kAyaDAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api
   dharmadhātur kāyadhātuṃ samanupaśyati na manodhātur dharmadhātuṃ	DarmaDAtuH kAya DAtum samanupaSyati na manaH DAtuH DarmaDAtum
   samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur manodhātuṃ samanupaśyati na rūpadhātur	samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH manaH DAtum samanupaSyati na rUpa DAtuH 
   dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur rūpadhātuṃ samanupaśyati na	DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH rUpa DAtum samanupaSyati na
   śabdadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur śabdadhātuṃ	Sabda DAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH Sabda DAtum
   samanupaśyati na gandhadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur	samanupaSyati na ganDaDAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH 
   gandhadhātuṃ samanupaśyati na rasadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi	ganDaDAtum samanupaSyati na rasa DAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api
   dharmadhātur rasadhātuṃ samanupaśyati na spraṣṭavyadhātur dharmadhātuṃ	DarmaDAtuH rasaDAtum samanupaSyati na sprazwavya DAtuH DarmaDAtum
   samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ samanupaśyati na	samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH sprazwavya DAtum samanupaSyati na
   dharmadhātur dharmadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpi dharmadhātur dharmadhātuṃ	DarmaDAtuH DarmaDAtum samanupaSyati na api DarmaDAtuH DarmaDAtum
   samanupaśyati iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ na subhūte saṃskṛtadhātur	samanupaSyati iti mArge anvaya jQAna kzAntiH na suBUte saMskRta DAtuH 
   asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ samanupaśyati nāpy asaṃskṛtadhātuḥ saṃskṛtadhātuṃ	asaMskRta DAtum samanupaSyati na api asaMskRta DAtuH saMskRta DAtum
   samanupaśyati iti mārge 'nvayajñānam iti darśanamārgāvavādaḥ na ca subhūte	samanupaSyati iti mArge anvaya jQAnam iti darSana mArga avavAdaH na ca suBUte
   saṃskṛtavyatirekeṇāsaṃskṛtaṃ śakyaṃ prajñapayitum nāpy	saMskRta vyatirekeNa asaMskRtam Sakyam prajQapayitum na api 
   asaṃskṛtavyatirekeṇa saṃskṛtaṃ śakyaṃ prajñapayitum evaṃ hi subhūte	asaMskRta vyatirekeNa saMskRtam Sakyam prajQapayitum evam hi suBUte
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaścid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran na kaScid Darmam samanupaSyati
   asamanupaśyan nottrasyati na santrasyati na santrāsam āpadyate na cāsya	asam anupaSyan na uttrasyati na santrasyati na santrAsam Apadyate na ca asya
   kvacid dharme cittam avalīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasam tat kasya	kvacid Darme cittam avalIyate na vipratisArI Bavati mAnasam tat kasya
   hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na	hetoH taTA hi suBUte mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran rUpam na
   samanupaśyati vedanāṃ na samanupaśyati saṃjñāṃ na samanupaśyati saṃskārān	samanupaSyati vedanAm na samanupaSyati saMjQAm na samanupaSyati saMskArAn
   na samanupaśyati vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati cakṣur na samanupaśyati śrotraṃ	na samanupaSyati vijQAnam na samanupaSyati cakzuH na samanupaSyati Srotram
   na samanupaśyati ghrāṇaṃ na samanupaśyati jihvāṃ na samanupaśyati kāyaṃ na	na samanupaSyati GrANam na samanupaSyati jihvAm na samanupaSyati kAyam na
   samanupaśyati mano na samanupaśyati rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati śabdaṃ na	samanupaSyati manaH na samanupaSyati rUpam na samanupaSyati Sabdam na
   samanupaśyati gandhaṃ na samanupaśyati rasaṃ na samanupaśyati spraṣṭavyaṃ	samanupaSyati ganDam na samanupaSyati rasam na samanupaSyati sprazwavyam
   na samanupaśyati dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ na	na samanupaSyati Darmam na samanupaSyati cakzuH vijQAna DAtum na
   samanupaśyati śrotravijñānadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ na	samanupaSyati Srotra vijQAna DAtum na samanupaSyati GrANa vijQAna DAtum na
   samanupaśyati jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati manovijñānadhātuṃ na	samanupaSyati jihvA vijQAna DAtum na samanupaSyati manaH vijQAna DAtum na
   samanupaśyati avidyāṃ na samanupaśyati saṃskāraṃ na samanupaśyati vijñānaṃ	samanupaSyati avidyAm na samanupaSyati saMskAram na samanupaSyati vijQAnam
   na samanupaśyati nāmarūpaṃ na samanupaśyati ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na samanupaśyati	na samanupaSyati nAma rUpam na samanupaSyati zaz Ayatanam na samanupaSyati
   sparśaṃ na samanupaśyati vedanāṃ na samanupaśyati tṛṣṇāṃ na samanupaśyati	sparSam na samanupaSyati vedanAm na samanupaSyati tRzNAm na samanupaSyati
   upādānaṃ na samanupaśyati bhavaṃ na samanupaśyati jātiṃ na samanupaśyati	upAdAnam na samanupaSyati Bavam na samanupaSyati jAtim na samanupaSyati
   jarāmaraṇaṃ na samanupaśyati rāgaṃ na samanupaśyati dveṣaṃ na	jarA maraNam na samanupaSyati rAgam na samanupaSyati dvezam na

   (PSP1: 119) śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati na ca	(PSP1: 119) SrAvaka BUmim vA na ca pratyekabudDa BUmim vA patati na ca

   āha kathaṃ vāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mūrdhāmaṃ patati	Aha kaTam vA Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mUrDAmam patati

   ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann upāyakauśalam ajānan śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān	zawsu pAramitAsu caran upAya kOSalam ajAnan SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitAn

   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmatṛṣṇāiti bhāvanāmārgāvavādaḥ ity ukto	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya Darma tRzNA iti BAvanA mArga avavAdaH iti uktaH 
   'vavādaḥ śāriputra āha katamā āyuṣman subhūte dharmatṛṣṇā subhūtir āha	avavAdaH SAriputraH Aha katamA Ayuzman suBUte Darma tRzNA suBUtiH Aha
   ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam	iha Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran rUpam
   anityam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte duḥkhaṃ śūnyam	anityam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAnIte duHKam SUnyam
   anātmakam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjātīte śūnyam ity	anAtmakam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAtIte SUnyam iti 
   apraṇihitam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjātīte vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ	apraNihitam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAtIte vedanAm saMjQAm
   saṃskārān vijñānam anityam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjātīte	saMskArAn vijQAnam anityam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAtIte
   duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjātīte	duHKam SUnyam anAtmakam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAtIte
   śūnyam ity apraṇihitam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjātīte iyam	SUnyam iti apraNihitam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAtIte iyam
   āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ānulomikī dharmatṛṣṇā āmaḥ	Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya AnulomikI Darma tRzNA AmaH
   iti duḥkhasatyādhikāreṇa mṛdūṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ evaṃ rūpaṃ	iti duHKa satya aDikAreNa mRdu Uzma gatasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH evam rUpam
   prahātavyam anena rūpaṃ prahātavyam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na	prahAtavyam anena rUpam prahAtavyam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na
   (PSP1: 120) saṃjānīte evaṃ vedanā prahātavyā anena vedanā prahātavyeti	(PSP1: 120) saMjAnIte evam vedanA prahAtavyA anena vedanA prahAtavyA iti
   nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte evaṃ saṃjñā prahātavyā anena	na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAnIte evam saMjQA prahAtavyAH anena
   saṃjñā prahātavyeti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte evaṃ	saMjQA prahAtavyA iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAnIte evam
   saṃskārāḥ prahātavyā anena saṃskārāḥ prahātavyā iti nābhiniviśate	saMskArAH prahAtavyAH anena saMskArAH prahAtavyAH iti na aBiniviSate
   nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte evaṃ vijñānaṃ prahātavyam anena vijñānaṃ	na aDitizWati na saMjAnIte evam vijQAnam prahAtavyam anena vijQAnam
   prahātavyam iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte evaṃ duḥkhaṃ	prahAtavyam iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAnIte evam duHKam
   parikṣayam anena duḥkhaṃ parikṣayam iti evaṃ samudayaḥ prahātavyo 'nena	parikzayam anena duHKam parikzayam iti evam samudayaH prahAtavyaH anena
   samudayaḥ prahātavya iti nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjātīte iti	samudayaH prahAtavyaH iti na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAtIte iti
   samudayasatyādhikāreṇa mṛdūṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ evaṃ nirodhaḥ	samudaya satya aDikAreNa mRdu Uzma gatasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH evam niroDaH
   sākṣātkartavyo 'nena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti evaṃ mārgo bhāvayitavyo	sAkzAt kartavyaH anena niroDaH sAkzAt kartavyaH iti evam mArgaH BAvayitavyaH 
   'nena mārgo bhāvayitavya iti ayaṃ saṃkleśa idaṃ vyavadānam iti ime dharmāḥ	anena mArgaH BAvayitavyaH iti ayam saMkleSaH idam vyavadAnam iti ime DarmAH
   sevitavyāḥ ime dharmā na sevitavyā iti iha caritavyam iha na caritavyam	sevitavyAH ime DarmAH na sevitavyAH iti iha caritavyam iha na caritavyam
   ayaṃ mārgo bhāvayitavyo 'yaṃ na bhāvayitavyaḥ iyaṃ bodhisattvasya śikṣā	ayam mArgaH BAvayitavyaH ayam na BAvayitavyaH iyam boDisattvasya SikzA
   iyam aśikṣā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya na dānapāramitā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya na	iyam aSikzAH iyam boDisattvasya na dAna pAramitA iyam boDisattvasya na
   śīlapāramitā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya na kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya na	SIla pAramitA iyam boDisattvasya na kzAnti pAramitA iyam boDisattvasya na
   vīryapāramitā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya na dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya na	vIrya pAramitAH iyam boDisattvasya na DyAna pAramitA iyam boDisattvasya na
   prajñāpāramitā idaṃ bodhisattvasyopāyakauśalam idam anupāyakauśalam iti	prajQApAramitA idam boDisattvasya upAya kOSalam idam anupAya kOSalam iti
   nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mūrdhāmaḥ	na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAnIte ayam boDisattvasya mUrDAmaH
   saced āyuṣman bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān	saced Ayuzman boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn
   evaṃ nābhiniviśate nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte iyaṃ bodhisattvasyānulomikī	evam na aBiniviSate na aDitizWati na saMjAnIte iyam boDisattvasya AnulomikI
   dharmatṛṣṇā āmaḥ śāriputra āha katamaḥ punar āyuṣman subhūte	Darma tRzNA AmaH SAriputraH Aha katamaH punar Ayuzman suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nyāmaḥ subhūtir āha ihāyuṣman śāriputra	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya nyAmaH suBUtiH Aha iha Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nādhyātmaśūnyatayā	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran na aDyAtma SUnyatayA
   bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na bahirdhāśūnyatayā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ	bahirDA SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na bahirDA SUnyatayA aDyAtma SUnyatAm
   samanupaśyati na bahirdhāśūnyatayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati	samanupaSyati na bahirDA SUnyatayA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm samanupaSyati
   nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati	na aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayA bahirDA SUnyatAm samanupaSyati
   nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na	na aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayA SUnyatA SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na
   śūnyatāśūnyatayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na	SUnyatA SUnyatayA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na
   śūnyatāśūnyatayā mahāśūnyatāṃ (PSP1: 121) samanupaśyati na	SUnyatA SUnyatayA mahA SUnyatAm (PSP1: 121) samanupaSyati na
   śūnyatāśūnyatayā paramārthaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā	SUnyatA SUnya tayA parama arTa SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnyatayA
   saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā atyantaśūnyatāṃ	saMskRta SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnya tayA atyanta SUnyatAm
   samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na	samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnyatayA anavara agra SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na
   śūnyatāśūnyatayā anavakāraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā	SUnyatA SUnyatayA anavakAra SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnyatayA
   prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ	prakRti SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnya tayA sarva Darma SUnyatAm
   samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na	samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnyatayA sva lakzaNa SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na
   śūnyatāśūnyatayā anupalambhaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā	SUnyatA SUnya tayA anupalamBa SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnyatayA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā bhāvaśūnyatāṃ	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnya tayA BAva SUnyatAm
   samanupaśyati na śūnyatāśūnyatayā abhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati na	samanupaSyati na SUnyatA SUnya tayA aBAva SUnyatAm samanupaSyati na
   parabhāvaśūnyatayā svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati ayaṃ hi śāriputra	para BAva SUnyatayA svaBAva SUnyatAm samanupaSyati ayam hi SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvanyāmaḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattvanyAmaH
   iti nirodhasatyādhikāreṇa mṛdūṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ punar aparaṃ	iti niroDa satya aDikAreNa mRdu Uzma gatasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA evam
   śikṣitavyam yathā śikṣamāṇena rūpaṃ jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyam	Sikzitavyam yaTA SikzamANena rUpam jQAtavyam na ca tena mantavyam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ jñātavyaṃ na ca tena mantavyaṃ cakṣur	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam jQAtavyam na ca tena mantavyam cakzuH 
   jñātavyaṃ evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano jñātavyaṃ na ca tena	jQAtavyam evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH jQAtavyam na ca tena
   mantavyaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā jñātavyā na ca tair mantavyaṃ	mantavyam Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya DarmA jQAtavyAH na ca tEH mantavyam
   dānapāramitā jñātavyā na ca tayā mantavyaṃ śīlapāramitā jñātavyā na ca	dAna pAramitA jQAtavyA na ca tayA mantavyam SIla pAramitA jQAtavyAH na ca
   tayā mantavyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā jñātavyā na ca tayā mantavyaṃ vīryapāramitā	tayA mantavyam kzAnti pAramitA jQAtavyA na ca tayA mantavyam vIrya pAramitA
   jñātavyā na ca tayā mantavyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jñātavyā na ca tayā mantavyaṃ	jQAtavyA na ca tayA mantavyam prajQApAramitA jQAtavyA na ca tayA mantavyam
   evaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ pañcacakṣūṃṣi catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni	evam paQca aBijQAH paQca cakzUMzi catvAri smRti upasTAnAni
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā bhāvayitavyā na ca tair	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgA BAvayitavyA na ca tEH 
   mantavyam catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido	mantavyam catvAri vESAradyAni daSa taTAgata balAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH 
   'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā jñātavyā na ca tair mantavyaṃ evaṃ hi	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmA jQAtavyAH na ca tEH mantavyam evam hi
   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhicittaṃ	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA boDi cittam
   nāma jñātavyaṃ samacittaṃ nāmodāracittaṃ nāma jñātavyaṃ na ca tena	nAma jQAtavyam sama cittam nAma udAra cittam nAma jQAtavyam na ca tena
   mantavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā tac cittam acittaṃ prakṛtiś cittasya	mantavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA tat cittam acittam prakRtiH cittasya
   prabhāsvarā śāriputra āha kā punar āyuṣman subhūte cittasya prabhāsvaratā	praBAsvarA SAriputraH Aha kA punar Ayuzman suBUte cittasya praBAsvaratA
   subhūtir āha yad āyuṣman śāriputra cittaṃ na rāgeṇa saṃyuktaṃ na	suBUtiH Aha yat Ayuzman SAriputra cittam na rAgeNa saMyuktam na
   visaṃyuktaṃ (PSP1: 122) na dveṣeṇa saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ na mohena	visaMyuktam (PSP1: 122) na dvezeNa saMyuktam na visaMyuktam na mohena
   saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ na paryutthānaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ	saMyuktam na visaMyuktam na paryutTAnEH saMyuktam na visaMyuktam
   nāvaraṇaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ nānuśayaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ na	na AvaraNEH saMyuktam na visaMyuktam na anuSayEH saMyuktam na visaMyuktam na
   saṃyojanaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ na dṛṣṭikṛtaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ na	saMyojanEH saMyuktam na visaMyuktam na dRzwi kRtEH saMyuktam na
   visaṃyuktaṃ iyaṃ śāriputra cittasya prabhāsvaratā śāriputra āha kiṃ punar	visaMyuktam iyam SAriputra cittasya praBAsvaratA SAriputraH Aha kim punar 
   āyuṣman subhūte asti tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam subhūtir āha kiṃ punar	Ayuzman suBUte asti tat cittam yat cittam acittam suBUtiH Aha kim punar 
   āyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā tatrāstitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā	Ayuzman SAriputra yA acitta tA tatra astitAH vA na astitA vA vidyate vA
   upalabhyate vā śāriputra āha na khalv āyuṣman subhūte subhūtir āha saced	upalaByate vA SAriputraH Aha na Kalu Ayuzman suBUte suBUtiH Aha saced 
   āyuṣman śāriputra tatrācittatāyām astitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate	Ayuzman SAriputra tatra acitta tAyAm astitAH vA na astitAH vA na vidyate
   nopalabhyate vā pai nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogaḥ yad āyuṣman śāriputra	na upalaByate vA pE nu te yuktaH eza paryanuyogaH yat Ayuzman SAriputra
   evam āha asti tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam iti śāriputra āha kā punar eṣā	evam Aha asti tat cittam yat cittam acittam iti SAriputraH Aha kA punar ezA
   āyuṣman subhūte acittatā subhūtir āha acikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā	Ayuzman suBUte acitta tA suBUtiH Aha acikArAH Ayuzman SAriputra avikalpA
   acittatā yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā iyam ucyate acittatā śāriputra āha kiṃ	acitta tA yA sarva DarmANAm DarmatA iyam ucyate acitta tA SAriputraH Aha kim
   punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva tac cittam avikāram avikalpaṃ tathaiva	punar Ayuzman suBUte yaTA eva tat cittam avikAram avikalpam taTA eva
   rūpam apy avikāram avikalpaṃ vedanāpy avikārāvikalpā saṃjñāpy avikārā	rUpam api avikAram avikalpam vedanA api avikAra avikalpA saMjQA api avikArA
   avikalpā saṃskārā apy avikārā avikalpā vijñānam apy avikāram avikalpam	avikalpA saMskArAH api avikArAH avikalpA vijQAnam api avikAram avikalpam
   evam eva cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ	evam eva cakzuH DAtuH rUpa DAtuH cakzuH vijQAna DAtuH avikAraH avikalpaH
   śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuś śrotravijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpo ghrāṇadhātur	Srotra DAtuH SabdaDAtuH Srotra vijQAna DAtuH avikAraH avikalpaH GrANa DAtuH 
   gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpo jihvādhātū rasadhātur	ganDaDAtuH GrANa vijQAna DAtuH avikAraH avikalpaH jihvA DAtuH rasa DAtuH 
   jihvāvijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuś	jihvA vijQAna DAtuH avikAraH avikalpaH kAyaDAtuH sprazwavya DAtu H 
   kāyavijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpao manodhātur dharmadhātur	kAya vijQAna DAtuH avikAraH avikalpaaH manaH DAtuH DarmaDAtuH 
   manovijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ evam āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ	manaH vijQAna DAtuH avikAraH avikalpaH evam AyatanAni pratItyasamutpAdaH
   pāramitā abhijñāḥ	pAramitAH aBijQAH
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNikA
   buddhadharmā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir avikārā avikalpā subhūtir āha	budDa DarmA yAvat anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH avikArA avikalpA suBUtiH Aha
   evam etad āyuṣman śāriptura yathaiva cittam avikāram avikalpaṃ tathaiva	evam etat Ayuzman SAriptura yaTA eva cittam avikAram avikalpam taTA eva
   skandhadhātvāyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pāramitā abhijñāḥ	skanDa DAtu AyatanAni pratItyasamutpAdaH pAramitAH aBijQAH
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNikA
   buddhadharmā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ śāriputra āha sādhu sādhu	budDa DarmA yAvat anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH SAriputraH Aha sADu sADu
   āyuṣman subhūte tad yathāpi nāma bhagavataḥ putra auraso mukhato jāto	Ayuzman suBUte tat yaTA api nAma BagavataH putraH OrasaH muKataH jAtaH 
   dharmajo dharmanirmito (PSP1: 123) dharmadāyado nāmiṣadāyādaḥ	DarmajaH Darma nirmitaH (PSP1: 123) Darma dAyadaH na Amiza dAyAdaH
   pratyakṣacakṣurdharmeṣu kāyasākṣī yathāpi nāmāgrāraṇavihāriṇāṃ bhagavatā	pratyakza cakzuH Darmezu kAya sAkzI yaTA api nAma agrAraNa vihAriNAm BagavatA
   agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭasyāyam upadeśaḥ evam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvena	agra tAyAm nirdizwasya ayam upadeSaH evam Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ataś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam atas ca boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'vinivartanīya upaparīkṣitavyo 'virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ	avinivartanIyaH upaparIkzitavyaH avirahitaH ca prajQApAramitayA veditavyaH
   iti mārgasatyādhikāreṇa mṛdūṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ śrāvakabhūmāv api	iti mArga satya aDikAreNa mRdu Uzma gatasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH SrAvaka BUmO api
   āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva	Ayuzman suBUte Sikzitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena iyam eva
   prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā	prajQApAramitA Srotavya udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA
   yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte	yoniSas ca upaparIkzitavyA pratyekabudDa BUmO api Ayuzman suBUte
   śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā	Sikzitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena iyam eva prajQApAramitA
   śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca	Srotavya udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA yoniSas ca
   upaparīkṣitavyā bodhisattvabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena	upaparIkzitavyA boDisattva BUmO api Ayuzman suBUte Sikzitu kAmena
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā	boDisattvena mahAsattvena iyam eva prajQApAramitA Srotavya udgrahItavyA
   dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā	DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA yoniSas ca upaparIkzitavyA
   buddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	budDa BUmO api Ayuzman suBUte Sikzitu kAmena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā	iyam eva prajQApAramitA Srotavya udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA
   paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi atra	paryavAptavyA yoniSas ca upaparIkzitavyA tat kasya hetoH taTA hi atra
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni yatra bodhisattvair	prajQApAramitAyAm trINi yAnAni vistareNa upadizwAni yatra boDisattvEH 
   mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā bodhisattvabhūmau vā	mahAsattvEH SrAvaka BUmO vA pratyekabudDa BUmO vA boDisattva BUmO vA
   śikṣitavyam iti sarveṣāṃ hetutvaviśeṣaḥ atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir	Sikzitavyam iti sarvezAm hetu tva viSezaH aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH 
   bhagavantam etad avocat yo 'haṃ bhagavan na bodhisattvaṃ na	Bagavantam etat avocat yaH aham Bagavat na boDisattvam na
   prajñāpāramitāṃ vindāmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi tat katamaṃ	prajQApAramitAm vindAmi na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi tat katamam
   bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi evad	boDisattvam katamasyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi evad
   eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt yo 'haṃ vastu na vindāmi nopalabhe na	eva me Bagavan kOkRtyam syAt yaH aham vastu na vindAmi na upalaBe na
   samanupaśyāmi so 'haṃ bhagavan vastv avindann anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan	samanupaSyAmi saH aham Bagavan vastu avindan anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan
   katamena (PSP1: 124) dharmeṇa katamaṃ dharmam avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi	katamena (PSP1: 124) DarmeNa katamam Darmam avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi
   etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt yo 'haṃ sarvadharmān avindann	etat eva me Bagavan kOkRtyam syAt yaH aham sarva DarmAn avindan= 
   anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ bodhisattva	anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyat nAmaDeya mAtreNa Aya vyayam kuryAm boDisattva
   iti vā prajñāpāramiteti vā api tu khalu punar bhagavan tad api nāmadheyaṃ	iti vA prajQApAramitA iti vE api tu Kalu punar Bagavan tat api nAmaDeyam
   na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ	na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam tat kasya hetoH
   avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ tan nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ	avidyamAna tvena tasya nAmaDeyasya evam tat nAmaDeyam na sTitam
   nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyaṃ ca vyayaṃ ca	na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam rUpasya aham Bagavan Ayam ca vyayam ca
   nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi vedanāyā ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca	na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi vedanAyAH aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca
   nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi saṃjñāyā ahaṃ bhagavan nāyañ ca vyayañ ca	na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi saMjQAyAH aham Bagavat na ayan ca vyayan ca
   nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi saṃskārāṇām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca	na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi saMskArANAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca
   nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi vijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca	na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi vijQAnasya aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca
   nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi so 'haṃ bhagavan rūpādīnām āyañ ca vyayañ	na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi saH aham Bagavan rUpa AdInAm Ayan ca vyayaQ
   cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti	ca anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan kasya nAmaDeyam karizyAmi boDisattvaH iti
   anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na	anena Bagavan paryAyeNa tat api nAmaDeyam na sTitam na AsTitam na
   viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya	vizWitam na avizWitam tat kasya hetoH avidyamAna tvAt tasya nAmaDeyasya
   evaṃ tan nāma na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam cakṣuṣo 'haṃ	evam tat nAma na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam cakzuzaH aham
   śrotrasyāhaṃ ghrāṇasyāhaṃ jihvāyā ahaṃ kāyasyāhaṃ manaso 'haṃ bhagavan	Srotrasya aham GrANasya aham jihvAyAH aham kAyasya aham manasaH aham Bagavan
   nāyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi api tu khalu punar bhagavan	na ayan ca vyayan ca na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi api tu Kalu punar Bagavan
   vedayitaṃ rūpaṃ nāma vedanā nāma saṃjñā nāma saṃskārā nāma vijñānaṃ nāma	vedayitam rUpam nAma vedanA nAma saMjQA nAma saMskArAH nAma vijQAnam nAma
   cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti nāma etāni nāmadheyāni na	cakzuH Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH iti nAma etAni nAmaDeyAni na
   sthitāni nāsthitāni na viṣṭhitāni nāviṣṭhitāni tat kasya hetoḥ	sTitAni na AsTitAni na vizWitAni na avizWitAni tat kasya hetoH
   avidyamānatvena teṣāṃ nāmadheyānām evaṃ tāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni	avidyamAna tvena tezAm nAmaDeyAnAm evam tAni nAmaDeyAni na sTitAni
   nāsthitāni na viṣṭhitāni nāviṣṭhitāni rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ	na AsTitAni na vizWitAni na avizWitAni rUpasya aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayaQ
   ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi evaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāṇām āyañ	ca na upalaBe na samanupaSyAmi evam Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya DarmANAm AyaQ
   ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe so 'haṃ bhagavan	ca vyayan ca na samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe saH aham Bagavan

   cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti	ca anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan kasya nAmaDeyam karizyAmi boDisattvaH iti

   vyayañ ca na samanupaśyan kāyavijñānasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyan	vyayan ca na samanupaSyan kAya vijQAnasya ayan ca vyayan ca na samanupaSyan

   nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti api tu khalu punar bhagavan tad api	nAmaDeyam karizyAmi boDisattvaH iti api tu Kalu punar Bagavan tat api
   nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ	nAmaDeyam na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam tat kasya hetoH
   avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ tan nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ	avidyamAna tvena tasya nAmaDeyasya evam tat nAmaDeyam na sTitam

   upādānaskandhānām āyañ cavyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe evaṃ	upAdAna skanDAnAm Ayan cavyayan ca samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe evam
   māyopamānāṃ pratiśrutkopamānāṃ pratibhāsopamānāṃ pratibimbopamānāṃ	mAyA upamAnAm pratiSrutka upamAnAm pratiBAsA upamAnAm pratibimba upamAnAm

   upādānaskandhānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe evaṃ	upAdAna skanDAnAm Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe evam
   viviktasya śāntasyānutpādasyānirodhasyāsaṃkleśasyāvyavadānasya ahaṃ	viviktasya SAntasya anutpAdasya aniroDasya asaMkleSasya avyavadAnasya aham
