   tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer ddharmasthititāyā dharmaniyāmatāyā ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ	taTatAyAH BUtakoweH dDarma sTiti tAyAH Darma niyAma tAyAH aham Bagavan AyaQ
   ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe evaṃ kuśalānām akuśalānāṃ sāvadyānām	ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe evam kuSalAnAm akuSalAnAm sAvadyAnAm
   anavadyānāṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ niḥkleśānāṃ laukikānāṃ	anavadyAnAm sa AsravANAm anAsravANAm saMkleSAnAm niHkleSAnAm lOkikAnAm
   lokottarāṇāṃ saṃskṛtānām asaṃskṛtānāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ vyavadānānāṃ	loka uttarANAm saMskRtAnAm asaMskRtAnAm saMkleSAnAm vyavadAnAnAm
   sāṃsārikāṇāṃ naivāṇikānāṃ ahaṃ bhagavan dharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca	sAMsArikANAm na evANikAnAm aham Bagavan DarmANAm Ayan ca vyayan ca
   samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām āyañ ca	samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm DarmANAm Ayan ca
   vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe bhagavato 'py ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca	vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe BagavataH api aham Bagavan Ayan ca
   vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu	vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu
   lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ	lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm
   sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi	sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi
   nopalabhe dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām	na upalaBe dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAnAm
   arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ	arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham
   bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe paścimāyāṃ diśi	Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm
   saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca	sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca
   samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm
   sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi	sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi
   nopalabhe uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	na upalaBe uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm
   sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi	sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi
   nopalabhe pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	na upalaBe pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm
   sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi	sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi
   nopalabhe dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	na upalaBe dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm
   sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi	sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi
   nopalabhe paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu	na upalaBe paScima uttarasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu
   tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ	taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm
   sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi	sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi
   nopalabhe adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām	na upalaBe aDastAt diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAnAm
   arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ	arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham
   bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe upariṣṭād diśi	Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe uparizwAt diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm
   saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca	sa SrAvaka saMGAnAm sa boDisattva saMGAnAm aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca
   samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe api tu khalu punar bhagavan tad api nāmadheyaṃ na	samanupaSyAmi na upalaBe api tu Kalu punar Bagavan tat api nAmaDeyam na
   sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ avidyamānatvena	sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam tat kasya hetoH avidyamAna tvena
   tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ tan nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ	tasya nAmaDeyasya evam tat nAmaDeyam na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam
   nāviṣṭhitam āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ	na avizWitam Ayan ca vyayan ca anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan katamam
   bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi api tu	boDisattvam katamasyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi api tu
   khalu punar bhagavan tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ	Kalu punar Bagavan tat api nAmaDeyam na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam
   nāviṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ tan	na avizWitam tat kasya hetoH avidyamAna tvena tasya nAmaDeyasya evam tat 
   nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam	nAmaDeyam na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam
   sarvadharmatathatāyā ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca samanupaśyāmi	sarva Darma taTatAyAH aham Bagavan Ayan ca vyayan ca samanupaSyAmi
   nopalabhe iti madhyoṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ yāpīyaṃ bhagavan	na upalaBe iti maDya Uzma gatasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH yApIyam Bagavan
   dharmasaṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir yad uta bodhisattva iti sā na kenacid	Darma saMketikI Darma prajQaptiH yat uta boDisattvaH iti sA na kenacid 
   vacanīyā skandhena vā dhātunā vā āyatanena vā yāvad (PSP1: 127) āveṇikena	vacanIyA skanDena vA DAtunA vA Ayatanena vA yAvat (PSP1: 127) AveNikena
   vā buddhadharmeṇa yāvad evaiṣā dharmaprajñaptiḥ tad yathāpi nāma bhagavan	vA budDa DarmeNa yAvat eva ezA Darma prajQaptiH tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan
   svapno na kenacid vacanīyaḥ pratiśrutko pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ nirmitakaṃ	svapnaH na kenacid vacanIyaH pratiSrutkaH pratiBAsaH pratibimbam nirmitakam
   na kenacid vacanīyam tad yāthāpi nāma bhagavan pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṃ	na kenacid vacanIyam tat yATA api nAma Bagavan pRTivI ap tejaH vAyu AkASam
   nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ tad yathāpi nāma bhagavan śīlam iti samādhir iti	nAma na kenacid vacanIyam tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan SIlam iti samADiH iti
   prajñeti vimuktir iti vimuktijñānadarśanam iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ	prajQA iti vimuktiH iti vimukti jQAna darSanam iti nAma na kenacid vacanIyam
   srotaāpanna iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ sakṛdāgāmīti anāgamīti arhann	srotaApannaH iti nAma na kenacid vacanIyam sakRdAgAmi iti anAgamI iti arhan= 
   iti pratyekabuddha iti yāvad bodhisattvadharma iti tathāgata iti buddha	iti pratyekabudDaH iti yAvat boDisattva DarmaH iti taTAgataH iti budDa
   tii tathateti buddhadharma iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ kuśalena vā	tii taTatA iti budDa DarmaH iti nAma na kenacid vacanIyam kuSalena vA
   akuśalena vā sāvadyena vā anavadyena vā sukhena vā duḥkhena vā ātmanā va	akuSalena vA sAvadyena vA anavadyena vA suKena vA duHKena vA AtmanA va
   anātmanā vā śāntena vā aśāntena vā viviktena vā aviviktena vā nimittena vā	anAtmanA vA SAntena vA aSAntena vA viviktena vA aviviktena vA nimittena vA
   animittena vā bhāvena vā abhāvena vā imam apy ahaṃ bhagavan arthavaśaṃ	animittena vA BAvena vA aBAvena vA imam api aham Bagavan arTa vaSam
   pratītya evaṃ vadāmi etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt yo 'haṃ	pratItya evam vadAmi etat eva me Bagavan kOkRtyam syAt yaH aham
   sarvadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan	sarva DarmANAm Ayan ca vyayan ca anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan
   nāmadheyamātreṇāyañ ca vyayañ ca kuryāṃ bodhisattva iti api tu khalu punar	nAmaDeya mAtreNa ayan ca vyayan ca kuryAm boDisattvaH iti api tu Kalu punar 
   bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam	Bagavan tat api nAmaDeyam na sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam
   tat kasya hetoḥ avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ tat nāmadheyaṃ na	tat kasya hetoH avidyamAna tvAt tasya nAmaDeyasya evam tat nAmaDeyam na
   sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ sa ceha bhagavan evaṃ	sTitam na AsTitam na vizWitam na avizWitam sa ca iha Bagavan evam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm BAzyamANAyAm cittam
   nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na	na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vipratisArI Bavati mAnasam na uttrasyati na
   saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate (PSP1: 128) niyataṃ mahāsattvo	saMtrasyati na saMtrAsam Apadyate (PSP1: 128) niyatam mahAsattvaH 
   'vinivartaṇīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito veditavyaḥ susthito	avinivartaNIyAyAm boDisattva BUmO sTitaH veditavyaH susTitaH 
   'sthānayogena iti adhimātroṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ punar aparaṃ	asTAna yogena iti aDimAtra Uzma gatasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH punar aparam
   bahgavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato na rūpe	bahgavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAn carataH na rUpe
   sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣu	sTAtavyam na vedanAyAm sTAtavyam na saMjQAyAm sTAtavyam na saMskArezu
   sthātavyaṃ na vijñāne sthātavayṃ tena na cakṣuṣi sthātavyaṃ na śrotre	sTAtavyam na vijQAne sTAtavaym tena na cakzuzi sTAtavyam na Srotre
   sthātavyaṃ na ghrāṇe sthātavyaṃ na jihvāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na kāye sthātavyaṃ	sTAtavyam na GrANe sTAtavyam na jihvAyAm sTAtavyam na kAye sTAtavyam
   na manasi sthātavyaṃ tena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde sthātavyaṃ na gandhe	na manasi sTAtavyam tena na rUpe sTAtavyam na Sabde sTAtavyam na ganDe
   sthātavyaṃ na rase sthātavyaṃ na spraṣṭavye sthātavyaṃ na dharme	sTAtavyam na rase sTAtavyam na sprazwavye sTAtavyam na Darme
   sthātavyam tena na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavayṃ na śrotravijñāne sthātavayṃ na	sTAtavyam tena na cakzuH vijQAne sTAtavaym na Srotra vijQAne sTAtavaym na
   ghrāṇavijñāne sthātavayṃ na jihvāvijñāne sthātavayṃ na kāyavijñāne	GrANa vijQAne sTAtavaym na jihvA vijQAne sTAtavaym na kAya vijQAne
   sthātavayṃ na manovijñāne sthātavyaṃ tena na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na	sTAtavaym na manaH vijQAne sTAtavyam tena na cakzuH saMsparSe sTAtavyam na
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam na Srotra saMsparSe sTAtavyam
   na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe	na Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam na GrANa saMsparSe
   sthātavyaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśe	sTAtavyam na GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam na jihvA saMsparSe
   sthātavyaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ na kāyasaṃsparśe	sTAtavyam na jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam na kAya saMsparSe
   sthātavyaṃ na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśe	sTAtavyam na kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam na manaH saMsparSe
   na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyam tena na pṛthivīdhātau	na manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam tena na pRTivI DAtO
   sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau sthātavyaṃ na tejodhātau sthātavyaṃ na vāyudhātau	sTAtavyam na abDAtO sTAtavyam na tejaH DAtO sTAtavyam na vAyu DAtO
   sthātavyaṃ nākāśadhātau sthātavyam na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam tena	sTAtavyam na AkASa DAtO sTAtavyam na vijQAna DAtO sTAtavyam tena
   nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣu sthātavyaṃ na vijñāyāṃ sthātavyam na	na avidyAyAm sTAtavyam na saMskArezu sTAtavyam na vijQAyAm sTAtavyam na
   nāmarūpe sthātavyaṃ na ṣaḍāyataneṣu sthātavyaṃ na sparśe sthātavyaṃ na	nAma rUpe sTAtavyam na zaz Ayatanezu sTAtavyam na sparSe sTAtavyam na
   vedanāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na upādāne sthātavyaṃ na bhave	vedanAyAm sTAtavyam na tRzNAyAm sTAtavyam naH upAdAne sTAtavyam na Bave
   sthātavyaṃ na jātau sthātavyaṃ na jarāmaraṇe sthātavyaṃ na jarāmaraṇe	sTAtavyam na jAtO sTAtavyam na jarA maraNe sTAtavyam na jarA maraNe
   sthātavyaṃ na śoke sthātavyaṃ na parideve sthātavyaṃ na duḥkhe sthātavyaṃ	sTAtavyam na Soke sTAtavyam na parideve sTAtavyam na duHKe sTAtavyam
   na daurmanasyopayāseṣū sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ	na dOrmanasya upayAsezU sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan rUpam
   rūpatvena śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanātvena śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñātvena śūnyā	rUpa tvena SUnyam vedanA vedanA tvena SUnyA saMjQA saMjQA tvena SUnyA
   saṃskārāḥ saṃskāratvena śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānatvena śūnyaṃ yā ca bhagavan	saMskArAH saMskAra tvena SUnyA vijQAnam vijQAna tvena SUnyam yA ca Bagavan
   rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rupaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā	rUpasya SUnyatA na tat rUpam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH rupam rUpam eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva rūpam yā ca bhagavan vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vedanā na cānyatra	SUnyatA eva rUpam yA ca Bagavan vedanAyAH SUnyatA na sA vedanA na ca anyatra
   śūnyatāyā vedanā vedanaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vedanā yā ca bhagavan	SUnyatAyAH vedanA vedanA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva vedanA yA ca Bagavan
   saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā saṃjñā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā saṃjñā saṃjñaiva	saMjQAyAH SUnyatA na sA saMjQA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyA saMjQA saMjQA eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva saṃjñā yā ca bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva saMjQA yA ca Bagavan saMskArANAm SUnyatA na te
   saṃskārāḥ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskārāḥ śūnyatā śūnyataiva	saMskArAH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH saMskArAH saMskArAH SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   saṃskārāḥ yā ca bhagavan vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ na cānyatra	saMskArAH yA ca Bagavan vijQAnasya SUnyatA na tat vijQAnam na ca anyatra
   śūnyatāyā vijñānaṃ vijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vijñānam anena bhagavan	SUnyatAyAH vijQAnam vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva vijQAnam anena Bagavan
   paryāyeṇa bodhiattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe	paryAyeNa boDiat tvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na rUpe
   sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣu	sTAtavyam na vedanAyAm sTAtavyam na saMjQAyAm sTAtavyam na saMskArezu
   sthātavyaṃ na vijñāne sthātavyaṃ na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau	sTAtavyam na vijQAne sTAtavyam na pRTivI DAtO sTAtavyam na abDAtO
   sthātavyaṃ na tejodhātau sthātavyaṃ na vāyudhātau sthātavyaṃ nākāśadhātau	sTAtavyam na tejaH DAtO sTAtavyam na vAyu DAtO sTAtavyam na AkASa DAtO
   sthātavyam na vijñānadhātau sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan	sTAtavyam na vijQAna DAtO sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan
   pṛthivīdhatuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena śūnyā yā ca pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā nāsau	pRTivIDatuH pRTivI DAtu tvena SUnyA yA ca pRTivI DAtu SUnyatA na asO
   pṛthivīdhātur na cānyatra śūnyatāyāḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātur eva	pRTivI DAtuH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH pRTivI DAtuH pRTivI DAtuH eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva pṛthivīdhātuḥ evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva pRTivI DAtuH evam abDAtuH tejaH DAtuH vAyuDAtuH 
   ākāśadhātus tathā hi bhagavan vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyā yā ca	AkASaDAtuH taTA hi Bagavan vijQAna DAtuH vijQAna DAtu tvena SUnyA yA ca
   vijñānadhātuśūnyatā nāsau vijñānadhātur na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	vijQAna DAtu SUnyatA na asO vijQAna DAtuH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātur eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vijñānadhātuḥ anena	vijQAna DAtuH vijQAna DAtuH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva vijQAna DAtuH anena
   (PSP1: 129) bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	(PSP1: 129) Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau sthātavyaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na pRTivI DAtO sTAtavyam na abDAtO sTAtavyam
   na tejodhātau sthātavyaṃ na vāyudhātau sthātavyaṃ nākāśadhātau sthātavyam	na tejaH DAtO sTAtavyam na vAyu DAtO sTAtavyam na AkASa DAtO sTAtavyam
   na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde sthātavyaṃ na	na vijQAna DAtO sTAtavyam na rUpe sTAtavyam na Sabde sTAtavyam na
   gandhe sthātavyaṃ na rase sthātavyaṃ na spraṣṭavye sthātavyaṃ na dharme	ganDe sTAtavyam na rase sTAtavyam na sprazwavye sTAtavyam na Darme
   sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpatvena śūnyam śabdaḥ	sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan rUpam rUpa tvena SUnyam SabdaH
   śabdatvena śūnyo gandho gandhatvena śūnyo raso rasatvena śūnyaḥ	Sabda tvena SUnyaH ganDaH ganDa tvena SUnyaH rasaH rasa tvena SUnyaH
   spraṣṭavyaṃ spraṣṭavyatvena śūnyam yā ca bhagavan rūpasya śūnyatā na tad	sprazwavyam sprazwavya tvena SUnyam yA ca Bagavan rUpasya SUnyatA na tat 
   rūpaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rupaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam yā ca	rUpam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH rupam rUpam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva rUpam yA ca
   bhagavan śabdasya śūnyatā na sa śabdaḥ na cānyatra śabdāt śabdaḥ śabda eva	Bagavan Sabdasya SUnyatA na sa SabdaH na ca anyatra SabdAt SabdaH SabdaH eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva śabdaḥ yā ca bhagavan gandhasya śūnyatā na sa gandhaḥ	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva SabdaH yA ca Bagavan ganDasya SUnyatA na sa ganDaH
   na cānyatra gandhaād gandho gandha eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva gandhaḥ yā ca	na ca anyatra ganDaAt ganDaH ganDaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva ganDaH yA ca
   bhagavan rasasya śūnyatā na sa rasaḥ na cānyatra rasād raso rasa eva	Bagavan rasasya SUnyatA na sa rasaH na ca anyatra rasAt rasaH rasaH eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva rasaḥ yā ca bhagavan spraṣṭavyasya śūnyatā na tad	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva rasaH yA ca Bagavan sprazwavyasya SUnyatA na tat 
   spraṣṭavyam na cānyatra spraṣṭavyāt spraṣṭavyaṃ spraṣṭavyam eva śūnyatā	sprazwavyam na ca anyatra sprazwavyAt sprazwavyam sprazwavyam eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva spraṣṭayam yā ca bhagavan dharmasya śūnyatā na sa dharmaḥ na	SUnyatA eva sprazwayam yA ca Bagavan Darmasya SUnyatA na sa DarmaH na
   cānyatra dharmād dharmo dharma eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmaḥ anena	ca anyatra DarmAt DarmaH DarmaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva DarmaH anena
   bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na	Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na
   rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde sthātavyaṃ na gandhe sthātavyaṃ na rase	rUpe sTAtavyam na Sabde sTAtavyam na ganDe sTAtavyam na rase
   sthātavyaṃ na spraṣṭavye sthātavyaṃ na dharme sthātavyaṃ na cakṣuṣi	sTAtavyam na sprazwavye sTAtavyam na Darme sTAtavyam na cakzuzi
   sthātavyaṃ na śrotre sthātavyaṃ na ghrāṇe sthātavyaṃ na jihvāyāṃ	sTAtavyam na Srotre sTAtavyam na GrANe sTAtavyam na jihvAyAm
   sthātavyaṃ na kāye sthātavyaṃ na manasi sthātavyaṃ na cakṣurvijñāne	sTAtavyam na kAye sTAtavyam na manasi sTAtavyam na cakzuH vijQAne
   sthātavyaṃ na śrotravijñāne sthātavayṃ na ghrāṇavijñāne sthātavayṃ na	sTAtavyam na Srotra vijQAne sTAtavaym na GrANa vijQAne sTAtavaym na
   jihvāvijñāne sthātavayṃ na kāyavijñāne sthātavayṃ na manovijñāne	jihvA vijQAne sTAtavaym na kAya vijQAne sTAtavaym na manaH vijQAne
   sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣurvijñānaṃ	sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan cakzuH vijQAnam
   cakṣurvijñānatvena śūnyam śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānatvena śūnyam	cakzuH vijQAna tvena SUnyam Srotra vijQAnam Srotra vijQAna tvena SUnyam
   ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānatvena śūnyam jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānatvena	GrANa vijQAnam GrANa vijQAna tvena SUnyam jihvA vijQAnam jihvA vijQAna tvena
   śūnyam kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānatvena śūnyam manovijñānaṃ manovijñānatvena	SUnyam kAya vijQAnam kAya vijQAna tvena SUnyam manaH vijQAnam manaH vijQAna tvena
   śūnyam yā ca bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasya śūnyatā na tad cakṣurvijñānaṃ na	SUnyam yA ca Bagavan cakzuH vijQAnasya SUnyatA na tat cakzuH vijQAnam na
   cānyatra śūnyatāyā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH cakzuH vijQAnam cakzuH vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   cakṣurvijñānam yā ca bhagavan śrotravijñānasya śūnyatā na tad	cakzuH vijQAnam yA ca Bagavan Srotra vijQAnasya SUnyatA na tat 
   śrotravijñānaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānam eva	Srotra vijQAnam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH Srotra vijQAnam Srotra vijQAnam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva śrotravijñānam yā ca bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasya śūnyatā	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva Srotra vijQAnam yA ca Bagavan GrANa vijQAnasya SUnyatA
   na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānam	na tat GrANa vijQAnam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH GrANa vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam
   eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇavijñānam yā ca bhagavan jihvāvijñānasya	eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva GrANa vijQAnam yA ca Bagavan jihvA vijQAnasya
   śūnyatā na tad jihvāvijñānaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā jihvāvijñānaṃ	SUnyatA na tat jihvA vijQAnam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH jihvA vijQAnam
   jihvāvijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva jihvāvijñānam yā ca bhagavan	jihvA vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva jihvA vijQAnam yA ca Bagavan
   kāyavijñānasya śūnyatā na tad kāyavijñānaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	kAya vijQAnasya SUnyatA na tat kAya vijQAnam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyavijñānam yā ca	kAya vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva kAya vijQAnam yA ca
   bhagavan manovijñānasya śūnyatā na tad manovijñānaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	Bagavat manaH vijQAnasya SUnyatA na tat manaH vijQAnam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   manovijñānaṃ manovijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manovijñānam anena	manaH vijQAnam manaH vijQAnam eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva manaH vijQAnam anena
   bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na	Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na
   cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyaṃ na śrotravijñāne sthātavayṃ na ghrāṇavijñāne	cakzuH vijQAne sTAtavyam na Srotra vijQAne sTAtavaym na GrANa vijQAne
   sthātavayṃ na jihvāvijñāne sthātavayṃ na kāyavijñāne sthātavayṃ na	sTAtavaym na jihvA vijQAne sTAtavaym na kAya vijQAne sTAtavaym na
   manovijñāne sthātavyaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśe	manaH vijQAne sTAtavyam na cakzuH saMsparSe sTAtavyam na Srotra saMsparSe
   sthātavyaṃ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na jihvāsaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na	sTAtavyam na GrANa saMsparSe sTAtavyam na jihvA saMsparSe sTAtavyam na
   kāyasaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ	kAya saMsparSe sTAtavyam na manaH saMsparSe sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśatvena śūnyaḥ	taTA hi Bagavan cakzuH saMsparSaH cakzuH saMsparSa tvena SUnyaH
   śrotrasaṃsparśaś śrotrasaṃsparśatvena śūnyo ghrāṇasparśaś	Srotra saMsparSaH Srotra saMsparSa tvena SUnyaH GrANa sparSaH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśatvena śūnyo jihvāsaṃsparśaś jihvāsaṃsparśatvena śūnyaḥ	GrANa saMsparSa tvena SUnyaH jihvA saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSa tvena SUnyaH
   kāyasaṃsparśaś kāyasaṃsparśatvena śūnyaḥ manaḥsaṃsparśaś	kAya saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSa tvena SUnyaH manaH saMsparSaH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśatvena śūnyaḥ yā ca bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya śūnyatā na sa	manaH saMsparSa tvena SUnyaH yA ca Bagavan cakzuH saMsparSasya SUnyatA na sa
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa	cakzuH saMsparSaH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH cakzuH saMsparSaH cakzuH saMsparSa
   eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ yā ca bhagavan śrotrasaṃsparśasya	eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva cakzuH saMsparSaH yA ca Bagavan Srotra saMsparSasya
   śūnyatā na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ	SUnyatA na sa Srotra saMsparSaH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH Srotra saMsparSaH
   śrotrasaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ yā ca bhagavan	Srotra saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva Srotra saMsparSaH yA ca Bagavan
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya śūnyatā na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	GrANa saMsparSasya SUnyatA na sa GrANa saMsparSaH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ ghrāṇasaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ	GrANa saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva GrANa saMsparSaH
   yā ca bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasya śūnyatā na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ na cānyatra	yA ca Bagavan jihvA saMsparSasya SUnyatA na sa jihvA saMsparSaH na ca anyatra
   śūnyatāyā jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ jihvāsaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	SUnyatAyAH jihvA saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ yā ca bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasya śūnyatā na sa	jihvA saMsparSaH yA ca Bagavan kAya saMsparSasya SUnyatA na sa
   kāyasaṃsparśaḥ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśa eva	kAya saMsparSaH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyA kAya saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSaH eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyasaṃsparśaḥ yā ca bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasya śūnyatā	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva kAya saMsparSaH yA ca Bagavat manaH saMsparSasya SUnyatA
   na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ na cānyatra śūnyatāyā manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ manaḥsaṃsparśa	na sa manaH saMsparSaH na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH manaH saMsparSaH manaH saMsparSa
   eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa	eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva manaH saMsparSaH anena Bagavan paryAyeNa
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na cakzuH saMsparSe
   sthātavyaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthāatavyaṃ na	sTAtavyam na manaH saMsparSe sTAatavyam na
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ evaṃ yāvan na	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam evam yAvat na
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayite sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	Bagavan cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita tvena SUnyam
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita tvena
   śūnyaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	SUnyam GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita tvena SUnyam
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita tvena SUnyam
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita tvena SUnyam
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitatvena śūnyaṃ	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayita tvena SUnyam
   yā ca bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasya śūnyatā na tad	yA ca Bagavan cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitasya SUnyatA na tat 
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam yā ca bhagavan	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam yA ca Bagavan
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasya śūnyatā na tad	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitasya SUnyatA na tat 
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam yā ca bhagavan	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam yA ca Bagavan
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasya śūnyatā na tad	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitasya SUnyatA na tat 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam yā ca bhagavan	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam yA ca Bagavan
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasya śūnyatā na tad	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitasya SUnyatA na tat 
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam yā ca bhagavan	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam yA ca Bagavan
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasya śūnyatā na tad	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitasya SUnyatA na tat 
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam yā ca bhagavan	SUnyatA eva kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam yA ca Bagavan
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasya śūnyatā na tad	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitasya SUnyatA na tat 
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anena bhagavan	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam anena Bagavan
   paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na	paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ na	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya utpanne vedayite sTAtavyam na
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ na	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya utpanne vedayite sTAtavyam na
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ na	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya utpanne vedayite sTAtavyam na
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ na	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya utpanne vedayite sTAtavyam na
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ na	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya utpanne vedayite sTAtavyam na
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayotpanne vedayite sthātavyaṃ nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya utpanne vedayite sTAtavyam na avidyAyAm sTAtavyam
   evaṃ yāvan na jarāmaraṇe tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan avidyā	evam yAvat na jarA maraNe tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan avidyA
   avidyātvena śūnyā yā cāvidyāśūnyatā na sā avidyā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	avidyA tvena SUnyA yA ca avidyA SUnyatA na sA avidyA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   avidyā avidyaiva śūnyatā śūnyataivāvidyā evaṃ saṃskārāḥ samskāratvena	avidyA avidyA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva avidyAH evam saMskArAH samskAra tvena
   śūnyāḥ vijñānaṃ vijñānatvena śūnyaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpatvena śūnyaṃ	SUnyAH vijQAnam vijQAna tvena SUnyam nAma rUpam nAma rUpa tvena SUnyam
   ṣaḍāyatanāni ṣaḍāyatanatvena śūnyāni sparśaḥ sparśatvena śūnyo vedanā	zaz AyatanAni zaz Ayatana tvena SUnyAni sparSaH sparSa tvena SUnyaH vedanA
   vedanātvena śūnyā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇātvena śūnyā upādānam upādānatvena śūnyaṃ	vedanA tvena SUnyA tRzNA tRzNA tvena SUnyAH upAdAnam upAdAna tvena SUnyam
   bhavo bhavatvena śūnyo jātir jātitvena śūnyā tathā hi bhagavan jarāmaraṇaṃ	BavaH Bava tvena SUnyaH jAtiH jAti tvena SUnyA taTA hi Bagavan jarA maraNam
   (PSP1: 130) jarāmaraṇatvena śūnyam yā ca jarāmaraṇaśūnyatā na taj	(PSP1: 130) jarA maraNa tvena SUnyam yA ca jarA maraNa SUnyatA na tad 
   jarāmaraṇaṃ na cānyatra śūnyatātā jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇam eva śūnyatā	jarA maraNam na ca anyatra SUnya tAtA jarA maraNam jarA maraNam eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva jarāmaraṇam anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	SUnyatA eva jarA maraNam anena Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā nāvidyāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na saṃskāreṣu sthātavyaṃ na	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na avidyAyAm sTAtavyam na saMskArezu sTAtavyam na
   vijñāne sthātavyaṃ na nāmarūpe sthātavyaṃ na ṣaḍāyataneṣu sthātavyaṃ na	vijQAne sTAtavyam na nAma rUpe sTAtavyam na zaz Ayatanezu sTAtavyam na
   sparśe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na	sparSe sTAtavyam na vedanAyAm sTAtavyam na tRzNAyAm sTAtavyam na
   upādāne sthātavyaṃ na bhave sthātavyaṃ na jātau sthātavyaṃ na jarāmarane	upAdAne sTAtavyam na Bave sTAtavyam na jAtO sTAtavyam na jarA marane
   sthātavyam evaṃ skandhadhātvāyataneṣu ca na kartavyam punar aparaṃ	sTAtavyam evam skanDa DAtu Ayatanezu ca na kartavyam punar aparam
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā smṛtyupasthāneṣu na	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA smRti upasTAnezu na
   sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan smṛtyupasthānāni	sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan smRti upasTAnAni
   smṛtyupasthānatvena śūnyāni yā ca bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ śūnyatā na	smRti upasTAna tvena SUnyAni yA ca Bagavan smRti upasTAnAnAm SUnyatA na
   tāni smṛtyupasthānāni na cānyatra smṛtyupasthānebhyaḥ smṛtyupasthānāni	tAni smRti upasTAnAni na ca anyatra smRti upasTAneByaH smRti upasTAnAni
   smṛtyupasthānāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva smṛtyupasthānāni tad anenāpi	smRti upasTAnAni eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva smRti upasTAnAni tat anena api
   bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na	Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na
   smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthātavyaṃ evaṃ samyak	smRti upasTAnezu sTAtavyam evam samyak 
   prahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu	prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga pAramitA aBijQA daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid azwAdaSa AveNika budDa Darmezu
   na sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharma	na sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi AveNika budDa Darma
   āveṇikabuddhadharmatvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavan āveṇikabuddhadharmasya	AveNika budDa Darma tvena SUnyA yA ca Bagavan AveNika budDa Darmasya
   śūnyatā na sa āveṇikabuddhadharmaḥ na cānyatrāveṇikabuddhadharmād	SUnyatA na saH AveNika budDa DarmaH na ca anyatra AveNika budDa DarmAt 
   āveṇikabuddhadharma āveṇikabuddhadharma eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	AveNika budDa DarmaH AveNika budDa DarmaH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   āveṇikabuddhadharmaḥ tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena	AveNika budDa DarmaH tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga bala vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNika budDa Darmezu
   na sthātavyam punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	na sTAtavyam punar aparam Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na dAna pAramitAyAm sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi dānapāramitaiva śūnyā dānapāramitāsvabhāvena śīlapāramitaiva	taTA hi dAna pAramitA eva SUnyA dAna pAramitA svaBAvena SIla pAramitA eva
   śūnyā śīlapāramitāsvabhāvena kṣātipāramitaiva śūnyā	SUnyA SIla pAramitA svaBAvena kzAti pAramitA eva SUnyA
   kṣāntipāramitāsvabhāvena vīryapāramitaiva śūnyā vīryapāramitāsvabhāvena	kzAnti pAramitA svaBAvena vIrya pAramitA eva SUnyA vIrya pAramitA svaBAvena
   dhyānapāramitaiva śūnyā dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvena prajñāpāramitaiva śūnyā	DyAna pAramitA eva SUnyA DyAna pAramitA svaBAvena prajQApAramitA eva SUnyA
   prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena yā ca bhagavan dānapāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā	prajQApAramitA svaBAvena yA ca Bagavan dAna pAramitAyAH SUnyatA na sA
   dānapāramitā na cānyatra dānapāramitāyāḥ dānapāramitā dānapāramitaiva	dAna pAramitA na ca anyatra dAna pAramitAyAH dAna pAramitA dAna pAramitA eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva dānapāramitā yā ca bhagavan śīlapāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva dAna pAramitA yA ca Bagavan SIla pAramitAyAH SUnyatA na
   sā śīlapāramitā na cānyatra śīlapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitaiva	sA SIla pAramitA na ca anyatra SIla pAramitAyAH SIla pAramitA SIla pAramitA eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataiva śīlapāramitā yā ca bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva SIla pAramitA yA ca Bagavan kzAnti pAramitAyAH SUnyatA
   na sā kṣāntipāramitā na cānyatra kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitā	na sA kzAnti pAramitA na ca anyatra kzAnti pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitA
   kṣāntipāramitaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kṣāntipāramitā yā ca bhagavan	kzAnti pAramitA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva kzAnti pAramitA yA ca Bagavan
   vīryapāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vīryapāramitā na cānyatra vīryapāramitāyāḥ	vIrya pAramitAyAH SUnyatA na sA vIrya pAramitA na ca anyatra vIrya pAramitAyAH
   vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vīryapāramitā yā ca	vIrya pAramitA vIrya pAramitA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva vIrya pAramitA yA ca
   bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā dhyānapāramitā na cānyatra	Bagavan DyAna pAramitAyAH SUnyatA na sA DyAna pAramitA na ca anyatra
   dhyānapāramitāyāḥ dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	DyAna pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitA DyAna pAramitA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   dhyānapāramitā yā ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā	DyAna pAramitA yA ca Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH SUnyatA na sA
   prajñāpāramitā na cānyatra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitA na ca anyatra prajQApAramitAyAH prajQApAramitA
   prajñāpāramitaiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva prajñāpāramitā tad anenāpi bhagavan	prajQApAramitA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva prajQApAramitA tat anena api Bagavan
   paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na	paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na
   dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na	dAna pAramitAyAm sTAtavyam na SIla pAramitAyAm sTAtavyam na
   kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na	kzAnti pAramitAyAm sTAtavyam na vIrya pAramitAyAm sTAtavyam na
   dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam punar aparaṃ	DyAna pAramitAyAm sTAtavyam na prajQApAramitAyAm sTAtavyam punar aparam
   bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā akṣareṣu na	Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA akzarezu na
   sthātavyaṃ akṣarābhinirhāreṣu na sthātavyaṃ ekodāhāre dvirudāhāre	sTAtavyam akzara aBinirhArezu na sTAtavyam eka udAhAre dvis udAhAre
   trirudāhāre na sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi akṣarāṇi śūnyāny	tris udAhAre na sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi akzarANi SUnyAni 
   akṣarasvabhāvena yā ca bhagavann akṣraśūnyatā na sā akṣarāṇi na cānyatra	akzara svaBAvena yA ca Bagavan akzra SUnyatA na sA akzarANi na ca anyatra
   śūnyatāyā akṣarāṇi akṣsarāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataivākṣarāṇi tad anena	SUnyatAyAH akzarANi akzsarAni eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva akzarANi tat anena
   bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   nākṣareṣu sthātavyam punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	na akzarezu sTAtavyam punar aparam Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā (PSP1: 131) nābhijñāsu sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA (PSP1: 131) na aBijQAsu sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH
   abhijñā eva śūnyā abhijñāsvabhāvena yā ca bhagavann abhijñāśūnyatā na tā	aBijQA eva SUnyAH aBijQA svaBAvena yA ca Bagavan aBijQA SUnyatA na tA
   abhijñā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā abhijñā abhijñā eva śūnyatā śūnyataivābhijñā	aBijQA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH aBijQA aBijQA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva aBijQA
   tad anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	tat anena Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   caratā nābhijñāsu sthātavyam punar aparaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	caratA na aBijQAsu sTAtavyam punar aparam boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpam anityam iti sthātavyaṃ na vedanā na	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na rUpam anityam iti sTAtavyam na vedanA na
   saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam anityam iti sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ	saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam anityam iti sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi rūpānityatā anityatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavan rūpānityatā	taTA hi rUpa anitya tA anitya tA svaBAvena SUnyA yA ca Bagavan rUpa anitya tA
   śūnyatā na sā anityatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā anityatā anityataiva śūnyatā	SUnyatA na sA anitya tA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH anitya tA anitya tA eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataiva anityatā tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena	SUnyatA eva anitya tA tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpam anityam iti na sthātavyaṃ	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA rUpam anityam iti na sTAtavyam
   vedanānityeti na sthātavyaṃ saṃjñānityeti na sthātavyaṃ saṃskārā anityā	vedanA anityA iti na sTAtavyam saMjQA anityA iti na sTAtavyam saMskArAH anityA
   iti na sthātavyaṃ vijñānam anityam iti na sthātavyam evaṃ na rūpaṃ duḥkham	iti na sTAtavyam vijQAnam anityam iti na sTAtavyam evam na rUpam duHKam
   iti sthātavyaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti	iti sTAtavyam na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam duHKam iti
   sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi rūpaduḥkhatā duḥkhatāsvabhāvena śūnyā	sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi rUpa duHKa tA duHKa tA svaBAvena SUnyA
   yā ca bhagavan rūpaduḥkhatāśūnyatā na sā duḥkhatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	yA ca Bagavan rUpa duHKa tA SUnyatA na sA duHKa tA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   duḥkhatā duḥkhataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva duḥkhatā tad anenāpi bhagavan	duHKa tA duHKa tA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva duHKa tA tat anena api Bagavan
   paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpaṃ	paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na rUpam
   duḥkham iti sthātavyam na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam tat	duHKam iti sTAtavyam na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi vijñānaduḥkhatā duḥkhatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca	kasya hetoH taTA hi vijQAna duHKa tA duHKa tA svaBAvena SUnyA yA ca
   bhagavan vijñānaduḥkhatāśūnyatā na sā duḥkhatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	Bagavan vijQAna duHKa tA SUnyatA na sA duHKa tA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   duḥkhatā duḥkhataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva duḥkhatā tad anenāpi bhagavan	duHKa tA duHKa tA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva duHKa tA tat anena api Bagavan
   paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānam	paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na vijQAnam
   duḥkham iti sthātavyam evaṃ na rūpam anātmam iti sthātavyaṃ na vedanā na	duHKam iti sTAtavyam evam na rUpam anAtmam iti sTAtavyam na vedanA na
   saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ anātmam iti sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ	saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam anAtmam iti sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi rūpānātmatānātmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavan	taTA hi rUpAn Atma tAn Atma tA svaBAvena SUnyA yA ca Bagavan
   rūpānātmatāśūnyatā na sānātmatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā anātmatānātmataiva	rUpAn Atma tA SUnyatA na sA anAtma tA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH anAtma tA anAtma tA eva
   śūnyatā śūnyataivānātmatā tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena	SUnyatA SUnyatA eva anAtma tA tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpam anātmam iti sthātavyam na	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na rUpam anAtmam iti sTAtavyam na
   vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   vijñānānātmatānātmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavan vijñānānātmatāśūnyatā	vijQAna anAtma tAn Atma tA svaBAvena SUnyA yA ca Bagavan vijQAna an Atma tA SUnyatA
   na sānātmatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā anātmatānātmataiva śūnyatā	na sA anAtma tA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH anAtma tA anAtma tA eva SUnyatA
   śūnyataivānātmatā tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena	SUnyatA eva anAtma tA tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na vijñānam anātmam iti sthātavyam	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na vijQAnam anAtmam iti sTAtavyam
   evaṃ na rūpaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na	evam na rUpam SAntam iti sTAtavyam na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na
   vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi rūpaśāntatā	vijQAnam SAntam iti sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi rUpa SAnta tA
   śāntatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavan rūpaśāntatāśūnyatā na sā śāntatā na	SAnta tA svaBAvena SUnyA yA ca Bagavan rUpa SAnta tA SUnyatA na sA SAnta tA na
   cānyatra śūnyatāyā śāntatā śāntataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śāntatā tad	ca anyatra SUnyatAyA SAnta tA SAnta tA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva SAnta tA tat 
   anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   caratā na rūpaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyam na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na	caratA na rUpam SAntam iti sTAtavyam na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na
   vijñānam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi vijñānaśāntatā śāntatāsvabhāvena śūnyā	vijQAnam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi vijQAna SAnta tA SAntatA svaBAvena SUnyA
   yā ca bhagavan vijñānaśāntatāśūnyatā na sā śāntatā na cānyatra śūnyatāyā	yA ca Bagavan vijQAna SAnta tA SUnyatA na sA SAnta tA na ca anyatra SUnyatAyAH 
   śāntatā śāntataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva śāntatā tad anenāpi (PSP1: 132)	SAnta tA SAnta tA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva SAnta tA tat anena api (PSP1: 132)
   bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na	Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA na
   vijñānaṃ śāntam iti sthātavyaṃ evaṃ hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayatāyāṃ na	vijQAnam SAntam iti sTAtavyam evam hetu samudaya praBava pratyaya tAyAm na
   sthātavyaṃ punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	sTAtavyam punar aparam Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathatāyāṃ na sthātavyaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA taTatAyAm na sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   tathatā tathatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavaṃs tathatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā	taTatA taTatA svaBAvena SUnyA yA ca Bagavan taTatAyAH SUnyatA na sA
   tathatā na cānyatra tathatāyāḥ śūnyatā tathataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	taTatA na ca anyatra taTatAyAH SUnyatA taTatA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   tathatā tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	taTatA tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathatāyāṃ na sthātavyam eva dharmatāyām na	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA taTatAyAm na sTAtavyam eva DarmatAyAm na
   sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi dharmatā dharmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā	sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi DarmatA DarmatA svaBAvena SUnyA yA
   ca bhagavaṃs dharmatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā dharmatā na cānyatra dharmatāyāḥ	ca Bagavan DarmatAyAH SUnyatA na sA DarmatA na ca anyatra DarmatAyAH
   śūnyatā dharmataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmatā tad anenāpi bhagavan	SUnyatA Darma tA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva DarmatA tat anena api Bagavan
   paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmatāyāṃ	paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA Darma tAyAm
   na sthātavyam dharmadhātau na sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	na sTAtavyam DarmaDAtO na sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   dharmadhātur dharmadhātusvabhāvena śūnyo yā ca bhagavaṃs dharmadhātoḥ	DarmaDAtuH DarmaDAtu svaBAvena SUnyaH yA ca Bagavan DarmaDAtoH
   śūnyatā na sa dharmadhātur na cānyatra dharmadhāoḥ śūnyatā dharmadhātur	SUnyatA na sa DarmaDAtuH na ca anyatra DarmaDAoH SUnyatA DarmaDAtuH 
   eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva dharmadhātuḥ tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa	eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva DarmaDAtuH tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmadhātau na	boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA DarmaDAtO na
   sthātavyam dharmaniyāmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	sTAtavyam Darma niyAma tAyAm na sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   dharmaniyāmatā dharmaniyāmatāsvabhāvena śūnyā yā ca bhagavaṃs	Darma niyAma tA Darma niyAmatA svaBAvena SUnyA yA ca Bagavan= 
   dharmaniyāmatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā dharmaniyāmatā na cānyatra	Darma niyAma tAyAH SUnyatA na sA Darma niyAma tA na ca anyatra
   dharmaniyāmatāyāḥ śūnyatā dharmaniyāmataiva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	Darma niyAma tAyAH SUnyatA Darma niyAma tA eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   dharmaniyāmatā tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	Darma niyAma tA tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmaniyāmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam bhūtakoṭyāṃ na	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA Darma niyAma tAyAm na sTAtavyam BUtakowyAm na
   sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭisvabhāvena śūnyā	sTAtavyam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi BUtakowiH BUta kowi svaBAvena SUnyA
   yā ca bhagavaṃs bhūtakoṭyāḥ śūnyatā na sā bhūtakoṭir na cānyatra	yA ca Bagavan BUtakowyAH SUnyatA na sA BUtakowiH na ca anyatra
   bhūtakoṭyāḥ śūnyatā bhūtakoṭir eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva bhūtakoṭiḥ tad	BUtakowyAH SUnyatA BUtakowiH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva BUtakowiH tat 
   anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   caratā bhūtakoṭyāṃ na sthātavyam punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena	caratA BUtakowyAm na sTAtavyam punar aparam Bagavan boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA sarva DAraNI muKezu na sTAtavyam
   tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni yā ca	tat kasya hetoH taTA hi DAraNI muKAni DAraNImuKEH SUnyAni yA ca
   bhagavaṃs dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ śūnyatā na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni na cānyatra	Bagavan DAraNImuKAnAm SUnyatA na tAni DAraNI muKAni na ca anyatra
   dhāraṇīmukhebhyaḥ śūnyatā dhāraṇīmukhāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva	DAraNI muKeByaH SUnyatA DAraNI muKAni eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva
   dhāraṇīmukhāni tad anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	DAraNI muKAni tat anena api Bagavan paryAyeNa boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam punar aparaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA DAraNI muKezu na sTAtavyam punar aparam
   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran anupāyakuśalo	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran anupAya kuSalaH 
   'haṅkāramamakārapatitena mānasena saced rūpe tiṣṭhati rūpābhisaṃskāre	ahaFkAra mamakAra patitena mAnasena saced rUpe tizWati rUpa aBisaMskAre
   carati na carati prajñāpāramitāyām saced vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu	carati na carati prajQApAramitAyAm saced vedanAyAm saMjQAyAm saMskArezu
   saced vijñāne tiṣṭhati vijñānābhisaṃskāre carati na carati	saced vijQAne tizWati vijQAna aBisaMskAre carati na carati
   prajñāpāramitāyām tat kasya hetoḥ na hy abhisaṃskāre caran	prajQApAramitAyAm tat kasya hetoH na hi aBisaMskAre caran
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parigṛhṇāti na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate na	prajQApAramitAyAm parigRhNAti na prajQApAramitAyAm yogam Apadyate na
   prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati, aparipūrayan prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyati	prajQApAramitAm paripUrayati, aparipUrayan prajQApAramitAm na niryAsyati
   sarvākārajñatāyām tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan rUpam aparigRhItam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam aparigṛhītam tat kasya hetoḥ yaś ca	vedanA saMjQA saMskAra avijQAnam aparigRhItam tat kasya hetoH yaH ca
   rūpasyāparigraho na tad rūpam prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā	rUpasya aparigrahaH na tat rUpam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya vedanA saMjQA saMskArA
   yaś ca vijñānasyāparigraho na tad vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya evaṃ	yaH ca vijQAnasya aparigrahaH na tat vijQAnam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya evam
   yāvad bhūtakoṭir aparigṛhītā tat kasya hetoḥ yaś ca bhāutakoṭyā aparigraho	yAvat BUtakowiH aparigRhItA tat kasya hetoH yaH ca BAuta kowyA aparigrahaH 
   na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	na sA BUtakowiH prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya evam boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ (PSP1: 133)	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA prakRti SUnyAH sarva DarmAH (PSP1: 133)
   pratyavekṣitavyāḥ tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyā yathā na kvacid dharme manaso	pratyavekzitavyAH taTA ca pratyavekzitavyA yaTA na kvacid Darme manasaH 
   vyupacāro bhavet idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhītaṃ	vyupacAraH Bavet idam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya sarva Darma aparigRhItam
   nāma samādhimaṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ puraskṛtam apramāṇaṃ niyatam asaṃhāryaṃ	nAma samADi maNxalam vipulam puraskRtam apramANam niyatam asaMhAryam
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sāpi sarvākārajñatā aparigṛhītā	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH sA api sarva AkAra jQa tA aparigRhItA
   adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām	aDyAtma SUnyatAm upAdAya bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm
   upādāya mahāśūnyatām upādāya śūnyatāśūnyatām upādāya paramārthaśūnyatām	upAdAya mahA SUnyatAm upAdAya SUnyatA SUnyatAm upAdAya parama arTa SUnyatAm
   upādāya saṃskṛtaśūnyatām upādāya asaṃskṛtaśūnyatām upādāya atyantaśūnyatām	upAdAya saMskRta SUnyatAm upAdAya asaMskRta SUnyatAm upAdAya atyanta SUnyatAm
   upādāya anavarāgraśūnyatām upādāya anavakāraśūnyatām upādāya	upAdAya anavara agra SUnyatAm upAdAya anavakAra SUnyatAm upAdAya
   prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya sarvadharmaśūnyatām upādāya svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām	prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya sarva Darma SUnyatAm upAdAya sva lakzaNa SUnyatAm
   upādāya anupalambhaśūnyatām upādāya abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya	upAdAya anupalamBa SUnyatAm upAdAya aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAm upAdAya
   bhāvaśūnyatām upādāya abhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya	BAva SUnyatAm upAdAya aBAva SUnyatAm upAdAya svaBAva SUnyatAm upAdAya
   parabhāvaśūnyatām upādāyeti mṛdumūrddhagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ tat kasya	para BAva SUnyatAm upAdAya iti mRdu mUrdDa gatasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH tat kasya
   hetoḥ tathā hi na bhagavan sarvākārajñatā nimittataḥ udgrahītavyā,	hetoH taTA hi na Bagavan sarva AkAra jQa tA nimittataH udgrahItavyA,
   nimittam hi kleśaḥ katamat punar nimitta rūpaṃ nimittaṃ vedanā nimittaṃ	nimittam hi kleSaH katamat punar nimitta rUpam nimittam vedanA nimittam
   saṃjñā nimittaṃ saṃskārā nimittaṃ vijñānaṃ nimittam cakṣur nimittam	saMjQA nimittam saMskArAH nimittam vijQAnam nimittam cakzuH nimittam
   śrotraṃ nimittam ghrāṇaṃ nimittam jihvā nimittam kāyo nimittam mano	Srotram nimittam GrANam nimittam jihvA nimittam kAyaH nimittam manaH 
   nimittaṃ, rūpaṃ nimittaṃ śabdo nimittaṃ gandho nimittaṃ raso nimittaṃ	nimittaM, rUpam nimittam SabdaH nimittam ganDaH nimittam rasaH nimittam
   spraṣṭavyaṃ nimittaṃ dharmo nimittaṃ,	sprazwavyam nimittam DarmaH nimittaM,
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskāradharmadhātudharmatādharmaniyāmatābhūtakoṭi	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga bala vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNika budDa Darma SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitAn aBisa
   nimittam ayam ucyate kleśaḥ, sacet punaḥ prajñāpāramitā nimittata	nimittam ayam ucyate kleSaH, saced punar prajQApAramitA nimittata
   udgrahītavyā abhaviṣyan naiveha śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ śāsane śraddhām	udgrahItavyAH aBavizyan na eva iha SreNikaH parivrAjakaH SAsane SradDAm
   alapsyata atra sarvajñajñāne katamā ca śraddhā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām	alapsyata atra sarvajQa jQAne katamA ca SradDA yA iyam prajQApAramitAyAm
   abhiśraddadhānatā avakalpanatā adhimukhtiś cintanā tulanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā	aBiSraddaDAna tA avakalpanatA aDimuKtiH cintanA tulanA vyupaparIkzaNA
   tac cānimittayogena evam animittata udgrahītavyā atra punaḥ (PSP1: 134)	tat ca animitta yogena evam animittatas udgrahItavyAH atra punar (PSP1: 134)
   śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ	SreNikaH parivrAjakaH aDimucya SradDA anusArI prAdeSikena jQAnena avatIrNaH
   so 'vatīrya na rūpaṃ parigṛhītavān na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na	saH avatIrya na rUpam parigRhItavAn na vedanAm na saMjQAm na saMskArAn na
   vijñānaṃ parīgṛhītavān tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa tena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu	vijQAnam parIgRhItavAn tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sa tena sva lakzaNa SUnyezu
   dharmeṣu na kaścid dharmaḥ parigṛhīto nimittāmanasikāratām upādāya tat	Darmezu na kaScid DarmaH parigRhItaH nimittAmanasikAra tAm upAdAya tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa nādhyātmaprāptyabhisamayatas tajjñānaṃ	kasya hetoH taTA hi sa na aDyAtma prApti aBisamayataH tat jQAnam
   samanupaśyati na bahirdhāprāptyabhisamayatas tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati,	samanupaSyati na bahirDA prApti aBisamayataH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati,
   nādhyātmabahirdhāprāptyabhisamayatas tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati nāpy anyatra	na aDyAtma bahirDA prApti aBisamayataH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati na api anyatra
   prāptyabhisamayatas tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa	prApti aBisamayataH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sa
   tam dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati, yo vā prajānīyād yena vā prajānīyāt tat	tam Darmam na samanupaSyati, yaH vA prajAnIyAt yena vA prajAnIyAt tat 
   kasya hetoḥ nādhyatmaṃ rūpasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati, nādhyātmaṃ	kasya hetoH na aDyatmam rUpasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati, na aDyAtmam
   vedanāyās tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati, nādhyātmaṃ saṃjñāyās tajjñānaṃ	vedanAyAH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati, na aDyAtmam saMjQAyAH tat jQAnam
   samanupaśyati, nādhyātmaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati, nādhyatmaṃ	samanupaSyati, na aDyAtmam saMskArANAm tat jQAnam samanupaSyati, na aDyatmam
   vijñānasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati, na bahirdhārūpasya tajjñānaṃ	vijQAnasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati, na bahirDArUpasya tat jQAnam
   samanupaśyati na bahirdhāvedanāyā na bahirdhāsaṃjñānāṃ na	samanupaSyati na bahirDA vedanAyAH na bahirDA saMjQAnAm na
   bahirdhāsaṃskārāṇāṃ na bahirdhāvijñānasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati,	bahirDA saMskArANAm na bahirDA vijQAnasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati,
   nādhyātmabahirdhārūpasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati	na aDyAtma bahirDA rUpasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati
   nādhyātmabahirdhāvedanāyāḥ tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati	na aDyAtma bahirDA vedanAyAH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati
   nādhyātmabahirdhāsaṃjñāyāḥ tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati	na aDyAtma bahirDA saMjQAyAH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati
   nādhyātmabahirdhāsaṃskārāṇāṃ tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati	na aDyAtma bahirDA saMskArANAm tat jQAnam samanupaSyati
   nādhyātmabahirdhāvijñānasya tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati, nāpy anyatra rūpāt	na aDyAtma bahirDA vijQAnasya tat jQAnam samanupaSyati, na api anyatra rUpAt 
   tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati nāpy anyatra vedanāyāḥ tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati	tat jQAnam samanupaSyati na api anyatra vedanAyAH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati
   nāpy anyatra saṃjñāyāḥ tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati nāpy anyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ	na api anyatra saMjQAyAH tat jQAnam samanupaSyati na api anyatra saMskAreByaH
   tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati nāpy anyatra vijñānāt tajjñānaṃ	tat jQAnam samanupaSyati na api anyatra vijQAnAt tat jQAnam
   samanupaśyatiadhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya atra padaparyāye śreṇikaḥ	samanupaSyati aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya atra pada paryAye SreNikaH
   parivrājako 'dhimuktaḥ so 'trādhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena	parivrAjakaH aDimuktaH saH atra aDimucya SradDA anusArI prAdeSikena
   jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ sarvajñajñānadharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya	jQAnena avatIrNaH sarvajQa jQAna Darma tAm pramANIkRtya
   sarvadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya, evam adhimuktas tena na kaścid dharmaḥ	sarva Darma anupalabDi tAm upAdAya, evam aDimuktaH tena na kaScid DarmaH
