   sarvasukhaduḥkhanirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ asti akṣayākāro nāma samādhiḥ	sarva suKa duHKa niraBinandI nAma samADiH asti akzaya AkAraH nAma samADiH
   asti dhāraṇīmatiḥ nāma samādhiḥ asti samyakamithyātvasaṃgraho nāma	asti DAraNImatiH nAma samADiH asti samyaka miTyAtva saMgrahaH nAma
   samādhiḥ asti roṣaviroṣapratiroṣo nāma samādhiḥ asti vimalaprabho nāma	samADiH asti rozavirozapratirozaH nAma samADiH asti vimala praBaH nAma
   samādhiḥ asti śāravatī nāma samādhiḥ asti paripūrṇavimalacandraprabho nāma	samADiH asti SAravatI nAma samADiH asti paripUrNa vimala candrapraBaH nAma
   samādhiḥ asti vidyutprabho nāma samādhiḥ asti (PSP1: 144) mahāvyūho nāma	samADiH asti vidyutpraBaH nAma samADiH asti (PSP1: 144) mahA vyUhaH nAma
   samādhiḥ asti sarvalokaprabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ asti samādhisaratā nāma	samADiH asti sarva loka praBAkaraH nAma samADiH asti samADi saratA nAma
   samādhiḥ asti anayavinayanayavimukto nāma samādhiḥ asti	samADiH asti anaya vinayanayavimuktaH nAma samADiH asti
   anusaraṇasarvasamavasaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ asti anilaniyato nāma samādhiḥ	anusaraNasarvasamavasaraNaH nAma samADiH asti anila niyataH nAma samADiH
   asti tathatāsthitaniścito nāma samādhiḥ asti kāyakalisaṃpramathano nāma	asti taTatAsTita niScitaH nAma samADiH asti kAyakali saMpramaTanaH nAma
   samādhiḥ asti vākkalividhvaṃsano nāma samādhiḥ asti gaganakalpo nāma	samADiH asti vAkkaliviDvaMsanaH nAma samADiH asti gaganakalpaH nAma
   samādhiḥ asti ākāśasaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ ime āyuṣman	samADiH asti AkASa saFga vimukti nirupalepaH nAma samADiH ime Ayuzman
   śāriputra samādhayo yaiḥ samādhibhir viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	SAriputra samADayaH yEH samADiBiH viharan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate anyāni	kzipram anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyate anyAni
   cāsaṃkhyeyāprameyāṇi samādhimukhāni yeṣu śikṣyamāṇā bodhisattvāḥ	ca asaMKyeya aprameyANi samADi muKAni yezu SikzyamANAH boDisattvAH
   mahāsattvāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante tatra	mahAsattvAH kzipram anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyante tatra
   katamaḥ śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ yena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ gocaram	katamaH SUraFgamaH nAma samADiH yena samADinA sarva sama aDInAm gocaram
   anubhavaty ayam ucyate śūraṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamo ratnamudro	anuBavati ayam ucyate SUraFgamaH nAma samADiH tatra katamaH ratnamudro
   nāma samādhiḥ yena samādhinā sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavaty ayam ucyate	nAma samADiH yena samADinA sarva samADayaH mudritA Bavati ayam ucyate
   ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ evaṃ yāvat tatra katama	ratnamudraH nAma samADiH evam yAvat tatra katama
   ākāśasaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā	AkASa saFga vimukti nirupalepaH nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA
   sarvadharmāṇām ākāśasaṅgavimuktinirupalepatām anuprāpnoty ayam ucyate	sarva DarmANAm AkASa saFga vimukti nirupalepatAm anuprApnoti ayam ucyate
   ākāśasaṅgavimuktinirupalepo nāma samādhiḥ iti	AkASa saFga vimukti nirupalepaH nAma samADiH iti
   mṛdvagradharmasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtir	mRdu agra Darmasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH aTa Kalu Ayuzman suBUtiH 
   buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat vyākṛto 'yam āyuṣman	budDa anuBAvena Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat vyAkRtaH ayam Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pUrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH
   samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ ye 'py etarhi daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante	samyaksaMbudDEH ye api etarhi daSa diSi loke tizWanti Driyante
   yāpayanti te 'pi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas taṃ bodhisattvaṃ	yApayanti te api taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDaH tam boDisattvam
   mahāsattvaṃ vyākurvanti ya etaiḥ samādhibhir viharati sa samādhim api na	mahAsattvam vyAkurvanti yaH etEH samADiBiH viharati sa samADim api na
   samanupaśyati sa na ca tena samādhinā manyate ahaṃ samāhita iti ahaṃ	samanupaSyati sa na ca tena samADinA manyate aham samAhitaH iti aham
   samādhiṃ samāpatsye ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadye sarve	samADim samApatsye aham samADim samApannaH aham samADim samApadye sarve
   ete vikalpā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na vidyante nopalabhyante iti	ete vikalpAH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na vidyante na upalaByante iti
   madhyāgradharmasyālaṃbanākārāraviśeṣaḥ (PSP1: 145) śāriputra āha kiṃ punar	maDya agra Darmasya alaMbana AkAra Ara viSezaH (PSP1: 145) SAriputraH Aha kim punar 
   āyuṣman subhūte eṣu samādhiṣu sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate	Ayuzman suBUte ezu samADizu sTitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vyAkriyate
   tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ subhūtir āha no hīdam āyuṣman	taTAgatEH arhadBiH samyaksaMbudDEH suBUtiH Aha no hi idam Ayuzman
   śāriputra tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nānyā prajñāpāramitā	SAriputra tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra na anyA prajQApAramitA
   anyaḥ samādhiḥ anyo bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva samādhiḥ samādhir eva	anyaH samADiH anyaH boDisattvaH boDisattvaH eva samADiH samADiH eva
   bodhisattvaḥ śāriputra āha yady āyuṣman subhūte nānyaḥ samādhiḥ nānyo	boDisattvaH SAriputraH Aha yadi Ayuzman suBUte na anyaH samADiH na anyaH 
   bodhisattvaḥ samādhir eva bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva samādhiḥ	boDisattvaH samADiH eva boDisattvaH boDisattvaH eva samADiH
   sarvadharmasamatām upādāya tat kiṃ śakyaḥ sa samādhir darśayitum subhūtir	sarva Darma sama tAm upAdAya tat kim SakyaH sa samADiH darSayitum suBUtiH 
   āha na hy etad āyuṣman śāriputra śāriputra āha kiṃ punar āyuṣman sa	Aha na hi etat Ayuzman SAriputra SAriputraH Aha kim punar Ayuzman sa
   kulaputras taṃ samādhiṃ saṃjānīte subhūtir āha nāyuṣman śāriputra sa	kula putraH tam samADim saMjAnIte suBUtiH Aha na Ayuzman SAriputra sa
   kulaputras taṃ samādhim saṃjānīte śāriputra āha kathaṃ na saṃjānīte	kula putraH tam samADim saMjAnIte SAriputraH Aha kaTam na saMjAnIte
   subhūtir āha yathā na vikalpayati śāriputra āha kathaṃ na vikalpayati	suBUtiH Aha yaTA na vikalpayati SAriputraH Aha kaTam na vikalpayati
   subhūtir āha avidyamānatvena sarvadharmāṇām eva samādhiṃ na vikalpayati	suBUtiH Aha avidyamAna tvena sarva DarmANAm eva samADim na vikalpayati
   anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte	anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na saMjAnIte
   śāriputra āha kathaṃ na saṃjānīte subhūtir āha avikalpatvena tasya	SAriputraH Aha kaTam na saMjAnIte suBUtiH Aha avikalpa tvena tasya
   samādher bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte iti	samADeH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na saMjAnIte iti
   adhimātrāgradharmasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate	aDimAtra agra Darmasya Alambana AkAra viSezaH aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmate
   subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt sādhu sādhu subhūte yathāpi nāma te mayā	suBUtaye sADu kAram adAt sADu sADu suBUte yaTA api nAma te mayA
   araṇavihāriṇām agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭasya nirdeśaḥ evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena	araNa vihAriNAm agra tAyAm nirdizwasya nirdeSaH evam suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam evaṃ (PSP1: 146)	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam evam (PSP1: 146)
   dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	DyAna pAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam vIrya pAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam
   kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam dānapāramitāyāṃ	kzAnti pAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam SIla pAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam dAna pAramitAyAm
   śikṣitavyam evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu	Sikzitavyam evam saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu yAvat azwAdaSa AveNikezu
   buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyam atha khalv āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavantam etad	budDa Darmezu Sikzitavyam aTa Kalu Ayuzman SAriputra Bagavantam etat 
   avocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	avocat evam SikzamANaH Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣate bhagavān āha evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	Sikzate BagavAn Aha evam SikzamANaH SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate anupalambhayogena evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzate anupalamBa yogena evam DyAna pAramitAyAm Sikzate
   anupalambhayogena vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate anupalambhayogena	anupalamBa yogena vIrya pAramitAyAm Sikzate anupalamBa yogena
   kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣate anupalambhayogena śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate	kzAnti pAramitAyAm Sikzate anupalamBa yogena SIla pAramitAyAm Sikzate
   anupalambhayogena dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate anupalambhayogena yāvad	anupalamBa yogena dAna pAramitAyAm Sikzate anupalamBa yogena yAvat 
   vistareṇa saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣate anupalambhayogena	vistareNa saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu Sikzate anupalamBa yogena
   yāvad apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu śikṣate anupalambhayogena	yAvat apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu Sikzate anupalamBa yogena
   daśabalacaturvaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate	daSa bala catur vESAradya azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu Sikzate
   anupalambhayogena śāriputra āha kim iti bhagavan nopalabhate bhagavān āha	anupalamBa yogena SAriputraH Aha kim iti Bagavat na upalaBate BagavAn Aha
   ātmānaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate yāvat	AtmAnam SAriputra na upalaBate yAvat 
   sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakān	sattva jIva poza puruza pudgalam anujamAnavakAraka vedaka jAnaka paSyakAn
   nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya yāvad vyastasamastān	na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya yAvat vyasta samastAn
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdAt na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya duḥkhaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya samudayaṃ	upAdAya duHKam na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya samudayam
   nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya nirodhaṃ nopalabhate	na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya niroDam na upalaBate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya mārgaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya mArgam na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   rūpadhātuṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya ārūpyadhātu nopalabhate	rUpa DAtum na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya ArUpya DAtu na upalaBate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr nopalabhate	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattIH na upalaBate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān nopalabhate	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAn na upalaBate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya pāramitā nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya pAramitA na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   daśabalacaturvaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopalabhate	daSa bala catur vESAradya azwAdaSa AveNikAn budDa DarmAn na upalaBate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya srotaāpannaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya srotaApannam na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya sakṛdāgāminaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya anāgāminaṃ	upAdAya sakRdAgAminam na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya anAgAminam
   nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya arhantaṃ nopalabhate	na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya arhantam na upalaBate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya pratyekabuddhaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya pratyekabudDam na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya bodhisattvaṃ nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya buddhaṃ	upAdAya boDisattvam na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya budDam
   nopalabhate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya śāriputra āha kā punar bhagavan	na upalaBate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya SAriputraH Aha kA punar Bagavan
   viśuddhiḥ bhagavān āha anutpādaḥ śāriputra aprādurbhāvo 'nupalambho	viSudDiH BagavAn Aha anutpAdaH SAriputra aprAdurBAvaH anupalamBaH 
   'nabhisaṃskāro viśuddhir ity ucyate iti sāmānyena	anaBisaMskAraH viSudDiH iti ucyate iti sAmAnyena
   vikalpasaṃprayogādhikāraḥ śāriputra āha evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan	vikalpa saMprayoga aDikAraH SAriputraH Aha evam SikzamANaH Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katameṣu dharmeṣu śikṣate bhagavān āha evaṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH katamezu Darmezu Sikzate BagavAn Aha evam
   śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃścid (PSP1: 147)	SikzamANaH SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na kasmiMScid (PSP1: 147)
   dharmeṣu śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ naite śāriputra dharmās tathā saṃvidyante	Darmezu Sikzate tat kasya hetoH na ete SAriputra DarmAH taTA saMvidyante
   yathā bālapṛthagjanānām abhiniveśaḥ śāriputra āha kathaṃ bhagavan naite	yaTA bAla pRTagjanAnAm aBiniveSaH SAriputraH Aha kaTam Bagavat na ete
   dharmāḥ saṃvidyante bhagavān āha tathā na saṃvidyante yathā	DarmAH saMvidyante BagavAn Aha taTA na saMvidyante yaTA
   bālapṛthagjanānām abhiniveśaḥ śāriputra āha kathaṃ bhagavan naite dharmāḥ	bAla pRTagjanAnAm aBiniveSaH SAriputraH Aha kaTam Bagavat na ete DarmAH
   saṃvidyante bhagavān āha yathā na saṃvidyante tathā saṃvidyante evam	saMvidyante BagavAn Aha yaTA na saMvidyante taTA saMvidyante evam
   asaṃvidyamānāḥ tenocyate 'vidyeti iti uṣmagatavikalpasaṃprayoge prathamo	asaMvidyamAnAH tena ucyate avidyA iti iti uzma gata vikalpa saMprayoge praTamaH 
   'vidyāvikalpaḥ śāiputra āha kena kāraṇenocyate asaṃvidyamānā avidyeti	avidyA vikalpaH SAi putraH Aha kena kAraNena ucyate asaMvidyamAnAH avidyA iti
   bhagavān āha rūpaṃ śāriputra na saṃvidyate adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya	BagavAn Aha rUpam SAriputra na saMvidyate aDyAtma SUnyatAm upAdAya
   bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya yāvad	bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya yAvat 
   bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ śāriputra na	BAva svaBAva SUnyatAm upAdAya vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam SAriputra na
   saṃvidyate adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya	saMvidyate aDyAtma SUnyatAm upAdAya bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā na	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya yAvat saptatriMSat boDi pakzAH DarmAH na
   saṃvidyante yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā na saṃvidyante	saMvidyante yAvat azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAH na saMvidyante
   adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāya bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām	aDyAtma SUnyatAm upAdAya bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm
   upādāya iti tatraiva dvitīyo rūpādiskandhavikalpaḥ tatra bālā avidyāyāṃ	upAdAya iti tatra eva dvitIyaH rUpa Adi skanDa vikalpaH tatra bAlA avidyAyAm
   tṛṣṇāyāñ cābhiniviṣṭāḥ tair avidyāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca kalpitāṃ kalpayitvā	tRzNAyAn ca aBinivizwAH tEH avidyAm tRzNAm ca kalpitAm kalpayitvA
   avidyātṛṣṇābhyām abhiniviśya ubhābhyāṃ antābhyāṃ saktās te ubhāv antau na	avidyA tRzNAByAm aBiniviSya uBAByAm antAByAm saktAH te uBO antO na
   jānanti na paśyanti yathā dharmā na saṃvidyante te tān dharmāṇ kalpayitvā	jAnanti na paSyanti yaTA DarmAH na saMvidyante te tAn DarmAN kalpayitvA
   nāmarūpe abhiniviṣṭāḥ yāvad buddhadharmeṣv abhiniviṣṭāḥ iti tatraiva	nAma rUpe aBinivizwAH yAvat budDa Darmezu aBinivizwAH iti tatra eva
   tṛtīyo nāmarūpābhiniveśavikalpaḥ te dharmeṣv abhiniviṣṭā asaṃvidyamānāv	tRtIyaH nAma rUpa aBiniveSa vikalpaH te Darmezu aBinivizwAH asaMvidyamAnOv
   ubhāv antau kalpayanti kalpayitvā na jānanti na paśyanti kiṃ na jānanti na	uBO antO kalpayanti kalpayitvA na jAnanti na paSyanti kim na jAnanti na
   paśyanti rūpaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ	paSyanti rUpam na jAnanti na paSyanti vedanAm saMjQAm saMskArAn vijQAnam
   na jānanti na paśyanti yāvat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ na	na jAnanti na paSyanti yAvat skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdam na
   jānanti na paśyanti (PSP1: 148) yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na	jAnanti na paSyanti (PSP1: 148) yAvat azwAdaSa AveNikAn budDa DarmAn na
   jānanti na paśyanti tena te bālā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti iti tatraiva	jAnanti na paSyanti tena te bAlAH iti saMKyAm gacCanti iti tatra eva
   caturtho 'ntadvayāsaktivikalpaḥ te avidyātṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ na jānanti na	caturTaH anta dvaya Asakti vikalpaH te avidyA tRzNA pratyayam na jAnanti na
   paśyanti rūpaṃ saṃkliṣṭam iti na jānanti na paśyanti evaṃ rūpaṃ vyavadānam	paSyanti rUpam saMklizwam iti na jAnanti na paSyanti evam rUpam vyavadAnam
   iti na jānanti na paśyanti vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃkliṣṭam iti na	iti na jAnanti na paSyanti vedanAm saMjQAm vijQAnam saMklizwam iti na
   jānanti na paśyanti evaṃ vijñānaṃ vyavadānam iti na jānanti na paśyanti te	jAnanti na paSyanti evam vijQAnam vyavadAnam iti na jAnanti na paSyanti te
   na niryāsyanti kuto na niryāsyanti kāmadhātor na niryāsyanti rūpadhātor na	na niryAsyanti kutas na niryAsyanti kAmaDAtoH na niryAsyanti rUpa DAtoH na
   niryāsyanti ārūpyadhātor na niryāsyanti śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmebhyo na	niryAsyanti ArUpya DAtoH na niryAsyanti SrAvaka pratyekabudDa DarmeByaH na
   niryāsyanti iti tatraiva pañcamaḥ saṃkleśavyavadānajñānavikalpaḥ te na	niryAsyanti iti tatra eva paQcamaH saMkleSa vyavadAna jQAna vikalpaH te na
   śraddadhati kim iti na śraddadhati rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam iti na śraddadhati	SraddaDati kim iti na SraddaDati rUpam rUpeNa SUnyam iti na SraddaDati
   yāvad bodhi bodhyātmanā śūnyam iti na śraddadhati te na pratiṣṭhante kim	yAvat boDi boDya AtmanA SUnyam iti na SraddaDati te na pratizWante kim
   iit na pratiṣṭhante dānapāramitāyāṃ na pratiṣṭhante śīlapāramitāyāṃ na	iid na pratizWante dAna pAramitAyAm na pratizWante SIla pAramitAyAm na
   pratiṣṭhante kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na pratiṣṭhante vīryapāramitāyāṃ na	pratizWante kzAnti pAramitAyAm na pratizWante vIrya pAramitAyAm na
   pratiṣṭhante dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na pratiṣṭhante prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na	pratizWante DyAna pAramitAyAm na pratizWante prajQApAramitAyAm na
   pratiṣṭhante avinivartanīyabhūmau na pratiṣṭhante yāvat buddhadharmeṣū na	pratizWante avinivartanIya BUmO na pratizWante yAvat budDa DarmezU na
   pratiṣṭhante anena kāraṇena bālā ity ucyante te abhiniviṣṭāḥ kim iti	pratizWante anena kAraNena bAlAH iti ucyante te aBinivizwAH kim iti
   abhiniviṣṭāḥ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñāneṣv abhiniviṣṭāḥ	aBinivizwAH rUpa vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAnezu aBinivizwAH
   rāgadveṣamoheṣv abhiniviṣṭāḥ dṛṣṭikṛteṣv abhiniviṣṭāḥ yāvad bodhāv	rAga dveza mohezu aBinivizwAH dRzwi kRtezu aBinivizwAH yAvat boDO= 
   abhiniviṣṭāḥ śāriputra āha evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	aBinivizwAH SAriputraH Aha evam SikzamANaH Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati bhagavān āha evaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzate sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati BagavAn Aha evam
   śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate	SikzamANaH SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm na Sikzate
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na niryāsyati bhagavān āha iha śāiputra bodhisattvo	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm na niryAsyati BagavAn Aha iha SAi putra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām anupāyakuśalaḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAm anupAya kuSalaH kalpayati aBiniviSate
   dhyānapāramitāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate vīryapāramitāṃ kalpayaty	DyAna pAramitAm kalpayati aBiniviSate vIrya pAramitAm kalpayati 
   abhiniviśate kṣāntipāramitāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate śīlapāramitāṃ	aBiniviSate kzAnti pAramitAm kalpayati aBiniviSate SIla pAramitAm
   kalpayaty abhiniviśate dānapāramitāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate evam	kalpayati aBiniviSate dAna pAramitAm kalpayati aBiniviSate evam
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate smṛtyupasthānaṃ	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattIH kalpayati aBiniviSate smRti upasTAnam
   samykaprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān kalpayaty abhiniviśate	samyka prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArgAn kalpayati aBiniviSate
   daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān kalpayaty	daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid azwAdaSa AveNikAn budDa DarmAn kalpayati 
   abhiniviśate yāvat sarvadharmān sarvākārajñātāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate	aBiniviSate yAvat sarva DarmAn sarva AkAra jQAtAm kalpayati aBiniviSate
   anena śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na	anena SAriputra paryAyeNa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm na
   śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na niryāsyati śāriptura āha evaṃ śikṣamāṇo	Sikzate sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm na niryAsyati SAripturaH Aha evam SikzamANaH 
   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattaH prajQApAramitAyAm na Sikzate
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na niryāsyati bhagavān āha evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm na niryAsyati BagavAn Aha evam SikzamANaH SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm na Sikzate sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm na
   niryāsyati iti tatraiva ṣaṣṭa āryamārgapratiṣṭhānavikalpaḥ (PSP1: 149)	niryAsyati iti tatra eva zazwaH Arya mArga pratizWAna vikalpaH (PSP1: 149)
   śāriputra āha kahtaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	SAriputraH Aha kahtam punar Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate yathā śikāamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati	prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzate yaTA SikAamANaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati
   bhagavān āha yadā śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ	BagavAn Aha yadA SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn 
   caran prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati evaṃ khalu śāriputra	caran prajQApAramitAm na upalaBate na samanupaSyati evam Kalu SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn caran prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati anupalambhayogena evaṃ	SikzamANaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati anupalamBa yogena evam
   dhyānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati vīryapāramitāṃ nopalabhate na	DyAna pAramitAm na upalaBate na samanupaSyati vIrya pAramitAm na upalaBate na
   samanupaśyati kṣānipāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati śīlapāramitāṃ	samanupaSyati kzAnipAramitAm na upalaBate na samanupaSyati SIla pAramitAm
   nopalabhate na samanupaśyati dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati	na upalaBate na samanupaSyati dAna pAramitAm na upalaBate na samanupaSyati
   yāvad bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate na samanupaśyati evaṃ khalu	yAvat boDim sarva AkAra jQa tAm na upalaBate na samanupaSyati evam Kalu
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn caran
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyaty	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzamANaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati 
   anupalambhayogena iti tatraiva saptama upalambhavikalpaḥ śāriputra āha	anupalamBa yogena iti tatra eva saptamaH upalamBa vikalpaH SAriputraH Aha
   kasyānupalambhayogena bhagavān āha ātmānaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate na	kasya anupalamBa yogena BagavAn Aha AtmAnam SAriputra na upalaBate na
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya iti tatraivāṣṭama ātmādivikalpaḥ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya iti tatra eva azwamaH Atma Adi vikalpaH
   anutpādaḥ śāriputrāprādurbhāvo 'nabhisaṃskāro viśuddhiḥ iti tatraiva	anutpAdaH SAriputra aprAdurBAvaH anaBisaMskAraH viSudDiH iti tatra eva
   navamo viśuddyutpādādivikalpaḥ iti prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ so	navamaH viSuddyutpAda Adi vikalpaH iti praTamaH grAhya vikalpaH saH 
   'nupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate yāvad vijñānaṃ kalpayaty	anupAya kuSalaH rUpam kalpayati aBiniviSate yAvat vijQAnam kalpayati 
   abhiniviśate iti mūrdhagatavikalpasaṃprayoge prathamo rāśyarthavikalpaḥ	aBiniviSate iti mUrDa gata vikalpa saMprayoge praTamaH rASi arTa vikalpaH
   cakṣuḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate evaṃ yāvan mana rūpaṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate	cakzuH kalpayati aBiniviSate evam yAvat mana rUpam kalpayati aBiniviSate
   evaṃ yāvad dharmān iti tatraiva dvitīya āyadvārārthavikalpaḥ	evam yAvat DarmAn iti tatra eva dvitIyaH Aya dvAra arTa vikalpaH
   cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānadhātūn kalpayaty abhiniviśate evaṃ yāvan	cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAna DAtUn kalpayati aBiniviSate evam yAvat 
   manodharmamanovijñānadhātūn kalpayaty abhiniviśate iti tatraiva tṛtīyo	manaH Darma manaH vijQAna DAtUn kalpayati aBiniviSate iti tatra eva tRtIyaH 
   gotrārthavikalpaḥ avidyāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate evaṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ	gotra arTa vikalpaH avidyAm kalpayati aBiniviSate evam yAvat jarA maraNam
   kalpayaty abhiniviśate iti tatraiva caturtha utpādārthavikalpaḥ so	kalpayati aBiniviSate iti tatra eva caturTaH utpAda arTa vikalpaH saH 
   'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad	aDyAtma SUnyatAm bahirDA SUnyatAm aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ kalpayaty abhiniviśate iti tatraiva pañcamaḥ	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAm kalpayati aBiniviSate iti tatra eva paQcamaH
   śūnyatārthavikalpaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate iti tatraiva	SUnyatA arTa vikalpaH zaz pAramitAH kalpayati aBiniviSate iti tatra eva
   ṣaṣṭhaḥ pāramitārthavikalpaḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān kalpayaty	zazWaH pAramitA arTa vikalpaH saptatriMSat boDi pakzAn DarmAn kalpayati 
   abhiniviśate iti tatraiva saptamo darśanamārgavikalpaḥ sa	aBiniviSate iti tatra eva saptamaH darSana mArga vikalpaH sa
   dhyānābhijñāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ kalpayaty abhiniviśate iti	DyAna aBijQA pramANA rUpya samApattIH kalpayati aBiniviSate iti
   tatraivāṣṭamo bhāvanāmārgavikalpaḥ sa daśatathāgatabalāni yāvat	tatra eva azwamaH BAvanA mArga vikalpaH sa daSa taTAgata balAni yAvat 
   sarvākārajñatāṃ (PSP1: 150) kalpayaty abhiniviśate iti tatraiva navamo	sarva AkAra jQa tAm (PSP1: 150) kalpayati aBiniviSate iti tatra eva navamaH 
   śaikṣamārgavikalpaḥ iti dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ ātmānaṃ śāriputra	SEkza mArga vikalpaH iti dvitIyaH grAhya vikalpaH AtmAnam SAriputra
   nopalabhate evaṃ sattvaṃ jīvaṃ poṣaṃ puruṣaṃ pudgalaṃ manujaṃ mānavaṃ	na upalaBate evam sattvam jIvam pozam puruzam pudgalam manujam mAnavam
   kārakām vedakaṃ jānakaṃ paśyakan nopalabhate tat kasya hetoḥ atyantatayā	kArakAm vedakam jAnakam paSyakan na upalaBate tat kasya hetoH atyanta tayA
   hy ātmā na vidyate nopalabhate iti kṣāntisahagatavikalpasamprayoge	hi AtmA na vidyate na upalaBate iti kzAnti saha gata vikalpa samprayoge
   prathamaḥ svatantrātmavikalpaḥ rūpaṃ śāriputra nopalabhate yāvad vijñānaṃ	praTamaH svatantra Atma vikalpaH rUpam SAriputra na upalaBate yAvat vijQAnam
   nopalabhate iti tatraiva dvitīya ekātmavikalpaḥ cakṣuḥ śāriputra	na upalaBate iti tatra eva dvitIyaH eka Atma vikalpaH cakzuH SAriputra
   nopalabhate evaṃ yāvan manaḥ rūpaṃ nopalabhate evaṃ yāvad buddhadharmān	na upalaBate evam yAvat manaH rUpam na upalaBate evam yAvat budDa DarmAn
   nopalabhate iti tatraiva tṛtīyaḥ kāraṇātmavikalpaḥ cakṣūrūpavijñānāni	na upalaBate iti tatra eva tRtIyaH kAraNa Atma vikalpaH cakzU rUpa vijQAnAni
   śāriputra nopalabhate yāvat manodharmamanovijñānāni nopalabhate iti	SAriputra na upalaBate yAvat manaH Darma manaH vijQAnAni na upalaBate iti
   tatraiva caturtho draṣṭādyātmavikalpaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śāriputra	tatra eva caturTaH drazwA Adi Atma vikalpaH pratItyasamutpAdam SAriputra
   nopalabhate yāvad ārūpyasamāpattīr nopalabhate iti tatraiva ṣaṣṭho	na upalaBate yAvat ArUpya samApattIH na upalaBate iti tatra eva zazWaH 
   vairāgyādhārātmavikalpaḥ āryasatyāni nopalabhate iti tatraiva saptamo	vErAgya ADAra Atma vikalpaH Arya satyAni na upalaBate iti tatra eva saptamaH 
   darśanādhārātmavikalpaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr	darSana ADAra Atma vikalpaH azwO vimokzAt nava anupUrva vihAra samApattIH 
   nopalabhate iti tatraivāṣṭamo bhāvanādhāratmavikalpaḥ daśabalāni	na upalaBate iti tatra eva azwamaH BAvanA DAratma vikalpaH daSa balAni
   nopalabhate yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate kathaṃ nopalabhate ātmatvena	na upalaBate yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tAm na upalaBate kaTam na upalaBate Atma tvena
   tat kasya hetoḥ ātmano 'tyantaviśuddhitām upādāya iti tatraiva navamaḥ	tat kasya hetoH AtmanaH atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya iti tatra eva navamaH
   kṛtārthatādhārātmavikalpaḥ iti prathamo grāhakavikalpaḥ atha khalv āyuṣmān	kRtArTa tA ADAra Atma vikalpaH iti praTamaH grAhaka vikalpaH aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat yo bhagavan pṛcchet kim ayaṃ māyāpuruṣaḥ	suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat yaH Bagavan pRcCet kim ayam mAyA puruzaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñātāyāṃ niryāsyatīti (PSP1: 151)	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQAtAyAm niryAsyati iti (PSP1: 151)
   tasyaivaṃ pṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ	tasya evam pRcCataH kaTam nirdezwavyam syAt evam DyAna pAramitAyAm
   śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā	SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati iti evam vIrya pAramitAyAm SikzitvA
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati iti evam kzAnti pAramitAyAm SikzitvA
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati iti evam SIla pAramitAyAm SikzitvA
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati iti dAna pAramitAyAm SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm
   niryāsyatīti tasyaivaṃ pṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt yāvat	niryAsyati iti tasya evam pRcCataH kaTam nirdezwavyam syAt yAvat 
   saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yāvat sarvākārajñātāyāṃ śikṣitvā	saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu yAvat sarva AkAra jQAtAyAm SikzitvA
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti sarvākārajñatāṃ prāpsyatīti tasyaivaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati iti sarva AkAra jQa tAm prApsyati iti tasya evam
   pṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt bhagavān āha tena hi subhūte tvām	pRcCataH kaTam nirdezwavyam syAt BagavAn Aha tena hi suBUte tvAm
   evātra pratiprakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ tat kiṃ manyase	eva atra pratiprakzyAmi yaTA te kzamate taTA vyAkuryAH tat kim manyase
   subhūte anyad rūpam anyā māyā anyā vedanā anyā saṃjñā anye saṃskārāḥ anyat	suBUte anyat rUpam anyA mAyA anyAH vedanA anyA saMjQA anye saMskArAH anyat 
   vijñānam anyā māyā subhūtir āha no bhagavān ity	vijQAnam anyA mAyA suBUtiH Aha naH BagavAn iti 
   agradharmagatavikalpasaṃprayoge prathamaḥ skandhaprajñaptivikalpaḥ	agra Darma gata vikalpa saMprayoge praTamaH skanDa prajQapti vikalpaH
   bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā anyac cakṣuḥ anyā māyā	BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyA mAyA anyat cakzuH anyA mAyA
   anyac chrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo 'nyā māyā anyan manaḥ anyā māyā anyad	anyat Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH anyAH mAyAH anyat manaH anyAH mAyA anyat 
   rūpaṃ anyā māyā anyaḥ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyam anyā māyā anye	rUpam anyAH mAyA anyaH SabdaH ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam anyAH mAyA anye
   dharmāḥ subhūtir āha no bhagavan iti tatraiva dvitīya	DarmAH suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan iti tatra eva dvitIya
   āyatanaprajñaptivikalpaḥ bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā	Ayatana prajQapti vikalpaH BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyA mAyA
   anyac cakṣurvijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyac chrotravijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyad	anyat cakzuH vijQAnam anyAH mAyA anyat Srotra vijQAnam anyAH mAyA anyat 
   ghrāṇavijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyaj jihvāvijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyat kāyavijñānaṃ	GrANa vijQAnam anyA mAyA anyat jihvA vijQAnam anyA mAyA anyat kAya vijQAnam
   anyā māyā anyad manovijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyac cakṣūrūpacajṣurvijñānaṃ anyā	anyA mAyA anyat manaH vijQAnam anyA mAyA anyat cakzu UrUpacajzuH vijQAnam anyA
   māyā anyac chrotraśabdaśrotravijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyad	mAyA anyat Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAnam anyAH mAyA anyat 
   ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyaj jihvārasajihvāvijñānaṃ anyā	GrANa ganDa GrANa vijQAnam anyA mAyA anyat jihvA rasa jihvA vijQAnam anyA
   māyā anyat kāyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānaṃ anyā māyā anyat	mAyA anyat kAyasprazwavya kAya vijQAnam anyA mAyA anyat 
   manodharmamanovijñānam anyā māyā anyaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ anyā māyā anyaḥ	manaH Darma manaH vijQAnam anyAH mAyA anyaH cakzuH saMsparSaH anyAH mAyA anyaH
   śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ anyā māyā anyo ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ anyā māyā anyo	Srotra saMsparSaH anyAH mAyA anyaH GrANa saMsparSaH anyAH mAyA anyaH 
   jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ anyā māyā anyaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ anyā māyā anyo	jihvA saMsparSaH anyAH mAyA anyaH kAya saMsparSaH anyAH mAyA anyaH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ subhūtir āha no bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase	manaH saMsparSaH suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase
   subhūte anyā māyā anyac	suBUte anyA mAyA anya t 
   chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanād utpadyate vedayitaṃ	Srotra GrANa jihvA kAya manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAt utpadyate vedayitam
   sukhaṃ vā dukhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā subhūtir āha no bhagavan bhagavān āha	suKam vA duKam vA aduHKa asuKam vA suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha
   tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā anyaḥ pṛthivīdhātur anyā māyā anyo	tat kim manyase suBUte anyAH mAyA anyaH pRTivI DAtuH anyAH mAyA anyaH 
   'bdhātur anyā māyā anyaḥ tejodhātur anyā māyā anyo vāyudhātur anyā māyā	ap DAtuH anyAH mAyA anyaH tejaH DAtuH anyA mAyA anyaH vAyuDAtuH anyA mAyA
   anya ākāśadhātur anyā māyā anyo vijñānadhātuḥ subhūtir āha no bhagavan	anyaH AkASa DAtuH anyAH mAyA anyaH vijQAna DAtuH suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan
   anyaḥ pṛthivīdhātur anyā māyā pṛthivīdhātur eva māyā māyaiva pṛthivīdhātuḥ	anyaH pRTivI DAtuH anyA mAyA pRTivI DAtuH eva mAyA mAyA eva pRTivI DAtuH
   (PSP1: 152) no bhagavan anyo abdhātur anyā māyā abdhātur eva māyā	(PSP1: 152) naH Bagavan anyaH abDAtuH anyA mAyA abDAtuH eva mAyA
   māyaivābdhātuḥ no bhagavan anyaḥ tejodhātur anyā māyā tejodhātur eva māyā	mAyA eva abDAtuH naH Bagavan anyaH tejaH DAtuH anyA mAyA tejaH DAtuH eva mAyA
   māyaiva tejodhātuḥ no bhagavan anyo vāyudhātur anyā māyā vāyudhātur eva	mAyA eva tejaH DAtuH naH Bagavan anyaH vAyuDAtuH anyAH mAyA vAyuDAtuH eva
   māyā māyaiva vāyudhātuḥ no bhagavan anya ākāśadhātur anyā māyā ākāśadhātur	mAyA mAyA eva vAyuDAtuH naH Bagavan anyaH AkASa DAtuH anyA mAyA AkASa DAtuH 
   eva māyā māyaivākāśadhātuḥ no bhagavann anyo vijñānadhātur anyā māyā	eva mAyA mAyA eva AkASa DAtuH naH Bagavan anyaH vijQAna DAtuH anyA mAyA
   vijñānadhātur eva māyā māyaiva vijñānadhātuḥ iti tatraiva tṛtīyo	vijQAna DAtuH eva mAyA mAyA eva vijQAna DAtuH iti tatra eva tRtIyaH 
   dhātuprajñaptivikalpaḥ bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā	DAtu prajQapti vikalpaH BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyA mAyA
   anyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ subhūtir āha no bhagavann anyā avidyā anyā māyā	anyaH pratItyasamutpAdaH suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan anyA avidyA anyA mAyA
   avidyaiva māyā māyaivāvidyā no bhagavann anye saṃskārā anyā māyā saṃskārā	avidyA eva mAyA mAyA eva avidyA naH Bagavan anye saMskArA anyA mAyA saMskArA
   eva māyā māyaiva saṃskārāḥ no bhagavann anyad vijñānam anyā māyā vijñānam	eva mAyA mAyA eva saMskArAH naH Bagavan anyat vijQAnam anyA mAyA vijQAnam
   eva māyā māyaiva vijñānaṃ no bhagavann anyad nāmarūpam anyā māyā nāmarūpam	eva mAyA mAyA eva vijQAnam naH Bagavan anyat nAma rUpam anyA mAyA nAma rUpam
   eva māyā māyaiva nāmarūpaṃ no bhagavann anyāni ṣaḍāyatanāny anyā māyā	eva mAyA mAyA eva nAma rUpam naH Bagavan anyAni zaz AyatanAni anyA mAyA
   ṣaḍāyatanāny eva māyā māyaiva ṣaḍāyatanāni no bhagavann anyaḥ sparśo anyā	zaz AyatanAni eva mAyA mAyA eva zaz AyatanAni naH Bagavan anyaH sparSaH anyA
   māyā sparśa eva māyā māyaiva sparśo no bhagavann anyā vedanānyā māyā	mAyA sparSaH eva mAyA mAyA eva sparSaH naH Bagavan anyA vedanA anyA mAyA
   vedanaiva māyā māyaiva vedanā no bhagavann anyā tṛṣṇānyā māyā tṛṣṇaiva	vedanA eva mAyA mAyA eva vedanA naH Bagavan anyA tRzNA anyA mAyA tRzNA eva
   māyā māyaiva tṛṣṇā no bhagavann anyad upādānam anyā māyā upādānam eva māyā	mAyA mAyA eva tRzNA naH Bagavan anyat upAdAnam anyA mAyA upAdAnam eva mAyA
   māyaiva upādānaṃ no bhagavann anyo bhavo anyā māyā bhava eva māyā māyaiva	mAyA eva upAdAnam naH Bagavan anyaH BavaH anyA mAyA BavaH eva mAyA mAyA eva
   bhavo no bhagavann anyā jātir anyā māyā jātir eva māyā māyaiva jātiḥ no	BavaH naH Bagavan anyA jAtiH anyA mAyA jAtiH eva mAyA mAyA eva jAtiH na u
   bhagavann anyaj jarāmaraṇam anyā māyā jarāmaraṇam eva māyā māyaiva	Bagavan anyat jarA maraNam anyA mAyA jarA maraNam eva mAyA mAyA eva
   jarāmaraṇam iti tatraiva caturthaḥ pratītyasamutpādaprajñaptivikalpaḥ	jarA maraNam iti tatra eva caturTaH pratItyasamutpAda prajQapti vikalpaH
   bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā anye saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā	BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyA mAyA anye saptatriMSat boDi pakzA
   dharmāḥ subhūtir āha no bhagavan iti tatraiva pañcamo	DarmAH suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan iti tatra eva paQcamaH 
   vyavadānaprajñaptivikalpaḥ bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā	vyavadAna prajQapti vikalpaH BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyA mAyA
   anyā śūnyatā anyā māyā anyat nimittam anyā māyā anyat praṇihitam subhūtir	anyA SUnyatA anyA mAyA anyat nimittam anyA mAyA anyat praNihitam suBUtiH 
   āha no bhagavan iti tatraiva ṣaṣṭho darśanamārgaprajñaptivikalpaḥ bhagavān	Aha naH Bagavan iti tatra eva zazWaH darSana mArga prajQapti vikalpaH BagavAn
   āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā anyā dhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ	Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyAH mAyA anyAH DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH
   subhūtir āha no bhagavan iti tatraiva saptamo	suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan iti tatra eva saptamaH 
   bhāvanāmārgaprajñaptivikalpaḥ bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā	BAvanA mArga prajQapti vikalpaH BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyA

   māyā anyāni daśabalāni anyā māyā anye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddhadharmāḥ subhūtir	mAyA anyAni daSa balAni anyAH mAyA anye azwAdaSa aveNikA budDa DarmAH suBUtiH 
   āha no bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyā māyā anyo bodhiḥ	Aha naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte anyA mAyA anyaH boDiH
   subhūtir āha no bhagavan anyā māyā anyad rūpaṃ rūpam eva bhagavan māyā	suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan anyA mAyA anyat rUpam rUpam eva Bagavat mAyA
   māyaiva bhagavan rūpam no bhagavan anyā māyā anyā vedanā vedanaiva	mAyA eva Bagavan rUpam naH Bagavan anyAH mAyA anyAH vedanA vedanA eva
   bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan vedanā no bhagavan anyā māyā anyā saṃjñā	Bagavat mAyA mAyA eva Bagavan vedanA naH Bagavan anyA mAyA anyA saMjQA
   saṃjñaiva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan saṃjñā no bhagavan anyā māyā anye	saMjQA eva Bagavat mAyA mAyA eva Bagavan saMjQA naH Bagavan anyAH mAyA anye
   saṃskārāḥ saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan saṃskārā no bhagavan	saMskArAH saMskArAH eva Bagavat mAyA mAyA eva Bagavan saMskArAH naH Bagavan
   anyā māyā anyad vijñānaṃ vijñānam eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan	anyAH mAyA anyat vijQAnam vijQAnam eva Bagavat mAyA mAyA eva Bagavan
   vijñānam na bahgavan anyac cakṣur anyā māyā na bhagavan anyad rūpam anyā	vijQAnam na bahgavan anyat cakzuH anyA mAyA na Bagavan anyat rUpam anyA
   māyā na bhagavan anyat śrotram anyā māyā na bhagavan anyaḥ śabdo anyā māyā	mAyA na Bagavan anyat Srotram anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyaH SabdaH anyA mAyA
   na bhagavan anyad ghrāṇam anyā māyā na bhagavan anyo gandho 'nyā māyā na	na Bagavan anyat GrANam anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyaH ganDaH anyA mAyA na
   bhagavan anyā jihvā anyā māyā na bhagavan anyo raso 'nyā māyā na bhagavan	Bagavan anyAH jihvAH anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyaH rasaH anyAH mAyA na Bagavan
   anyaḥ kāyo anyā māyā na bhagavan anyat spraṣṭavyam anyā māyā na bhagavan	anyaH kAyaH anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyat sprazwavyam anyAH mAyA na Bagavan
   anyad mano 'nyā māyā na bhagavan anyo dharmo 'nyā māyā na bhagavan anyac	anyat manaH anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyaH DarmaH anyA mAyA na Bagavan anya t 
   chrotravijñānam anyā māyā na bhagavan anyac chrotravijñānaṃ anyā māyā na	Srotra vijQAnam anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyat Srotra vijQAnam anyA mAyA na
   bhagavan anyad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ anyā māyā na bhagavan anyaj jihvāvijñānaṃ	Bagavan anyat GrANa vijQAnam anyA mAyA na Bagavan anyat jihvA vijQAnam
   anyā māyā na bhagavan anyat kāyavijñānaṃ anyā māyā na bhagavan anyad	anyA mAyA na Bagavan anyat kAya vijQAnam anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyat

   na bhagavan anyac chrotraśabdaśrotravijñānaṃ anyā māyā na bhagavan anyad	na Bagavan anyat Srotra Sabda Srotra vijQAnam anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyat

   māyā na bhagavan anyaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nyā māyā na bhagavan anyo	mAyA na Bagavan anyaH Srotra saMsparSaH anyA mAyA na Bagavan anyaH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nyā māyā na bhagavan anyo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nyā māyā na	GrANa saMsparSaH anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyaH jihvA saMsparSaH anyA mAyA na
   bhagavan anyaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nyā māyā na bhagavan anyo manaḥsaṃsparśo	Bagavan anyaH kAya saMsparSaH anyAH mAyA na Bagavan anyaH manaH saMsparSaH 
   'nyā māyā na bhagavan anyac	anyA mAyA na Bagavan anya t 
   chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanād utpadyate vedayitaṃ	Srotra GrANa jihvA kAya manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAt utpadyate vedayitam
   sukhaṃ vā dukhaṃ vā aduḥkhaṃ vā asukhaṃ vā na bhagavan anyā māyā anye	suKam vA duKam vA aduHKam vA asuKam vA na Bagavan anyAH mAyA anye
   bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ bodhipakṣā dharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavan	boDi pakzAH DarmAH boDi pakzAH DarmAH eva Bagavat mAyA mAyA eva Bagavan
   bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ na bhagavan (PSP1: 153) anyā māyā anye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā	boDi pakzAH DarmAH na Bagavan (PSP1: 153) anyA mAyA anye azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmāḥ aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva	budDa DarmAH azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH eva Bagavat mAyA mAyA eva
   bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ na bhagavan anyā māyā anyo bodhiḥ	Bagavan azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH na Bagavan anyA mAyA anyaH boDiH
   bodhir eva māyā māyaiva bhagavan bodhiḥ bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase	boDiH eva mAyA mAyA eva Bagavan boDiH BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase
   subhūte api nu māyāyā utpādo vā nirodho vā subhūtir āha no bhagavan	suBUte api nu mAyAyAH utpAdaH vA niroDaH vA suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan
   bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte māyāyāḥ saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā	BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte mAyAyAH saMkleSaH vA vyavadAnam vA
   subhūtir āha no bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yasya	suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte yasya
   notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate	na utpAdaH na niroDaH na saMkleSaH na vyavadAnam sa prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzate
   dhyānapāramitayāṃ śikṣate vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ	DyAna pAramitayAm Sikzate vIrya pAramitAyAm Sikzate kzAnti pAramitAyAm
   śikṣate śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate	Sikzate SIla pAramitAyAm Sikzate dAna pAramitAyAm Sikzate
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu śikṣate saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu Sikzate saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu
   abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu śikṣate	aBijQA daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNika budDa Darmezu Sikzate
   sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati subhūtir āha	sarvajQa tAyAm niryAsyati yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApsyati suBUtiH Aha
   no bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣā saṃjñā samajñā	naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte atra ezA saMjQA sama jQA
   prajñaptir vyavahāro bodhisattva iti pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu subhūtir āha	prajQaptiH vyavahAraH boDisattvaH iti paQca su upAdAna skanDezu suBUtiH Aha
   no bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase subhūte saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptir	naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase suBUte saMjQA samajQA prajQaptiH 
   vyavahāramātreṇa pañcānām upādānaskandhānām utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo	vyavahAra mAtreNa paQcAnAm upAdAna skanDAnAm utpAdaH vA niroDaH vA saMkleSaH 
   vā vyavadānaṃ vā upalabhyate subhūtir āha no bhagavan bhagavān āha tat kiṃ	vA vyavadAnam vA upalaByate suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kim
   manyase subhūte yasya na saṃjñā na samajñā na prajñaptir na vyavahāro na	manyase suBUte yasya na saMjQA na samajQA na prajQaptiH na vyavahAraH na
   nāma na nāmaprajñaptir na kāyo na kāyakarma na vāk na vākkarma na mano na	nAma na nAma prajQaptiH na kAyaH na kAya karma na vAc na vAkkarma na manaH na
   manaḥkarma notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam api na sa	manaH karma na utpAdaH na niroDaH na saMkleSaH na vyavadAnam api na sa
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati subhūtir āha no	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati suBUtiH Aha no
   bhagavan bhagavān āha evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	Bagavan BagavAn Aha evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati anupalambhayogena	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati anupalamBa yogena
   subhūtir āha evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	suBUtiH Aha evam Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇaiva śikṣitavyaṃ bhagavaty anuttarāyāṃ	SikzamANena mAyA puruzeNa eva Sikzitavyam Bagavati anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan sa eva māyāpuruṣo	samyaksaMboDO tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan saH eva mAyA puruzaH 
   veditavyaḥ yad uta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase	veditavyaH yat uta paQca upAdAna skanDAH BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase
   subhūte api tv ime pañcopādānaskandhāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā	suBUte api tu ime paQca upAdAna skanDAH prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati subhūtir āha no bhagavan tat (PSP1: 154)	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan tat (PSP1: 154)
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ evaṃ	kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan aBAva svaBAvAH paQca upAdAna skanDAH evam
   svapnopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ svapnaś cābhāvasvabhāvo nopalabhyate tathaiva	svapna upamAH paQca skanDAH svapnaH ca aBAva svaBAvaH na upalaByate taTA eva
   pañcaskandhā abhāvasvabhāvatayā nopalabhyante bhagavān āha tat kiṃ manyase	paQca skanDAH aBAva svaBAvatayA na upalaByante BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase
   subhūte pratiśrutkopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ nirmitakopamāḥ	suBUte pratiSrutka upamAH paQca skanDAH pratiBAsA upamAH nirmitaka upamAH
   pratibimbopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ	pratibimba upamAH paQca skanDAH prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm
   niryāsyati subhūtir āha no bhagavan tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavann	niryAsyati suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavat = 
   abhāvasvabhāvo pratiśrutka eva pratibhāso nirmitakaṃ pratibimbas tathaiva	aBAva svaBAvaH pratiSrutkaH eva pratiBAsaH nirmitakam pratibimbaH taTA eva
   pañcaskandhā abhāvasvabhāvatayā nopalabhyante tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ	paQca skanDAH aBAva svaBAvatayA na upalaByante taTA hi Bagavat mAyA upamam
   rūpaṃ māyopamā vedanā māyopamā saṃjñā māyopamāḥ saṃskārā māyopamaṃ	rUpam mAyA upamA vedanA mAyA upamA saMjQA mAyA upamAH saMskArAH mAyA upamam
   vijñānaṃ yac ca vijñānaṃ tat ṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañcaskandhās te ca	vijQAnam yat ca vijQAnam tat zaz indriyam te paQca skanDAH te ca
   adhyātmaśūnyatayā nopalabhyante bahirdhāśūnyatayā nopalabhyante	aDyAtma SUnyatayA na upalaByante bahirDA SUnyatayA na upalaByante
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā nopalabhyante yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayA na upalaByante yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatayA
   nopalabhyante saced evaṃ bahgavan bhāṣyamāṇo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	na upalaByante saced evam bahgavan BAzyamANaH yaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati notrasyati na santrasyati	na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vipratisArI Bavati na utrasyati na santrasyati
   na santrāsam āpadyate, veditavyam ayam bhagavan niryāsyati sarvajñatāyāṃ	na santrAsam Apadyate, veditavyam ayam Bagavat niryAsyati sarvajQa tAyAm
   sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati iti tatraiva	sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApsyati iti tatra eva
   navamo'śaiksamārgaprajñaptivikalpaḥ iti dvitīyo grāhakavikalpaḥ atha khalv	navamaH aSEksa mArga prajQapti vikalpaH iti dvitIyaH grAhaka vikalpaH aTa Kalu 
   āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat mā khalu bhagavan	AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat mA Kalu Bagavan
   navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā avalīyate	nava yAna saMprasTitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imam nirdeSam SrutvA avalIyate
   saṃlīyate vipratisārī bhavet uttrasyet santrasyet santrāsam āpadyeta	saMlIyate vipratisArI Bavet uttrasyet santrasyet santrAsam Apadyeta
   bhagavān āha sacet subhūte navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha saced suBUte nava yAna saMprasTitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran anupāyakuśalo bhaven na ca kalyāṇamitrahastagato	prajQApAramitAyAm caran anupAya kuSalaH Bavet na ca kalyANa mitra hasta gataH 
   bhavet uttrasyet saṃtrasyet santrāsam āpadyeta subhūtir āha katamad	Bavet uttrasyet saMtrasyet santrAsam Apadyeta suBUtiH Aha katamat 
   bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carata	Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAn carata
   upāyakauśalyaṃ yatra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nottrasyati na	upAya kOSalyam yatra caran boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na uttrasyati na
   santrasyati na santrāsam āpadyate bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo	santrasyati na santrAsam Apadyate BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena rūpam anityam iti	mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena rUpam anityam iti
   pratyavekṣate na copalabhate vedanāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate vedanAm sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittenānityeti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate saṃjñāṃ	cittena anitya iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate saMjQAm
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityeti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena anitya iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate
   saṃskārān (PSP1: 155) sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenānityā iti	saMskArAn (PSP1: 155) sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena anityAH iti
   pratyavekṣate na copalabhate vijñānaṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate vijQAnam sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittenānityeti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	cittena anitya iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate idam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam punar	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH upAya kOSalyam veditavyam punar 
   aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittena rūpaṃ duḥkham iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate vedanāṃ	cittena rUpam duHKam iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate vedanAm
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena duḥkheti pratyavekṣate na	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena duHKa iti pratyavekzate na
   copalabhate saṃjñāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena duḥkheti	ca upalaBate saMjQAm sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena duHKa iti
   pratyavekṣate na copalabhate saṃskārān sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate saMskArAn sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittena duḥkhā iti pratyavekṣate na copalabhate vijñānaṃ	cittena duHKAH iti pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate vijQAnam
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena duḥkham iti pratyavekṣate na	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena duHKam iti pratyavekzate na
   copalabhate idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ca upalaBate idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carata upāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo	carataH upAya kOSalyam veditavyam punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH

   caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yāṃ dharmadeśanāṅ karoty	caran sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yAm Darma deSanAF karoti 
   anupalambhayogena iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā teṣām eva	anupalamBa yogena iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA tezAm eva
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām aparāmarṣaṇatā iyaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktAnAm manasikArANAm apara amarzaNa tA iyam

   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām kṣamaṇārocanapratyavekṣaṇatā	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktAnAm manasikArANAm kzamaNa Arocana pratyavekzaNa tA
   iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā yā teṣām eva	iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kzAnti pAramitA yA tezAm eva
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām anutsṛṣṭir iyaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktAnAm manasikArANAm anutsRzwiH iyam
