   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ manasikārāṇām anavakāśadānatā	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktAnAm manasikArANAm anavakASa dAna tA
   anyeṣām api vākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anyezAm api vA akuSalAnAm DarmANAm iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   dhyānapāramitā evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ	DyAna pAramitA evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn 
   caran nottrasyati na santrasyati na santrāsam āpadyate punar aparaṃ	caran na uttrasyati na santrasyati na santrAsam Apadyate punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran evam
   pratyavekṣate na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ, rūpam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva	pratyavekzate na rUpa SUnya tayA rUpam SUnyaM, rUpam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva
   rūpam na vedanāśūnyatayā vedanā śūnyā, vedanaiva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva	rUpam na vedanA SUnyatayA vedanA SUnyA, vedanA eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva
   vedanā, na saṃjñāśūnyatayā saṃjñā sūnyā, saṃjñaiva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva	vedanA, na saMjQA SUnya tayA saMjQA sUnyA, saMjQA eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva
   saṃjñā na saṃskāraśūnyatayā saṃskārāḥ śūnyāḥ, saṃskārā eva śūnyatā,	saMjQA na saMskAra SUnyatayA saMskArAH SUnyAH, saMskArAH eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaṃ śūnyam, vijñānam eva	SUnyatA eva saMskArAH na vijQAna SUnya tayA vijQAnam SUnyam, vijQAnam eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva vijñānam na cakṣuḥśūnyatayā cakṣuḥ śūnyam, cakṣur eva	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva vijQAnam na cakzuH SUnyatayA cakzuH SUnyam, cakzuH eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva cakṣuḥ na śrotraśūnyatayā śrotraṃ śūnyam, śrotram eva	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva cakzuH na Srotra SUnyatayA Srotram SUnyam, Srotram eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva śrotram na ghrāṇaśūnyatayā ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam, ghrāṇam eva	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva Srotram na GrANa SUnyatayA GrANam SUnyam, GrANam eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva ghrāṇam na jihvāśūnyatayā jihvā śūnyā, jihvaiva	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva GrANam na jihvA SUnya tayA jihvA SUnyA, jihvA eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva jihvā na kāyaśūnyatayā kāyaḥ śūnyaḥ, kāya eva śūnyatā,	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva jihvA na kAya SUnya tayA kAyaH SUnyaH, kAyaH eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva kāyaḥ na manaḥśūnyatayā manaḥ śūnyam, mana eva śūnyatā,	SUnyatA eva kAyaH na manaH SUnyatayA manaH SUnyam, manaH eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva manaḥ na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam, rūpam eva śūnyatā,	SUnyatA eva manaH na rUpa SUnya tayA rUpam SUnyam, rUpam eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva rūpam na śabdaśūnyatayā śabdaḥ śūnyaḥ, śabda eva śūnyatā,	SUnyatA eva rUpam na Sabda SUnya tayA SabdaH SUnyaH, SabdaH eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva śabdaḥ na gandhaśūnyatayā gandho śūnyaḥ, gandha eva śūnyatā,	SUnyatA eva SabdaH na ganDa SUnya tayA ganDaH SUnyaH, ganDaH eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva gandhaḥ na rasaśūnyatayā rasaḥ śūnyaḥ, rasa eva śūnyatā,	SUnyatA eva ganDaH na rasa SUnya tayA rasaH SUnyaH, rasaH eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva rasaḥ na spraṣṭavyaśūnyatayā spraṣṭavyaṃ śūnyam, spraṣṭavyam	SUnyatA eva rasaH na sprazwavya SUnyatayA sprazwavyam SUnyam, sprazwavyam
   eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva spraṣṭavyam na dharmaśūnyatayā dharmaḥ śūnyaḥ,	eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva sprazwavyam na Darma SUnyatayA DarmaH SUnyaH,
   dharma eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva dharmaḥ na cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatayā	DarmaH eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva DarmaH na cakzuH vijQAna SUnya tayA
   cakṣurvijñānaṃ śūnyam, cakṣurvijñānam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva	cakzuH vijQAnam SUnyam, cakzuH vijQAnam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva
   cakṣurvijñānam na śrotravijñānaśūnyatayā śrotravijñānaṃ śūnyam,	cakzuH vijQAnam na Srotra vijQAna SUnya tayA Srotra vijQAnam SUnyam,
   śrotravijñānam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva śrotravijñānam na	Srotra vijQAnam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva Srotra vijQAnam na
   ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatayā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ śūnyam, ghrāṇavijñānam eva śūnyatā,	GrANa vijQAna SUnya tayA GrANa vijQAnam SUnyam, GrANa vijQAnam eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva ghrāṇavijñānam na jihvāvijñānaśūnyatayā jihvāvijñānaṃ śūnyam,	SUnyatA eva GrANa vijQAnam na jihvA vijQAna SUnya tayA jihvA vijQAnam SUnyam,
   jihvāvijñānam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva jihvāvijñānam na	jihvA vijQAnam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva jihvA vijQAnam na
   kāyavijñānaśūnyatayā kāyavijñānaṃ śūnyam, kāyavijñānam eva śūnyatā,	kAya vijQAna SUnyatayA kAya vijQAnam SUnyam, kAya vijQAnam eva SUnyatA,
   śūnyataiva kāyavijñānam na manovijñānaśūnyatayā manovijñānaṃ śūnyam,	SUnyatA eva kAya vijQAnam na manaH vijQAna SUnyatayA manaH vijQAnam SUnyam,
   manovijñānam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva manovijñānam na	manaH vijQAnam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva manaH vijQAnam na
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatayā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śūnyaḥ, cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa eva	cakzuH saMsparSa SUnya tayA cakzuH saMsparSaH SUnyaH, cakzuH saMsparSaH eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ na śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatayā	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva cakzuH saMsparSaH na Srotra saMsparSa SUnyatayA
   śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śūnyaḥ, śrotrasaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva	Srotra saMsparSaH SUnyaH, Srotra saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva
   śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ na ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatayā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ śūnyaḥ,	Srotra saMsparSaH na GrANa saMsparSa SUnya tayA GrANa saMsparSaH SUnyaH,
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ na	GrANa saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva GrANa saMsparSaH na
   jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatayā jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ śūnyaḥ, jihvāsaṃsparśa eva	jihvA saMsparSa SUnya tayA jihvA saMsparSaH SUnyaH, jihvA saMsparSaH eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ na kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatayā	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva jihvA saMsparSaH na kAya saMsparSa SUnyatayA
   kāyasaṃsparśaḥ śūnyaḥ, kāyasaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva	kAya saMsparSaH SUnyaH, kAya saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva
   kāyasaṃsparśaḥ na manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatayā manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ śūnyaḥ,	kAya saMsparSaH na manaH saMsparSa SUnya tayA manaH saMsparSaH SUnyaH,
   manaḥsaṃsparśa eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ na	manaH saMsparSaH eva SUnyatA, SUnya tA eva manaH saMsparSaH na
   cakṣuḥpratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā cakṣuḥpratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam,	cakzuH pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA cakzuH pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam,
   cakṣuḥpratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva cakṣuḥpratyayavedayitam na	cakzuH pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva cakzuH pratyaya vedayitam na
   śrotrapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śrotrapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam,	Srotra pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA Srotra pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam,
   śrotrapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva śrotrapratyayavedayitam na	Srotra pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva Srotra pratyaya vedayitam na
   ghrāṇapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā ghrāṇapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam,	GrANa pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA GrANa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam,
   ghrāṇapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva ghrāṇapratyayavedayitam na	GrANa pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva GrANa pratyaya vedayitam na
   jihvāpratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā jihvāpratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam,	jihvA pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA jihvA pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam,
   jihvāpratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva jihvāpratyayavedayitam na	jihvA pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva jihvA pratyaya vedayitam na
   kāyapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā kāyapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam,	kAya pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA kAya pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam,
   kāyapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva kāyapratyayavedayitam na	kAya pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva kAya pratyaya vedayitam na
   manaḥpratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā manaḥpratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam,	manaH pratyaya vedayita SUnyatayA manaH pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam,
   manaḥpratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva manaḥpratyayavedayitam na	manaH pratyaya vedayitam eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva manaH pratyaya vedayitam na
   smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatayā smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyāni, smṛtyupasthānāny eva	smRti upasTAna SUnyatayA smRti upasTAnAni SUnyAni, smRti upasTAnAni eva
   śūnyatā, śūnyataiva smṛtyupasthānāni evaṃ	SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva smRti upasTAnAni evam
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni na mārgaśūnyatayā mārgaḥ	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFgAni na mArga SUnyatayA mArgaH
   śūnyo, mārga eva śūnyatā, śūnyataiva mārgaḥ na	SUnyo, mArgaH eva SUnyatA, SUnyatA eva mArgaH na
   balavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatayā buddhadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ,	bala vESAradyA veNika budDa Darma SUnya tayA budDa DarmAH SUnyAH,
   buddhadharmā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva buddhadharmāḥ iyaṃ subhūte	budDa DarmAH eva SUnyatA SUnyatA eva budDa DarmAH iyam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP1: 156) prajñāpāramitā, evaṃ hi subhūte	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya (PSP1: 156) prajQApAramitA, evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nottrasyati na santrasyati	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn caran na uttrasyati na santrasyati
   na santrāsam āpadyate ity upāyakauśalyaṃ prathamaḥ saparigrahaḥ subhūtir	na santrAsam Apadyate iti upAya kOSalyam praTamaH sa parigrahaH suBUtiH 
   āha katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yaiḥ	Aha katamAni Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi yEH
   parigṛhīta imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā nottrasyati na santrasyati	parigRhIta imam prajQApAramitA nirdeSam SrutvA na uttrasyati na santrasyati
   na santrāsam āpadyate bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvasya	na santrAsam Apadyate BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya rūpam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti	mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrAni yAni asya rUpam anityam iti Darmam deSayanti
   tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayanti anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam	pariNAmayanti anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam
   anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni	anityam iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni
   na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ	na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH
   amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāṇy asya rūpaṃ	amUni suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi yANi asya rUpam
   duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti rūpam anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti	duHKam iti Darmam deSayanti rUpam anAtmA iti SAntam iti viviktam iti
   śūnyam iti animittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac	SUnyam iti animittam iti apraNihitam iti Darmam deSayanti tat 
   cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ yāny asya	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH yAni asya
   vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti vijñānam anātmeti śāntam iti	vijQAnam duHKam iti Darmam deSayanti vijQAnam anAtmA iti SAntam iti
   viviktam iti śūnyam iti animittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti	viviktam iti SUnyam iti animittam iti apraNihitam iti Darmam deSayanti
   tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya cakṣur anityam iti dharmaṃ	mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrAni yAni asya cakzuH anityam iti Darmam
   deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na	deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotraṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH Srotram
   ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac	GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH anityam iti Darmam deSayanti tat 
   cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāṇy asya cakṣur duḥkham iti dharmaṃ	mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi yANi asya cakzuH duHKam iti Darmam
   deśayanti cakṣur anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti animittam iti	deSayanti cakzuH anAtmA iti SAntam iti viviktam iti SUnyam iti animittam iti
   apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca	apraNihitam iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca
   kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra	kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano duḥkham iti dharmaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH duHKam iti Darmam
   deśayanti mana anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti animittam iti	deSayanti manaH anAtmA iti SAntam iti viviktam iti SUnyam iti animittam iti
   apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca	apraNihitam iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca
   kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra	kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kalyāṇamitrāṇi punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	kalyANa mitrANi punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya cakṣurvijñānam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac	kalyANa mitrAni yAni asya cakzuH vijQAnam anityam iti Darmam deSayanti tat 
   cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH Srotra vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam
   jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac	jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam manaH vijQAnam anityam iti Darmam deSayanti tat 
   cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāṇy asya cakṣurvijñānaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ	mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi yANi asya cakzuH vijQAnam duHKam iti Darmam
   deśayanti cakṣurvijñānam anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti	deSayanti cakzuH vijQAnam anAtmA iti SAntam iti viviktam iti SUnyam iti
   animittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena	animittam iti apraNihitam iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena
   tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra	tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH Srotra vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam
   manovijñānaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti manovijñānam anātmeti śāntam	manaH vijQAnam duHKam iti Darmam deSayanti manaH vijQAnam anAtmA iti SAntam
   iti viviktam iti śūnyam iti animittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ	iti viviktam iti SUnyam iti animittam iti apraNihitam iti Darmam
   deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na	deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi punar aparaṃ subhūte	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrAni yAni asya cakzuH saMsparSaH 
   'nitya iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni	anityaH iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni
   na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ	na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH
   śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśo kāyavijñānasaṃsparśo	Srotra saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH kAya vijQAna saMsparSaH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nitya iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca	manaH saMsparSaH anityaH iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca
   kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra	kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāṇy asya cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo duḥkha iti dharmaṃ deśayanti	kalyANa mitrANi yANi asya cakzuH saMsparSaH duHKaH iti Darmam deSayanti
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo anātmeti śānta iti vivikta iti śūnya iti animitta iti	cakzuH saMsparSaH anAtmA iti SAntaH iti vivikte iti SUnyaH iti animittaH iti
   apraṇihita iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca	apraNihitaH iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca
   kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra	kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśo	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH Srotra saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH 
   kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo duḥkha iti dharmaṃ deśayanti manaḥsaṃsparśo	kAya saMsparSaH manaH saMsparSaH duHKaH iti Darmam deSayanti manaH saMsparSaH 
   'nātmeti śānta iti vivikta iti śūnya iti animitta iti apraṇihita iti	anAtmA iti SAntaH iti vivikte iti SUnyaH iti animittaH iti apraNihitaH iti
   dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na	Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi punar aparaṃ subhūte	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrAni yAni asya
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anityam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam anityam iti Darmam deSayanti tat 
   cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anityam iti	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam anityam iti
   dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na	Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāṇy asya	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi yANi asya
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ duḥkham iti dharmaṃ deśayanti	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam duHKam iti Darmam deSayanti
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anātmeti śāntam iti viviktam iti śūnyam	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam anAtmA iti SAntam iti viviktam iti SUnyam
   iti animittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena	iti animittam iti apraNihitam iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena
   tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra	tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ duḥkham iti	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam duHKam iti
   dharmaṃ deśayanti manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam anātmeti śāntam iti	Darmam deSayanti manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam anAtmA iti SAntam iti
   viviktam iti śūnyam iti animittam iti apraṇihitam iti dharmaṃ deśayanti	viviktam iti SUnyam iti animittam iti apraNihitam iti Darmam deSayanti
   tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya smṛtyupasthānāny anityāny iti	mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrAni yAni asya smRti upasTAnAni anityAni iti
   dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na	Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāṇy asya	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi yANi asya
   smṛtyupasthānāni duḥkhāny iti dharmaṃ deśayanti smṛtyupasthānāny anātmāny	smRti upasTAnAni duHKAni iti Darmam deSayanti smRti upasTAnAni anAtmAni 
   iti śāntāny iti viviktāny iti śūnyāny iti animittāny iti apraṇihitāny iti	iti SAntAni iti viviktAni iti SUnyAni iti animittAni iti apraNihitAni iti
   dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na	Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ amūni	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH amUni
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi punar aparaṃ subhūte	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāni yāny asya samyakprahāṇāny	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrAni yAni asya samyak prahANAni 
   anityāny iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni	anityAni iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni
   na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ	na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH
   amūni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi yāṇy asya	amUni suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitrANi yANi asya
   samyakprahāṇāni duḥkhāny iti dharmaṃ deśayanti samyakprahāṇāny anātmāny	samyak prahANAni duHKAni iti Darmam deSayanti samyak prahANAni anAtmAni 
   iti śāntāny iti viviktāny iti śūnyāny iti animittāny iti apraṇihitāny iti	iti SAntAni iti viviktAni iti SUnyAni iti animittAni iti apraNihitAni iti
   dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na	Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ evaṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH evam
   samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgo	samyak prahANAni RdDipAdAH indriyAni balAni boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFga mArgaH 
   'nitya iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni	anityaH iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni
   na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ evam	na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH evam
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñā anityā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH aBijQAH anityAH iti Darmam deSayanti tat 
   cānupalambhayogena tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau	ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO
   pariṇāmayati anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ evaṃ vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido daśa	pariNAmayati anyatra sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH evam vESAradyAni pratisaMvidaH daSa
   tathāgatabalāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy anityā iti dharmaṃ	taTAgata balAni azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH api anityAH iti Darmam
   deśayanti duḥkhā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti tac cānupalambhayogena tāni ca	deSayanti duHKAH iti Darmam deSayanti tat ca anupalamBa yogena tAni ca
   kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayati anyatra	kuSala mUlAni na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH imAni suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kalyāṇamitrāṇi yaiḥ parigṛhīta imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā	kalyANa mitrANi yEH parigRhIta imam prajQApAramitA nirdeSam SrutvA
   nottrasyati na santrasyati na santrāsam āpadyate (PSP1: 157) subhūtir āha	na uttrasyati na santrasyati na santrAsam Apadyate (PSP1: 157) suBUtiH Aha
   kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām anupāyakuśalo	kaTam Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm anupAya kuSalaH 
   bhaviṣyati pāpamitrahastagataś ca bhaviṣyati ya imaṃ	Bavizyati pApa mitra hasta gataH ca Bavizyati yaH imam
   prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasiṣyati saṃtrasiṣyati santrāsam	prajQApAramitA nirdeSam SrutvA uttrasizyati saMtrasizyati santrAsam
   āpatsyate bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	Apatsyate BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'pagatasarvākārajñatāpratiyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati	apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratiyuktEH manasikArEH prajQApAramitAm BAvayati
   upalabhate tathā ca prajñāpāramitayā manyate dhyānapāramitāṃ bhāvayati	upalaBate taTA ca prajQApAramitayA manyate DyAna pAramitAm BAvayati
   upalabhate tathā ca dhyānapāramitayā manyate vīryapāramitāṃ bhāvayati	upalaBate taTA ca DyAna pAramitayA manyate vIrya pAramitAm BAvayati
   upalabhate tathā ca vīryapāramitayā manyate kṣāntipāramitāṃ bhāvayati	upalaBate taTA ca vIrya pAramitayA manyate kzAnti pAramitAm BAvayati
   upalabhate tathā ca kṣāntipāramitayā manyate śīlapāramitāṃ bhāvayati	upalaBate taTA ca kzAnti pAramitayA manyate SIla pAramitAm BAvayati
   upalabhate tathā ca śīlapāramitayā manyate punar aparaṃ subhūte	upalaBate taTA ca SIla pAramitayA manyate punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran
   apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārai rūpam adhyātmaśūnyam iti	apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH rUpam aDyAtma SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti rūpaṃ bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti yāvad rūpam	manasikaroti rUpam bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti yAvat rUpam
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti vedanādhyātmaśūnyeti manasikaroti	aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti vedanA aDyAtma SUnyA iti manasikaroti
   vedanā bahirdhāśūnyeti manasikaroti yāvad vedanābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyeti	vedanA bahirDA SUnyA iti manasikaroti yAvat vedanA BAva svaBAva SUnyA iti
   manasikaroti saṃjñādhyātmaśūnyeti manasikaroti saṃjñā bahirdhāśūnyeti	manasikaroti saMjQA aDyAtma SUnyA iti manasikaroti saMjQA bahirDA SUnyA iti
   manasikaroti yāvad saṃjñābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyeti manasikaroti saṃskārā	manasikaroti yAvat saMjQA BAva svaBAva SUnyA iti manasikaroti saMskArA
   adhyātmaśūnyā iti manasikaroti saṃskārā bahirdhāśūnyā iti manasikaroti	aDyAtma SUnyAH iti manasikaroti saMskArAH bahirDA SUnyAH iti manasikaroti
   yāvad saṃskārā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyā iti manasikaroti vijñānam	yAvat saMskArAH aBAva svaBAva SUnyAH iti manasikaroti vijQAnam
   adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti vijñānaṃ bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti	aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti vijQAnam bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti
   yāvad vijñānam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti	yAvat vijQAnam aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti
   apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ tāṃ cādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ	apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tAm ca aDyAtma SUnyatAm
   bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām	bahirDA SUnyatAm aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAm
   upalabhate tābhiś ca śūnyatābhir manyate upalambhayogena cakṣur	upalaBate tABiH ca SUnyatABiH manyate upalamBa yogena cakzuH 
   adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti	aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti bahirDASUnyam iti manasikaroti
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam	aDyAtma bahirDASUnyam iti manasikaroti yAvat aBAva svaBAva svaBAva SUnyam
   iti manasikaroti tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate tathā ca manyate	iti manasikaroti tAH ca SUnyatA upalaBate taTA ca manyate
   upalambhayogena evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'dhyātmaśūnyam iti	upalamBa yogena evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH aDyAtma SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano bahirdhāśūnyam iti	manasikaroti Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH bahirDASUnyam iti
   manasikaroti yāvat śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam	manasikaroti yAvat Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH aBAva svaBAva SUnyam
   iti manasikaroti rūpam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti bahirdhāśūnyam iti	iti manasikaroti rUpam aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti bahirDA SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti yāvad	manasikaroti aDyAtma bahirDASUnyam iti manasikaroti yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti tāś ca śūnyatā upalabhate	aBAva svaBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti tAH ca SUnyatA upalaBate
   tathā ca manyate upalambhayogena evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ	taTA ca manyate upalamBa yogena evam SabdaH ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam
   dharmo 'dhyātmaśūnya iti manasikaroti śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ	DarmaH aDyAtma SUnyaH iti manasikaroti SabdaH ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam
   dharmo bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti yāvat śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ	DarmaH bahirDA SUnyaH iti manasikaroti yAvat SabdaH ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam
   dharmo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti cakṣurvijñānam adhyātmaśūnyam	DarmaH aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti cakzuH vijQAnam aDyAtma SUnyam
   iti manasikaroti bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam	iti manasikaroti bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyam
   iti manasikaroti yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti tāś	iti manasikaroti yAvat aBAva svaBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti tAH 
   ca śūnyatā upalabhate tathā ca manyate upalambhayogena evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ	ca SUnyatA upalaBate taTA ca manyate upalamBa yogena evam Srotra vijQAnam
   ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānam adhyātmaśūnyam iti	GrANa vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam manaH vijQAnam aDyAtma SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ	manasikaroti Srotra vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam
   manovijñānaṃ bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti yāvat śrotravijñānaṃ	manaH vijQAnam bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti yAvat Srotra vijQAnam
   ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ	GrANa vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam manaH vijQAnam
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'dhyātmaśūnya iti	aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti cakzuH saMsparSaH aDyAtma SUnyaH iti
   manasikaroti bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti adhyātmabahirdhāśūnya iti	manasikaroti bahirDA SUnyaH iti manasikaroti aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyaH iti
   manasikaroti yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnya iti manasikaroti tāś ca	manasikaroti yAvat aBAva svaBAva svaBAva SUnyaH iti manasikaroti tAH ca
   śūnyatā upalabhate tathā ca manyate upalambhayogena evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo	SUnyatA upalaBate taTA ca manyate upalamBa yogena evam Srotra saMsparSaH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'dhyātmaśūnya	GrANa saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSaH manaH saMsparSaH aDyAtma SUnya
   iti manasikaroti śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ	iti manasikaroti Srotra saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH
   kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti yāvat	kAya saMsparSaH manaH saMsparSaH bahirDA SUnyaH iti manasikaroti yAvat 
   śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo	Srotra saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSaH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti	manaH saMsparSaH aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti
   bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti	bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti aDyAtma bahirDASUnyam iti manasikaroti
   yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti tāś ca śūnyatā	yAvat aBAva svaBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti tAH ca SUnyatA
   upalabhate tathā ca manyate upalambhayogena evaṃ	upalaBate taTA ca manyate upalamBa yogena evam
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti yāvat	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti yAvat 
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti evam	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti manasikaroti evam
   avidyāyāṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇam adhyātmaśūnyam iti manasikaroti jarāmaraṇaṃ	avidyAyAm yAvat jarA maraNam aDyAtma SUnyam iti manasikaroti jarA maraNam
   bahirdhāśūnyam iti manasikaroti yāvad jarāmaraṇam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti	bahirDA SUnyam iti manasikaroti yAvat jarA maraNam aBAva svaBAva SUnyam iti
   manasikaroti punar aparaṃ subhūti bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	manasikaroti punar aparam suBUti boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm caran apagata sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH
   smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati tāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni upalabhate taiś ca	smRti upasTAnAni BAvayati tAni ca smRti upasTAnAni upalaBate tEH ca
   manyate upalambhayogena evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādān indriyāṇi balāni	manyate upalamBa yogena evam samyak prahANAni RdDi pAdAn indriyANi balAni
   bodhyaṅgāni mārgān pratisaṃvidaś vaiśāradyāni abhijñāḥ tathāgatabalāni	boDi aFgAni mArgAn pratisaMvidaH vESAradyAni aBijQAH taTAgata balAni
   buddhadharmān bhāvayati tāṃñ ca buddhadharmān upalabhate taiś ca manyate	budDa DarmAn BAvayati tAM ca budDa DarmAn upalaBate tEH ca manyate
   upalambhayogena evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	upalamBa yogena evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśala imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā	prajQApAramitAyAm caran anupAya kuSalaH imam prajQApAramitA nirdeSam SrutvA
   uttrasyati santrasyati santrāsam āpadyate subhūtir āha kathaṃ bhagavan	uttrasyati santrasyati santrAsam Apadyate suBUtiH Aha kaTam Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pāpamitraparigṛhīto bhavati (PSP1: 158) yena	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH pApa mitra parigRhItaH Bavati (PSP1: 158) yena
   pāpamitraparigrahaṇenemaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā uttrasyati	pApa mitra parigrahaNena imam prajQApAramitA nirdeSam SrutvA uttrasyati
   santrasyati santrāsam āpadyate bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvasya	santrasyati santrAsam Apadyate BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyā vivecayati dhyānapāramitāyā vivecayati	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAH vivecayati DyAna pAramitAyAH vivecayati
   vīryapāramitāyā vivecayati kṣāntipāramitāyā vivecayati śīlapāramitāyā	vIrya pAramitAyAH vivecayati kzAnti pAramitAyAH vivecayati SIla pAramitAyAH 
   vivecayati dānapāramitāyā vivecayati nātra śikṣitavyam iti naitat	vivecayati dAna pAramitAyAH vivecayati na atra Sikzitavyam iti na etat 
   tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitam iti kavikṛtāny etāni kāvyāni	taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena BAzitam iti kavi kRtAni etAni kAvyAni
   naitāni śrotavyāni nodgrahītavyāni na paryavāptavyāni na dhārayitavyāni na	na etAni SrotavyAni na udgrahItavyAni na paryavAptavyAni na DArayitavyAni na
   vācayitavyāni na manasikartavyāni nāpi parasyādeśayitavyāni idaṃ subhūte	vAcayitavyAni na manasi kartavyAni na api parasya AdeSayitavyAni idam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte	boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram veditavyam punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāpamitraṃ yo 'sya na mārakarmāṇy upadiśati	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya pApa mitram yaH asya na mAra karmANi upadiSati
   na māradoṣān ācaṣṭa iti hi māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇa vivecayati	na mAra dozAn Acazwe iti hi mAraH pApIyAn budDa vezeNa vivecayati
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ bravīti kiṃ te kulaputra	boDisattvam mahAsattvam upasaMkramya evam bravIti kim te kula putra
   prajñāpāramitayā bhāvitayā kiṃ te dhyānapāramitayā bhāvitayā kiṃ te	prajQApAramitayA BAvitayA kim te DyAna pAramitayA BAvitayA kim te
   vīryapāramitayā bhāvitayā kiṃ te kṣāntipāramitayā bhāvitayā kiṃ te	vIrya pAramitayA BAvitayA kim te kzAnti pAramitayA BAvitayA kim te
   śīlapāramitayā bhāvitayā kiṃ te dānapāramitayā bhāvitayā idaṃ subhūte	SIla pAramitayA BAvitayA kim te dAna pAramitayA BAvitayA idam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte	boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram veditavyam punar aparam suBUte
   māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇa śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktāni sūtrāṇi geyaṃ	mAraH pApIyAn budDa vezeNa SrAvaka BUmi pratisaMyuktAni sUtrANi geyam
   vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānaṃ nidānam itivṛttakaṃ jātakāni vaipulyam	vyAkaraNam gATA udAnam nidAnam iti vRttakam jAtakAni vEpulyam
   adbhutadharmāvadānopadeśam upadekṣyati prakāśayiṣyati vibhajiṣyati	adButa Darma avadAna upadeSam upadekzyati prakASayizyati viBajizyati
   uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi cākhyātāni	uttAnIkarizyati saMprakASayizyati imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi ca AKyAtAni
   nāvabodhayati idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ	na avaboDayati idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram
   veditavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvam mahāsattvam	veditavyam punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   upasaṃkrāmyaivaṃ vakṣyati na te kulaputra kiṃcid bodhicittaṃ nāpi tvam	upasaMkrAmya evam vakzyati na te kula putra kiMcid boDi cittam na api tvam
   avinivartanīyo nāpi tvaṃ śakṣyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum	avinivartanIyaH na api tvam Sakzyasi anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbodDum
   ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇy ākhyātāni nāvabodhayati idam api subhūte	yaH imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi AKyAtAni na avaboDayati idam api suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte	boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram veditavyam punar aparam suBUte
   māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ	mAraH pApIyAn boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya budDa vezeNa upasaMkramya evam
   vakṣyati cakṣuḥ kulaputra (PSP1: 159) śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca evaṃ	vakzyati cakzuH kula putraH (PSP1: 159) SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca evam
   śrotraṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca	Srotram SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca GrANam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   jihvā śūnyātmanā cātmīyena ca kāyaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca manaḥ śūnyam	jihvA SUnya AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca kAyaH SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca manaH SUnyam
   ātmanā cātmīyena ca rūpaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca śabdaḥ śūnya ātmanā	AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca rUpam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca SabdaH SUnyaH AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca gandhaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca rasaḥ śūnya ātmanā	ca AtmIyena ca ganDaH SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca rasaH SUnyaH AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca spraṣṭavyaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca dharmaḥ śūnya ātmanā	ca AtmIyena ca sprazwavyam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca DarmaH SUnyaH AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca śrotravijñānaṃ	ca AtmIyena ca cakzuH vijQAnam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca Srotra vijQAnam
   śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca	SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca GrANa vijQAnam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   jihvāvijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca kāyavijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā	jihvA vijQAnam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca kAya vijQAnam SUnyam AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca manovijñānaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ	ca AtmIyena ca manaH vijQAnam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca cakzuH saMsparSaH
   śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca	SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca Srotra saMsparSaH SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā	GrANa saMsparSaH SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca jihvA saMsparSaH SUnyaH AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca kāyasaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ	ca AtmIyena ca kAya saMsparSaH SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca manaH saMsparSaH
   śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā	SUnyaH AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca	ca AtmIyena ca Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca dānapāramitā	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam SUnyam AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca dAna pAramitA
   śūnyātmanā cātmīyena ca śīlapāramitā śūnyātmanā cātmīyena ca	SUnya AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca SIla pAramitA SUnya AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca
   kṣāntipāramitā śūnyātmanā cātmīyena ca vīryapāramitā śūnyātmanā cātmīyena	kzAnti pAramitA SUnya AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca vIrya pAramitA SUnya AtmanA ca AtmIyena
   ca dhyānapāramitā śūnyātmanā cātmīyena ca prajñāpāramitā śūnyātmanā	ca DyAna pAramitA SUnya AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca prajQApAramitA SUnya AtmanA
   cātmīyena ca smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyāni ātmanā cātmīyena ca evaṃ	ca AtmIyena ca smRti upasTAnAni SUnyAni AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca evam
   samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā yāvad	samyak prahANAni RdDi pAdAH indriyANi balAni boDi aFgAni mArgAH yAvat 
   āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ śūnyā ātmanā cātmīyena ca kiṃ kariṣyaty anuttarāṃ	AveNikAH budDa DarmAH SUnyA AtmanA ca AtmIyena ca kim karizyati anuttarAm
   samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nācaṣṭe	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDya yaH imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi na Acazwe
   nopadiśati idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam	na upadiSati idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram veditavyam
   punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   pratyekabuddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati śūnyatā kulaputra pūrvadig	pratyekabudDa vezeNa upasaMkramya evam vakzyati SUnyatA kula putra pUrva diS 
   buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na	budDEH BagavadBiH boDisattvEH SrAvakEH ca na atra budDaH na boDiH na
   bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ evaṃ samantād daśadiśaḥ śūnyā buddhair	boDisattvaH na SrAvakaH evam samantAt daSa diSaH SUnyA budDEH 
   bhagavadbhiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca nātra buddho na bodhir na	BagavadBiH boDisattvEH SrAvakEH ca na atra budDaH na boDiH na
   bodhisattvo na śrāvakaḥ ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyati imāni	boDisattvaH na SrAvakaH yaH imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi na upadekzyati imAni
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitrāṇi veditavyāni punar aparaṃ	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitrANi veditavyAni punar aparam
   subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	suBUte mAraH pApIyAn SramaNa vezeNa upasaMkramya boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktebhyo manasikārebhyo vivecya	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyukteByaH manasikAreByaH vivecya
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārair anuśāsiṣyati	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH anuSAsizyati
   avavadiṣyati ya idam evaṃrūpaṃ mārakarma nopadekṣyati idaṃ subhūte	avavadizyati yaH idam evaMrUpam mAra karma na upadekzyati idam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte	boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram veditavyam punar aparam suBUte
   māraḥ pāpīyān upādhyāyācāryaveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ	mAraH pApIyAn upADyAya AcArya vezeNa upasaMkramya boDisattvam mahAsattvam
   bodhisattvacaryāyā vivecayiṣyati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktebhyo	boDisattva caryAyAH vivecayizyati sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyukteByaH 
   manasikārebhyo vivecayiṣyati smṛtyupasthāneṣu niyojayiṣyati	manasikAreByaH vivecayizyati smRti upasTAnezu niyojayizyati
   samyakprahāṇeṣu ṛddhipādeṣu indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣu mārgeṣu	samyak prahANezu RdDi pAdezu indriyezu balezu boDi aFgezu mArgezu
   niyojayiṣyati śūnyatāyām animitte apraṇihite niyojayiṣyati imāny evaṃrūpān	niyojayizyati SUnyatAyAm animitte apraNihite niyojayizyati imAni evaMrUpAn
   dharmān sākṣatkṛtya śrāvakabhūmiṃ sākṣātkuruṣva, kiṃ te kariṣyaty	DarmAn sAkzatkRtya SrAvaka BUmim sAkzAt kuruzva, kim te karizyati 
   anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyabhisaṃbuddhayā ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi	anuttarayA samyaksaMboDi aBisaMbudDayA ye imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi
   nācaṣṭe nopadiśati idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ	na Acazwe na upadiSati idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram
   veditavyam (PSP1: 160) punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān	veditavyam (PSP1: 160) punar aparam suBUte mAraH pApIyAn
   mātāpitṛveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evaṃ vakṣyati ehi tvaṃ	mAtA pitR vezeNa upasaMkramya boDisattvam mahAsattvam evam vakzyati ehi tvam
   kulaputra srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai yogam āpadyasva	kula putra srotaApatti Pala sAkzAt kriyAyE yogam Apadi asva
   sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai yogam āpadyasva, anāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai	sakRdAgAmi Pala sAkzAt kriyAyE yogam Apadya sva, anAgAmi Pala sAkzAt kriyAyE
   yogam āpadyasva arhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai yogam āpadyasva kiṃ te	yogam Apadyasva arhat tva Pala sAkzAt kriyAyE yogam Apadyasva kim te
   'nuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyābhisaṃbuddhayā yasyāḥ kṛtaśo 'saṃkhyeyān	anuttarayA samyaksaMboDya aBisaMbudDayA yasyAH kRtaSas asaMKyeyAn
   aprameyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsarato hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāś	aprameyAn kalpAn saMsAre saMsarataH hasta= CedAH pAda= Ceda AH 
   cānubhavitavyāḥ ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyati nākhyāsyati	ca anuBavitavyAH ye imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi na upadekzyati na AKyAsyati
   idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ veditavyam punar aparaṃ	idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram veditavyam punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvasya mAraH pApIyAn Bikzu vezeNa upasaMkramya
   rūpam anityam iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena rūpaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ	rUpam anityam iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena rUpam duHKam anAtmakam
   śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati	SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati
   upalambhayogena vedanānityeti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena vedanā	upalamBa yogena vedanA anityA iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena vedanA
   duḥkhānātmakā śāntā viviktā śūnyānimittāpraṇihiteti deśayiśyati	duHKa anAtmakA SAntA viviktA SUnya animitta apraNihitA iti deSayiSyati
   upalambhayogena saṃjñānityeti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena saṃjñā	upalamBa yogena saMjQA anityA iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena saMjQA
   duḥkhānātmakā śāntā viviktā śūnyānimittāpraṇihiteti deśayiśyati	duHKa anAtmakA SAntA viviktA SUnya animitta apraNihitA iti deSayiSyati
   upalambhayogena saṃskārā anityā iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena saṃskārā	upalamBa yogena saMskArAH anityAH iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena saMskArA
   duḥkhā anātmakāḥ śāntā viviktāḥ śūnyā animittā apraṇihitā iti deśayiśyati	duHKAH anAtmakAH SAntAH viviktAH SUnyAH animittAH apraNihitAH iti deSayiSyati
   upalambhayogena vijñānam anityam iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena vijñānaṃ	upalamBa yogena vijQAnam anityam iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena vijQAnam
   duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti	duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti
   deśayiśyati upalambhayogena cakṣur anityam iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena	deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena cakzuH anityam iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena
   cakṣur duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti	cakzuH duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti
   deśayiśyati upalambhayogena śrotram anityam iti deśayiṣyāti	deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena Srotram anityam iti deSayizyAti
   upalambhayogena śrotraṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam	upalamBa yogena Srotram duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam
   apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena ghrāṇam anityam iti	apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena GrANam anityam iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena ghrāṇaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena GrANam duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam
   śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena jihvānityeti	SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena jihvA anityeti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena jihvā duḥkhānātmakā śāntā viviktā	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena jihvA duHKa anAtmakA SAntA viviktA
   śūnyānimittāpraṇihiteti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena kāyo 'nitya iti	SUnya animitta apraNihitA iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena kAyaH anityaH iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena kāyo duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ śānta viviktaḥ śūnyo	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena kAyaH duHKaH anAtmakaH SAnta viviktaH SUnyaH 
   'nimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena mano anityam iti	animittaH apraNihitaH iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena manaH anityam iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena mano duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena manaH duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam
   animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena rūpam anityam iti	animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena rUpam anityam iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena rūpaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena rUpam duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam
   animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena śabdo 'nitya iti	animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena SabdaH anityaH iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena śabdo duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ śānta viviktaḥ śūnyo	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena SabdaH duHKaH anAtmakaH SAnta viviktaH SUnyaH 
   'nimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena gandho 'nitya iti	animittaH apraNihitaH iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena ganDaH anityaH iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena gandho duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ śānta viviktaḥ śūnyo	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena ganDaH duHKaH anAtmakaH SAnta viviktaH SUnyaH 
   'nimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena raso 'nitya iti	animittaH apraNihitaH iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena rasaH anityaH iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena raso duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ śānta viviktaḥ śūnyo	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena rasaH duHKaH anAtmakaH SAnta viviktaH SUnyaH 
   'nimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena spraṣṭavyam anityam	animittaH apraNihitaH iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena sprazwavyam anityam
   iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena spraṣṭavyaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ	iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena sprazwavyam duHKam anAtmakam SAntam
   viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena	viviktam SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena
   dharmo 'nitya iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena dharmo duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ	DarmaH anityaH iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena DarmaH duHKaH anAtmakaH
   śānta viviktaḥ śūnyo 'nimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena	SAnta viviktaH SUnyaH animittaH apraNihitaH iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena
   cakṣurvijñānam anityam iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena cakṣurvijñānaṃ	cakzuH vijQAnam anityam iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena cakzuH vijQAnam
   duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti	duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti
   deśayiśyati upalambhayogena śrotravijñānam anityam iti deśayiṣyāti	deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena Srotra vijQAnam anityam iti deSayizyAti
   upalambhayogena śrotravijñānaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam	upalamBa yogena Srotra vijQAnam duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam
   animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena ghrāṇavijñānam	animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena GrANa vijQAnam
   anityam iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena ghrāṇavijñānaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ	anityam iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena GrANa vijQAnam duHKam anAtmakam
   śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati	SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati
   upalambhayogena jihvāvijñānam anityam iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena	upalamBa yogena jihvA vijQAnam anityam iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena
   jihvāvijñānaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam	jihvA vijQAnam duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam
   apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena kāyavijñānam anityam iti	apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena kAya vijQAnam anityam iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena kāyavijñānaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ śāntaṃ viviktaṃ	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena kAya vijQAnam duHKam anAtmakam SAntam viviktam
   śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena manovijñānam	SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena manaH vijQAnam
   anityam iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena manovijñānaṃ duḥkham anātmakaṃ	anityam iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena manaH vijQAnam duHKam anAtmakam
   śāntaṃ viviktaṃ śūnyam animittam apraṇihitam iti deśayiśyati	SAntam viviktam SUnyam animittam apraNihitam iti deSayiSyati
   upalambhayogena evaṃ yāvat smṛtyupasthānāny anityāni iti deśayiṣyāti	upalamBa yogena evam yAvat smRti upasTAnAni anityAni iti deSayizyAti
   upalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni duḥkhāny anātmakāni śāntāni viviktāni	upalamBa yogena smRti upasTAnAni duHKAni anAtmakAni SAntAni viviktAni
   śūnyāny animittāny apraṇihitāny iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena evaṃ	SUnyAni animittAni apraNihitAni iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena evam
   samyakprahāṇāny anityāny iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni	samyak prahANAni anityAni iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena smRti upasTAnAni
   duḥkhāny anātmakāni śāntāni viviktāni śūnyāny animittāny apraṇihitāny iti	duHKAni anAtmakAni SAntAni viviktAni SUnyAni animittAni apraNihitAni iti
   deśayiśyati upalambhayogena ṛddhipādā anityā iti deśayiṣyāti	deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena RdDi pAdAH anityAH iti deSayizyAti
   upalambhayogena saṃskārā duḥkhā anātmakāḥ śāntā viviktāḥ śūnyā animittā	upalamBa yogena saMskArAH duHKAH anAtmakAH SAntAH viviktAH SUnyA animittA
   apraṇihitā iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena indriyāṇy anityāny iti	apraNihitAH iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena indriyANi anityAni iti
   deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni duḥkhāny anātmakāni śāntāni	deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena smRti upasTAnAni duHKAni anAtmakAni SAntAni
   viviktāni śūnyāny animittāny apraṇihitāny iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena	viviktAni SUnyAni animittAni apraNihitAni iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena
   balāny anityāny iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni duḥkhāny	balAni anityAni iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena smRti upasTAnAni duHKAni 
   anātmakāni śāntāni viviktāni śūnyāny animittāny apraṇihitāny iti	anAtmakAni SAntAni viviktAni SUnyAni animittAni apraNihitAni iti
   deśayiśyati upalambhayogena bodhyaṅgāny anityāny iti deśayiṣyāti	deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena boDi aFgAni anityAni iti deSayizyAti
   upalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni duḥkhāny anātmakāni śāntāni viviktāni	upalamBa yogena smRti upasTAnAni duHKAni anAtmakAni SAntAni viviktAni
   śūnyāny animittāny apraṇihitāny iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena mārgo	SUnyAni animittAni apraNihitAni iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena mArgaH 
   'nityo 'nitya iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena mārgo duḥkho 'nātmakaḥ śānta	anityaH anityaH iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena mArgaH duHKaH anAtmakaH SAnta
   viviktaḥ śūnyo 'nimitto 'praṇihita iti deśayiśyati upalambhayogena yāvad	viviktaH SUnyaH animittaH apraNihitaH iti deSayiSyati upalamBa yogena yAvat 
   buddhadharmā api anityā iti deśayiṣyāti upalambhayogena saṃskārā duḥkhā	budDa DarmAH api anityAH iti deSayizyAti upalamBa yogena saMskArA duHKA
   anātmakāḥ śāntā viviktāḥ śūnyā animittā apraṇihitā iti deśayiśyati	anAtmakAH SAntAH viviktAH SUnyAH animittAH apraNihitAH iti deSayiSyati
   upalambhayogena ya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi nopadekṣyati nākhyāsyati	upalamBa yogena yaH imAni evaMrUpANi mAra karmANi na upadekzyati na AKyAsyati
   idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattsya pāpamitraṃ veditavyaṃ viditvā	idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattsya pApa mitram veditavyam viditvA
   ca parivarjayitavyam iti kalyāṇamitradvitīyasaṃparigrahaḥ ity uktaṃ	ca parivarjayitavyam iti kalyANa mitra dvitIya saMparigrahaH iti uktam
   nirvedhāṅgaṃ caturvidham subhūtir āha bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti	nirveDa aFgam caturviDam suBUtiH Aha boDisattvaH boDisattvaH iti
   bhagavann ucyate bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārthaḥ bhagavān āha	Bagavan ucyate boDisattvaH iti Bagavan kaH padArTaH BagavAn Aha
   apadārthaḥ subhūte bodhisattvapadārthaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte	apadArTaH suBUte boDisattva padArTaH tat kasya hetoH na hi suBUte
   bodhir utpādāstitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vopalabhyate tasmād apadārthaḥ	boDiH utpAda astitAH vA na astitA vA vidyate vA upalaByate tasmAt apadArTaH
   subhūte bodhisattvapadārthaḥ iti gotrasvarūpam tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	suBUte boDisattva padArTaH iti gotra svarUpam tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśe śakuneḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte	AkASe SakuneH padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate svapnasya padaṃ na vidyate	boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate svapnasya padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate
   māyāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho	mAyAyAH padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattva padArTaH 
   na vidyate nopalabhyate marīcyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva	na vidyate na upalaByate marIcyAH padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva
   subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate pratiśrutkāyāḥ padaṃ	suBUte boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate pratiSrutkAyAH padam
   na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate	na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate
   nopalabhyate pratibhāsasya padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte	na upalaByate pratiBAsasya padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate pratibimbasya padaṃ na vidyate	boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate pratibimbasya padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate
   gandharvanagarasya padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte	ganDarvanagarasya padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate nirmitasya padaṃ na vidyate	boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate nirmitasya padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate
   (PSP1: 161) ity uṣmagatādhāraḥ tad yathāpi nāma subhūte bhūtakoṭyāḥ padaṃ	(PSP1: 161) iti uzma gata ADAraH tat yaTA api nAma suBUte BUtakowyAH padam
   na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva bodhisattvasya padārtho na vidyate	na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva boDisattvasya padArTaH na vidyate
   nopalabhyate tad yathāpi nāma subhūte tathatāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate	na upalaByate tat yaTA api nAma suBUte taTatAyAH padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva bodhisattvasya padārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate evam	na upalaByate evam eva boDisattvasya padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate evam
   avitathatāyā ananyatathatāyā dharmatāyā dharmadhātor dharmasthititāyā	avitaTa tAyAH ananya taTatAyAH Darma tAyAH DarmaDAtoH Darma sTiti tAyAH 
   dharmaniyāmatāyāḥ satyatāyāḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva	Darma niyAma tAyAH satyatAyAH padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva
   bodhisattvasya padārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate iti mūrdhagatādhāraḥ tad	boDisattvasya padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate iti mUrDa gata ADAraH tat 
   yathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣasya rūpasya padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate	yaTA api nAma suBUte mAyA puruzasya rUpasya padam na vidyate na upalaByate
   evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato	evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH 
   bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ	boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
   tad yathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣasya vijñānasya padaṃ na vidyate	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte mAyA puruzasya vijQAnasya padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate tad	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate tat 
   yathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣasya cakṣuṣaḥ padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate	yaTA api nAma suBUte mAyA puruzasya cakzuzaH padam na vidyate na upalaByate
   evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato	evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH 
   bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā	boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate evam Srotram GrANam jihvA
   kāyaḥ tad yathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣasya manasaḥ padaṃ na vidyate	kAyaH tat yaTA api nAma suBUte mAyA puruzasya manasaH padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya

   saṃjñāyā atyantaviviktatvān nimittapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva	saMjQAyAH atyanta vivikta tvAt nimitta padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH 
   bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate saṃskārāṇām atyantaviviktatvān	boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate saMskArANAm atyanta vivikta tvAt 
   nimittapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya	nimitta padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate
   nopalabhyate vijñānasyātyantaviviktatvān nimittapadaṃ na vidyate	na upalaByate vijQAnasya atyanta vivikta tvAt nimitta padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate
   (PSP1: 163) tad yathāpi nāma subhūte vyastasamastānāṃ	(PSP1: 163) tat yaTA api nAma suBUte vyasta samastAnAm
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānām atyantaviviktatvān nimittapadaṃ na	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdAnAm atyanta vivikta tvAt nimitta padam na
   vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate tad	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate tat 
   yathāpi nāma subhūte smṛtyupasthānānām atyantaviśuddhatvān nimittapadaṃ na	yaTA api nAma suBUte smRti upasTAnAnAm atyanta viSudDa tvAt nimitta padam na

   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate evaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate evam
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga bala vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNika budDa DarmANAm
   atyantaviśuddhatvān nimittapadaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte	atyanta viSudDa tvAt nimitta padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattva padArTaH 
   na vidyate nopalabhyate tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	na vidyate na upalaByate tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakānāṃ	Atma sattva jIva poza puruza pudgalam anujamAnavakAraka vedaka jAnaka paSyakAnAm
   viśuddhau padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate	viSudDO padam na vidyate na upalaByate
   ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāsattvām	Atma sattva jIva poza puruza pudgalam anujamAnavakAraka vedaka jAnaka paSyakA sattvAm
   upādāya evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	upAdAya evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate iti bhāvanāmārgādhāraḥ	carataH boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate iti BAvanA mArga ADAraH

   sarvasaṃskāre padaṃ na vidyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte	sarva saMskAre padam na vidyate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte

   na vidyate nopalabhyate iti vipakṣaprahāṇādhāraḥ tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	na vidyate na upalaByate iti vipakza prahANa ADAraH tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śīle dauḥśīlyapadaṃ na vidyate	taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya SIle dOHSIlya padam na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvapadārtho na vidyate nopalabhyate tad	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattva padArTaH na vidyate na upalaByate tat 
   yathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samādhau	yaTA api nAma suBUte taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya samADO

   nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	na upalaByate evam eva suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya

   prajñākaruṇādhāraḥ (PSP1: 164) tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	prajQA karuNA DAraH (PSP1: 164) tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhagrahanakṣatramaṇiratnajyotiṣāṃ prabhāyāḥ padaṃ na	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa graha nakzatra maNi ratna jyotizAm praBAyAH padam na

   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yayā bodhyā bodhisattvapadārthaḥ yaś ca	kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yayA boDyA boDisattva padArTaH yaH ca
   bodhisattvapadārthaḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpino	boDisattva padArTaH sarve ete DarmAH na saMyuktAH na visaMyuktAH arUpinaH 
   'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte	anidarSanAH apratiGAH eka lakzaNAH yat uta alakzaNAH sarva DarmANAm hi suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asaktatāyām asadbhūtatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam	boDisattvena mahAsattvena asakta tAyAm asat BUta tAyAm Sikzitavyam

   pratipattyādhāraḥ subhūtir āha katame bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ kathaṃ	pratipatti ADAraH suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan sarva DarmAH kaTam
   bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇām asadbhūtatāyāṃ	Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena sarva DarmANAm asat BUta tAyAm

   vyākṛtāś cāvyākṛtāś ca laukikāś ca lokottarāś ca sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca	vyAkRtAH ca avyAkRtAH ca lOkikAH ca lokottarAH ca sa AsravAH ca anAsravAH ca
   saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca sādhāraṇāś cāsādhāraṇāś ca ima ucyante subhūte	saMskRtAH ca asaMskRtAH ca sADAraNAH ca asADAraNAH ca ime ucyante suBUte

   ptreyatā śrāmaṇyatā brahmaṇyatā kule jyeṣṭhāpacāyitā dānamayaṃ	ptreya tA SrAmaNyatA brahmaNya tA kule jyezWa apacAyitA dAna mayam
   puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu	puNya kriyA vastu SIla mayam puNya kriyA vastu BAvanA mayam puNya kriyA vastu
   vaiyāvṛtyasahagatam upāyakauśalam daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ laukikā	vEyAvRtya saha gatam upAya kOSalam daSa kuSalAH karma paTAH lOkikA
   navasaṃjñā ādhmātakasaṃjñā vipaṭumakasaṃjñā vipūyakasaṃjñā	nava saMjQA ADmAtaka saMjQA vipawumaka saMjQA vipUyaka saMjQA

   catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ laukikyaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ	catvAri apramANAni catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH lOkikyaH paQca aBijQAH
   laukikyo daśānusmṛtayaḥ yad uta buddhānusmṛtiḥ dharmānusmṛtiḥ	lOkikyaH daSa anusmRtayaH yat uta budDa anusmRtiH Darma anusmRtiH
   saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtiḥ tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir ānāpānānusmṛtir	saMGa anusmRtiH SIla anusmRtiH tyAga anusmRtiH devatA anusmRtiH AnA pAna anusmRtiH 
   maraṇānusmṛtir udvegānusmṛtiḥ kāyagatānusmṛtiḥ ima ucyante kuśalā laukikā	maraNa anusmRtiH udvega anusmRtiH kAya gata anusmRtiH ime ucyante kuSalA lOkikA
   dharmāḥ subhūtir āha katame bhagavan laukikā akuśalā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha	DarmAH suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan lOkikAH akuSalAH DarmAH BagavAn Aha
   prāṇātipāto 'dattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāro mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ	prANa atipAtaH adatta AdAnam kAma miTyA AcAraH mRzAvAdaH pESunyam pAruzyam
   sambhinnapralāpo 'bhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādarśanaṃ daśa akuśalakarmapathāḥ	samBinna pralApaH aBiDyAH vyApAdaH miTyA darSanam daSa akuSala karma paTAH
   krodhopanāhau mrakṣaḥ pradāśo vihiṃsā īrṣyā mātsaryaṃ māno mithyāmānaḥ ima	kroDa upanAhO mrakzaH pradASaH vihiMsA IrzyA mAtsaryam mAnaH miTyAmAnaH ima
   ucyante laukikā akuśalā dharmāḥ (PSP1: 166) subhūtir āha katame bhagavan	ucyante lOkikAH akuSalAH DarmAH (PSP1: 166) suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan
   avyākṛtā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha avyākṛtaṃ kāyakarma avyākṛtaṃ vākkarma	avyAkRtAH DarmAH BagavAn Aha avyAkRtam kAya karma avyAkRtam vAkkarma
   avyākṛtaṃ manaḥkarma avyākṛtāni catvāri mahābhūāni avyākṛtāni	avyAkRtam manaH karma avyAkRtAni catvAri mahABUAni avyAkRtAni
   pañcendriyāni avyākṛtāni ṣaḍāyatanāni avyākṛtāny arūpyāṇi	paQca indriyAni avyAkRtAni zaz AyatanAni avyAkRtAni arUpyANi
   skandhadhātvāyatanāni avyākṛtāḥ viākāḥ sarva ima ucyante avyākṛtā dharmāḥ	skanDa DAtu AyatanAni avyAkRtAH viAkAH sarve ime ucyante avyAkRtAH DarmAH
   subhūtir āha katame bhagavan laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha pañca	suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan lOkikAH kuSalAH DarmAH BagavAn Aha paQca
   skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri	skanDAH dvAdaSa AyatanAni azwAdaSa DAtavaH daSa kuSalAH karma paTAH catvAri
   dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ ye	DyAnAni catvAri apramANAni catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH paQca aBijQAH ye
   cānye laukikā dharmāḥ ima ucyante laukikāḥ kuśaladharmāḥ subhūtir āha	ca anye lOkikAH DarmAH ime ucyante lOkikAH kuSala DarmAH suBUtiH Aha
   katame bhagavan lokottarāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha catvāri	katame Bagavan loka uttarAH kuSalAH DarmAH BagavAn Aha catvAri
   smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi	smRti upasTAnAni catvAri samyak prahANAni catvAraH RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi
   pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭhāṅgo mārgaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukham	paQca balAni sapta boDi aFgAni AryAzWa aFgaH mArgaH SUnyatA vimokza muKam
   animittavimokṣamukham apraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ anājñātam ājñāsyāmīndriyam	animitta vimokza muKam apraNihita vimokza muKam anAjQAtam AjQAsyAmi indriyam
   ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ avitarko	AjQa indriyam AjQAta avi indriyam savitarkaH sa vicAraH samADiH avitarkaH 
   'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ vidyā vimuktiḥ smṛtiḥ samprajanyaṃ yoniśo manaskāraḥ	avicAraH samADiH vidyA vimuktiH smRtiH samprajanyam yoniSas manaskAraH
   aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ katame aṣṭau rūpī rūpāṇi paśyati ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ	azwO vimokzAH katame azwO rUpI rUpANi paSyati ayam praTamaH vimokzaH
   adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyati ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ	aDyAtmam arUpa saMjQI bahirDA rUpANi paSyati ayam dvitIyaH vimokzaH
   śūnyatāyām adhimukto bhavati ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ	SUnyatAyAm aDimuktaH Bavati ayam tRtIyaH vimokzaH sarvaSas rUpa saMjQAnAm
   samatikramātu pratighasaṃjñānām astaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād	samatikramAtu pratiGa saMjQAnAm astaFgamAt nAnAtva saMjQAnAm amanasikArAt 
   anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati ayaṃ caturtho	anantam AkASam iti AkASAnantya Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati ayam caturTaH 
   vimokṣaḥ sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti	vimokzaH sarvaSas AkASa AnantyAyatana samatikramAt anantam vijQAnam iti
   vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati ayaṃ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ sarvaśo	vijQAna Ananti Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati ayam paQcamaH vimokzaH sarvaSas 
   vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramāt nāsti kiñcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam	vijQAna AnantyAyatana samatikramAt na asti kiQcid iti AkiQcani Ayatanam
   upasaṃpadya viharati ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimoṣaḥ sarvaśa	upasaMpadya viharati ayam zazWaH vimozaH sarvaSa
   ākiñcanyāyatanasamatikramāt naiva (PSP1: 167) saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam	AkiQca nyAyatana samatikramAt na eva (PSP1: 167) saMjQAna asaMjQA Ayatanam
   upasaṃpadya viharati ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ sarvaśo naiva	upasaMpadya viharati ayam saptamaH vimokzaH sarvaSas na eva
   saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya	saMjQAna asaMjQAyatana samatikramAt saMjQA vedayita niroDam upasaMpadya
   viharati ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ ima aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ	viharati ayam azwamaH vimokzaH ime azwO vimokzAH
   navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ catvāri dhyānāni viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ	nava anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH catvAri DyAnAni viviktam kAmEH viviktam
   pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ	pApakEH akuSalEH DarmEH sa vitarkam sa vicAram viveka jam prIti suKam
   prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād	praTamam DyAnam upasaMpadya viharati vitarka vicArANAm vyupaSamAt 
   adhyātmaṃ samprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ	aDyAtmam samprasAdAt cetasaH ekotIBAvAt avitarkam avicAram samADi jam
   prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati prīter virāgād upekṣakaś	prIti suKam dvitIyam DyAnam upasaMpadya viharati prIteH virAgAt upekzakaH 
   ca viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhañ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yat tad	ca viharati smRtimAn saMprajAnan suKan ca kAyena pratisaMvedayati yat tat 
   āryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimāṃś ca sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam	AryAH Acakzate upekzakaH smRtimAn ca suKa vihArI iti tRtIyam DyAnam
   upasaṃpadya viharati sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva	upasaMpadya viharati suKasya ca prahANAt duHKasya ca prahANAt pUrvam eva
   saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ	sOmanasya dOrmanasyayoH astaFgamAt aduHKa asuKam upekzA smRti pariSudDam
   caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ	caturTam DyAnam upasaMpadya viharati sa sarvaSas rUpa saMjQAnAm
   samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād	samatikramAt pratiGa saMjQAnAm astaFgamAt nAnAtva saMjQAnAm amanasikArAt 
   anantam ākāśam iti ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati sa sarvaśa	anantam AkASam iti AkASAnantya Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati sa sarvaSa
   ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam	AkASa AnantyAyatana samatikramAt anantam vijQAnam iti vijQAna Ananti Ayatanam
   upasaṃpadya viharati sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti	upasaMpadya viharati sa sarvaSas vijQAna AnantyAyatana samatikramAt na asti
   kiñcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati sa sarvaśa	kiQcid iti AkiQcani Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati sa sarvaSa
   ākiñcanyāyatanasamatikramān naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya	AkiQca nyAyatana samatikramAt na eva saMjQAna asaMjQA Ayatanam upasaMpadya
