   saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharati etā	saMjQA vedayita niroDam upasaMpadya viharati etA
   navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā	nava anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā daśabalāni catvāri	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA daSa balAni catvAri
   vaiśāradyāni (PSP1: 168) catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ aṣṭādaśāveṇikā	vESAradyAni (PSP1: 168) catasraH pratisaMvidaH azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmāḥ ima ucyante lokottarāḥ kuśaladharmāḥ subhūtir āha katame	budDa DarmAH ime ucyante loka uttarAH kuSala DarmAH suBUtiH Aha katame
   bhagavan sāsravā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha pañcaskandhā dvādaśāyatanāni	Bagavan sa AsravAH DarmAH BagavAn Aha paQca skanDAH dvAdaSa AyatanAni
   aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra	azwAdaSa DAtavaH catvAri DyAnAni catvAri apramANAni catasra
   ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ima ucyante sāsravā dharmāḥ subhūtir āha katame	ArUpya samApattayaH ime ucyante sa AsravAH DarmAH suBUtiH Aha katame
   bhagavan anāsravā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri	Bagavan anAsravAH DarmAH BagavAn Aha catvAri smRti upasTAnAni catvAri
   samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni sapta	samyak prahANAni catvAraH RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi paQca balAni sapta
   bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ daśaḥtathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni	boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFga mArgaH daSaH taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni
   catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ ima ucyante	catasraH pratisaMvidaH yAvat azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH ime ucyante
   anāsravā dharmāḥ subhūtir āha katame bhagavan saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ bhagavān	anAsravAH DarmAH suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan saMskRtAH DarmAH BagavAn
   āha kāmadhātū rūpadhātur ārūpyadhātur ye 'py anye kecit	Aha kAmaDAtuH rUpa DAtuH ArUpya DAtuH ye api anye kecid 
   traidhātukaparyāpannā dharmāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣādayo dharmāḥ ima	trEDAtuka paryApannAH DarmAH saptatriMSat boDi pakza AdayaH DarmAH ima
   ucyante saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ subhūtir āha katame bhagavann asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ	ucyante saMskRtAH DarmAH suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan asaMskRtAH DarmAH
   bhagavān āha yeṣāṃ dharmāṇān notpādo na nirodho nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate	BagavAn Aha yezAm DarmANAn na utpAdaH na niroDaH na anyaTAtvam prajQAyate
   rāgakṣayo doṣakṣayo mohakṣayaś ca tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā	rAga kzayaH doza kzayaH moha kzayaH ca taTatA avitaTa tA ananyataTatA
   dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ ima ucyante	DarmatA DarmaDAtuH Darma sTiti tA Darma niyAma tA BUtakowiH ime ucyante
   asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ subhūtir āha katame bhagavan sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ bhagavān	asaMskRtAH DarmAH suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan sADAraNAH DarmAH BagavAn
   āha catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ	Aha catvAri DyAnAni catvAri apramANAni catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH
   pañcābhijñāḥ ima ucyante sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ subhūtir āha katame bhagavann	paQca aBijQAH ime ucyante sADAraNAH DarmAH suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavat = 
   asādhāraṇā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣadharmā daśa	asADAraNAH DarmAH BagavAn Aha saptatriMSat boDi pakza DarmAH daSa

   vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ ima ucyante asādhāraṇā dharmāḥ	vimokza muKAni azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH ime ucyante asADAraNAH DarmAH
   (PSP1: 169) tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na	(PSP1: 169) tatra boDisattvena mahAsattvena sva lakzaNa SUnyezu Darmezu na
   saktiḥ kāryā advayayogena ca sarvadharmā avaboddhavyāḥ avakalpanatām	saktiH kAryAH advaya yogena ca sarva DarmAH avabodDavyAH avakalpanatAm
   anavakalpanatāṃ copādāya ity uktaṃ pratipattyālambanam subhūtir āha yad	anavakalpanatAm ca upAdAya iti uktam pratipatti Alambanam suBUtiH Aha yat 
   ucyate bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti kena kāraṇena bhagavan	ucyate Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti kena kAraNena Bagavan
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate bhagavān āha iha subhūte mahataḥ	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate BagavAn Aha iha suBUte mahataH
   sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ kārayiṣyati tena kāraṇena	sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tAm kArayizyati tena kAraNena
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate subhūtir āha katamo bhagavan	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate suBUtiH Aha katamaH Bagavan
   mahāsattvarāśir mahāsattvanikāyaḥ yasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gratāṃ	mahAsattva rASiH mahAsattva nikAyaH yasya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH agra tAm
   kārayiṣyati bhagavān āha mahāsattvarāśir mahāsattvanikāya iti subhūte	kArayizyati BagavAn Aha mahAsattva rASiH mahAsattva nikAyaH iti suBUte
   ucyate yad uta gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmiḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī	ucyate yat uta gotra BUmiH azwamaka BUmiH srotaApannaH sakRdAgAmI anAgAmI
   arhat pratyekabuddhaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad avinivartanīya iti	arhat pratyekabudDaH praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat avinivartanIyaH iti
   ayaṃ mahān sattvarāśiḥ mahāsattvanikāyaḥ asya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	ayam mahAn sattva rASiH mahAsattva nikAyaH asya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'gratāṃ kārayiṣyati atra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vajropamaṃ	agra tAm kArayizyati atra suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena vajra upamam
   cittam utpādya mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāḥ	cittam utpAdya mahataH sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tAH

   āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittam utpādayati aparimite	Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam cittam utpAdayati aparimite
   mayā saṃsāre sannāhaṃ sannahya sarvasattvāparityāginā bhavitavyam	mayA saMsAre sanna aham sat nahya sarva sattva aparityAginA Bavitavyam
   sarvasattvānām antike mayā samacittatā utpādayitavyā sarvasattvā mayā	sarva sattvAnAm antike mayA sama citta tA utpAdayitavyA sarva sattvAH mayA
   tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ (PSP1: 170) sarvasattvān api mayā	triBiH yAnEH parinirvApayitavyAH (PSP1: 170) sarva sattvAn api mayA
   parinirvāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ	parinirvApya na kaScid sattvaH parinirvApitaH Bavati tat kasya hetoH
   anutpādo mayā sarvadharmāṇām avaboddhavyaḥ avyavakīrṇena mayā	anutpAdaH mayA sarva DarmANAm avabodDavyaH avyavakIrNena mayA
   sarvākārajñatācittena ṣāṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyam sarvatrānugatāyāṃ	sarva AkAra jQa tA cittena zAwsu pAramitAsu caritavyam sarvatra anugatAyAm
   sarvadharmaprativedhapariniṣpattyāṃ mayā śikṣitavyam ekatayābhinirhāro	sarva Darma prativeDa parinizpattyAm mayA Sikzitavyam ekatayA aBinirhAraH 
   mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiboddhavyaḥ yāvat pāramitābhinirhāraprativedhāya	mayA sarva DarmANAm pratibodDavyaH yAvat pAramitA aBinirhAra prativeDAya
   mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyam saptatriṃśad	mayA sarva DarmANAm Sikzitavyam saptatriMSat 
   bodhipakṣadharmābhinirhāraprativedhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyam	boDi pakza Darma aBinirhAra prativeDAya mayA sarva DarmANAm Sikzitavyam
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyābhijñājñānābhinirhāraprativedhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ	apramANa DyAna ArUpya aBijQA jQAna aBinirhAra prativeDAya mayA sarva DarmANAm
   śikṣitavyam daśabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmābhinirhāraprativedhāya	Sikzitavyam daSa bala vESAradyA veNika budDa Darma aBinirhAra prativeDAya
   mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyam ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	mayA sarva DarmANAm Sikzitavyam ayam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   vajropamaś cittotpādaḥ yatra pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahataḥ	vajra upamaH citta utpAdaH yatra pratizWitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahataH
   sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ kārayiṣyati tac	sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tAm kArayizyati tat 
   cānupalambhayogena punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittam	ca anupalamBa yogena punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam cittam
   utpādayati yāvantaḥ sattvā nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yamalaukikā vā	utpAdayati yAvantaH sattvAH nErayikA vA tEryagyonikA vA yama lOkikA vA
   duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayeyaṃ tatra	duHKAm vedanAm vedayanti tAm duHKAm vedanAm vedayeyam tatra
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam ekaikasyāpy ahaṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam ekEkasya api aham
   sattvasyārthāya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nairayikaṃ vā tairyagyonikaṃ	sattvasya arTAya kalpa kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi nErayikam vA tEryagyonikam
   vā yamalaukikaṃ vā duḥkham anubhaveyaṃ yāvan na te sattvā	vA yama lOkikam vA duHKam anuBaveyam yAvat na te sattvA
   nirūpadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhaveyur iti etenopāyena	nirUpa Di Seza nirvANa DAtO parinirvRtA BaveyuH iti etena upAyena
   sarvasattānāṃ kṛtaśas tan nairayikādikaṃ duḥkham anubhaveyaṃ yāvan na te	sarva sattAnAm kRtaSas tat nErayika Adikam duHKam anuBaveyam yAvat na te
   sattvā nirūpadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhaveyur iti paścād aham	sattvAH nirUpa Di Seza nirvANa DAtO parinirvRtAH BaveyuH iti paScAt aham
   ātmanaḥ kṛtakuśalam avaropya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair anuttarāṃ	AtmanaH kRta kuSalam avaropya kalpa kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH anuttarAm

   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam ekaikasyāpy ahaṃ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam ekEkasya api aham
   sattvasyārthāya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nairayikaṃ vā tairyagyonikaṃ	sattvasya arTAya kalpa kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi nErayikam vA tEryagyonikam
   vā yamalaukikaṃ vā duḥkham anubhaveyaṃ yāvan na te sattvā	vA yama lOkikam vA duHKam anuBaveyam yAvat na te sattvA

   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena udāracittena bhavitavyaṃ yena cittena	boDisattvena mahAsattvena udAra cittena Bavitavyam yena cittena
   sarvasattvānām agratā kārayitavyā tatreyaṃ bodhisattvasya	sarva sattvAnAm agra tA kArayitavyA tatra iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyodāracittatā yat prathamacittotpādam upādāya na rāgacittam	mahAsattvasya udAra citta tA yat praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya na rAga cittam
   utpādayati na doṣacittam utpādayati na mohacittam utpādayati na	utpAdayati na doza cittam utpAdayati na moha cittam utpAdayati na

   mahāsattvasyodāracittatā yayā sarvasattvānām agratāṃ kārayisyati tena ca	mahAsattvasya udAra citta tA yayA sarva sattvAnAm agra tAm kArayisyati tena ca
   cittena na manyate punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	cittena na manyate punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   akampyacittena bhavitavyam tatreyaṃ bodhisattvasya	akampya cittena Bavitavyam tatra iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyākampyacittatā yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktam api	mahAsattvasya akampya citta tA yat sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktam api
   manasikāran na manyate iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	manasikArat na manyate iyam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyākampyacittatā punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	mahAsattvasya akampya citta tA punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   sarvasattvānām antike hitasukhacittena bhavitavyam tatreyaṃ bodhisattvasya	sarva sattvAnAm antike hita suKa cittena Bavitavyam tatra iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya hitasukhacittatā yā sarvasattvānāṃ paritrāṇanā yaḥ	mahAsattvasya hita suKa citta tA yA sarva sattvAnAm paritrANanAH yaH
   sarvasattvānām aparityāgaḥ tena ca na manyate iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	sarva sattvAnAm aparityAgaH tena ca na manyate iyam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya hitasukhacittatā evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	mahAsattvasya hita suKa citta tA evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānām agratāṃ kārayiṣyati punar aparaṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm caran sarva sattvAnAm agra tAm kArayizyati punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmarāgeṇa bhavitavyam dharmas tena	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena DarmarAgeNa Bavitavyam DarmaH tena
   dharmārāgatāyogam anuyuktena bhavitavyam tatra katamo dharmo yad uta	Darma ArAgatA yogam anuyuktena Bavitavyam tatra katamaH DarmaH yat uta
   sarvadharmāṇām asambhedaḥ ayam ucyate dharmaḥ tatra katamo dharmaratir yā	sarva DarmANAm asamBedaH ayam ucyate DarmaH tatra katamaH Darma ratiH yA
   dharme 'bhiratir iyam ucyate dharmaratiḥ tatra katamā dharmārāmatā yā	Darme aBiratiH iyam ucyate Darma ratiH tatra katamA Darma arAma tA yA
   tasya dharmasya bhāvanā bahulīkaraṇatā iyam ucyate dharmārāmatā evaṃ hi	tasya Darmasya BAvanA bahulIkaraNa tA iyam ucyate Darma arAma tA evam hi
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā mahataḥ	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA mahataH
   sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena	sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tA kArayitavyAH anupalamBa yogena
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA
   adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā	aDyAtma SUnyatAyAm sTitvA bahirDA SUnyatAyAm sTitvA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAm sTitvA yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAm sTitvA
   mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā	mahataH sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tA kArayitavyA
   anupalambhayogena punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	anupalamBa yogena punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā baleṣu	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu sTitvA balezu
   vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sthitvā mahataḥ	vESAradyezu pratisaMvitsu azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu sTitvA mahataH
   sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena	sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tA kArayitavyAH anupalamBa yogena
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena (PSP1: 172) mahāsattvena	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena (PSP1: 172) mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā vajropamasamādhau sthitvā yāvad	prajQApAramitAyAm caratA vajra upama samADO sTitvA yAvat 
   ākāśāsaṅgaimuktinirupalepasamādhau sthitvā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ	AkASa asaFgEmukti nirupalepa samADO sTitvA mahataH sattva rASeH mahataH
   sattvanikāyasyāgratāṃ kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena eteṣu subhūte dharmeṣu	sattva nikAyasya agra tAm kArayitavyAH anupalamBa yogena etezu suBUte Darmezu
   sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā mahataḥ	sTitvA boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA mahataH
   sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā tenocyate bodhisattvo	sattva rASeH mahataH sattva nikAyasya agra tA kArayitavyA tena ucyate boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ iti sarvasattvāgratācittamahattvam atha khalv āyuṣmān	mahAsattvaH iti sarva sattva agra tA citta mahat tvam aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena	SAriputraH Bagavantam etat avocat mama api Bagavan pratiBAti yena arTena
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate bhagavān āha pratibhātu te śāriputra	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate BagavAn Aha pratiBAtu te SAriputra
   yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śāriputra āha ātmadṛṣṭer bhagavan	yena arTena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH SAriputraH Aha Atma dRzweH Bagavan
   sattvadṛṣṭer	sattva dRzweH 
   jantujīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakadṛṣṭer	jantu jIva poza puruza pudgalam anujamAnavakAraka vedaka jAnaka paSyaka dRzweH 
   ucchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭeḥ skandhadṛṣṭer	ucCeda dRzweH SASvata dRzweH asti dRzweH nAsti dRzweH skanDa dRzweH 
   dhātudṛṣṭer āyatanadṛṣṭeḥ pratītyasamutpādadṛṣṭer bodhipakṣadharmadṛṣṭer	DAtu dRzweH Ayatana dRzweH pratItyasamutpAda dRzweH boDi pakza Darma dRzweH 
   balavaiśāradyadṛṣṭer āveṇikabuddhadharmadṛṣṭeḥ sattvaparipācanadṛṣṭer	bala vESAradya dRzweH AveNika budDa Darma dRzweH sattva paripAcana dRzweH 
   buddhakṣetrapariśodhanadṛṣṭer bodhisattvadṛṣṭer buddhadṛṣṭer	budDa kzetra pariSoDana dRzweH boDisattva dRzweH budDa dRzweH 
   dharmacakrapravarttanadṛṣṭer iti āsāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ prahāṇāya dharma	Darma cakra pravarttana dRzweH iti AsAm sarvAsAm dRzwInAm prahANAya Darma
   deśayati anupalambhayogena tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate	deSayati anupalamBa yogena tena arTena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate
   subhūtir āha kena kāraṇenāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	suBUtiH Aha kena kAraNena Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   rūpadṛṣṭir bhavati vedanādṛṣṭir bhavati saṃjñādṛṣṭir bhavati	rUpa dRzwiH Bavati vedanA dRzwiH Bavati saMjQA dRzwiH Bavati
   saṃskāradṛṣṭir bhavati vijñānadṛṣṭir bhavati śāriputra āha ihāyuṣman	saMskAra dRzwiH Bavati vijQAna dRzwiH Bavati SAriputraH Aha iha Ayuzman
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran anupāyakuśalo	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn caran anupAya kuSalaH 
   bhavati sa rūpam upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayati upalambhayogena evaṃ	Bavati sa rUpam upalaBya dRzwim utpAdayati upalamBa yogena evam
   vistareṇa vyastasamastaskandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ yāvaj	vistareNa vyasta samasta skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdam yAvat 
   jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsām upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayati	jarA maraNa Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAsAm upalaBya dRzwim utpAdayati
   upalambhayogena evaṃ	upalamBa yogena evam
   smṛtyupasthānaprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitā'bhijñā'kṣarāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr	smRti upasTAna prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga pAramitA aBijQA akzarA pramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattIH 
   upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayati upalambhayogena evaṃ	upalaBya dRzwim utpAdayati upalamBa yogena evam
   daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān upalabhya dṛṣṭim	daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAn upalaBya dRzwim
   utpādayati upalambhayogena iti prahāṇamahattvam atha khalv āyuṣmān	utpAdayati upalamBa yogena iti prahANa mahat tvam aTa Kalu AyuzmAn
   subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena	suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat mama api Bagavan pratiBAti yena arTena
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate bhagavān āha pratibhātu te subhūte	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate BagavAn Aha pratiBAtu te suBUte
   subhūtir āha yad api bhagavan bodhicittam asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ	suBUtiH Aha yat api Bagavan boDi cittam asamasama cittam asADAraNa cittam
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ (PSP1: 173) tatrāpi citte 'saktaḥ tat kasya	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH (PSP1: 173) tatra api citte asaktaH tat kasya
   hetoḥ tathā hi tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ traidhātuke	hetoH taTA hi tat sarvajQa tA cittam anAsravam aparyApannam trEDAtuke
   tatrāpi citte 'saktas tena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati	tatra api citte asaktaH tena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti saMKyAm gacCati
   śāriputra āha katamad āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	SAriputraH Aha katamat Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ subhūtir āha	asama sama cittam asADAraNa cittam sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH suBUtiH Aha
   ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya na	iha Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya na
   kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā samanupaśyati na hāniṃ na	kasyacid Darmasya utpAdam vA niroDam vA samanupaSyati na hAnim na
   vṛddhiṃ nāgatiṃ na gatim na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ yatra cāyuṣman	vRdDim na Agatim na gatim na saMkleSam na vyavadAnam yatra ca Ayuzman
   śāriputra na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na gatir nāgatir na hānir na vṛddhir	SAriputra na saMkleSaH na vyavadAnam na gatiH na AgatiH na hAniH na vRdDiH 
   notpādo na nirodhaḥ tac ca na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam idaṃ	na utpAdaH na niroDaH tat ca na SrAvaka cittam na pratyekabudDa cittam idam
   śāriutra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ	SAriutra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya asamasama cittam asADAraNa cittam
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ śāriputra āha yadāyuṣman subhūtir evam āha	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH SAriputraH Aha yat Ayuzman suBUtiH evam Aha
   tatrāpi śrāvakapratyekabuddhacitte 'sakta iti nanv āyuṣman subhūte rūpam	tatra api SrAvaka pratyekabudDa citte asaktaH iti nanu Ayuzman suBUte rUpam
   apy asaktaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya vedanāpy asaktā saṃjñāpy asaktā	api asaktam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya vedanA api asaktA saMjQA api asaktA
   saṃskārā apy asaktā vijñānam apy asaktam subhūtir āha evam etad āyuṣman	saMskArAH api asaktA vijQAnam api asaktam suBUtiH Aha evam etat Ayuzman
   śāriputra rūpam apy asaktaṃ vedanāpy asaktā saṃjñāpy asaktā saṃskārā apy	SAriputra rUpam api asaktam vedanA api asaktA saMjQA api asaktA saMskArAH api 
   asaktā vijñānam apy asaktaṃ yāvad vyastasamastāḥ	asaktA vijQAnam api asaktam yAvat vyasta samastAH
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam apy asaktam evam	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdAH yAvat jarA maraNam api asaktam evam
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'py asaktāḥ yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH api asaktAH yAvat saptatriMSat boDi pakzA
   dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu āveṇikā	DarmAH balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidaH AveNikezu budDa Darmezu AveNikA
   buddhadharmā apy asaktāḥ śāriputra āha yady apy āyuṣmān subhūtir idam āha	budDa DarmAH api asaktAH SAriputraH Aha yadi api AyuzmAn suBUtiH idam Aha
   yad api tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpanna iti nanv āyuṣman	yat api tat sarvajQa tA cittam anAsravam aparyApannaH iti nanu Ayuzman
   subhūte bālapṛthagjanānām (PSP1: 174) api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ	suBUte bAla pRTagjanAnAm (PSP1: 174) api cittam anAsravam aparyApannam

   evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra śāriutra āha rūpam api subhūte anāsravam	evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra SAriutraH Aha rUpam api suBUte anAsravam
   aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya vedanāpi subhūte anāsravāparyāpannā	aparyApannam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya vedanA api suBUte anAsrava aparyApannA
   prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya saṃjñāpi subhūte anāsravāparyāpannā	prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya saMjQA api suBUte anAsrava aparyApannA
   prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya saṃskārā api subhūte anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ	prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya saMskArAH api suBUte anAsravAH aparyApannAH
   prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya vijñānam apy āyuṣman subhūte anāsravam	prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya vijQAnam api Ayuzman suBUte anAsravam
   aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya nanv āyuṣman subhūte saptatriṃśad	aparyApannam prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya nanu Ayuzman suBUte saptatriMSat 
   bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ	boDi pakzAH DarmAH daSa taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH
   pratisaṃvidaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā	pratisaMvidaH trINi vimokza muKAni azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA anAsravA
   aparyāpannāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya subhūtir āha evam etad āyuṣman	aparyApannAH prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya suBUtiH Aha evam etat Ayuzman
   śāriputra yathā vadasi bālapṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ	SAriputra yaTA vadasi bAla pRTagjanAnAm api cittam anAsravam aparyApannam
   prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām	prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya yAvat sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDa samyaksaMbudDAnAm

   catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā	catasraH pratisaMvidaH trINi vimokza muKAni azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA

   āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha acittatvāt tatrāpi citte asakta iti nanv āyuṣman	AyuzmAn suBUtiH evam Aha acitta tvAt tatra api citte asaktaH iti nanu Ayuzman
   subhūte arūpe 'pi rūpam asaktam avedanāyām api vedanāsaktā asaṃjñāyām api	suBUte arUpe api rUpam asaktam avedanAyAm api vedanA AsaktAH asaMjQAyAm api
   saṃjñāsaktā asaṃskāreṣv api saṃskārā asaktā avijñāne 'pi vijñānam asaktam	saMjQA saktAH asaMskArezu api saMskArAH asaktAH avijQAne api vijQAnam asaktam
   subhūtir āha evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra śāriputra āha nanv āyuṣman	suBUtiH Aha evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra SAriputraH Aha nanu Ayuzman
   subhūte asmṛtyupasthāneṣv api smṛtyupasthānāny asaktāni evam	suBUte asmRti upasTAnezu api smRti upasTAnAni asaktAni evam
   asamyakprahāṇeṣv api asamyakprahāṇāny asaktāny arddhipādeṣv api ṛddhipādā	asamyak prahANezu api asamyak prahANAni asaktAni ardDi pAdezu api RdDipAdA
   asaktā aindriyāṇeṣv api indriyāṇy asaktāniy abalāneṣv api balāny asaktāni	asaktA EndriyANezu api indriyANi asaktAnii abalAnezu api balAni asaktAni

   evaṃ vyastasamastā api skandhadhātava āyatanāni satyāni pratītyasamutpādā	evam vyasta samastAH api skanDa DAtavaH AyatanAni satyAni pratItyasamutpAdA
   'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ pāramitā abhijñā bodhipakṣā dharmā balāni	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH pAramitAH aBijQA boDi pakzAH DarmAH balAni
   vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu āveṇikā buddhadharmā	vESAradyAni pratisaMvidaH AveNikezu budDa Darmezu AveNikA budDa DarmA
   asaktāḥ evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	asaktAH evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tenāpi bodhicittena asamasamacittena (PSP1: 175)	prajQApAramitAyAm caran tena api boDi cittena asamasama cittena (PSP1: 175)
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair asādhāraṇacittena na manyate nābhiniviśate	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH asADAraNa cittena na manyate na aBiniviSate
   sarvadharmān upalambhayogena ity adhigamamahattvam ity uktaḥ	sarva DarmAn upalamBa yogena iti aDigama mahat tvam iti uktaH
   pratipattyuddeśaḥ pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti	pratipatti uddeSaH pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Aha mama api Bagavan pratiBAti
   yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ity ucyate bhagavān āha ratibhātu te	yena arTena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate BagavAn Aha rati BAtu te
   pūrṇa pūrṇa āha mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sa bhagavan sattvo	pUrNa pUrNaH Aha mahA sannAhasannadDaH sa Bagavan sattvaH 
   mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa sattvo mahāyānasamāruḍhaḥ sa sattvas tena	mahAyAna saMprasTitaH sa sattvaH mahAyAna samAruXaH sa sattvaH tena
   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate śāriputra āha kiyatā āyuṣman	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate SAriputraH Aha kiyatA Ayuzman
   pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate pūrṇa āha	pUrNa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate pUrNaH Aha
   ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ	iha Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH na prAdeSikAnAm sattvAnAm
   kṛtena bodhāya caran dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti api tu	kRtena boDAya caran dAna pAramitAyAm sTitvA dAnam dadAti api tu
   sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti evaṃ	sarva sattvAnAm kRtena dAna pAramitAyAm sTitvA dAnam dadAti evam
   śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na	SIla pAramitAyAm kzAnti pAramitAyAm vIrya pAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm na
   prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā	prAdeSikAnAm sattvAnAm kRtena boDAya caran prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāṃ	prajQApAramitAm BAvayati api tu sarva sattvAnAm kRtena prajQApAramitAm
   bhāvayati na sattvaparicchedena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaḥ	BAvayati na sattva paricCedena boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsanna ahaH
   sannahyate iyataḥ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi iyataḥ sattvān na	sat nahyate iyataH sattvAn parinirvApayizyAmi iyataH sattvAt na
   parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti iyataḥ sattvān bodhāya pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iyataḥ	parinirvApayizyAmi iti iyataH sattvAn boDAya pratizWApayizyAmi iyataH
   sattvān bodhāya na pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ	sattvAn boDAya na pratizWApayizyAmi iti api tu Kalu punar sarva sattvAnAm
   kṛtena sannāhaḥ sannahyate evaṃ cāsya bhavati ātmanā ca dānapāramitāṃ	kRtena sannAhaH sat nahyate evam ca asya Bavati AtmanA ca dAna pAramitAm
   paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ (PSP1: 176)	paripUrayizyAmi sarva sattvAn ca dAna pAramitAyAm (PSP1: 176)
   niyojayiṣyāmīti evaṃ cāsya bhavati ātmanā ca śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi	niyojayizyAmi iti evam ca asya Bavati AtmanA ca SIla pAramitAm paripUrayizyAmi
   sarvasattvāṃś ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ niyojayiṣyāmīti evaṃ cāsya bhavati ātmanā	sarva sattvAn ca SIla pAramitAyAm niyojayizyAmi iti evam ca asya Bavati AtmanA
   ca kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ	ca kzAnti pAramitAm paripUrayizyAmi sarva sattvAn ca kzAnti pAramitAyAm
   niyojayiṣyāmīti evaṃ cāsya bhavati ātmanā ca dhyānapāramitāṃ	niyojayizyAmi iti evam ca asya Bavati AtmanA ca DyAna pAramitAm
   paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayiṣyāmīti evaṃ	paripUrayizyAmi sarva sattvAn ca DyAna pAramitAyAm niyojayizyAmi iti evam
   cāsya bhavati ātmanā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca	ca asya Bavati AtmanA ca prajQApAramitAm paripUrayizyAmi sarva sattvAn ca
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niyojayiṣyāmīti evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm niyojayizyAmi iti evam apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattIH
   ātmanā ca bhāvayiṣyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca tāsu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti yāvat	AtmanA ca BAvayizyAmi sarva sattvAn ca tAsu pratizWApayizyAmi iti yAvat 
   saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu	saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu daSa bala vESAradya azwAdaSa AveNikezu
   buddhadharmeṣv ātmanā ca sthāsyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca teṣu	budDa Darmezu AtmanA ca sTAsyAmi sarva sattvAn ca tezu
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti iyatāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	pratizWApayizyAmi iti iyatA Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate iti pratipattisvarūpam punar aparaṃ	mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate iti pratipatti svarUpam punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato dānaṃ	SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAn carataH dAnam
   dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ yā dānasya	dadataH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yA dAnasya
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye niryātanā ayaṃ	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye niryAtanAH ayam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH dAnam dadataH 
   dānapāramitāsannāhaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	dAna pAramitA AsannAhaH punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair	prajQApAramitAyAn carataH dAnam dadataH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH 
   manasikāraiḥ yā śrāvakapratyekabuddhamanasikārāṇāṃ parivarjanatā ayaṃ	manasikArEH yA SrAvaka pratyekabudDa manasikArANAm parivarjana tA ayam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato śīlapāramitāsannāhaḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA AsannAhaH
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAn 
   carato dānaṃ dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ yā teṣāṃ	carataH dAnam dadataH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yA tezAm
   kṣamaṇā rocanā vyupaparīkṣaṇā ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	kzamaNA rocanA vyupaparIkzaNAH ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra	prajQApAramitAyAm carataH kzAnti pAramitA AsannAhaH punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAn carataH dAnam dadataH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ yā vīryasraṃsanatā tat	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yA vIrya sraMsana tA tat 
   kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye	kuSala mUlam sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye
   pariṇāmayati ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato	pariNAmayati ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH 
   vīryapāramitāsannāhaḥ punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	vIrya pAramitA AsannAhaH punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ yac cittasyaikāgratā	prajQApAramitAyAn carataH dAnam dadataH yat cittasya ekAgra tA
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittam	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH SrAvaka pratyekabudDa cittam
   anavakāśaṃ dānatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai	anavakASam dAna tA tat kuSala mUlam sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE
   samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati ayaṃ dānaṃ dadataḥ dhyānapāramitāsannāhaḥ	samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati ayam dAnam dadataH DyAna pAramitA AsannAhaH
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAn

   177) yā māyākṛtasaṃjñopasthitā ca naiva dāyakam upalabhate na	177) yA mAyA kRta saMjQA upasTitA ca na eva dAyakam upalaBate na
   pratigrāhakaṃ na deyam ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	pratigrAhakam na deyam ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm
   carato prajñāpāramitāsannāhaḥ yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	carataH prajQApAramitA AsannAhaH yat Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena tāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā na	mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena cittena tAH zaw pAramitA na

   dānapāramitsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ prathamam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya	dAna pAramit sannAha zawkam praTamam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya

   samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati anupalambhayogena iyaṃ subhūte	samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati anupalamBa yogena iyam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā punar	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm carataH dAna pAramitA punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato	aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm carataH 
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ yā	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yA
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyaspṛhaṇatā prāg eva pṛthagjanabhūmer iyaṃ	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi aspRhaNa tA prAk eva pRTagjana BUmeH iyam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā punar	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA punar

   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ yā teṣāṃ kṣamaṇā rocanā	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yA tezAm kzamaNA rocanA
   vyupaparīkṣaṇā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ	vyupaparIkzaNAH iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm carataH
   kṣāntipāramitā punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	kzAnti pAramitA punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ yā	SIla pAramitAyAm carataH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH yA
   vīryasraṃsanatānavalīnatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā	vIrya sraMsana tAnavalIna tA tat kuSala mUlam sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA
   anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya	anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato vīryapāramitā punar aparaṃ śāriputra	mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm carataH vIrya pAramitA punar aparam SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato yac	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitAyAm carataH yat 
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittotpādānām anavakāśadānaṃ tasya	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktAnAm citta utpAdAnAm anavakASa dAnam tasya
   kṛtaśaḥ kuśalamūlasya cittasyaikāgratā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair	kRtaSas kuSala mUlasya cittasya ekAgra tA sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH 
   manasikāraiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittam anavakāśaṃ dānatā tat kuśalamūlaṃ	manasikArEH SrAvaka pratyekabudDa cittam anavakASam dAna tA tat kuSala mUlam
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati iyaṃ	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati iyam

   pratyupashtitā bhavati tac ca śīlaṃ na manyate nopalabhate iyam āyuṣman	pratyupashtitA Bavati tat ca SIlam na manyate na upalaBate iyam Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāñ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH SIla pAramitAyAn carataH prajQApAramitA
   evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ	evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH SIla pAramitAyAm caran zax 
   pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati iti	pAramitAH parigRhNAti tena mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti saMKyAm gacCati iti
   śīlapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ dvitīyam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo	SIla pAramitA sannAha zawkam dvitIyam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti	mahAsattvaH kzAnti pAramitAyAm caran dAnam dadAti

   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye (PSP1: 178)	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye (PSP1: 178)
   pariṇāmayati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carato	pariNAmayati iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kzAnti pAramitAyAm carataH 
   dānapāramitā evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	dAna pAramitA evam kzAnti pAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanatāyai	mahAsattvaH kzAnti pAramitAyAm caran sarva budDa Darma samudAnayana tAyE
   sarvasattvaparipākāya ca prayujyate prajñayā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair	sarva sattva paripAkAya ca prayujyate prajQayA sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH 
   manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca	manasikArEH na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat ca
   kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye	kuSala mUlam sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye

   prajñāpāramitā evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitA evam hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH kzAnti pAramitAyAm
   caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ	caran zaw pAramitAH parigRhNAti tena mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti saMKyAm
   gacchati iti kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ tṛtīyam punar aparam āyuṣman	gacCati iti kzAnti pAramitA sannAha zawkam tRtIyam punar aparam Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vIrya pAramitAyAm caran dAnam dadAti

   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati iyaṃ	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati iyam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā evaṃ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya vIrya pAramitAyAm carataH dAna pAramitA evam
   vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā	vIrya pAramitAyAm carataH SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA
   dhyānapāramitā punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	DyAna pAramitA punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu	vIrya pAramitAyAm caran prajQApAramitAm BAvayan sarva Darmezu
   māyākṛtasaṃjñām upasthāpayati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair	mAyA kRta saMjQAm upasTApayati sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH 
   na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ	na SrAvaka pratyekabudDa pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tat ca kuSala mUlam
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati iyaṃ	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati iyam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā evaṃ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya vIrya pAramitAyAm carataH prajQApAramitA evam
   hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ	hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vIrya pAramitAyAm caran zaw pAramitAH
   parigṛhṇāti tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati iti	parigRhNAti tena mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti saMKyAm gacCati iti
   vīryapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ caturtham punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra	vIrya pAramitA sannAha zawkam caturTam punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna pAramitAyAm caran dAnam dadAti

   hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsttvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran	hi SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsttvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran
   prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	prajQApAramitAm paripUrayati yat Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH

   aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate naiva	aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAnAni ca samApadyate na eva
   dhyānāny āsvādayati na ca taiḥ saṃhriyate na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate evam	DyAnAni AsvAdayati na ca tEH saMhriyate na ca tezAm vaSena upapadyate evam
   apramāṇāni cārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na ca tā āsvādayati na ca	apramANAni ca ArUpya samApattIH ca samApadyate na ca tAH AsvAdayati na ca
   tābhiḥ saṃhriyate na ca tāsāṃ vaśenopapadyate iyaṃ bodhisattvasya	tABiH saMhriyate na ca tAsAm vaSena upapadyate iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyagatā prajñāpāramitā veditavyā punar aparaṃ	mahAsattvasya upAya kOSalya gatA prajQApAramitA veditavyA punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu vivekadarśanena ca	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna ArUpya samApattizu viveka darSanena ca

   sākṣātkaroti ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata	sAkzAtkaroti ayam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAm carata
   upāyakauśalyasannāhaḥ evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	upAya kOSalya sanna ahaH evam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāsannāhasannaddhas tenocyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti evaṃ	mahAsannAha sannadDaH tena ucyate boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti evam
   mahāsannāhasannaddhasyāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	mahAsannAha sannadDasya Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanta udānam udānayati varṇam udīrayanti	daSasu dikzu budDAH BagavantaH udAnam udAnayati varNam udIrayanti
   nāmadheyaṃ parikīrttyamānās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śabdam	nAmaDeyam parikIrttyamAnAH tasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya Sabdam
   anuśrāvayanti ghoṣam udīrayanti amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare bodhisattvo	anuSrAvayanti Gozam udIrayanti amuzmin lokaDAtu prasare boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha iti sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ	mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti sattvAn ca paripAcayati budDa kzetram
   ca pariśodhayati iti sannāhaṣaṭkopasaṃhāraḥ ity uktā sannāhapratipattiḥ	ca pariSoDayati iti sannAha zawkopa saMhAraH iti uktA sannAha pratipattiH
   (PSP1: 180) śāriputra āha kiyatāyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	(PSP1: 180) SAriputraH Aha kiyatA Ayuzman pUrNa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāyānasaṃpratisthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati pūrṇa āha ihāyuṣman	mahAyAna saMpratisTitaH mahAyAna samArUXaH Bavati pUrNaH Aha iha Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH dAna pAramitAyAm caran viviktam kAmEH 
   viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ	viviktam pApakEH akuSalEH DarmEH sa vitarka sa vicAram viveka jam
   prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ	prIti suKam praTamam DyAnam upasaMpadya viharati evam dvitIyam tRtIyam
   caturthaṃ dhyānam evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam	caturTam DyAnam evam AkASAnantya Ayatanam vijQAna Ananti Ayatanam
   ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasampadya viharati imāni	AkiQcani Ayatanam na eva saMjQAna asaMjQA Ayatanam upasampadya viharati imAni
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānārūpyāṇi yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya DyAna ArUpyANi yadA boDisattvaH mahAsattva
   etaiś ca dhyānair etaiś cārūpyair dānapāramitāyāṃ caran	etEH ca DyAnEH etEH ca ArUpyEH dAna pAramitAyAm caran
   ākāśākāraliṅganimittaiḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś ca tāni ca	AkASa AkAra liFga nimittEH samApadyamAnaH vyuttizWamAnaH ca tAni ca
   kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye	kuSala mUlAni sarva sattva sADAraNAni kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye

   sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati	sarva sattva sADAraNAni kRtvA anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati

   ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati iti	ca paripAcayati budDa kzetram pariSoDayati iti

   mahāsattvo yat sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ kāram utpādya	mahAsattvaH yat sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH kAram utpAdya
   kleśānāṃ dhvaṃsanāya sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti cittam	kleSAnAm DvaMsanAya sarva sattvAnAm Darmam deSayizyAmi iti cittam
   utpādayati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā yad bodhisattvo	utpAdayati iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA yat boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvas tair eva sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ prathamaṃ	mahAsattvaH tEH eva sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH praTamam
   dhyānam ākrāmati deśayati tatra ca prathamadhyāne pratiṣṭhate na cānyeṣāṃ	DyAnam AkrAmati deSayati tatra ca praTama DyAne pratizWate na ca anyezAm

   sarvakuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai	sarva kuSala mUlAni sarva sattva sADAraNAni kRtvA anuttarAyE

   mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	mahAsattvasya vIrya pAramitA yat boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānārūpyasamāpattīś ca	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH DyAna ArUpya samApattIH ca
   samāpadyate na copalabhate iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	samApadyate na ca upalaBate iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   dhyānapāramitā yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair	DyAna pAramitA yat boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH 
   manasikāraiḥ prathamadyānāṅgāni dvitīyāni tṛtīyāni caturthāni dhyānāṅgāni	manasikArEH praTama dyAna aFgAni dvitIyAni tRtIyAni caturTAni DyAna aFgAni
   anityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa śūnyākāreṇa	anitya AkAreNa duHKa AkAreNa anAtma AkAreNa SAnta AkAreNa SUnya AkAreNa
   animittākāreṇa apraṇihitākāreṇa pratyavekṣate na copalabhate iyaṃ	animitta AkAreNa apraNihita AkAreNa pratyavekzate na ca upalaBate iyam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā idam āyuṣman śāriputra	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA idam Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam iti ṣaṭpāramitāprasthānam punar	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam iti zaz pAramitA prasTAnam punar 
   aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat	aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat 
   sarvākāraṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati sarvākāraṃ	sarva AkAram saptatriMSat boDi pakzAn DarmAn BAvayati sarva AkAram
   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhasamādhiṃ bhāvayati sarvākāraṃ balāni	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKa samADim BAvayati sarva AkAram balAni

   śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam ity āryamārgaprasthānam	SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam iti Arya mArga prasTAnam
   punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maitrīsahagatena cittena	punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mEtrI sahagatena cittena
   vipulena mahodgatenādvayenāpramāṇenāvaireṇāsapatnenānāvaraṇenāvyāvādhena	vipulena mahA udgatena advayena apramANena avEreNa Asapatnena anAvaraNena avyAvADena
   sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne	sarvatra anugatena su BAzitena DarmaDAtu parame loke AkASa DAtu paryavasAne
   sarvāvantaṃ lokam ekāṃ diśaṃ sphuritvopasampadya viharati yāvad daśadiśaḥ	sarvAvantam lokam ekAm diSam sPuritvA upasampadya viharati yAvat daSa diSaH
   sphuritvopasampadya viharati evaṃ karuṇāsahagatena (PSP1: 182)	sPuritvA upasampadya viharati evam karuNA sahagatena (PSP1: 182)
   muditāsahagatena upekṣāsahagatena cittena vipulena	mudita asaha gatena upekzA sahagatena cittena vipulena
   mahodgatenādvayenāpramāṇenāvaireṇāsapatnenānāvaraṇenāvyāvādhena	mahA udgatena advayena apramANena avEreNa Asapatnena anAvaraNena avyAvADena
   sarvatrānugatena subhāṣitena dharmadhātuparame loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne	sarvatra anugatena su BAzitena DarmaDAtu parame loke AkASa DAtu paryavasAne
   sarvāvantaṃ lokam ekāṃ diśaṃ sphuritvopasampadya viharati yāvad daśadiśaḥ	sarvAvantam lokam ekAm diSam sPuritvA upasampadya viharati yAvat daSa diSaH
   sphuritvopasampadya viharati imāny ucyante bodhisattvasya	sPuritvA upasampadya viharati imAni ucyante boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāpramāṇāni punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mahA sattvasya apramANAni punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   maitrīsamādhiṃ samāpadyate mayā sarvasattvās trātavyā iti nirnāmayati	mEtrI samADim samApadyate mayA sarva sattvAH trAtavyAH iti nirnAmayati
   karuṇāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate klīvakāruṇyatāñ ca sattveṣu nirṇāmayati	karuNAm ca samADim samApadyate klIvaka aruNya tAn ca sattvezu nirNAmayati
   muditāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate aham eva modayiṣyāmīti sattveṣu	muditAm ca samADim samApadyate aham eva modayizyAmi iti sattvezu
   nirṇāmayati upekṣāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate āsravakṣayaṃ ca sattveṣu	nirNAmayati upekzAm ca samADim samApadyate Asrava kzayam ca sattvezu
   nirṇāmayati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato dānapāramitā	nirNAmayati iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya apramANezu carataH dAna pAramitA
   yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāpramāṇākāraliṅganimittāni samāpadyate	yadA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna apramANa AkAra liFga nimittAni samApadyate
   cyuttiṣṭhate ca na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau pariṇāmayaty anyatra	cyuttizWate ca na ca SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO pariNAmayati anyatra
   sarvākārajñatāyāḥ iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya apramANezu carataH 
   'parāmṛṣṭā śīlapāramitā yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tābhir	aparAmRzwA SIla pAramitA yadA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tABiH 
   dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattibhir avyavakīrṇo viharati ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ	DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApattiBiH avyavakIrNaH viharati AByAm dvAByAm
   śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye vā na spṛhayate	SrAvaka BUmaye vA pratyekabudDa BUmaye vA na spRhayate
   sarvākārajñataivāsya kṣamate rocate ceyaṃ bodhisattvasya	sarva AkAra jQa tA eva asya kzamate rocate ca iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato 'parāmṛṣṭā kṣāntipāramitā yadā bodhisattvo	mahA sattvasya apramANezu carataH aparAmRzwA kzAnti pAramitA yadA boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiḥ cittotpādair anikṣiptadhuro	mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH anikzipta DuraH 
   viharati akuśaladharmaprahāṇāya kuśaladharmopasampade iyaṃ bodhisattvasya	viharati akuSala Darma prahANAya kuSala Darma upasampade iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato 'parāmṛṣṭā vīryapāramitā yadā bodhisattvo	mahA sattvasya apramANezu carataH aparAmRzwAH vIrya pAramitA yadA boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattva etāni ca dhyānāny etāś cāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate	mahAsattvaH etAni ca DyAnAni etAH ca apramANA rUpya samApattIH ca samApadyate
   na ca dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattivaśenopapadyate na ca tā āsvādāyati na ca	na ca DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApatti vaSena upapadyate na ca tAH AsvAdAyati na ca
   tābhiḥ saṃhriyate iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato	tABiH saMhriyate iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya apramANezu carataH 
   'parāmṛṣṭā dhyānapāramitā yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	aparAmRzwAH DyAna pAramitA yadA boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tā dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH tAH DyAna apramANa ArUpya samApattIH
   samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca tāś cānityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa	samApadyate ca vyuttizWate ca tAH ca anitya AkAreNa duHKa AkAreNa anAtma AkAreNa
   śāntākāreṇa śūnyākāreṇa animittākāreṇa apraṇihitākāreṇa pratyavekṣate na	SAnta AkAreNa SUnya AkAreNa animitta AkAreNa apraNihita AkAreNa pratyavekzate na
   ca śrāvakanyāmaṃ vā pratyekabuddhanyāmaṃ vābhikrāmati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya	ca SrAvakanyAmam vA pratyekabudDanyAmam vA aBikrAmati iyam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyāpramāṇeṣu carato 'parāmṛṣṭā prajñāpāramitā idam āyuṣman	mahA sattvasya apramANezu carataH aparAmRzwA prajQApAramitA idam Ayuzman
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam ity apramāṇaprasthānam (PSP1: 183)	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam iti apramANa prasTAnam (PSP1: 183)
   punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yad	punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat 
   adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ na copalambhayogena yad bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ	aDyAtma SUnyatAyAm jQAnam na ca upalamBa yogena yat bahirDA SUnyatAyAm
   jñānaṃ na copalambhayogena yad adhyātamabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ na	jQAnam na ca upalamBa yogena yat aDyAtam abahirDA SUnyatAyAm jQAnam na
   copalambhayogena yad śūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ na copalambhayogena idaṃ	ca upalamBa yogena yat SUnyatAyAm jQAnam na ca upalamBa yogena idam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat sarvadharmeṣu na śikṣiṣyate	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat sarva Darmezu na Sikzizyate
   cittaṃ samāhitaṃ taj jñānam idam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	cittam samAhitam tat jQAnam idam api boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam	mahAyAnam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam
   yad asya na nityam iti jñānaṃ pravartate nānityam iti na duḥkham iti	yat asya na nityam iti jQAnam pravartate na anityam iti na duHKam iti
   nāduḥkham iti na sukham iti nāsukham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti	na aduHKam iti na suKam iti na asuKam iti na AtmA iti na anA AtmA iti na SAntam iti
   nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na	nASAntam iti na SUnyam iti na aSUnyam iti na nimittam iti na animittam iti na
   praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti jñānaṃ pravartate idam api subhūte	praNihitam iti na apraNihitam iti jQAnam pravartate idam api suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yad atīte 'dhvani jñānaṃ na	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat atIte aDvani jQAnam na
   pravartate anāgate 'dhvani jñānaṃ na pravartate pratyutpanne 'dhvani	pravartate anAgate aDvani jQAnam na pravartate pratyutpanne aDvani
   jñānaṃ na pravartate na cāsya triṣv adhvasu jñānaṃ pravartate tac	jQAnam na pravartate na ca asya trizu aDvasu jQAnam pravartate tat 
   cānupalambhayogena idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	ca anupalamBa yogena idam api SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānam punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	mahAyAnam punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānam yan na kāmadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate na rūpadhātau jñānaṃ	mahAyAnam yat na kAmaDAtO jQAnam pravartate na rUpa DAtO jQAnam
   pravartate nārūpyadhātau jñānaṃ pravartate na cāsya kāmarūpārūpyadhātau	pravartate na ArUpya DAtO jQAnam pravartate na ca asya kAmarUpa ArUpya DAtO
   jñānaṃ pravartate tac cānupalambhayogena idam api śāriputra bodhisattvasya	jQAnam pravartate tat ca anupalamBa yogena idam api SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yan na laukikeṣu lokottareṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat na lOkikezu lokottarezu Darmezu jQAnam
   pravartate na sāsraveṣu dharmeṣu nānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu na saṃskṛteṣu	pravartate na sa Asravezu Darmezu nAnA sravezu Darmezu na saMskRtezu
   nāsaṃskṛteṣu na cāsya laukikalokottarasāsravānāsravasaṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu	na asaMskRtezu na ca asya lOkika loka uttarasa AsravAn Asrava saMskRta asaMskRtezu
   dharmeṣu jñānaṃ pravartate tac cānupalambhayogena idam āyuṣman śāriputra	Darmezu jQAnam pravartate tat ca anupalamBa yogena idam Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam iti anupalambhayogena prasthānam	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam iti anupalamBa yogena prasTAnam
   śāriputra āha kiyatāyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha	SAriputraH Aha kiyatA Ayuzman pUrNa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna samArUXa
   ity ucyate pūrṇa āha ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	iti ucyate pUrNaH Aha iha Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitām ārohati sa naiva dānapāramitām	prajQApAramitAyAm caran dAna pAramitAm Arohati sa na eva dAna pAramitAm
   upalabhate na dāyakaṃ na pratigrāhakaṃ na dānam upalabhate	upalaBate na dAyakam na pratigrAhakam na dAnam upalaBate
   anupalambhayogena evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	anupalamBa yogena evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   dānapāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate evaṃ śīlapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ,	dAna pAramitA samArUXaH iti ucyate evam SIla pAramitA samArUXaH,
   kṣāntipāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ, (PSP1: 184) vīryapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ,	kzAnti pAramitA samArUXaH, (PSP1: 184) vIrya pAramitA samArUXaH,
   dhyānapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām ārohati,	DyAna pAramitA samArUXaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran prajQApAramitAm Arohati,
   sa naiva prajñāpāramitām upalabhate na bodhisattvaṃ na manasikāram	sa na eva prajQApAramitAm upalaBate na boDisattvam na manasikAram
   upalabhate anupalambhayogena evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	upalaBate anupalamBa yogena evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate iti	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitA samArUXaH iti ucyate iti
   trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiprasthānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo	tri maNxala pariSudDi prasTAnam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena saptatriṃśad	mahAsattvaH avyavakIrNena sarva AkAra jQa tA citta utpAdena saptatriMSat 
   bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac	boDi pakzAn DarmAn BAvayati BAvanA viBAvana arTena tat 
   cānupalambhayogena evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	ca anupalamBa yogena evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mahAyAna samArUXaH iti ucyate punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīn	avyavakIrNena sarva AkAra jQa tA citta utpAdena SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita samADIn
   bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena evaṃ hy āyuṣman	BAvayati BAvanA viBAvana arTena tat ca anupalamBa yogena evam hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate punar aparam	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna samArUXaH iti ucyate punar aparam
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH avyavakIrNena sarva AkAra jQa tA citta utpAdena
   daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido	daSa taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH 
   'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac	azwAdaSa AveNikAn budDa DarmAn BAvayati BAvanA viBAvana arTena tat 
   cānupalambhayogena evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	ca anupalamBa yogena evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva	mahAyAna samArUXaH iti ucyate punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattva
   evaṃ sañjānāti vyavahāramātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti	evam san jAnAti vyavahAra mAtram idam yat uta boDisattvaH iti
   sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya idam api nāmamātraṃ yad uta rūpaṃ	sattva anupalabDi tAm upAdAya idam api nAma mAtram yat uta rUpam
   rūpānupalabdhitām upādāya vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ nāmamātraṃ yad uta	rUpa anupalabDi tAm upAdAya vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH nAma mAtram yat uta
   vijñānaṃ vijñānānupalabdhitām upādāya nāmamātraṃ yad uta cakṣuś	vijQAnam vijQAna anupalabDi tAm upAdAya nAma mAtram yat uta cakzuH 
   cakṣuṣānupalabdhitām upādāya evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaḥ nāmamātraṃ	cakzuzA anupalabDi tAm upAdAya evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH nAma mAtram
   yad uta mano manasānupalabdhitām upādāya evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhā	yat uta manaH manasA anupalabDi tAm upAdAya evam vyasta samastAH skanDA
   dhātavaḥ āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pāramitā abhijñāḥ	DAtavaH AyatanAni pratItyasamutpAdaH pAramitAH aBijQAH
   smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā	smRti upasTAna samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNikA
   buddhadharmāḥ nāmamātraṃ yad uta buddhadharmā buddhadharmānupalabdhitām	budDa DarmAH nAma mAtram yat uta budDa DarmAH budDa Darma anupalabDi tAm
   upādāya adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad	upAdAya aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya tathatā	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA anupalabDi tAm upAdAya taTatA
   dharmadhātuś ca dharmaniyāmatā ca bhūtakoṭiś ca bhūtakoṭyanupalabdhitām	DarmaDAtuH ca Darma niyAma tA ca BUtakowiH ca BUtakowI anupalabDi tAm
   upādāya nāmamātraṃ yad uta bodhir buddhaś ca buddhānupalabdhitām upādāya	upAdAya nAma mAtram yat uta boDiH budDaH ca budDa anupalabDi tAm upAdAya
   evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity	evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna samArUXaH iti 
   ucyate ity uddeśaprasthānam punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	ucyate iti uddeSa prasTAnam punar aparam SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad (PSP1: 185) bodhir atrāntare bodhisattvo	praTama citta utpAdam upAdAya yAvat (PSP1: 185) boDiH atra antare boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'bhijñāparipūrṇatvāt sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetreṇa ca	mahAsattvaH aBijQA paripUrNa tvAt sattvAn ca paripAcayati budDa kzetreNa ca
   buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhakṣetre buddhakṣetre ca buddhān bhagavataḥ	budDa kzetram saMkrAmati budDa kzetre budDa kzetre ca budDAn BagavataH
   satkaroti gurūkaroti mānayati pūjayati yo yasya buddhasya aupayikapūjā	satkaroti gurUkaroti mAnayati pUjayati yaH yasya budDasya Opayika pUjA
   satkāravidhis tebhyaś ca buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dharmaṃ śṛṇoti yad uta	satkAra viDiH teByaH ca budDeByaH BagavadByaH Darmam SRNoti yat uta
   idam eva mahāyānaṃ sa tatra bodhisattvayāne abhiruhya buddhakṣetreṇa ca	idam eva mahAyAnam sa tatra boDisattva yAne aBiruhya budDa kzetreNa ca
   buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca	budDa kzetram saMkrAmati budDa kzetram ca pariSoDayati sattvAn ca
   paripācayati na cāsya buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā pravartate na sattvasaṃjñā	paripAcayati na ca asya budDa kzetra saMjQA pravartate na sattva saMjQA
   pravartate so 'dvayabhūmau sthitvā yādṛśenātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ śaknoy	pravartate saH advaya BUmO sTitvA yAdRSena Atma BAvena sattvAnAm Saknoy
   arthakaraṇāya tādṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya parigṛhṇāti sa na jātu tena	arTa karaNAya tAdRSam Atma BAvam saMcintya parigRhNAti sa na jAtu tena
   mahāyānena virahito bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti iti	mahAyAnena virahitaH Bavati yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApnoti iti
   abhijñāprasthānam sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati	aBijQA prasTAnam sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApya Darma cakram pravartayati
   apravartanīyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair	apravartanIyam sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH

   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate iti	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna samArUXaH iti ucyate iti
   sarvākārajñātāprasthānam ity ucyate prasthānapratipattiḥ atha khalv	sarva AkAra jQAta aprasTAnam iti ucyate prasTAna pratipattiH aTa Kalu 
   āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat mahāsannāhasannaddho	AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat mahAsanna ahasannadDo
   mahāsannāhasannaddha iti bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate kiyatā	mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti ucyate kiyatA
   bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate bhagavān	Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate BagavAn
   āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta	Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAnam sat nahya yat uta
   dānapāramitāsannāhaṃ sannahyate mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta	dAna pAramitA Asanna aham sat nahyate mahAyAnam sat nahya yat uta
   śīlapāramitāsannāhaṃ sannahyate mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta	SIla pAramitA Asanna aham sat nahyate mahAyAnam sat nahya yat uta
   kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaṃ sannahyate mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta	kzAnti pAramitA Asanna aham sat nahyate mahAyAnam sat nahya yat uta
   vīryapāramitāsannāhaṃ sannahyate mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta	vIrya pAramitA Asanna aham sat nahyate mahAyAnam sat nahya yat uta
   dhyānapāramitāsannāhaṃ sannahyate mahāyānaṃ sannahya yad uta	DyAna pAramitA Asanna aham sat nahyate mahAyAnam sat nahya yat uta
   prajñāpāramitāsannāhaṃ sannahyate smṛtyupasthānasannāhaṃ sannahya	prajQApAramitA Asanna aham sat nahyate smRti upasTAna sanna aham sannahya
   samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgasannāhaṃ (PSP1: 186)	samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga sannA aham (PSP1: 186)
   sannahya samāpattisannāhaṃ sannahya śūnyatāsannāhaṃ sannahya	sat nahya samApatti sannA aham sat nahya SUnyatA Asanna aham sannahya
   vaiśāradyasannāhaṃ sannahya pratisaṃvitsannāhaṃ sannahya	vESAradya sanna aham sat nahya pratisaMvid sanna aham sannahya
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmasannāhaṃ sannahya sarvākārajñatāsannāhaṃ	azwAdaSa AveNika budDa Darma sannA aham sat nahya sarva AkAra jQa tA sanna aham
   sannahya buddhavigrahaṃ sannahya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum	sat nahya budDa vigraham sat nahya tri sAhasra mahA sAhasram lokaDAtum
   avabhāsena sphurati ca ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane	avaBAsena sPurati ca zaz vikAram kampayati ca sarvasmin nErayika Bavane
   ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān	ca tam agni skanDam nirvApya nErayikAnAm sattvAnAm duHKAni praSAmya tAn
   sarvān nirvaṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam	sarvAn nirvaNa aBimuKAn vijQAya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam
   udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāyeti	udIrayati Gozam anuSrAvayati namaH taTAgatAya arhate samyaksambudDAya iti
   tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante	tatas te nErayikAH sattvAH tam budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante
   te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv	te tena eva suKa sOmanasyena teByaH nirayeByaH vyutTAya tatra lokaDAtO= 
   upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti	upapadyante yatra budDAn BagavataH paSyanti ArAgayanti
   devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca parigṛhṇanti evaṃ tiryagyonito yamalokato vyutthāya	deva manuzya upapattin ca parigRhNanti evam tiryagyonitaH yama lokataH vyutTAya
   te lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti	te loka DAtO upapadyante yatra budDAn BagavataH paSyanti ArAgayanti
   devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca parigṛhṇanti evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi	deva manuzya upapattin ca parigRhNanti evam pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃl lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphurati ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampayati	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn avaBAsena sPurati zaz vikAram kampayati
   ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ	ca sarvasmin nErayika Bavane ca tam agni skanDam nirvApya nErayikAnAm
   sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān nirvaṇābhimukhān vijñāya	sattvAnAm duHKAni praSAmya tAn sarvAn nirvaNa aBimuKAn vijQAya
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam udIrayati Gozam anuSrAvayati namas
   tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāyeti tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ	taTAgatAya arhate samyaksambudDAya iti tatas te nErayikAH sattvAH tam
   buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena	budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante te tena eva suKa sOmanasyena
   tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān	teByaH nirayeByaH vyutTAya tatra loka DAtO upapadyante yatra budDAn
   bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca parigṛhṇanti evaṃ	BagavataH paSyanti ArAgayanti deva manuzya upapattin ca parigRhNanti evam
   dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃl lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphurati	dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn avaBAsena sPurati
   ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca tam agniskandhaṃ	zaz vikAram kampayati ca sarvasmin nErayika Bavane ca tam agni skanDam
   nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān	nirvApya nErayikAnAm sattvAnAm duHKAni praSAmya tAn sarvAn
   nirvaṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam udīrayati	nirvaNa aBimuKAn vijQAya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam udIrayati
   ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāyeti tatas te	Gozam anuSrAvayati namaH taTAgatAya arhate samyaksambudDAya iti tatas te
   nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante te tenaiva	nErayikAH sattvAH tam budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante te tena eva
   sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante	suKa sOmanasyena teByaH nirayeByaH vyutTAya tatra lokaDAtO upapadyante
   yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca	yatra budDAn BagavataH paSyanti ArAgayanti deva manuzya upapattin ca
   parigṛhṇanti evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃl lokadhātūn	parigRhNanti evam paScimAyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   avabhāsena sphurati ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca	avaBAsena sPurati zaz vikAram kampayati ca sarvasmin nErayika Bavane ca
   tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān	tam agni skanDam nirvApya nErayikAnAm sattvAnAm duHKAni praSAmya tAn
   sarvān nirvaṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam	sarvAn nirvaNa aBimuKAn vijQAya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam
   udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāyeti	udIrayati Gozam anuSrAvayati namaH taTAgatAya arhate samyaksambudDAya iti
   tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante	tatas te nErayikAH sattvAH tam budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante
   te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv	te tena eva suKa sOmanasyena teByaH nirayeByaH vyutTAya tatra lokaDAtO=

   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam udIrayati Gozam anuSrAvayati namas
   tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāyeti tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ	taTAgatAya arhate samyaksambudDAya iti tatas te nErayikAH sattvAH tam
   buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena	budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante te tena eva suKa sOmanasyena
   tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān	teByaH nirayeByaH vyutTAya tatra loka DAtO upapadyante yatra budDAn
   bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca parigṛhṇanti evam	BagavataH paSyanti ArAgayanti deva manuzya upapattin ca parigRhNanti evam
   uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃl lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphurati	uttara pUrvasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn avaBAsena sPurati
   ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca tam agniskandhaṃ	zaz vikAram kampayati ca sarvasmin nErayika Bavane ca tam agni skanDam
   nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān sarvān	nirvApya nErayikAnAm sattvAnAm duHKAni praSAmya tAn sarvAn
   nirvaṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam udīrayati	nirvaNa aBimuKAn vijQAya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam udIrayati
   ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāyeti tatas te	Gozam anuSrAvayati namaH taTAgatAya arhate samyaksambudDAya iti tatas te
   nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante te tenaiva	nErayikAH sattvAH tam budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante te tena eva
   sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante	suKa sOmanasyena teByaH nirayeByaH vyutTAya tatra lokaDAtO upapadyante
   yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti devamanuṣyopapattiñ ca	yatra budDAn BagavataH paSyanti ArAgayanti deva manuzya upapattin ca
   parigṛhṇanti evaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃl lokadhātūn	parigRhNanti evam pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn
   avabhāsena sphurati ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampayati ca sarvasmin nairayikabhavane ca	avaBAsena sPurati zaz vikAram kampayati ca sarvasmin nErayika Bavane ca
   tam agniskandhaṃ nirvāpya nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni praśāmya tān	tam agni skanDam nirvApya nErayikAnAm sattvAnAm duHKAni praSAmya tAn
   sarvān nirvaṇābhimukhān vijñāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam	sarvAn nirvaNa aBimuKAn vijQAya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam

   tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante	tatas te nErayikAH sattvAH tam budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante

   upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti	upapadyante yatra budDAn BagavataH paSyanti ArAgayanti

   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH evam Sabdam udIrayati Gozam anuSrAvayati namas
   tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāyeti tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ	taTAgatAya arhate samyaksambudDAya iti tatas te nErayikAH sattvAH tam
   buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena	budDa Gozam SrutvA suKam pratilaBante te tena eva suKa sOmanasyena

   upādāya evaṃ sannāhaṃ sannahyate sacet mama sarvasattvā	upAdAya evam sat na aham sat nahyate saced mama sarva sattvA
