   tad yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe	tat yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe
   mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya nirmimīte te 'pi sarve tasya māyākārasya	mahAntam jana kAyam nirmAya nirmimIte te api sarve tasya mAyA kArasya
   daṇḍair loṣṭrair muṣṭibhiḥ śastrair vā prahāraṃ dadyuḥ sa ca teṣu ekam api	daNxEH lozwrEH muzwiBiH SastrEH vA prahAram dadyuH sa ca tezu ekam api
   kṣobhacittaṃ notpādayet tāṃś ca sattvān nirmitān evaṃrūpāyāṃ kṣāntau	kzoBa cittam na utpAdayet tAn ca sattvAt nirmitAn evaMrUpAyAm kzAntO
   pratiṣṭhāpayet tena tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ	pratizWApayet tena tAvataH sattvAn kzAntO pratizWApya na kaScid sattvaH
   pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs	pratizWApitaH Bavati evam eva suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena tAn= 
   tāvataḥ sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kṣāntau	tAvataH sattvAn kzAntO pratizWApya na kaScid sattvaH kzAntO
   pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ	pratizWApitaH Bavati tat kasya hetoH Darma tA ezA suBUte DarmANAm
   māyādharmatām upādāya evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāsannāhasannaddhaṃ ity ucyate iti kṣāntisambhāraḥ (PSP1: 189) punar	mahAsannAha sat nadDam iti ucyate iti kzAnti samBAraH (PSP1: 189) punar 
   aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā	aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vIrya pAramitAyAm sTitvA
   sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	sarva sattvAn vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā	kaTan ca suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH vIrya pAramitAyAm sTitvA
   sarvasattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati iha	sarva sattvAn vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati iha
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH
   kāyikacetasikavīryapratiṣṭhitaḥ savasattvān kāyikacetasikavīrye	kAyika cetasika vIrya pratizWitaH savasattvAn kAyika cetasika vIrye
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati tad yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati tat yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH 
   māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya	mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe mahAntam jana kAyam nirmAya
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ kāyikacetasikavīrye	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH kAyika cetasika vIrye
   pratiṣṭhāpayet tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān kāyikacetasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpya	pratizWApayet tena tAn tAvataH sattvAn kAyika cetasika vIrye pratizWApya
   na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacetasikavīrye pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati evam eva	na kaScid sattvaH kAyika cetasika vIrye pratizWApitaH Bavati evam eva
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena tAn tAvataH sattvAn
   kāyikacetasikavīrye praviṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ kāyikacetasikavīrye	kAyika cetasika vIrye pravizWApya na kaScid sattvaH kAyika cetasika vIrye
   pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ	pratizWApitaH Bavati tat kasya hetoH Darma tA ezA suBUte DarmANAm
   māyādharmatām upādāya evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāsannāhasannaddhaṃ ity ucyate iti vīryasambhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte	mahAsannAha sat nadDam iti ucyate iti vIrya samBAraH punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna pAramitAyAm sTitvA sarva sattvAn
   dhynapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati kathaṃ ca subhūte	Dyna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati kaTam ca suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna pAramitAyAm sTitvA sarva sattvAn
   dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati iha subhūte	DyAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati iha suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatāyāṃ sthitvā na kasyacid	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva DarmANAm samatAyAm sTitvA na kasyacid 
   dharmasya vikṣepaṃ vā avikṣepaṃ vā samanupaśyati evaṃ hi subhūte	Darmasya vikzepam vA avikzepam vA samanupaSyati evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati sa tathaiva	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH DyAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH Bavati sa taTA eva
   sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati te	sarva sattvAn DyAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati te
   ca samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti na jātu virahitā bhavanti	ca samAdApitAH niveSitAH pratizWApitAH Bavanti na jAtu virahitAH Bavanti
   dhyānapāramitayā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti tad	DyAna pAramitayA yAvat anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti tat 
   yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe	yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe
   mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya janakāyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tena	mahAntam jana kAyam nirmAya jana kAyam DyAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApayet tena
   tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekaḥ sattvo	tAn tAvataH sattvAn DyAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApya na kaScid ekaH sattvaH 
   'pi dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena	api DyAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApitaH Bavati evam eva suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo	mahAsattvena sarva sattvAn DyAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApya na kaScid sattvaH 
   dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ dharmataiṣā	DyAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApitaH Bavati tat kasya hetoH Darma tA ezA
   subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo	suBUte DarmANAm mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaṃ ity ucyate iti dhyānasambhāraḥ punar	mahAsattvaH mahAsanna aha sat nadDam iti ucyate iti DyAna samBAraH punar 
   aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā	aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA
   sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	sarva sattvAn prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā	kaTan ca suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA
   sarvasattvān prajñāpramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	sarva sattvAn prajQA pramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran (PSP1: 190)	yatas suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran (PSP1: 190)
   na kasyacid dharmasyāpāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhate evaṃ bodhisattvo	na kasyacid Darmasya apAram vA pAram vA upalaBate evam boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati sa tathaiva sarvasattvān api	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm sTitaH Bavati sa taTA eva sarva sattvAn api
   tatra samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	tatra samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ	dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe mahAntam jana kAyam
   nirmāya janakāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tena tāṃs tāvataḥ	nirmAya jana kAyam prajQApAramitAyAm pratizWApayet tena tAn tAvataH
   sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekaḥ sattvo 'pi	sattvAn prajQApAramitAyAm pratizWApya na kaScid ekaH sattvaH api
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena	prajQApAramitAyAm pratizWApitaH Bavati evam eva suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo	mahAsattvena sarva sattvAn prajQApAramitAyAm pratizWApya na kaScid sattvaH 
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ dharmataiṣā	prajQApAramitAyAm pratizWApitaH Bavati tat kasya hetoH Darma tA ezA
   subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo	suBUte DarmANAm mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaṃ ity ucyate prajñāsambhāraḥ punar aparaṃ	mahAsattvaH mahAsanna aha sat nadDam iti ucyate prajQA samBAraH punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsannAhasannadDaH pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam dakziNasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā itievaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH itievam paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evam uttarasyāṃ diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam uttarasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evam uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam uttara pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam pUrva dakziNasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam dakziNa paScimAyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evaṃ paścimottarasyām diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam paScima uttarasyAm diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evam adhastād diśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam aDastAt diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti evam ūrdhvadiśi	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti evam UrDva diSi
   gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāṃs tān sarvān	gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu yAvantaH sattvAn tAn sarvAn
   yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	yaTA eva AtmanA dAna pAramitAyAm sTitaH taTA dAna pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣātipāramitāyāṃ	niveSayati pratizWApayati evam SIla pAramitAyAm kzAti pAramitAyAm
   samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati vīryapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati	samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati vIrya pAramitAyAm samAdApayati
   niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dhyānapāramitāyāṃsamādāpayati niveśayati	niveSayati pratizWApayati DyAna pAramitAyAMsam AdApayati niveSayati
   pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati	pratizWApayati prajQApAramitAyAm samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati
   dharmañ ca deśayati yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam te ca taṃ	Darman ca deSayati yat uta imam eva zaz pAramitA pratisaMyuktam te ca tam
   śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣadbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad	SrutvA na jAtu BUyas virahitAH Bavanti zadBiH pAramitABiH yAvat 
   anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo	anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte dakzaH 
   māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ nirmāya	mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe mahAntam jana kAyam nirmAya
   ṣaṭpāramitāsu samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati tat kiṃ manyase	zaz pAramitAsu samAdApayati niveSayati pratizWApayati tat kim manyase
   subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvaḥ	suBUte api nu tena mAyAkAreNa mAyA kAra antevAsinA vA kaScid sattvaH
   ṣaṭpāramitāsu samādāpito bhavati niveśito vā pratiṣṭhāpito vā bhavati	zaz pAramitAsu samAdApitaH Bavati niveSitaH vA pratizWApitaH vA Bavati
   subhūtir āha no bhagavan bhagavān āha evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena	suBUtiH Aha naH Bagavan BagavAn Aha evam eva suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit	mahAsattvena tAn tAvataH sattvAn zawsu pAramitAsu pratizWApya na kaScid 
   sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ dharmataiṣā	sattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu pratizWApitaH Bavati tat kasya hetoH Darma tA ezA
   subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo	suBUte DarmANAm mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaṃ ity ucyate punar aparaṃ subhūte	mahAsattvaH mahAsanna aha sat nadDam iti ucyate punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ sannahya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAsanna aham sat nahya sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena
   cittena viharan nānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti iyanto mayā sattvā	cittena viharan na anyezAm citta utpAdAnAm avakASam dadAti iyantaH mayA sattvA
   dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā śīlapāramitāyāṃ	dAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvA SIla pAramitAyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvA kzAnti pAramitAyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvAH vIrya pAramitAyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvAH DyAna pAramitAyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvA prajQApAramitAyAm
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā bodhipakṣadharmeṣu	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvAH boDi pakza Darmezu
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvAH AveNika budDa Darmezu
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā srotaāpattiphale	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvA srotaApatti Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā sakṛdāgāmiphale	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvA sakRdAgAmi Pale
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā	pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvAH anAgAmi Pale pratizWApayitavyA
   iti iyanto mayā sattvā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā	iti iyantaH mayA sattvAH arhat tve pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvA
   pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti iyanto mayā sattvā sarvajñatve	pratyekabudDa tve pratizWApayitavyAH iti iyantaH mayA sattvA sarvajQa tve
   pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti api tu khalu punar asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā aprameyāḥ	pratizWApayitavyAH iti api tu Kalu punar asaMKyeyAH sattvAH aprameyAH
   sattvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ evaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu	sattvAH zawsu pAramitAsu pratizWApayitavyAH evam saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu
   dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśasv	Darmezu daSasu taTAgata balezu catasRzu pratisaMvitsu azwAdaSasv
   āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ srotaāpattiphale	AveNikezu budDa Darmezu pratizWApayitavyAH srotaApatti Pale
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve asaṃkhyeyā aprameyāḥ sattvā	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve asaMKyeyAH aprameyAH sattvA
   buddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iti śamathasambhāraḥ (PSP1: 191) tad yathāpi	budDa tve pratizWApayitavyAH iti SamaTa samBAraH (PSP1: 191) tat yaTA api
   nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ	nAma suBUte dakzaH mAyA kAraH mAyAkAra antevAsI vA catur mahApaTe mahAntam
   janakāyaṃ nirmāya taṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet yāvat	jana kAyam nirmAya tam zawsu pAramitAsu pratizWApayet yAvat 
   sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayed evam eva subhūte	sarva AkAra vara upete sarvajQa jQAne pratizWApayet evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāmahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān asaṃkhyeyān aprameyān	boDisattvena mahA mahAsattvena tAn tAvataH sattvAn asaMKyeyAn aprameyAn
   ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne	zawsu pAramitAsu pratizWApya yAvat sarva AkAra vara upete sarvajQa jQAne
   pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati tat	pratizWApya na kaScid sattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu pratizWApitaH Bavati tat 
   kasya hetoḥ dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ yad imāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya	kasya hetoH Darma tA ezA suBUte DarmANAm yat imAm mAyA Darma tAm upAdAya
   subhūtir āha yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā	suBUtiH Aha yaTA aham Bagavan BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi taTA
   asannāhasannaddho vatāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ	asat nAha sat nadDaH vata ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH veditavyaH
   svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa	sva lakzaNa SUnyatAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan rUpam rUpeNa
   śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ	SUnyam vedanA vedanayA SUnyA saMjQA saMjQayA SUnyA saMskArAH saMskArEH
   śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ, cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam śrotraṃ śrotreṇa	SUnyAH vijQAnam vijQAnena SUnyaM, cakzuH cakzuzA SUnyam Srotram SrotreNa
   śūnyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyaṃ jihvā jihvayā śūnyā kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo mano	SUnyam GrANam GrANena SUnyam jihvA jihvayA SUnyA kAyaH kAyena SUnyaH manaH 
   manasā śūnyaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyo gandho gandhena	manasA SUnyam rUpam rUpeNa SUnyam SabdaH Sabdena SUnyaH ganDaH ganDena
   śūnyo raso rasena śūnyo spraṣṭavyaṃ spraṣṭavyena śūnyaṃ dharmo dharmeṇa	SUnyaH rasaH rasena SUnyaH sprazwavyam sprazwavyena SUnyam DarmaH DarmeNa
   śūnyo cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānena	SUnyaH cakzuH vijQAnam cakzuH vijQAnena SUnyam Srotra vijQAnam Srotra vijQAnena
   śūnyaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānena śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānena	SUnyam GrANa vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnena SUnyam jihvA vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnena
   śūnyaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānena śūnyaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyaṃ	SUnyam kAya vijQAnam kAya vijQAnena SUnyam manaH vijQAnam manaH vijQAnena SUnyam
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitena śūnyaṃ	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitena SUnyam
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitena śūnyaṃ	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitena SUnyam
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitena śūnyaṃ	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitena SUnyam
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitena śūnyaṃ	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitena SUnyam
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitena śūnyaṃ	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitena SUnyam
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitena śūnyaṃ	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitena SUnyam
   dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā	dAna pAramitA dAna pAramitayA SUnyA SIla pAramitA SIla pAramitayA SUnyA
   kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitayā śūnyā vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā	kzAnti pAramitA kzAnti pAramitayA SUnyA vIrya pAramitA vIrya pAramitayA SUnyA
   dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayā śūnyā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā	DyAna pAramitA DyAna pAramitayA SUnyA prajQApAramitA prajQApAramitayA
   śūnyā adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā bahirdhāśūnyatā	SUnyAH aDyAtma SUnyatA aDyAtma SUnya tayA SUnyA bahirDA SUnyatA
   bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā	bahirDA SUnyatayA SUnyAH aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayA
   śūnyā śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyā mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatayā	SUnyA SUnyatA SUnyatA SUnyatA SUnyatayA SUnyAH mahA SUnyatA mahA SUnyatayA
   śūnyā paramārthaśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatayā śūnyā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā	SUnyA parama arTa SUnyatA parama arTa SUnya tayA SUnyA saMskRta SUnyatA
   saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā	saMskRta SUnyatayA SUnyA asaMskRta SUnyatA asaMskRta SUnyatayA SUnyA
   atyantaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā anavarāgraśūnyatā	atyanta SUnyatA atyanta SUnyatayA SUnyA anavara agra SUnyatA
   anavarāgraśūnyatayā śūnyā anavakāraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatayā śūnyā	anavara agra SUnyatayA SUnyA anavakAra SUnyatA anavakAra SUnyatayA SUnyA
   prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyā sarvadharmaśūnyatā	prakRti SUnyatA prakRti SUnyatayA SUnyA sarva Darma SUnyatA
   sarvadharmaśūnyatayā śūnyā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā śūnyā	sarva Darma SUnyatayA SUnyA sva lakzaNa SUnyatA sva lakzaNa SUnyatayA SUnyA
   anupalambhaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatayā śūnyā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā	anupalamBa SUnyatA anupalamBa SUnyatayA SUnyA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā bhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatayA SUnyAH BAva SUnyatA BAva SUnyatayA SUnyA
   abhāvaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā svabhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatayā	aBAva SUnyatA aBAva SUnya tayA SUnyA svaBAva SUnyatA svaBAva SUnyatayA
   śūnyā parabhāvaśūnyatā parabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā	SUnyA para BAva SUnyatA para BAva SUnyatayA SUnyA
   saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ	saptatriMSat boDi pakza DarmAH saptatriMSat boDi pakza DarmEH SUnyAH
   daśatathāgatabalāni daśatathāgataiḥ śūnyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ	daSa taTAgata balAni daSa taTAgatEH SUnyAni azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAH
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ	azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmEH SUnyAH boDisattvaH boDisattvena SUnyaH
   mahāyānasannāho 'pi bhagavan mahāyānasannāhena śūnyaḥ anena bhagavan	mahA yAna sannAhaH api Bagavat mahA yAna sat nAhena SUnyaH anena Bagavan
   paryāyeṇa asannāhasannaddho bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ evam ukte bhagavān	paryAyeNa asannAhasat nadDaH boDisattvaH veditavyaH evam ukte BagavAn
   āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat evam etat subhūte yathā vadasi tat kasya	Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat evam etat suBUte yaTA vadasi tat kasya
   hetoḥ akṛtā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā te 'pi sattvā	hetoH akRtA hi suBUte sarva AkAra jQa tA avikRtAH anaBisaMskRtA te api sattvA
   akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	akRtAH avikRtAH anaBisaMskRtAH yezAm kRtaSas boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   mahāsannāhaḥ sannaddhaḥ subhūtir āha kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā	mahAsanna ahaH sannadDaH suBUtiH Aha kena kAraNena Bagavan sarva AkAra jQa tA
   akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā te 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā	akRtA avikRtAH anaBisaMskRtA te api sattvAH akRtA avikRtA anaBisaMskRtA
   yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ bhagavān āha	yezAm kRtaSas boDisattvena mahAsattvena mahA sannAhasannadDaH BagavAn Aha
   kārakānupalabdhitām upādāya subhūte sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā	kAraka anupalabDi tAm upAdAya suBUte sarva AkAra jQa tA akRtA avikRtA
   anabhisaṃskṛtā te 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā tat kasya hetoḥ	anaBisaMskRtA te api sattvAH akRtA avikRtA anaBisaMskRtA tat kasya hetoH
   na hi subhūte rūpaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na vedanā karoti na	na hi suBUte rUpam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na vedanA karoti na
   vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na saṃjñā karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na saMjQA karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   saṃskārāḥ kurvanti na vikurvanti nābhisaṃskurvanti na vijñānaṃ karoti na	saMskArAH kurvanti na vikurvanti na aBisaMskurvanti na vijQAnam karoti na
   vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na cakṣuḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na cakzuH karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   śrotraṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na ghrāṇaṃ karoti na vikaroti	Srotram karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na GrANam karoti na vikaroti
   nābhisaṃskaroti na jihvā karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na kāyaḥ	na aBisaMskaroti na jihvA karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na kAyaH
   karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na manaḥ karoti na vikaroti	karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na manaH karoti na vikaroti
   nābhisaṃskaroti na rūpaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na śabdaḥ	na aBisaMskaroti na rUpam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na SabdaH
   karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na gandhaḥ karoti na vikaroti	karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na ganDaH karoti na vikaroti
   nābhisaṃskaroti na rasaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na spraṣṭavyaṃ	na aBisaMskaroti na rasaH karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na sprazwavyam
   karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na dharmaḥ karoti na vikaroti	karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na DarmaH karoti na vikaroti
   nābhisaṃskaroti na cakṣurvijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	na aBisaMskaroti na cakzuH vijQAnam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   śrotravijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ karoti	Srotra vijQAnam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na GrANa vijQAnam karoti
   na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na jihvāvijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti	na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na jihvA vijQAnam karoti na vikaroti
   nābhisaṃskaroti na kāyavijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	na aBisaMskaroti na kAya vijQAnam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   manovijñānaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	manaH vijQAnam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti na	kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti na
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti tat	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedayitam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete (PSP1: 192) na vidyante	kasya hetoH taTA hi atyanta tayA sarve ete (PSP1: 192) na vidyante
   nopalabhyante ātmā subhūte na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti evaṃ na	na upalaByante AtmA suBUte na karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti evam na
   sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako	sattvaH na jIvaH na pozaH na puruzaH na pudgalaH na manujaH na mAnavaH na kArakaH 
   na vedako na jānako na paśyakaḥ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti tat	na vedakaH na jAnakaH na paSyakaH karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante svapnaḥ subhūte	kasya hetoH taTA hi atyanta tayA na vidyante na upalaByante svapnaH suBUte
   na karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti pratiśrutkaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ	na karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti pratiSrutkaH pratiBAsaH pratibimbam
   marīcir na nirmāṇaṃ karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti tat kasya hetoḥ	marIciH na nirmANam karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi atyantatayā na vidyante nopalabhyante adhyātmaśūnyatā	taTA hi atyanta tayA na vidyante na upalaByante aDyAtma SUnyatA
   bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā	bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA SUnyatA SUnyatA mahA SUnyatA
   paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā	parama arTa SUnyatA saMskRta SUnyatA asaMskRta SUnyatA atyanta SUnyatA
   anavarāgraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā	anavara agra SUnyatA anavakAra SUnyatA prakRti SUnyatA sarva Darma SUnyatA
   svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatā	sva lakzaNa SUnyatA anupalamBa SUnyatA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA BAva SUnyatA
   abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā na parabhāvaśūnyatā karoti na vikaroti	aBAva SUnyatA svaBAva SUnyatA na para BAva SUnyatA karoti na vikaroti
   nābhisaṃskaroti tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi atyantatayā na vidyante	nABisaMskaroti tat kasya hetoH taTA hi atyanta tayA na vidyante
   nopalabhyante saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri	na upalaByante saptatriMSat boDi pakzAH DarmAH daSa taTAgata balAni catvAri
   vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā tathatā	vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA taTatA
   ākāśadhātur bhūtakoṭir acintyadhātur bodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā subhūte na	AkASa DAtuH BUtakowiH acintya DAtuH boDiH sarva AkAra jQa tA suBUte na
   karoti na vikaroti nābhisaṃskaroti tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi atyantatayā na	karoti na vikaroti na aBisaMskaroti tat kasya hetoH taTA hi atyanta tayA na
   vidyante nopalabhyate anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvākārajñatā akṛtā avikṛtā	vidyante na upalaByate anena suBUte paryAyeNa sarva AkAra jQa tA akRtA avikRtA
   anabhisaṃskṛtā yeṣāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	anaBisaMskRtAH yezAm kRtaSas boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mahAsannAhasannadDaH evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate iti vidarśanāsambhāraḥ subhūtir āha	mahAsannAha sat nadDaH iti ucyate iti vidarSana asamBAraH suBUtiH Aha
   yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi rūpaṃ bhagavann abaddham	yaTA aham BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi rUpam Bagavan abadDam
   amuktaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ bhagavan na baddhamuktam pūrṇo	amuktam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam Bagavat na badDa muktam pUrNo
   maitrāyaṇīputra āha rūpam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi	mEtrAyaNI putraH Aha rUpam Ayuzman suBUte abadDam amuktam iti vadasi
   vedanāyuṣman subhūte abaddhāmukteti vadasi saṃjñāyuṣman subhūte	vedanA Ayuzman suBUte abadDa amuktA iti vadasi saMjQA Ayuzman suBUte
   abaddhāmukteti vadasi saṃskārā āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amuktā iti vadasi	abadDa amuktA iti vadasi saMskArAH Ayuzman suBUte abadDAH amuktAH iti vadasi
   vijñānam āyuṣman subhūte abaddham amuktam iti vadasi subhūtir āha evam	vijQAnam Ayuzman suBUte abadDam amuktam iti vadasi suBUtiH Aha evam
   etad āyuṣman pūrṇa pūrṇa āha katamat tad āyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yad	etat Ayuzman pUrNa pUrNaH Aha katamat tat Ayuzman suBUte rUpam yat 
   abaddham amuktam katamā sāyuṣman subhūte vedanā yābaddhāmuktā katamā	abadDam amuktam katamA sa Ayuzman suBUte vedanA yAbadDa amuktA katamA
   sāyuṣman subhūte saṃjñā yābaddhāmuktā katamāḥ te āyuṣman subhūte saṃskārā	sa Ayuzman suBUte saMjQA yAbadDa amuktA katamAH te Ayuzman suBUte saMskArA
   ye abaddhā amuktāḥ katamat tad āyuṣman subhūte vijñānaṃ yad abaddham	ye abadDAH amuktAH katamat tat Ayuzman suBUte vijQAnam yat abadDam
   amuktam subhūtir āha yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa svapnopamaṃ rūpaṃ tad abaddham	amuktam suBUtiH Aha yat etat Ayuzman pUrNa svapna upamam rUpam tat abadDam
   amuktam ya ete svapnopamā vedanā sābaddhāmuktā ya eṣā svapnopamā saṃjñā	amuktam yaH ete svapna upamA vedanA sA badDa amuktA yaH ezA svapna upamA saMjQA
   sābaddhāmuktā ye ete svapnopamāḥ saṃskārāḥ te 'baddhā amuktāḥ yad etat	sAbadDa amuktAH ye ete svapna upamAH saMskArAH te abadDAH amuktAH yat etat 
   svapnopamaṃ vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam evaṃ pratiśrutkopamā māyopamā	svapna upamam vijQAnam tat abadDam amuktam evam pratiSrutka upamA mAyA upamA
   marīcyupamā pratibhāsopamā yad etad āyuṣman pūrṇa nirmitopamaṃ rūpaṃ tad	marIci upamA pratiBAsA upamA yat etat Ayuzman pUrNa nirmita upamam rUpam tat 
   abaddham amuktam ya ete nirmitopamā (PSP1: 193) vedanā sābaddhāmuktā ya	abadDam amuktam yaH ete nirmitA upamA (PSP1: 193) vedanA sA badDa amuktAH ya
   eṣā nirmitopamā saṃjñā sābaddhāmuktā ye ete nirmitopamāḥ saṃskārāḥ te	ezA nirmitA upamA saMjQA sA badDa amuktAH ye ete nirmita upamAH saMskArAH te
   'baddhā amuktāḥ yad etat nirmitopamaṃ vijñānaṃ tad abaddham amuktam evam	abadDAH amuktAH yat etat nirmita upamam vijQAnam tat abadDam amuktam evam
   anāgataṃ pratyutpannam āyuṣman pūrṇa rūpam abaddham amuktam pratyutpannā	anAgatam pratyutpannam Ayuzman pUrNa rUpam abadDam amuktam pratyutpannA
   vedanā abaddhāmuktā pratyutpannā saṃjñābaddhāmuktā pratyutpannāḥ saṃskārā	vedanA abadDa amuktA pratyutpannA saMjQA badDa amuktA pratyutpannAH saMskArA
   abaddhā amuktāḥ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam abaddham amuktam tat kasya hetoḥ	abadDAH amuktAH pratyutpannam vijQAnam abadDam amuktam tat kasya hetoH
   asattvād āyusman pūrṇa rūpasya evaṃ tad rūpam abaddham amuktam asattvād	asattvAt Ayusman pUrNa rUpasya evam tat rUpam abadDam amuktam asattvAt 
   āyuṣman pūrṇa vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām asattvād āyuṣman pūrṇa	Ayuzman pUrNa vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm asattvAt Ayuzman pUrNa
   vijñānasyaivaṃ tad vijñānam abaddham amuktam evaṃ viviktatvāc chāntatvāc	vijQAnasya evam tat vijQAnam abadDam amuktam evam vivikta tvAt SAnta tvAt 
   chūnyatvād animittatvād apraṇihitatvād asaṃskṛtatvād anutpannatvāt kuśalam	CUnya tvAt animitta tvAt apraNihita tvAt asaMskRta tvAt anutpanna tvAt kuSalam
   akuśalaṃ saṃkleśan niṣkleśaṃ sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ	akuSalam saMkleSan nizkleSam sAvadyam anavadyam sa Asravam anAsravam
   laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ saṃkliṣṭaṃ vyavadānam āyuṣman pūrṇaṃ rūpam abaddham	lOkikam loka uttaram saMklizwam vyavadAnam Ayuzman pUrNam rUpam abadDam
   amuktam tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād rūpasyaivaṃ tad rūpam abaddham amuktam	amuktam tat kasya hetoH asattvAt rUpasya evam tat rUpam abadDam amuktam
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ saṃkliṣṭaṃ vyavadānam āyuṣman pūrṇa vijñānam	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH saMklizwam vyavadAnam Ayuzman pUrNa vijQAnam
   abaddham amuktam tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād vijñānasya evaṃ tad vijñānam	abadDam amuktam tat kasya hetoH asattvAt vijQAnasya evam tat vijQAnam
   abaddham amuktam sarvadharmā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ tat kasya	abadDam amuktam sarva DarmAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDAH amuktAH tat kasya
   hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād	hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat anutpanna tvAt 
   abaddhā amuktā adhyātmaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ tat kasya	abadDAH amuktAH aDyAtma SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDAH amuktAH tat kasya
   hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād	hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat anutpanna tvAt 
   abaddhā amuktā bahirdhāśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ tat kasya	abadDAH amuktAH bahirDA SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDAH amuktAH tat kasya
   hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād	hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat anutpanna tvAt 
   abaddhā amuktā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ	abadDAH amuktAH aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDAH amuktAH
   tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā śūnyatāśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktA SUnyatA SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA
   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā mahāśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ	anutpanna tvAt abadDAH amuktAH mahA SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDAH amuktAH
   tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā paramārthaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktA parama arTa SUnyAtA api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA
   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā saṃskṛtaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktA saMskRta SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA
   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā atyantaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDAH amuktAH atyanta SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA
   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā anavarāgraśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktA anavara agra SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA

   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā sarvadharmaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktA sarva Darma SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA
   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā svalakṣaṇaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktA sva lakzaNa SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA
   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā anupalambhaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa abaddhā	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktAH anupalamBa SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa abadDA
   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyātā apy āyuṣman pūrṇa	anutpanna tvAt abadDAH amuktAH aBAva svaBAva SUnyAtAH api Ayuzman pUrNa
   abaddhā amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād	abadDAH amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt

   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat

   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat

   amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ viviktatvād yāvad	amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam vivikta tvAt yAvat 
   anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā saptatriṃśadbopdhipakṣā dharmā apy āyuṣman	anutpanna tvAt abadDA amuktA saptatriMSat bopDi pakzAH DarmAH api Ayuzman
   pūrṇa abaddhā amuktāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asattvād abaddhā amuktāḥ evaṃ	pUrNa abadDAH amuktAH tat kasya hetoH asattvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam
   viviktatvād yāvad anutpannatvād abaddhā amuktā evaṃ daśabalāni catvāri	vivikta tvAt yAvat anutpanna tvAt abadDAH amuktAH evam daSa balAni catvAri
   vaiśāradyāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ, sarvākārajñatā, tathatā	vESAradyAni yAvat azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAH, sarva AkAra jQa tA, taTatA
   dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭiḥ evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	DarmaDAtuH BUtakowiH evam hi Ayuzman pUrNa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   'baddho 'muktaḥ evaṃ ṣaḍ api pāramitā abaddhā amuktāḥ yāvat	abadDaH amuktaH evam zaw api pAramitAH abadDAH amuktAH yAvat 
   sarvākārajñatāpy abaddhāmuktā sattvān api yān parinirvāpayiṣyati te api	sarva AkAra jQa tA api abadDa amuktA sattvAn api yAn parinirvApayizyati te api
   abaddhā amuktāḥ buddhakṣetrāṇy api yāni pariśodhayiṣyati tāny apy	abadDAH amuktAH budDa kzetrANi api yAni pariSoDayizyati tAni api 
   abaddhāny amuktāni yān api buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyate te 'py	abadDAni amuktAni yAn api budDAn BagavataH paryupAsizyate te api 
   abaddhā amuktāḥ yam api dharmaṃ śroṣyati so 'py abaddho 'muktaḥ buddhair	abadDAH amuktAH yam api Darmam Srozyati saH api abadDaH amuktaH budDEH 
   bhagavadbhir na jātu virahito bhaviṣyati abaddho 'muktaḥ nābhijñābhir	BagavadBiH na jAtu virahitaH Bavizyati abadDaH amuktaH na aBijQABiH 
   virahito bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ na pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir virahito	virahitaH Bavizyati abadDaH amuktaH na paQcaBiH cakzurBiH virahitaH 
   bhaviṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ tathā nānyaiḥ samādhibhir virahito bhaviṣyaty	Bavizyati abadDaH amuktaH taTA na anyEH samADiBiH virahitaH Bavizyati 
   abaddho 'muktaḥ abaddhām amuktāṃ mārgākārajñatām utpādayiṣyati abaddhām	abadDaH amuktaH abadDAm amuktAm mArga AkAra jQa tAm utpAdayizyati abadDAm
   amuktāṃ sarvākārajñatām avabhotsyate abaddham amuktaṃ dharmacakraṃ	amuktAm sarva AkAra jQa tAm avaBotsyate abadDam amuktam Darma cakram
   pravartayiṣyati abaddhān amuktān sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ	pravartayizyati abadDAn amuktAn sattvAn triBiH yAnEH
   parinirvāpayiṣyaty abaddho 'muktaḥ evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo	parinirvApayizyati abadDaH amuktaH evam hi Ayuzman pUrNa boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abaddho 'muktaḥ sarvadharmān	mahAsattvaH zaxBiH pAramitABiH abadDaH amuktaH sarva DarmAn
   abhisaṃbhotsyate asattvām upādāya evaṃ viviktatā yāvad (PSP1: 194)	aBisaMBotsyate asattvAm upAdAya evam viviktatA yAvat (PSP1: 194)
   anutpannatām upādāya evaṃ hy āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anutpanna tAm upAdAya evam hi Ayuzman pUrNa boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   abaddho 'mukto mahāyānasannāho veditavyaḥ iti yuganaddhamārgasambhāraḥ	abadDaH amuktaH mahA yAna sanna ahaH veditavyaH iti yuga nadDa mArga samBAraH
   atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat katamad bhagavan	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat katamat Bagavan
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam kaTam Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ kutas tad yānaṃ niryāsyati kva	mahAsattvaH mahAyAna saMprasTitaH veditavyaH kutas tat yAnam niryAsyati kva
   vā tad yānaṃ sthāsyati ko vā tena yānena niryāsyati evam ukte bhagavān	vA tat yAnam sTAsyati kaH vA tena yAnena niryAsyati evam ukte BagavAn
   āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat yat subhūte evaṃ vadasi katamad	Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat yat suBUte evam vadasi katamat 
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam iti ṣaṭpāramitāḥ subhūte	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam iti zaz pAramitAH suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam katamā ṣaṭpāramitā dānapāramitā	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam katamA zaz pAramitA dAna pAramitA
   śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā	SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA
   subhūtir āha katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā	suBUtiH Aha katamA Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA
   bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānaṃ dadāti yad	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH dAnam dadAti yat 
   utādhyātmikabāhyāni vastūni tāni ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai	uta ADyAtmika bAhyAni vastUni tAni ca sarva sattva sADAraNAni kRtvA anuttarAyE
   samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati parāṃś ca tatra samādāpayati	samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati parAn ca tatra samAdApayati
   anupalambhayogena iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā	anupalamBa yogena iyam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya dAna pAramitA
   subhūtir āha katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā	suBUtiH Aha katamA Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitA
   bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair ātmanā ca daśa kuśalān	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH AtmanA ca daSa kuSalAn
   karmapathān samādāya varttate parāṃś ca daśakuśale karmapathe samādāpayati	karma paTAn samAdAya varttate parAn ca daSa kuSale karma paTe samAdApayati
   anupalambhayogena iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparāmṛṣṭā	anupalamBa yogena iyam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya aparAmRzwA
   śīlapāramitā subhūtir āha katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	SIla pAramitA suBUtiH Aha katamA Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   kṣāntipāramitā bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	kzAnti pAramitA BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair ātmanā ca kṣāntisamāpanno	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH AtmanA ca kzAnti samApannaH 
   bhavati parāṃś ca kṣāntau samādāpayati anupalambhayogena iyaṃ subhūte	Bavati parAn ca kzAntO samAdApayati anupalamBa yogena iyam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā subhūtir āha katamā bhagavan	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kzAnti pAramitA suBUtiH Aha katamA Bagavan
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā (PSP1: 195) bhagavān āha iha	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya vIrya pAramitA (PSP1: 195) BagavAn Aha iha
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH 
   pañcasu pāramitāsu anikṣiptadhūro viharati parāṃś ca tāsu pañcasu	paQcasu pAramitAsu anikzipta DUraH viharati parAn ca tAsu paQcasu
   pāramitāsu samādāpayati anupalambhayogena iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	pAramitAsu samAdApayati anupalamBa yogena iyam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā subhūtir āha katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvasya vIrya pAramitA suBUtiH Aha katamA Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo	mahAsattvasya DyAna pAramitA BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair ātmanā	mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH AtmanA
   copāyakauśalyena dhyānāni samāpadyate na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate parāṃś	ca upAya kOSalyena DyAnAni samApadyate na ca tezAm vaSena upapadyate parAn= 
   ca dhyāneṣu samādāpayati anupalambhayogena iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	ca DyAnezu samAdApayati anupalamBa yogena iyam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā subhūtir āha katamā bhagavan bodhisattvasya	mahAsattvasya DyAna pAramitA suBUtiH Aha katamA Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā bhagavān āha iha subhūte bodhisattvo	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA BagavAn Aha iha suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair sarvadharmān	mahAsattvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH citta utpAdEH sarva DarmAn
   abhiniviśate sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ pratyavekṣate	aBiniviSate sarva DarmANAm ca prakRtim pratyavekzate
   sarvadharmaprakṛtipratyavekṣāyāṃ ca sattvāṃś ca samādāpayati	sarva Darma prakRti pratyavekzAyAm ca sattvAn ca samAdApayati
   anupalambhayogena iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā	anupalamBa yogena iyam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitA
   idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam ity	idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam iti 
   upāyakauśalyasambhāraḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	upAya kOSalya samBAraH punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā	mahAyAnam yat uta aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA
   śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā	SUnyatA SUnyatA mahA SUnyatA parama arTa SUnyatA saMskRta SUnyatA
   atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā	atyanta SUnyatA anavara agra SUnyatA anavakAra SUnyatA prakRti SUnyatA
   sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā	sarva Darma SUnyatA sva lakzaNa SUnyatA anupalamBa SUnyatA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA BAva SUnyatA aBAva SUnyatA svaBAva SUnyatA
   parabhāvaśūnyatā tatra katamā adhyātmaśūnyatā ādhyātmikā dharmā ucyante	para BAva SUnyatA tatra katamAH aDyAtma SUnyatAH ADyAtmikAH DarmAH ucyante
   cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ tatra cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ	cakzuH Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH tatra cakzuH cakzuzA SUnyam
   akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā śrotraṃ	akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA Srotram
   śrotreṇa śūnyaṃ akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir	SrotreNa SUnyam akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH 
   asyaiṣā ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyaṃ akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ	asya ezA GrANam GrANena SUnyam akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH
   prakṛtir asyaiṣā jihvā jihvayā śūnyām akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya	prakRtiH asya ezA jihvA jihvayA SUnyAm akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya
   hetoḥ prakṛtir asyā eṣā kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat	hetoH prakRtiH asyAH ezA kAyaH kAyena SUnyaH akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat 
   kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā mano manasā śūnyaṃ akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya	kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA manaH manasA SUnyam akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya
   tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā iyam ucyate adhyātmaśūnyatā tatra katamā	tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA iyam ucyate aDyAtma SUnyatA tatra katamA
   bahirdhāśūnyatā ye bahirdhā dharmās tad yathā	bahirDA SUnyatA ye bahirDA DarmAH tat yaTA
   rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāḥ tatra rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam	rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya DarmAH tatra rUpam rUpeNa SUnyam
   akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā, śabdaḥ	akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA, SabdaH
   śabdena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā	Sabdena SUnyaH akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA
   gandho gandhena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir	ganDaH ganDena SUnyaH akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH 
   asyaiṣā raso rasena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ	asya ezA rasaH rasena SUnyaH akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH

   upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā dharmo dharmeṇa śūnyo	upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA DarmaH DarmeNa SUnyaH 
   'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā iyam ucyate	akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA iyam ucyate
   bahirdāśūnyatā tatra katamā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ṣaḍādhyātmikāny	bahis dASUnyatA tatra katamA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA zaz ADyAtmikAni 
   āyatanāni ṣaḍbāhyāny āyatanāni iyam ucyate adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā tatra	AyatanAni zaz bAhyAni AyatanAni iyam ucyate aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA tatra
   katamā ādhyātmikā dharmā bahirdhādharmaiḥ śūnyāś	katamA ADyAtmikAH DarmAH bahirDA DarmEH SUnyAS

   akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyā eṣā iyam ucyate	akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asyAH ezA iyam ucyate
   śūnyatāśūnyatā tatra katamā mahāśūnyatā pūrvā dik pūrvayā diśā śūnyā evaṃ	SUnyatA SUnyatA tatra katamA mahASUnyatA pUrvA diS pUrvayA diSA SUnyAH evam
   dakṣiṇā paścimā uttarā uttarapūrvā pūrvadakṣiṇā dakṣiṇapaścimā	dakziNA paScimA uttarA uttara pUrvA pUrva dakziNA dakziNa paScimA

   akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā iyam ucyate	akUwa sTA vinASitAm upAdAya tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA iyam ucyate

   saṃskṛtānāṃ vā asaṃskṛtānāṃ vā na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā	saMskRtAnAm vA asaMskRtAnAm vA na SrAvakEH kRtA na pratyekabudDEH kRtA

   rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo	rUpam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam cakzuH Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH

   yad uta śūarṅgamo nāma samādhiḥ ratnamudro nāma samādhiḥ sucandro nāma	yat uta SUarFgamaH nAma samADiH ratnamudraH nAma samADiH sucandraH nAma

   yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ dhārayati tenocyate	yatra samADO sTitvA sarva sama aDInAm pradIpam DArayati tena ucyate

   samādhau sthitvā anantāṃ prabhāṃ karoti tenocyate 'nantaprabho nāma	samADO sTitvA anantAm praBAm karoti tena ucyate anantapraBaH nAma

   katamaḥ śuddhasāro nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ	katamaH SudDasAraH nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA sarva sama aDInAm

   tatra katamaḥ ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā	tatra katamaH ratikaraH nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA

   katamaḥ vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ	katamaH vidyutpradIpaH nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA sarva sama aDInAm
   pradīpaṃ karoti tenocyate vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ akṣayo	pradIpam karoti tena ucyate vidyutpradIpaH nAma samADiH tatra katamaH akzayaH 
   nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā samādhīnāṃ naivākṣayaṃ na kṣayaṃ	nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA samADInAm na eva akzayam na kzayam
   samanupaśyati tenocyate 'kṣayo nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ vajramaṇḍalo	samanupaSyati tena ucyate akzayaH nAma samADiH tatra katamaH vajramaNxalaH 
   nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhimaṇḍalāni dhārayati	nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA sarva samADi maNxalAni DArayati
   tenocyate vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ akṣayāpagato nāma	tena ucyate vajramaNxalaH nAma samADiH tatra katamaH akzaya apagataH nAma
   samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ kṣayaṃ samanupaśyati tathā	samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA sarva samADInAm kzayam samanupaSyati taTA
   ca paśyati yathā aṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati tenocyate akṣayāpagato	ca paSyati yaTA aNum api Darmam na samanupaSyati tena ucyate akzaya apagataH 
   nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ aniñjyo nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā	nAma samADiH tatra katamaH aniQjyaH nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA
   sarvasamādhīn neñjayati na manyate na spandate na prapañcayati tenocyate	sarva samADIn na iQjayati na manyate na spandate na prapaQcayati tena ucyate
   'niñjyo nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau	aniQjyaH nAma samADiH tatra katamaH vivRtaH nAma samADiH yatra samADO

   āpatsyate na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati cittam iti tenocyate cittasthitir nāma	Apatsyate na ca asya evam Bavati cittam iti tena ucyate cittasTitiH nAma

   samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ sarvasukhaduḥkhanirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ yatra	samADiH tatra katamaH sarva suKa duHKa niraBinandI nAma samADiH yatra
   samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhiṣu sukhaduḥkhāni na samanupaśyati tenocyate	samADO sTitvA sarva samADizu suKa duHKAni na samanupaSyati tena ucyate
   sarvasukhaduḥkhanirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ (PSP1: 203)	sarva suKa duHKa niraBinandI nAma samADiH tatra katamaH (PSP1: 203)
   akṣayākāro nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ kṣayaṃ na	akzaya AkAraH nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA sarva samADInAm kzayam na

   paripūrṇacandravimalo nāma samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā tasya	paripUrNacandravimalaH nAma samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA tasya
   sarvasamādhayaḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti tad yathāpi nāma candraḥ pūrṇamāsyāṃ	sarva samADayaH paripUrNAH Bavanti tat yaTA api nAma candraH pUrNamAsyAm
   tenocyate paripūrṇacandravimalo nāma samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ mahāvyūho nāma	tena ucyate paripUrNacandravimalaH nAma samADiH tatra katamaH mahA vyUhaH nAma
   samādhiḥ yatra samādhau sthitvā tasya sarvasamādhayo mahāvyūhena	samADiH yatra samADO sTitvA tasya sarva samADayaH mahA vyUhena

   mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato mahāyānam iti puṇyasambhāraḥ punar	mahAsattvasya prajQApAramitAyAn carataH mahAyAnam iti puNya samBAraH punar 
   aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yad uta catvāri	aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta catvAri
   smṛtyupasthānāni katamāni catvāri kāyasmṛtyupasthānānaṃ	smRti upasTAnAni katamAni catvAri kAya smRti upasTAnAnam
   vedanāsmṛtyupasthānānaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānānaṃ	vedanA smRti upasTAnAnam citta smRti upasTAnAnam Darma smRti upasTAnAnam

   dharmasmṛtyupasthānānaṃ iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmakāye	Darma smRti upasTAnAnam iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH aDyAtma kAye
   kāyānupāśyī viharati na ca kāyasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac	kAyAnupASyI viharati na ca kAya saha gatAn vitarkAn vitarkayati tat

   vitarkān vitarkayati tac cānupalambhayogena adhyātmabahirdhākāye	vitarkAn vitarkayati tat ca anupalamBa yogena aDyAtma bahirDAkAye

   'bhidhyādaumanasye evaṃ adhyātmaṃ vedanāsu citte adhyātmaṃ dharmeṣu	aBiDyAdOmanasye evam aDyAtmam vedanAsu citte aDyAtmam Darmezu
   dharmānupaśyī viharati na ca dharmasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac	Darma anupaSyI viharati na ca Darma saha gatAn vitarkAn vitarkayati tat

   kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caraṃś	kAye kAyAnupaSyI viharati iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH caraMS
   carāmīti prajānāti sthitaḥ sthito 'smīti prajānāti niṣaṇṇo niṣaṇṇo 'smīti	carAmi iti prajAnAti sTitaH sTitaH asmi iti prajAnAti nizaNNaH nizaNNaH asmi iti
