   ayaṃ śāliḥ, ayaṃ vrīhī, amī tilāḥ, amī taṇḍulāḥ, amī mudgāḥ, amī māṣāḥ,	ayam SAliH, ayam vrIhI, amI tilAH, amI taNxulAH, amI mudgAH, amI mAzAH,
   amī yavāḥ, amī godhūmāḥ, amī samūrāḥ, amī sarṣapā iti evam eva subhūte	amI yavAH, amI goDUmAH, amI sa mUrAH, amI sarzapAH iti evam eva suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam eva kāyamūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imam eva kAyam UrDvam pAda talAt aDas keSa mastakAt 
   nakharomatvakparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ	naKa roma tvac paryantam pUrNam nAnA prakArasya aSuceH yaTABUtam
   pratyavekṣate santy asmin kāye keśaromāṇi nakhā dantās tvak carma māṃsas	pratyavekzate santi asmin kAye keSa romANi naKAH dantAH tvac carma mAMsas
   jāyavaḥ śoṇitam asthimajjāhṛdayaṃ vṛkkāyakṛtklomaplīhā āmamantrāṇi	jAyavaH SoNitam asTi majjA hRdayam vRkkAyakRt kloma plIhAH Ama mantrANi
   antraguṇā udaraṃ purīṣaṃ mūtram aśrusvedo medaḥ kheṭaḥ siṃhānakaṃ pūyaṃ	antra guNAH udaram purIzam mUtram aSru svedaH medaH KewaH siMhAnakam pUyam
   lohitaṃ pittaṃ śleṣmā vasā malo mastakaluṅgam akṣigūthakaṃ karṇagūthakaṃ	lohitam pittam SlezmA vasA malaH mastakaluFgam akzi gUTakam karNa gUTakam
   evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran adhyātmaṃ	evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn caran aDyAtmam
   kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke	kAye kAyAnupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan smRtimAn vinIya loke
   'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā	aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yadA
   śmaśānagataḥ paśyati nānārūpāṇi śmaśāne 'paviddhāni śivapathikāyām	SmaSAna gataH paSyati nAnA rUpANi SmaSAne apavidDAni Siva paTikAyAm
   ujjhitāni ekāhamṛtāni vā dvyahamṛtāni tryahamṛtāni vā caturahamṛtāni vā	ujJitAni eka aha mRtAni vA dvi ahamRtAni tri ahamRtAni vA catur aham RtAni vA
   pañcāhamṛtāni vā ādhmātakāni vinīlakāni vā vipūyakāni vā vikhāditakāni vā	paQca ahamRtAni vA ADmAtakAni vinIlakAni vA vipUyakAni vA viKAditakAni vA
   vijñaptakāni vā sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃ	vijQaptakAni vA saH imam eva kAyam tatra upasaMharati ayam api kAyaH evam
   dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte	DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm Darma tAm avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDA kAye kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan
   smṛtimān vinīyaloke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo	smRtimAn vinIya loke aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śmaśāna utsṛṣṭāni ṣaḍātramṛtāni vā	mahAsattvaH yadA mRta SarIrANi paSyati SmaSAnaH utsRzwAni zaz Atra mRtAni vA
   saptarātramṛtāni vā tāni kākair vā khādyamānāni kurarair vā gṛdhrair vā	sapta rAtramRtAni vA tAni kAkEH vA KAdyamAnAni kurarEH vA gRDrEH vA
   śṛgālair vā vṛkair vā śvabhir vā tadanyair vā nānāvidhaiḥ prāṇakajātaiḥ	SRgAlEH vA vRkEH vA SvaBiH vA tad anyEH vA nAnAviDEH prANaka jAtEH
   khādyamānāni sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃ dharmā	KAdyamAnAni saH imam eva kAyam tatra upasaMharati ayam api kAyaH evam DarmA
   evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo	evam svaBAvaH etAm Darma tAm avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān	mahAsattvaH bahirDA kAye kAyAnupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan smRtimAn
   vinīyaloke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	vinIya loke aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   yāni tāni paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāna ujjhitāni khāditakāni aśucīni	yAni tAni paSyati mRta SarIrANi SmaSAnaH ujJitAni KAditakAni aSucIni
   vipūtīni durgandhīni sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃ	vipUtIni durganDIni saH imam eva kAyam tatra upasaMharati ayam api kAyaH evam
   dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte	DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm Darma tAm avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDA kAye kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan
   smṛtimān vinīyaloke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo	smRtimAn vinIya loke aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkulāṃ māṃsaśoṇitamrakṣitāṃ	mahAsattvaH yadA paSyati Siva paTikAyAm asTi saMkulAm mAMsa SoNitamrakzitAm
   snāyuvinibaddhāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati ayam api	snAyu vinibadDa antAm dRzwvA saH imam eva kAyam tatra upasaMharati ayam api
   kāya evaṃ dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte	kAyaH evam DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm Darma tAm avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDA kAye kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan
   smṛtimān vinīyaloke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo	smRtimAn vinIya loke aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo yāni tāni paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalām	mahAsattvaH yAni tAni paSyati mRta SarIrANi Siva paTikAyAm asTi saMkalAm
   apagatamāṃsaśoṇitasnāyuvandhanāntāṃ (PSP1: 207) dṛṣṭvā imam eva kāyaṃ	apagata mAMsa SoNita snAyu vanDana antAm (PSP1: 207) dRzwvA imam eva kAyam
   tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃ dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām	tatra upasaMharati ayam api kAyaH evam DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm Darma tAm
   avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye	avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDAkAye
   kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke	kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan smRtimAn vinIya loke
   'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā	aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yadA
   paśyati śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalāṃ vigrahavandhanaviprayuktāṃ	paSyati Siva paTikAyAm asTi saMkalAm vigraha vanDana viprayuktAm
   visaṃyuktāṃ yathāsaṃkhyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ vikṣiptāḥ sa imam eva kāyaṃ	visaMyuktAm yaTA saMKyAH pRTivyAm vikziptAH saH imam eva kAyam
   tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃ dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām	tatra upasaMharati ayam api kAyaH evam DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm Darma tAm
   avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye	avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDAkAye
   kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke	kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan smRtimAn vinIya loke
   'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā	aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yadA
   paśyati śivapathikāyām astḥīni digvidiśo vikṣiptāni yad utānyena	paSyati Siva paTikAyAm astHIni diS vidiSaH vikziptAni yat uta anyena
   pādāsthīni anyena jaṃghāsthīni anyena urvasthīni anyena śroṇīkaṭāhāsthīni	pAda asTIni anyena jaMGa asTIni anyena uru asTIni anyena SroNI kawAha asTIni
   anyena pṛṣṭhavaṃśāsthīni anyena pārśvakāsthīni anyena grīvāsthīni anyena	anyena pRzWavaMSa asTIni anyena pArSvaka asTIni anyena grIvA asTIni anyena
   vāhvasthīni anyena śiraḥkapālāsthīni sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati	vAhu asTIni anyena SiraH kapAla asTIni saH imam eva kAyam tatra upasaMharati
   ayam api kāya evaṃ dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ	ayam api kAyaH evam DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm DarmatAm avyativRttaH evam
   hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī	hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDA kAye kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI
   saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte	saMprajAnan smRtimAn vinIya loke aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīni anekavārṣikāṇi	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yadA paSyati Siva paTikAyAm asTIni aneka vArzikANi
   anekavarṣaśatāni vātātapaparītāni śvetāni śaṅkhasannibhāni sa imam eva	aneka varza SatAni vAta Atapa parItAni SvetAni SaFKa sanniBAni saH imam eva
   kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃ dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ	kAyam tatra upasaMharati ayam api kAyaH evam DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm
   dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye	DarmatAm avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDAkAye
   kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke	kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan smRtimAn vinIya loke
   'bhidhyādaurmanasye punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā	aBiDyA dOrmanasye punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH yadA
   paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīni tirovārṣikāṇi nīlāni kapotavarṇāni pūtīni	paSyati Siva paTikAyAm asTIni tirovArzikANi nIlAni kapota varNAni pUtIni
   cūrṇakajātāni pṛthivyāṃ pāṃśunā samasamībhūtāni sa imam eva kāyaṃ	cUrNaka jAtAni pRTivyAm pAMSunA sama samIBUtAni saH imam eva kAyam
   tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃ dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām	tatra upasaMharati ayam api kAyaH evam DarmAH evam svaBAvaH etAm Darma tAm
   avyativṛttaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye	avyativRttaH evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH bahirDAkAye
   kāyānupaśyī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke	kAya anupaSyI viharati AtApI saMprajAnan smRtimAn vinIya loke
   'bhidhyādaurmanasye evaṃ vedanāyāṃ citte dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati	aBiDyA dOrmanasye evam vedanAyAm citte Darme Darma anupaSyI viharati
   ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke abhidhyādaurmanasye tac	AtApI saMprajAnan smRtimAn vinIya loke aBiDyA dOrmanasye tat 
   cānupalambhayogena idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam	ca anupalamBa yogena idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam
   punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yad uta	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta
   catvāri samyakprahāṇāni katamāni catvāri iha subhūte bodhisattvo	catvAri samyak prahANAni katamAni catvAri iha suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'nutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandaṃ	mahAsattvaH anutpannAnAm pApakAnAm akuSalAnAm DarmANAm anutpAdAya Candam
   janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti	janayati vyAyacCate vIryam AraBate cittam pratigRhNAti
   samyakpraṇidadhāti utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya	samyak praNidaDAti utpannAnAm pApakAnAm akuSalAnAm DarmANAm prahANAya
   chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhāti	Candam janayati vyAyacCate cittam pratigRhNAti samyak praNidaDAti
   anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate	anutpannAnAm kuSalAnAm DarmANAm utpAdAya Candam janayati vyAyacCate
   cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhāti utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	cittam pratigRhNAti samyak praNidaDAti utpannAnAm kuSalAnAm DarmANAm
   syitaye bhūyo bhavāya asaṃpramoṣāya aparihāṇāya chandaṃ janayati	syitaye BUyas BavAya asaMpramozAya aparihANAya Candam janayati
   vyāyacchate cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhāti tac cānupalambhayogena	vyAyacCate cittam pratigRhNAti samyak praNidaDAti tat ca anupalamBa yogena
   idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparaṃ	idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yad uta catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta catvAraH RdDi pAdAH
   katame catvāraḥ iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś chandasamādhiprahāṇaṃ	katame catvAraH iha suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Canda samADi prahANam
   saṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ	saMskAra samanvAgatam RdDi pAdam BAvayati viveka niSritam virAga niSritam
   nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasarge parigatam evaṃ vīryasamādhiś cittasamādhir	niroDa niSritam vyavasarge parigatam evam vIrya samADiH citta samADiH 
   mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati	mImAMsA samADi prahANa saMskAra samanvAgatam RdDi pAdam BAvayati
   vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasarge (PSP1: 208)	viveka niSritam virAga niSritam niroDa niSritam vyavasarge (PSP1: 208)
   parigatam tac cānupalambhayogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya	parigatam tat ca anupalamBa yogena idam api suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcendriyāṇi katamāni pañca śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ	mahAyAnam yat uta paQca indriyANi katamAni paQca SradDA indriyam vIrya indriyam
   smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam tac cānupalambhayogena idam api	smRti indriyam samADi indriyam prajQA indriyam tat ca anupalamBa yogena idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparam subhūte	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcabalāni katamāni pañca	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta paQca balAni katamAni paQca
   śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalam tac	SradDA balam vIrya balam smRti balam samADi balam prajQA balam tat 
   cānupalambhayogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam	ca anupalamBa yogena idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam
   punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta
   saptabodhyaṅgāni katamāni sapta smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ	sapta boDi aFgAni katamAni sapta smRti saMboDi aFgam
   dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ	Darma pravicaya saMboDi aFgam vIrya saMboDi aFgam prIti saMboDi aFgam
   prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ tatra	prasrabDi saMboDi aFgam samADi saMboDi aFgam upekzA saMboDi aFgam tatra
   katamat smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ yāvad upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ iha subhūte	katamat smRti saMboDi aFgam yAvat upekzA saMboDi aFgam iha suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ yāvad	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn caran smRti saMboDi aFgam yAvat 
   upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ	upekzA saMboDi aFgam BAvayati viveka niSritam virAga niSritam
   nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigatam tac cānupalambhayogena idam api	niroDa niSritam vyavasarga parigatam tat ca anupalamBa yogena idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparam subhūte	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ katama	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta Arya azwa aFga mArgaH katama
   āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ yad uta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyakkarmāntaḥ	Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH yat uta samyak dRzwiH samyak saMkalpaH samyak karmAntaH
   samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ tac	samyak AjIvaH samyak vyAyAmaH samyak smRtiH samyak samADiH tat 
   cānupalambhayogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam	ca anupalamBa yogena idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam
   punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta trayaḥ	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta trayaH
   samādhayaḥ katame trayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaḥ tatra katamaḥ	samADayaH katame trayaH samADayaH SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitaH tatra katamaH
   śūnyatāsamādhiḥ svalakṣaṇena śūnyān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā	SUnyatA samADiH sva lakzaNena SUnyAn sarva DarmAn pratyavekzamANasya yA
   cittasya sthitiḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukham ayam ucyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ	cittasya sTitiH SUnyatA vimokza muKam ayam ucyate SUnyatA samADiH
   animittān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ	animittAn sarva DarmAn pratyavekzamANasya yA cittasya sTitiH
   animittavimokṣamukham ayam ucyate animittasamādhiḥ apraṇihitān	animitta vimokza muKam ayam ucyate animitta samADiH apraNihitAn
   sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ	sarva DarmAn pratyavekzamANasya yA cittasya sTitiH
   apraṇihitavimokṣamukham ayam ucyate apraṇihitasamādhiḥ imāni trīṇi	apraNihita vimokza muKam ayam ucyate apraNihita samADiH imAni trINi
   vimokṣamukhāni trayaḥ samādhayaḥ idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya	vimokza muKAni trayaH samADayaH idam api suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam eteṣu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu śikṣitavyam punar	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam etezu trizu vimokza muKezu Sikzitavyam punar 
   aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta duḥkhajñānaṃ	aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta duHKa jQAnam
   samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ	samudaya jQAnam niroDa jQAnam mArga jQAnam kzaya jQAnam anutpAda jQAnam
   dharmajñānaṃ anvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛttijñānaṃ parijayajñānaṃ (PSP1: 209)	Darma jQAnam anvaya jQAnam saMvRtti jQAnam parijaya jQAnam (PSP1: 209)
   yathārutajñānaṃ tatra katamad duḥkhajñānaṃ yad duḥkhasyānutpādajñānam idaṃ	yaTA aruta jQAnam tatra katamat duHKa jQAnam yat duHKasya anutpAda jQAnam idam
   duḥkhajñānaṃ tatra katamat samudayajñānaṃ yat samudayasya prahāṇajñānaṃ	duHKa jQAnam tatra katamat samudaya jQAnam yat samudayasya prahANa jQAnam
   tatra katamad nirodhajñānaṃ yad duḥkhanirodhajñānaṃ tatra katamad	tatra katamat niroDa jQAnam yat duHKa niroDa jQAnam tatra katamat 
   mārgajñānaṃ yan nirodhasākṣātkaraṇajñānaṃ tatra katamat kṣayajñānaṃ yad	mArga jQAnam yat niroDa sAkzAt karaNa jQAnam tatra katamat kzaya jQAnam yat 
   rāgadoṣamohakṣayajñānaṃ tatra katamad anutpdajñānaṃ yad anutpāde	rAga doza moha kzaya jQAnam tatra katamat anutpda jQAnam yat anutpAde
   anutpādajñānaṃ tatra katamad dharmajñānaṃ yat pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ	anutpAda jQAnam tatra katamat Darma jQAnam yat paQcAnAm skanDAnAm
   dharmopacchedajñānaṃ tatra katamad anvayajñānaṃ cakṣur anityaṃ śrotraṃ	Darma upacCeda jQAnam tatra katamat anvaya jQAnam cakzuH anityam Srotram
   ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityaṃ evaṃ yāvad vyastasamasteṣu	GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH anityam evam yAvat vyasta samastezu
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu ca jñānaṃ tatra katamat	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu ca jQAnam tatra katamat 
   saṃvṛttijñānaṃ yat parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetaso jñānaṃ	saMvRtti jQAnam yat para sattvAnAm para pudgalAnAm cetasA eva cetasaH jQAnam
   tatra katamat parijayajñānaṃ yat pratipatparijayajñānaṃ tatra katamad	tatra katamat parijaya jQAnam yat pratipad parijaya jQAnam tatra katamat 
   yathārutajñānaṃ yat tat tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ tac	yaTA aruta jQAnam yat tat taTAgatasya sarva AkAra jQa tA jQAnam tat 
   cānupalambhayogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam	ca anupalamBa yogena idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam
   punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad idaṃ	punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat idam
   trīṇīndriyāni katamāni trīṇi anājñātam ājñāsyāmīndriyam ājñendriyam	trINi indriyAni katamAni trINi anAjQAtam AjQAsyAmi indriyam AjQa indriyam
   ājñātāvīndriyaṃ tatra katamat anājñātam ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ yac chaikṣāṇāṃ	AjQAta avi indriyam tatra katamat anAjQAtam AjQAsyAmi indriyam yat SEkzANAm
   pudgalānām anabhisamitānām anavabhāsaṃ yad avinayaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ	pudgalAnAm anaBisamitAnAm anavaBAsam yat avinayam SradDA indriyam
   vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyate	vIrya indriyam smRti indriyam samADi indriyam prajQA indriyam idam ucyate
   anājñātam ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ tatra katamad ājñendriyaṃ yac chaikṣāṇāṃ	anAjQAtam AjQAsyAmi indriyam tatra katamat AjQa indriyam yat SEkzANAm
   pudgalānām ājñātavatāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ	pudgalAnAm AjQAtavatAm SradDA indriyam vIrya indriyam smRti indriyam
   samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyate ājñendriyaṃ tatra katamad	samADi indriyam prajQA indriyam idam ucyate AjQa indriyam tatra katamat 
   ājñātāvīndriyaṃ yad utāśaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ	AjQAta avi indriyam yat uta aSEkzANAm pudgalAnAm arhatAm pratyekabudDAnAm
   bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ	boDisattvAnAm taTAgatAnAm arhatAm samyaksaMbudDAnAm SradDA indriyam
   vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyate	vIrya indriyam smRti indriyam samADi indriyam prajQA indriyam idam ucyate
   ājñātāvīndriyaṃ idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam	AjQAta avi indriyam idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam
   anupalambhayogena punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anupalamBa yogena punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānaṃ yad uta savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko 'vicāramātraḥ	mahAyAnam yat uta savitarkaH sa vicAraH samADiH avitarkaH avicAra mAtraH
   samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ savitrkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ iha subhūte	samADiH tatra katamaH savitrkaH sa vicAraH samADiH iha suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH viviktam kAmEH viviktam pApakEH akuSalEH 
   dharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam	DarmEH sa vitarka sa vicAram viveka jam prIti suKam praTamam DyAnam
   upasampadya viharati ayam ucyate savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ tatra	upasampadya viharati ayam ucyate savitarkaH sa vicAraH samADiH tatra
   (PSP1: 210) katamo 'vitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ yaḥ prathamasya	(PSP1: 210) katamaH avitarkaH avicAra mAtraH samADiH yaH praTamasya
   dhyānasya dvitīyasya dhyānasyāntariko 'yam ucyate avitarko 'vicāramātraḥ	DyAnasya dvitIyasya DyAnasya antarikaH ayam ucyate avitarkaH avicAra mAtraH
   samādhiḥ tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhir yad dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ	samADiH tatra katamaH avitarkaH avicAraH samADiH yat dvitIyam DyAnam
   vistareṇa kartavyaṃ yāvan naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir ayam ucyate	vistareNa kartavyam yAvat na eva saMjQAna asaMjQA Ayatana samApattiH ayam ucyate
   'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	avitarkaH avicAraH samADiH idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānam anupalambhayogena punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya	mahAyAnam anupalamBa yogena punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta daśānusmṛtayaḥ katamā daśa yad uta	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta daSa anusmRtayaH katamA daSa yat uta
   buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtir aṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtiḥ tyāgānusmṛtir	budDa anusmRtiH Darma anusmRtiH aMGa anusmRtiH SIla anusmRtiH tyAga anusmRtiH 
   devatānusmṛtir ūrdhvagānusmṛtir maraṇānusmṛtiḥ kāyānusmṛtir	devatA anusmRtiH UrDva gA anusmRtiH maraNa anusmRtiH kAya anusmRtiH 
   ānāpānānusmṛtiḥ idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam	AnA pAna anusmRtiH idam api suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam
   anupalambhayogena punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	anupalamBa yogena punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   mahāyānaṃ yad uta catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra	mahAyAnam yat uta catvAri DyAnAni catvAri apramANAni catasra
   ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ idam api	ArUpya samApattayaH azwO vimokzAH nava anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH idam api
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparam subhūte	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ daśa tathāgatabalāni katamāni daśa	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam daSa taTAgata balAni katamAni daSa
   yad uta iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthānañ ca sthānato 'sthānañ	yat uta iha boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sTAnan ca sTAnataH asTAnaQ
   cāsthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ	ca AsTAnataH yaTABUtam prajAnAti atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm ca karmaNAm
   karmasamādānānāṃ ca sthānato hetuto vipākañ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti	karma samAdAnAnAm ca sTAnataH hetutaH vipAkan ca yaTABUtam prajAnAti
   nānādhātukaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ	nAnA DAtukam yaTABUtam prajAnAti para sattvAnAm para pudgalAnAm
   nānādhimuktikatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānām	nAnA aDimuktika tAm yaTABUtam prajAnAti para sattvAnAm para pudgalAnAm
   indriyaparāparajñānatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ	indriya para apara jQAna tAm yaTABUtam prajAnAti sarvatra gAminIm pratipadam
   yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ	yaTABUtam prajAnAti para sattvAnAm para pudgalAnAm
   dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisaṃkleśavyavadānavyutthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ	DyAna vimokza samADi samApatti saMkleSa vyavadAna vyutTAnam yaTABUtam
   prajānāti so 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā	prajAnAti saH anekaviDam pUrva nivAsam anusmarati sa ca divyena cakzuzA
   sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ	sattvAnAm cyuta upapAdam yaTABUtam prajAnAti saH AsravANAm kzayAt anAsravAn
   cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā	cetaH vimuktim prajQA vimuktim dRzwaH eva Darme svayam aBijQAya sAkzAtkRtvA
   upasampadya viharati kṣīnā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ	upasampadya viharati kzInA me jAtiH uzitam brahmacaryam kRtam karaNIyam
   nāparamithyātvam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya	na apara miTyAtvam iti yaTABUtam prajAnAti idam api suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena (PSP1: 211) punar aparam subhūte	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam anupalamBa yogena (PSP1: 211) punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catvāri vaiśāradyāni	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta catvAri vESAradyAni
   katamāni catvāri yad uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me pratijānataḥ ime	katamAni catvAri yat uta samyaksaMbudDasya vata me pratijAnataH ime
   dharmā abhisaṃbuddhā iti atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā devo vā māro vā	DarmAH aBisaMbudDAH iti atra ca me kaScid SramaNaH vA devaH vA mAraH vA
   brahmā vā kaścid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa codayed iti nimittam etan na	brahmA vA kaScid vA punar loke saha DarmeNa codayet iti nimittam etat na
   samanupaśyāmi idam atra nimittam asamanupaśyan kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāpto	samanupaSyAmi idam atra nimittam asamanupaSyan kzema prAptaH aBaya prAptaH 
   viharāmi ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāmi parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi	viharAmi ArzaBam sTAnam prajAnAmi parzadi samyak siMhanAdam nadAmi
   brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmi apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena	brAhmam cakram pravartayAmi apravartitam SramaNena vA brAhmaNena vA devena
   vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti	vA mAreNa vA brahmaNA vA kenacid vA punar loke saha DarmeNa iti
   kṣīṇāśravasya vata me pratijānataḥ ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā iti naitat	kzINa ASravasya vata me pratijAnataH ime AsravAH aparikzINAH iti na etat 
   sthānaṃ vidyate atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā peyālaṃ yāvad	sTAnam vidyate atra ca me kaScid SramaNaH vA brAhmaNaH vA peyAlam yAvat 
   brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmi apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena	brAhmam cakram pravartayAmi apravartitam SramaNena vA brAhmaNena vA devena
   vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti ye khalu	vA mAreNa vA brahmaNA vA kenacid vA punar loke saha DarmeNa iti ye Kalu
   punar ime mayā āntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātās tān pratiṣevamāṇasya nālam	punar ime mayA AntarAyikAH DarmAH AKyAtAH tAn pratizevamANasya na alam
   antarāyāyeti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate atra me kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā	antarAyAya iti na etat sTAnam vidyate atra me kaScid SramaNaH vA brAhmaNaH vA
   peyālaṃ yāvat kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇeti yā mayā	peyAlam yAvat kenacid vA punar loke saha DarmeNa iti yA mayA
   pratipadākhyātā āryā nairyāṇikī niryāti tat karasya samyag duḥkhakṣayāya	pratipad A AKyAtA AryA nEryANikI niryAti tat karasya samyak duHKa kzayAya
   tāṃ pratipadyamāno na niryāyāt samyag duḥkhakṣayāyeti naitat sthānaṃ	tAm pratipadyamAnaH na niryAyAt samyak duHKa kzayAya iti na etat sTAnam
   vidyate atra ca me kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā peyālaṃ yāvat kenacid vā	vidyate atra ca me kaScid SramaNaH vA brAhmaNaH vA peyAlam yAvat kenacid vA
   punar loke saha dharmeṇeti imāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni idam api subhūte	punar loke saha DarmeNa iti imAni catvAri vESAradyAni idam api suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena punar aparam	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam anupalamBa yogena punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catasraḥ	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta catasraH
   pratisaṃvidaḥ katamāś catasraḥ dharmapratisaṃvid arthapratisaṃvid	pratisaMvidaH katamAH catasraH Darma pratisaMvid arTa pratisaMvid 
   niruktipratisaṃvit pratibhānapratisaṃvit idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya	nirukti pratisaMvid pratiBAna pratisaMvid idam api suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena punar aparam subhūte	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam anupalamBa yogena punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad utāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH
   katame aṣṭādaśa yad uta yāñ ca rātriṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan	katame azwAdaSa yat uta yAn ca rAtrim suBUte taTAgataH arhan
   samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ yāñ ca rātrim upādāya parinirvāsyati	samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDaH yAn ca rAtrim upAdAya parinirvAsyati
   etasminn antare subhūte nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ nāsti cavitaṃ nāsti	etasmin antare suBUte na asti taTAgatasya sKalitam na asti cavitam na asti
   muṣitasmṛtitā nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā nāsty asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ nāsty	muzita smRti tA na asti nAnAtva saMjQA na asti asamAhitam cittam na asti 
   apratisaṃkhyā (PSP1: 212) copekṣā nāsti chandaparihāṇir nāsti	apratisaMKyA (PSP1: 212) ca upekzA na asti Canda parihANiH na asti
   vīryaparihāṇir nāsti smṛtiparihāṇir nāsti samādhiparihāṇir nāsti	vIrya parihANiH na asti smRti parihANiH na asti samADi parihANiH na asti
   prajñāparihāṇir nāsti vimuktiparihāṇiḥ	prajQA parihANiH na asti vimukti parihANiH
   sarvakāyakarmajñānapūrvaṅgamajñānānuparivartti	sarva kAya karma jQAna pUrvaFgam ajQAna anuparivartti
   sarvavākkarmajñānapūrvaṅgamajñānānuparivartti	sarva vAkkarma jQAna pUrvaFgam ajQAna anuparivartti
   sarvamanaskarmajñānapūrvaṅgamajñānānuparivartti atīte 'dhvany apratihatam	sarva manaskarma jQAna pUrvaFgam ajQAna anuparivartti atIte aDvani apratihatam
   asaṅgajñānan darśanañ ca anāgate 'dhvany apratihatam asaṅgajñānan darśanañ	asaFga jQAnan darSanan ca anAgate aDvani apratihatam asaFga jQAnan darSanaQ
   ca pratyutpanne 'dhvany apratihatam asaṅgajñānan darśanañ ca pravarttate	ca pratyutpanne aDvani apratihatam asaFga jQAnan darSanan ca pravarttate
   ime aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ idam pi subhūte bodhisattvasya	ime azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH idam pi suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena iti mārgasambhāraḥ punar aparam	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam anupalamBa yogena iti mArga samBAraH punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta dhāraṇīmukhāni yad	suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat uta DAraNI muKAni yat 
   utākṣaranayasamatākṣaramukham akṣarapraveśaḥ katamo 'kṣaranayasamatā	uta akzara naya samatA akzara muKam akzara praveSaH katamaH akzara naya sama tA
   akṣaramukham akṣarapraveśaḥ akāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvāt	akzara muKam akzara praveSaH akAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm Adi anud panna tvAt 
   repho mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ rajo 'pagatatvāt pakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	rePaH muKaH sarva DarmANAm rajaH apagata tvAt pakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   paramārthanirdeśāt cakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	parama arTa nirdeSAt cakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   cyavanopapattyanupalabdhitvāt nakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nāmāpagatatvāt	cyavana upapatti anupalabDi tvAt nakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm nAma apagata tvAt
   lakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ lokottīrṇatvāt	lakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm loka uttIrNa tvAt 
   tṛṣṇālatāhetupratyayasamudghātitvāt ca dakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	tRzNA latA hetu pratyaya samudGAti tvAt ca dakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   dāntadamathaparicchinnatvāt bakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	dAnta damaTa paricCinna tvAt bakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   bandhanavimuktatvāt ḍakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ḍamarāpagatatvāt sakāro	banDana vimukta tvAt xakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm xamara apagata tvAt sa kAraH 
   mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṅgānupalabdhitvāt vakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	muKaH sarva DarmANAm saFga anupalabDi tvAt vakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   vākpathaghoṣasamucchinnatvāt takāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā	vAc paTa Goza samucCinna tvAt takAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm taTatA
   'calitatvāt yakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathāvad anutpādatvāt stakāro	acalita tvAt yakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm yaTAvat anutpAda tvAt stakAraH 
   mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ stambhānupalabdhitvāt kakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	muKaH sarva DarmANAm stamBa anupalabDi tvAt kakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   kārakānupalabdhitvāt sakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatānupalabdhitvāt	kAraka anupalabDi tvAt sakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm samatA anupalabDi tvAt 
   makāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ mamakārānupalabdhitvāt gakāro mukhaḥ	makAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm mamakAra anupalabDi tvAt gakAraH muKaH
   sarvadharmāṇāṃ gaganānupalabdhitaḥ sthakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	sarva DarmANAm gagana anupalabDitaH sTakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   sthānānupalabdhitaḥ jakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ jātyanupalabdhitaḥ	sTAna anupalabDitaH jakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm jAti anupalabDitaH
   śvakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ śvāsānupalabdhitaḥ dhakāro mukhaḥ	SvakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm SvAsa anupalabDitaH DakAraH muKaH
   sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmadhātvanupalabdhitaḥ śakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ	sarva DarmANAm DarmaDAtu anupalabDitaH SakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm
   śamathānupalabdhitaḥ khakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ khasamatānupalabdhitaḥ	SamaTa anupalabDitaH KakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm Ka sa mata anupalabDitaH
   kṣakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣayānupalabdhitaḥ takāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ	kzakAraH muKaH sarva DarmANAm kzaya anupalabDitaH takAra muKAH sarva DarmAH
   tac cānupalabdhitaḥ (PSP1: 213) jñakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ	tat ca anupalabDitaH (PSP1: 213) jQakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH
   sarvajñānānupalabdhitaḥ hakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ hetor anupalabdhitaḥ	sarva jQAna anupalabDitaH hakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH hetoH anupalabDitaH
   cchakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ chaver apy anupalabdhitaḥ smakāramukhāḥ	cCakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH CaveH api anupalabDitaH smakAra muKAH
   sarvadharmāḥ smaraṇānupalabdhitaḥ ddhakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmā	sarva DarmAH smaraNa anupalabDitaH dDakAra muKAH sarva DarmA
   āddhānāpagatatvāt sakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmā utsāhānupalabdhitaḥ	AdDAna apagata tvAt sakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH utsAha anupalabDitaH
   ghakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ ghanānupalabdhitaḥ ṭhakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ	GakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH Gana anupalabDitaH WakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH
   viṭhapanānupalabdhitaḥ ṇakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ raṇavigatatvāt	viWapana anupalabDitaH NakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH raNa vigata tvAt 
   phakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ phalānupalabdhitaḥ skakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ	PakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH Pala anupalabDitaH skakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH
   skandhānupalabdhitaḥ jakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ jarānupalabdhitaḥ	skanDa anupalabDitaH jakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH jarA anupalabDitaH
   cakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ caraṇānupalabdhitaḥ ṭakāramukhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ	cakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH caraNa anupalabDitaH wakAra muKAH sarva DarmAH
   ṭhaṃkārānupalabdhitaḥ ḍhakāro mukhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ ḍaṃkārānupalabdhitaḥ	WaMkAra anupalabDitaH XakAraH muKaH sarva DarmAH xaMkAra anupalabDitaH
   nāsti ata uttari akṣayavyavahāraḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi na kasyacin	na asti atas uttari akzaya vyavahAraH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi na kasyacid 
   nāmāsti yena saṃvyavahriyeta yena vābhilapyeta yena nirdiśyeta yena	nAma asti yena saMvyavahriyeta yena vA aBilapyeta yena nirdiSyeta yena
   lakṣyeta yena paśyet tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśam evam eva sarvadharmā	lakzyeta yena paSyet tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam evam eva sarva DarmA
   anugantavyāḥ ayaṃ subhūte dhāraṇīpraveśo 'kārādyakṣaranirdeśapraveśaḥ yaḥ	anugantavyAH ayam suBUte DAraNI praveSaH akAra Adi akzara nirdeSa praveSaH yaH
   kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idam akārādyakṣarakauśalyapraveśaṃ	kaScid suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH idam akAra Adi akzara kOSalya praveSam
   jñāsyati na sa kvacid rute pratihanyate sarvaṃ taṃ dharmatayā	jQAsyati na sa kvacid rute pratihanyate sarvam tam Darma tayA
   samādhayiṣyati rutajñānakauśalyañ ca pratilapsyate yo hi kaścit subhūte	samADayizyati ruta jQAna kOSalyan ca pratilapsyate yaH hi kaScid suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattva imām akārādyakṣaramudrāṃ śroṣyati śrutvā	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH imAm akAra Adi akzara mudrAm Srozyati SrutvA
   codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pareṣāṃ deśayiṣyati ramayati tayā	ca udgrahIzyati DArayizyati vAcayizyati parezAm deSayizyati ramayati tayA
   santatyā tasya viṃśatir anuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ katamā viṃśatiḥ	santatyA tasya viMSatiH anuSaMsAH pratikAMkzitavyAH katamA viMSatiH
   smṛtimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati matimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati gatimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati	smRtimAn ca Bavizyati matimAn ca Bavizyati gatimAn ca Bavizyati
   dhṛtimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati hrīmāṃś ca prajñāvāṃś ca pratibhānavāṃś ca	DRtimAn ca Bavizyati hrImAn ca prajQAvAn ca pratiBAnavAn ca
   satyakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati idaṃ dhāraṇīmukham alpakṛcchreṇa pratilapsyate	satyakuSalaH ca Bavizyati idam DAraNI muKam alpa kRcCreNa pratilapsyate
   na ca kathaṃkathī bhaviṣyati vimatiś cāsya na bhaviṣyati na ca ślakṣṇāṃ	na ca kaTaMkaTI Bavizyati vimatiH ca asya na Bavizyati na ca SlakzNAm
   vācaṃ śrutvā pareṣv anunīto bhaviṣyati na ca paruṣayā vācā pratihanyate na	vAcam SrutvA parezu anunItaH Bavizyati na ca paruzayA vAcA pratihanyate na
   connato bhaviṣyati nāvanataḥ yathāsthita eva bhaviṣyati rutakuśalaś ca	ca unnataH Bavizyati na avanataH yaTA sTitaH eva Bavizyati ruta kuSalaH ca
   bhaviṣyati skandhakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati dhātukuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati	Bavizyati skanDa kuSalaH ca Bavizyati DAtu kuSalaH ca Bavizyati
   āyatanakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati satyakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati	Ayatana kuSalaH ca Bavizyati satya kuSalaH ca Bavizyati
   pratītyasamutpādakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati hetukuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati	pratItyasamutpAda kuSalaH ca Bavizyati hetu kuSalaH ca Bavizyati
   pratyayakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati dharmakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati	pratyaya kuSalaH ca Bavizyati Darma kuSalaH ca Bavizyati
   indriyaparipūrṇajñānakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati (PSP1: 214)	indriya paripUrNa jQAna kuSalaH ca Bavizyati (PSP1: 214)
   paracittajñānakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati ṛddhividhijñānakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati	para citta jQAna kuSalaH ca Bavizyati RdDi viDi jQAna kuSalaH ca Bavizyati
   divyaśrotrajñānakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānakuśalaś ca	divya Srotra jQAna kuSalaH ca Bavizyati pUrva nivAsa anusmRti jQAna kuSalaH ca
   bhaviṣyati cyutopapattijñānakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati āsravakṣayajñānakuśalaś	Bavizyati cyuta upapatti jQAna kuSalaH ca Bavizyati Asrava kzaya jQAna kuSalaH 
   ca bhaviṣyati sthānāsthānanirdeśakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati atikramaṇakuśalaś	ca Bavizyati sTAna AsTAna nirdeSa kuSalaH ca Bavizyati atikramaNa kuSalaH 
   ca bhaviṣyati iryāpathakuśalaś ca bhaviṣyati imān anuśaṃsān pratilapsyate	ca Bavizyati iryApaTa kuSalaH ca Bavizyati imAn anuSaMsAn pratilapsyate
   iti idam api subhūte dhāraṇīmukham akṣaramukam akāramukhaṃ bodhisattvasya	iti idam api suBUte DAraNI muKam akzaramukam akAra muKam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam iti dhāraṇīsambhāraḥ yad api tat subhūtir evam āha	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam iti DAraNI samBAraH yat api tat suBUtiH evam Aha
   kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamprasthito bhavatīti iha subhūte	kaTam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna samprasTitaH Bavati iti iha suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu caran BUmeH BUmim saMkrAmati
   kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati yad	kaTam ca suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH BUmeH BUmim saMkrAmati yat 
   utāsaṃkrāntyā sarvadharmāṇām tat kasya hetoḥ na hi sa kaścid dharmo ya	uta asaMkrAntyA sarva DarmANAm tat kasya hetoH na hi sa kaScid DarmaH ya
   āgacchati vā gacchati vā saṃkrāmati vā upasaṃkrāmati vā api tu yā	AgacCati vA gacCati vA saMkrAmati vA upasaMkrAmati vE api tu yA
   dharmāṇāṃ bhūmis tān na manyate na cintayati bhūmiparikarma ca karoti na	DarmANAm BUmiH tAn na manyate na cintayati BUmi parikarma ca karoti na
   ca bhūmiṃ samanupaśyati katamac ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	ca BUmim samanupaSyati katamat ca boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   bhūmiparikarma prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	BUmi parikarma praTamAyAm BUmO vartamAnena boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   daśabhūmiparikarmāṇi karaṇīyāni katamāni daśa adhyāśayaparikarma	daSa BUmi parikarmANi karaNIyAni katamAni daSa aDyASaya parikarma
   anupalambhayogena hitavastutāparikarma nimittatānupalambhatām upādāya	anupalamBa yogena hita vastu tA parikarma nimitta tA anupalamBa tAm upAdAya
   sarvasattvasamacittatāparikarma sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya tyāgaparikarma	sarva sattva sama citta tA parikarma sattva anupalabDi tAm upAdAya tyAga parikarma
   dāyakadeyaparigrāhakānupalabdhitām upādāya kalyāṇamitrasevāparikarma tair	dAyaka deya parigrAhaka an upalabDi tAm upAdAya kalyANa mitra sevA parikarma tEH 
   asaṃstāpanatām upādāya saddharmaparyeṣṭiparikarma sarvadharmānupalabdhitām	asan= tApana tAm upAdAya sat Darma paryezwi parikarma sarva Darma anupalabDi tAm
   upādāya abhīkṣṇaṃ naiṣkramyaparikarma gṛhānupalabdhitām upādāya	upAdAya aBIkzNam nEzkramya parikarma gRhAnupalabDi tAm upAdAya
   buddhakāyaspṛhāparikarma lakṣaṇānuvyañjananimittānupalabdhitām upādāya	budDa kAya spRhA parikarma lakzaNa anuvyaQjana nimitta anupalabDi tAm upAdAya
   dharmavivaraṇaparikarma dharmabhedānupalabdhitām upādāya	Darma vivaraNa parikarma Darma Beda anupalabDi tAm upAdAya
   satyavacanaparikarma vacanānupalabdhitām upādāya imāni subhūte	satya vacana parikarma vacana anupalabDi tAm upAdAya imAni suBUte
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamāyā bhūmer daśa parikarmāṇi yāni	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm praTamAyAH BUmeH daSa parikarmANi yAni
   prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśa parikarmāṇi	praTamAyAm BUmO vartamAnena boDisattvena mahAsattvena daSa parikarmANi
   karaṇīyāni (PSP1: 215) punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	karaNIyAni (PSP1: 215) punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamāno 'ṣṭau dharmān manasikaroti teṣu ca	dvitIyAyAm BUmO vartamAnaH azwO DarmAn manasikaroti tezu ca
   pratipadyate katamān aṣṭau yad uta śīlaviśuddhiṃ kṛtajñatāṃ kṛtaveditāṃ	pratipadyate katamAn azwO yat uta SIla viSudDim kRtajQa tAm kRta veditAm
   kṣāntibalapratiṣṭhānaṃ prāmodyapratyanubhavatāṃ sarvasattvāparityāgitayā	kzAnti bala pratizWAnam prAmodya pratyanuBavatAm sarva sattva aparityAgitayA
   mahākaruṇāyā āmukhīkarma gurūṇāṃ śraddhayā gauravaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñāyā	mahA karuNAyAH AmuKIkarma gurUNAm SradDayA gOravam SAstR saMjQAyAH 
   guruśuśrūṣāṃ pāramitās tadyogaparyeṣṭim imān subhūte bodhisattvena	guru SuSrUzAm pAramitAH tad yoga paryezwim imAn suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānenāṣṭau dharmān manasikṛtvā	mahAsattvena dvitIyAyAm BUmO vartamAnena azwO DarmAt manasi kRtvA
   pratipattavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tṛtīyāyāṃ	pratipattavyam punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena tRtIyAyAm
   bhūmau vartamānena pañcasu dharmeṣu sthātavyam katameṣu pañcasu yad uta	BUmO vartamAnena paQcasu Darmezu sTAtavyam katamezu paQcasu yat uta
   bāhuśrutye 'tṛptatāyāṃ tatra cākṣarān abhiniveśe	bAhu Srutye atRpta tAyAm tatra ca akzarAn aBiniveSe
   nirāmiṣadharmadānavivaraṇatāyāṃ tayā cāmanyanatayā	nirAmiza Darma dAna vivaraNa tAyAm tayA ca amanyana tayA
   buddhakṣetrapariśodhanakuśalamūlapariṇāmanatāyāṃ tayā cāmanyanatayā	budDa kzetra pariSoDana kuSala mUla pariNAma natAyAm tayA ca amanyana tayA
   amitasaṃsārāparikhedanatāyāṃ tayā cāmanyanatayā hrīrapatrāpyavyavasthāne	amita saMsAra apari Keda natAyAm tayA ca Amanyana tayA hrIH apatra api avyavasTAne
   tena cāmanyanatayā eṣu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsatvena pañcasu dharmeṣu	tena cAmanyana tayA ezu suBUte boDisattvena mahAsatvena paQcasu Darmezu
   tṛtīyāyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena sthātavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena	tRtIyAyAm BUmO vartamAnena sTAtavyam punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena caturthyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena daśasu dharmeṣu sthātavyam te	mahAsattvena caturTyAm BUmO vartamAnena daSasu Darmezu sTAtavyam te
   ca na parityaktavyāḥ katameṣu daśasu yad uta araṇyavāso 'lpecchatā	ca na parityaktavyAH katamezu daSasu yat uta araNya vAsaH alpa icCatA
   santuṣṭhir dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhānutsarjanaṃ śikṣāyā aparityāgaḥ	santuzWiH DUta guNa saMleKA anutsarjanam SikzAyAH aparityAgaH
   kāmaguṇavijugupsanaṃ nirvitsahagataś cittotpādaḥ sarvāstiparityāgitā	kAma guNa vijugupsanam nirvitsaha gataH citta utpAdaH sarvAsti parityAgitA
   anavalīnacittatā sarvavastunirapekṣatā ime subhūte daśa dharmā	anavalIna citta tA sarva vastu nirapekzatA ime suBUte daSa DarmA
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caturthyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena na parityaktavyā	boDisattvena mahAsattvena caturTyAm BUmO vartamAnena na parityaktavyA
   eṣu ca sthātavyam punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	ezu ca sTAtavyam punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   pañcamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena daśa dharmā parivarjayitavyāḥ katame daśa yad	paQcamyAm BUmO vartamAnena daSa DarmAH parivarjayitavyAH katame daSa yat 
   uta gṛhiprabrajitasaṃstavaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ kulamātsaryaṃ	uta gRhi prabrajita saMstavaH parivarjayitavyaH kula mAtsaryam
   parivarjayitavyam saṃgaṇikāsthānaṃ parivarjayitavyam ātmotkarṣaṇaṃ	parivarjayitavyam saMgaNikA sTAnam parivarjayitavyam Atma utkarzaNam
   parivarjayitavyam parapaṃsanaṃ parivarjayitavyam daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ	parivarjayitavyam para paMsanam parivarjayitavyam daSa akuSalAH karma paTAH
   parivarjayitavyāḥ adhimānastambhau parivarjayitavyau viparyāsāḥ	parivarjayitavyAH aDimAna stamBO parivarjayitavyO viparyAsAH
   parivarjayitavyāḥ vivikitsā parivarjayitavyā rāgadveṣamohādhivāsanāḥ	parivarjayitavyAH vivikitsA parivarjayitavyAH rAga dveza moha aDivAsanAH
   parivarjayitavyāḥ ime subhūte daśa dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	parivarjayitavyAH ime suBUte daSa DarmAH boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   pañcamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena parivarjayitavyāḥ (PSP1: 216) punar aparaṃ	paQcamyAm BUmO vartamAnena parivarjayitavyAH (PSP1: 216) punar aparam
   subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena ṣaḍ dharmā	suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena zazwyAm BUmO vartamAnena zaw DarmA
   paripūrayitavyāḥ katame ṣaṭ yad uta ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ apare	paripUrayitavyAH katame zaw yat uta zaw pAramitAH paripUrayitavyAH apare
   ṣaḍ dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ katame ṣaṭ śrāvakacittaṃ parvarjayitavyaṃ	zaw DarmAH parivarjayitavyAH katame zaw SrAvaka cittam parvarjayitavyam
   pratyekabuddhacittaṃ parvarjayitavyaṃ paritasanācittaṃ parvarjayitavyaṃ	pratyekabudDa cittam parvarjayitavyam paritasana acittam parvarjayitavyam
   yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāvalīyate sarvavastūni ca tyājyāni na ca	yAcanakam dRzwvA na avalIyate sarva vastUni ca tyAjyAni na ca
   daurmanasyacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na ca yācanakavikṣepaḥ kartavyaḥ ime	dOrmanasya cittam utpAdayitavyam na ca yAcanaka vikzepaH kartavyaH ime
   subhūte ṣaḍ dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena	suBUte zaw DarmAH boDisattvena mahAsattvena zazwyAm BUmO vartamAnena
   paripūrayitavyāḥ apare ṣaḍ dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte	paripUrayitavyAH apare zaw DarmAH parivarjayitavyAH punar aparam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saptamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānasya viṃśatiḥ dharmā	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya saptamyAm BUmO vartamAnasya viMSatiH DarmA
   na bhavanti katame viṃśatiḥ yad uta ātmagrāho 'sya na bhavati sattvagrāho	na Bavanti katame viMSatiH yat uta Atma grAhaH asya na Bavati sattva grAhaH 
   jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāha ucchedagrāhaḥ śāśvatagrāhaḥ nimittasaṃjñā	jIva grAhaH pudgala grAhaH ucCeda grAhaH SASvata grAhaH nimitta saMjQA
   hetudṛṣṭiḥ skandhābhiniveśo dhātvabhiniveśaḥ āyatanam ṛddhis traidhātuke	hetu dRzwiH skanDa aBiniveSaH DAtu aBiniveSaH Ayatanam RdDiH trEDAtuke
   pratiṣṭhānaṃ traidhātukādhyavasānaṃ traidhātuke ālayo	pratizWAnam trEDAtuka aDyavasAnam trEDAtuke AlayaH 
   buddhaniśrayadṛṣṭyabhiniveśo dharmaniśrayadṛṣṭyabhiniveśaḥ	budDa niSraya dRzwi aBiniveSaH Darma niSraya dRzwi aBiniveSaH
   saṃghaniśrayadṛṣṭyabhiniveśaḥ śīlaniśrayadṛṣṭyabhiniveśaḥ śūnyā dharmā iti	saMGa niSraya dRzwi aBiniveSaH SIla niSraya dRzwi aBiniveSaH SUnyAH DarmAH iti
   vivādaḥ śūnyatāvirodhaś cāsya na bhavati ime subhūte viṃśatir dharmā	vivAdaH SUnyatA viroDaH ca asya na Bavati ime suBUte viMSatiH DarmA
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saptamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānasya na bhavanti	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya saptamyAm BUmO vartamAnasya na Bavanti
   tena viṃśatir eva dharmāḥ saptamyāṃ bhūmau sthitena paripūrayitavyāḥ	tena viMSatiH eva DarmAH saptamyAm BUmO sTitena paripUrayitavyAH
   katame viṃśatiḥ yad uta śūnyatāparipūritā nimittasākṣatkriyā	katame viMSatiH yat uta SUnyatA paripUritA nimitta sAkzatkriyA
   apraṇihitajñānaṃ trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ kṛpākāruṇyañ ca sarvasattveṣu teṣv	apraNihita jQAnam tri maNxala pariSudDiH kRpA kAruNyan ca sarva sattvezu tezu 
   anavamanyanā sarvadharmasamatādarśanaṃ tatra cānabhiniveśaḥ	anavamanyanA sarva Darma sama tA darSanam tatra ca anaBiniveSaH
   bhūtanayaprativedhas tena cāmanyanā anutpādakṣāntir anutpādajñānam	BUta naya prativeDaH tena ca amanyanA anutpAda kzAntiH anutpAda jQAnam
   ekanayanirdeśaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kalpanāsamudghātaḥ saṃjñādṛṣṭivivarttaḥ	ekanaya nirdeSaH sarva DarmANAm kalpanA samudGAtaH saMjQA dRzwi vivarttaH
   kleśavivarttaḥ śamathanidhyaptiḥ vipaśyanākauśalyaṃ dāntacittatā	kleSa vivarttaH SamaTa niDi aptiH vipaSyanA kOSalyam dAnta citta tA
   sarvatrāpratihatajñānacittatā anunayasyābhumir yatrecchākṣetragamanaṃ	sarvatra apratihata jQAna citta tA anunayasya aBumiH yatra icCA kzetra gamanam
   tatra ca buddhaparṣanmaṇḍale sthitvātmabhāvasandarśanam ime viṃśatir	tatra ca budDa parzad maNxale sTitvA Atma BAva sandarSanam ime viMSatiH 
   dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena	DarmAH boDisattvena mahAsattvena saptamyAm BUmO vartamAnena
   paripūrayitavyāḥ (PSP1: 217) punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena	paripUrayitavyAH (PSP1: 217) punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena catvāro dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ	mahAsattvena azwamyAm BUmO vartamAnena catvAraH DarmAH paripUrayitavyAH
   katame catvāraḥ yad uta sarvasattvacittānupraveśo 'bhijñāvikrīḍanaṃ	katame catvAraH yat uta sarva sattva citta anupraveSaH aBijQA vikrIxanam
   buddhakṣetradarśanan teṣāñ ca buddhakṣetrāṇāṃ yathādṛṣṭiniṣpādanatā	budDa kzetra darSanan tezAn ca budDa kzetrANAm yaTA dRzwi nizpAdana tA

   uta indriyaparāparajñānaṃ buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ māyopamasya samādher	uta indriya para apara jQAnam budDa kzetra pariSoDanam mAyA upamasya samADeH 
   abhīkṣṇaṃ samāpattir yathā ca sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaniṣpattis tathā	aBIkzNam samApattiH yaTA ca sattvAnAm kuSala mUla nizpattiH taTA
   tathātmabhāvam abhinirmimīte saṃcintyabhavotpādanatā ime subhūte	taTA Atma BAvam aBinirmimIte saMcintya Bava utpAda natA ime suBUte
   bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena catvāro dharmāḥ	boDisattvena mahAsattvena azwamyAm BUmO vartamAnena catvAraH DarmAH
   paripūrayitavyāḥ punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena navamyāṃ	paripUrayitavyAH punar aparam suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena navamyAm
   bhūmau vartamānena dvādaśa dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ katame dvādaśa yad uta	BUmO vartamAnena dvAdaSa DarmAH paripUrayitavyAH katame dvAdaSa yat uta
   anantapraṇidhānaparigrahaḥ sa yathā yathā praṇidadhāti tathā tathāsya	ananta praNiDAna parigrahaH sa yaTA yaTA praNidaDAti taTA taTA asya
   samṛdhyate devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragarutajñānaṃ	samRDyate deva nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahoH agaruta jQAnam
   pratibhānanirdeśajñānaṃ garbhāvakrāntisampatkuśalasampad jātisampad	pratiBAna nirdeSa jQAnam garBAvakrAnti sampad kuSala sampad jAti sampad 
   gotrasampat parivārasampad janmasampad naiṣkramyasampad bodhivṛkṣasampat	gotra sampad parivAra sampad janma sampad nEzkramya sampad boDi vRkza sampad 
   sarvaguṇaparipūraṇasampat ime subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena navamyāṃ	sarva guNa paripUraNa sampad ime suBUte boDisattvena mahAsattvena navamyAm

   bodhisattvabhūmau vartamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eveti	boDisattva BUmO vartamAnaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH taTAgataH eva iti
   vaktavyaḥ subhūtir āha katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya	vaktavyaH suBUtiH Aha katamat Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasyādhyāśayaparikarma bhagavān āha yā	mahAsattvasya aDyASaya parikarma BagavAn Aha yA
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvakuśalamūlasamudānayanatā	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH sarva kuSala mUla samudAnayana tA
   idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyāśayaparikarma tatra katamad	idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya aDyASaya parikarma tatra katamat 
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya hitavastutāparikarma yad bodhisattvo	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya hita vastu tA parikarma yat boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām arthāya mahāyānajñānaparyeṣṭim āpadyate idaṃ	mahAsattvaH sarva sattvAnAm arTAya mahAyAna jQAna paryezwim Apadyate idam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya hitavastutāparikarma tatra katamad	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya hita vastu tA parikarma tatra katamat 
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvasamacittatāparikarma yat	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya sarva sattva sama citta tA parikarma yat 
   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiś caturapramāṇābhinirharaṇa	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktEH manasikArEH catura pramANa aBinirharaNa
   maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣaṇam idam ucyate sarvasattvasamacittatāparikarma	mEtrI karuNAm udita upekzaNam idam ucyate sarva sattva sama citta tA parikarma
   (PSP1: 218) tatra katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tyāgaparikarma yat	(PSP1: 218) tatra katamat boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya tyAga parikarma yat 
   sarvasattvebhyo 'vikalpitaṃ dānaṃ dadāti idam ucyate tyāgaparikarma tatra	sarva sattveByaH avikalpitam dAnam dadAti idam ucyate tyAga parikarma tatra
   katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrasevanāparikarma yāni	katamat boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kalyANa mitra sevana aparikarma yAni

   samādāpayanti teṣāṃ mitrāṇāṃ sevanā bhajanā paryupāsanā śuśrūṣā idam	samAdApayanti tezAm mitrANAm sevanA BajanA paryupAsanA SuSrUzAH idam

   sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena manasikāreṇa dharmaṃ paryeṣate na ca	sarva AkAra jQa tA pratisaMyuktena manasikAreNa Darmam paryezate na ca
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau patati idaṃ ucyate bodhisattvasya	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO patati idam ucyate boDisattvasya

   mahāsattvasya abhīkṣṇaṃ naiṣkramyaparikarma yat sarvajātiṣv avyavakīrnno	mahAsattvasya aBIkzNam nEzkramya parikarma yat sarva jAtizu avyavakIrnno
   'bhiniṣkrāmati tathāgataśāsane pravrajati na cāsya kaścid antarāyo bhavati	aBinizkrAmati taTAgata SAsane pravrajati na ca asya kaScid antarAyaH Bavati

   sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalpāṇaṃ paryavasāne	sattvAnAm Darmam deSayati AdO kalyANam maDye kalpANam paryavasAne

   jātakaṃ nidānam avadānaṃ tathā vaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśāḥ idaṃ ucyate	jAtakam nidAnam avadAnam taTA vEpulya adButa Darma upadeSAH idam ucyate

   uta śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittānām amanasikāratā ye 'py anye dauḥśīlyakarā	uta SrAvaka pratyekabudDa cittAnAm amanasikA ra tA ye api anye dOHSIlya karA

   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapariśuddhir tatra katamā bodhisattvasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SIla pariSudDiH tatra katamA boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā (PSP1: 219) yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo	mahAsattvasya kRtajQa tA kRta veditA (PSP1: 219) yat boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH 
   bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran alpam api kṛtam āsaṃsārān na nāśayati prāg eva	boDisattva caryAm caran alpam api kRtam AsaMsArAt na nASayati prAk eva
   bahu iyaṃ ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā tatra	bahu iyam ucyate boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya kRtajQa tA kRta veditA tatra

   ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prāmodyapratītyanubhavanatā tatra	ucyate boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya prAmodya prati iti anuBavana tA tatra

   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata evam bhavati	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya boDisattva cArikAm carataH evam Bavati
   ekaikasya sattvasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān niraye paceyaṃ yāvan	ekEkasya sattvasya arTAya gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn kalpAn niraye paceyam yAvat 
   na sa sattvo buddhajñāne pratiṣṭhāpita iti evam ekaikasya kṛtaśaḥ	na sa sattvaH budDa jQAne pratizWApitaH iti evam ekEkasya kRtaSas

   katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya guruśuśrūṣāśraddhānatā yad gurūṇām	katamA boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya guru SuSrUzA SradDAnatA yat gurUNAm
   antike śāstṛsaṃjñā iyam ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	antike SAstR saMjQA iyam ucyate boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya

   tadyogaparyeṣṭiḥ yā ananyakarmatayā pāramitāparyeṣaṇatā iyam ucyate	tad yoga paryezwiH yA ananya karma tayA pAramitA paryezaNa tA iyam ucyate

   sarvam ārādhayiṣyāmīti yā atṛptatā iyaṃ ucyate bodhisattvasya	sarvam ArADayizyAmi iti yAH atRpta tA iyam ucyate boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya bāhuśrutyatṛptatā tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	mahAsattvasya bAhu Srutya tRpta tA tatra katamA boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   nirāmiṣadharmadānavivaraṇatā yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmaṃ deśayati	nirAmiza Darma dAna vivaraNa tA yat boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Darmam deSayati
   sa tena dharmadānakuśalenātmano bodhim api na pratikāṃkṣati iyaṃ ucyate	sa tena Darma dAna kuSalena AtmanaH boDim api na pratikAMkzati iyam ucyate
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nirāmiṣadharmadānavivaraṇatā tatra katamā	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya nirAmiza Darma dAna vivaraNa tA tatra katamA
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhakṣetrapariśodhanakuśalamūlapariṇāmanā	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya budDa kzetra pariSoDana kuSala mUla pariNAmanA
   yaiḥ kuśalamūlair buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayan ātmaparacittaṃ pariśodhayati	yEH kuSala mUlEH budDa kzetram pariSoDayan Atma para cittam pariSoDayati
   teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ yā pariṇāmanā iyam ucyate bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	tezAm kuSala mUlAnAm yA pariNAmanAH iyam ucyate boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   buddhakṣetrapariśodhanakuśalamūlapariṇāmanā tatra katamā bodhisattvasya	budDa kzetra pariSoDana kuSala mUla pariNAmanA tatra katamA boDisattvasya

   bhavaty evaṃ śīladṛṣṭiniśrayo na kartavyaḥ tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena	Bavati evam SIla dRzwi niSrayaH na kartavyaH tatra kaTam boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena śūnyatāyāṃ vivādo na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetos tathā hi	mahAsattvena SUnyatAyAm vivAdaH na kartavyaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā na śūnyatayā evaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ vivādo na	sarva DarmAH svaBAvena SUnyAH na SUnya tayA evam SUnyatAyAm vivAdaH na
   kartavyaḥ tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāvirodho na	kartavyaH tatra kaTam boDisattvena mahAsattvena SUnyatA viroDaH na
   kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetos tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ	kartavyaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sarva DarmAH SUnyA na SUnyatA SUnyatAm
   virodhayati evaṃ śūnyatāvirodho na kartavyaḥ tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena	viroDayati evam SUnyatA viroDaH na kartavyaH tatra kaTam boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena śūnyatā paripūrayitavyā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya paripūrir	mahAsattvena SUnyatA paripUrayitavyA sva lakzaNa SUnyatAm upAdAya paripUriH 
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śūnyatāparipūrir evaṃ śūnyatā paripūrayitavyā	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya SUnyatA paripUriH evam SUnyatA paripUrayitavyA
   tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya animittāsākṣātkriyā yad uta	tatra katamA boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya animitta asAkzAt kriyA yat uta
   sarvanimittānām amanasikāratā iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva nimittAnAm amanasikA ra tA iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   animittāsākṣātkriyā tatra katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	animitta asAkzAt kriyA tatra katamat boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   apraṇihitajñānam yat sarvatraidhātuke cittasyāpratiṣṭhānam idam	apraNihita jQAnam yat sarva tra eDAtuke cittasya apratizWAnam idam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apraṇihitajñānam tatra katamā (PSP1: 223)	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya apraNihita jQAnam tatra katamA (PSP1: 223)

   sarvasattveṣu kṛpākaruṇāparipūriḥ kartavyā yo mahākaruṇāyāḥ pratilābhaḥ	sarva sattvezu kRpA karuNA paripUriH kartavyAH yaH mahA karuNAyAH pratilABaH
   evaṃ sarvasattveṣu kṛpākaruṇāparipūriḥ kartavyā tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena	evam sarva sattvezu kRpA karuNA paripUriH kartavyA tatra kaTam boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sarvasattvā nāvamantavyāḥ yad uta maitrīparipūryā evaṃ	mahAsattvena sarva sattvAH na avamantavyAH yat uta mEtrI paripUryAH evam
   sarvasattvā nāvamantavyāḥ tatra katamad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva sattvAH na avamantavyAH tatra katamat boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   samatādarśanam yad utānutkṣepo 'prakṣepaḥ sarvadharmāṇām idaṃ	samatA darSanam yat uta anutkzepaH aprakzepaH sarva DarmANAm idam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya samatādarśanam tatra katamo bodhisattvasya	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya samatA darSanam tatra katamaH boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya bhūtanayaprativedhaḥ yaḥ sarvadharmānām aprativedhaḥ ayaṃ	mahAsattvasya BUta naya prativeDaH yaH sarva DarmAnAm aprativeDaH ayam
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhūtanayaprativedhaḥ tatra katamā	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya BUtanaya prativeDaH tatra katamA
