   bodhisattvabhūmeḥ paran tathāgata eveti vaktavyaḥ tatra katamā	boDisattva BUmeH paran taTAgataH eva iti vaktavyaH tatra katamA
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśabhūmayaḥ yad bodhisattvo mahāsattva	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya daSa BUmayaH yat boDisattvaH mahAsattva
   upāyakauśalyena sarvāsu pāramitāsu caran saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu	upAya kOSalyena sarvAsu pAramitAsu caran saptatriMSat boDi pakzezu Darmezu
   śikṣito 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu caran	SikzitaH apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu caran
   daśatathāgatabalapratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran	daSa taTAgata bala pratisaMvitsu azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu caran
   gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ vītarāgabhūmiṃ	gotra BUmim azwamaka BUmim darSana BUmim tanu BUmim vIta rAga BUmiM
   kṛtāvibhūmiṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabudhabhūmiṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ	kRta aviBUmim SrAvaka BUmim pratyekabuDa BUmim boDisattva BUmim
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tikramya etā navabhūmīr atikramya buddhabhūmau	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH atikramya etAH nava BUmIH atikramya budDa BUmO
   pratiṣṭhate iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśamī bhūmir evaṃ hi	pratizWate iyam boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya daSamI BUmiH evam hi
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthito bhavati iti	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH mahAyAna saMprasTitaH Bavati iti
   bhūmisambhāraḥ yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha kutas tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti	BUmi samBAraH yat punar suBUtiH evam Aha kutas tat yAnam niryAsyati iti
   traidhātukān niryāsyati yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyati tat punar	trEDAtukAn niryAsyati yena sarva AkAra jQa tA tena sTAsyati tat punar 
   advayayogena tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi yac ca mahāyānaṃ yā ca	advaya yogena tat kasya hetoH taTA hi yat ca mahAyAnam yA ca
   sarvākārajñatā ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau	sarva AkAra jQa tA uBO etO DarmO na saMyuktO na visaMyuktO arUpiNO
   anidarśanau apratighau ekalakṣaṇau yad utālakṣaṇau tat kasya hetoḥ na hi	anidarSanO apratiGO eka lakzaNO yat uta alakzaNO tat kasya hetoH na hi
   subhūte alakṣaṇau dharmau niryātau vā (PSP1: 226) niryāto vā niryāsyato vā	suBUte alakzaNO DarmO niryAtO vA (PSP1: 226) niryAtaH vA niryAsyataH vA
   dharmadhātoḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet tathatāyāḥ yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ	DarmaDAtoH sa suBUte niryANam icCet taTatAyAH yaH alakzaNAnAm
   dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icched evaṃ bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor ākāśadhātoḥ	DarmANAm niryANam icCet evam BUtakoweH acintya DAtoH AkASa DAtoH
   prahāṇadhātor virāgakoṭer anutpādasyānirodhasyābhāvasya sa niryāṇam icched	prahANa DAtoH virAga koweH anutpAdasya aniroDasya aBAvasya sa niryANam icCet 
   yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte	yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet rUpa SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte
   niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet evaṃ	niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet evam
   vedanāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃjñāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskāraśūnyatāyāḥ vijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ sa	vedanA SUnyatAyAH saMjQA SUnya tAyAH saMskAra SUnyatAyAH vijQAna SUnyatAyAH sa
   subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet tat kasya	suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet tat kasya
   hetoḥ na hi subhūte rūpaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na	hetoH na hi suBUte rUpa SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati na vedanāśūnyatā saṃjñāśūnyatā saṃskāraśūnyatā	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati na vedanA SUnyatA saMjQA SUnyatA saMskAra SUnyatA
   vijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat	vijQAna SUnyatA trEDAtukAt niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam vedanā vedanayā śūnyā	kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte rUpam rUpeNa SUnyam vedanA vedanayA SUnyA
   saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ cakṣuḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa	saMjQA saMjQayA SUnyA saMskArAH saMskArEH SUnyAH cakzuH SUnyatAyAH sa
   subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet evaṃ	suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet evam
   śrotraśūnyatāyāḥ ghrāṇaśūnyatāyāḥ jihvāśūnyatāyāḥ kāyavyaśūnyatāyāḥ	Srotra SUnyatAyAH GrANa SUnyatAyAH jihvA SUnyatAyAH kAya vyaSUnyatAyAH
   manaḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	manaH SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm
   niryāṇam icchet evaṃ rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ śabdaśūnyatāyāḥ gandhaśūnyatāyāḥ	niryANam icCet evam rUpa SUnyatAyAH Sabda SUnyatAyAH ganDa SUnyatAyAH
   rasaśūnyatāyāḥ spraṣṭavyaśūnyatāyāḥ dharmaśūnyatāyāḥ	rasa SUnyatAyAH sprazwavya SUnyatAyAH Darma SUnyatAyAH
   cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ śrotravijñānaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatāyā	cakzuH vijQAna SUnyatAyAH Srotra vijQAna SUnyatAyAH GrANa vijQAna SUnyatAyAH 
   jihvāvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyavijñānaśūnyatāyā manovijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ	jihvA vijQAna SUnyatAyAH kAya vijQAna SUnyatAyAH manaH vijQAna SUnyatAyAH
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā	cakzuH saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH Srotra saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā	GrANa saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH jihvA saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH kAya saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ	manaH saMsparSa SUnyatAyAH cakzuH saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatAyAH
   śrotrasaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ ghrāṇasaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ	Srotra saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatAyAH GrANa saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatAyAH
   jihvāsaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ	jihvA saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatAyAH kAya saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatAyAH
   manaḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo	manaH saMsparSa ja vedayita SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH 
   'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte	alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet tat kasya hetoH na hi suBUte
   cakṣuḥśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati evaṃ	cakzuH SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati evam
   na śrotraśūnyatā na ghrāṇaśūnyatā na jihvāśūnyatā na kāyaśūnyatā na	na Srotra SUnyatA na GrANa SUnyatA na jihvA SUnyatA na kAya SUnyatA na
   manaḥśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati evaṃ	manaH SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati evam
   na rūpaśūnyatā na śabdaśūnyatā na gandhaśūnyatā na rasaśūnyatā na	na rUpa SUnyatA na Sabda SUnyatA na ganDa SUnyatA na rasa SUnyatA na
   spraṣṭavyaśūnyatā na dharmaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na	sprazwavya SUnyatA na Darma SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati evaṃ na cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā na	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati evam na cakzuH vijQAna SUnyatA na
   śrotravijñānaśūnyatā na ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā na jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā na	Srotra vijQAna SUnyatA na GrANa vijQAna SUnyatA na jihvA vijQAna SUnyatA na
   kāyavijñānaśūnyatā na manovijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na	kAya vijQAna SUnyatA na manaH vijQAna SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā na	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati evam na cakzuH saMsparSa SUnyatA na
   śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatā	Srotra saMsparSa SUnyatA na GrANa saMsparSa SUnyatA na jihvA saMsparSa SUnyatA
   na kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati	na kAya saMsparSa SUnyatA na manaH saMsparSa SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati
   na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati evaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatā na	na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati evam na cakzuH saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatA na
   śrotrasaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatā na ghrāṇasaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatā na	Srotra saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatA na GrANa saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatA na
   jihvāsaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatā na kāyasaṃsparśavedayitaśūnyatā na	jihvA saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatA na kAya saMsparSa vedayita SUnyatA na
   manaḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na	manaH saMsparSa ja vedayita SUnyatA trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte cakṣuś	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte cakzuH 
   cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyaṃ jihvā	cakzuzA SUnyam Srotram SrotreNa SUnyam GrANam GrANena SUnyam jihvA
   jihvayā śūnyā kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo mano manasā śūnyaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ	jihvayA SUnyA kAyaH kAyena SUnyaH manaH manasA SUnyam rUpam rUpeNa SUnyam
   śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyo gandho gandhena śūnyo raso rasena śūnyo spraṣṭavyaṃ	SabdaH Sabdena SUnyaH ganDaH ganDena SUnyaH rasaH rasena SUnyaH sprazwavyam
   spraṣṭavyena śūnyaṃ dharmo dharmeṇa śūnyo cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena	sprazwavyena SUnyam DarmaH DarmeNa SUnyaH cakzuH vijQAnam cakzuH vijQAnena
   śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānena śūnyaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ	SUnyam Srotra vijQAnam Srotra vijQAnena SUnyam GrANa vijQAnam
   ghrāṇavijñānena śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānena śūnyaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ	GrANa vijQAnena SUnyam jihvA vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnena SUnyam kAya vijQAnam
   kāyavijñānena śūnyaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ	kAya vijQAnena SUnyam manaH vijQAnam manaH vijQAnena SUnyam cakzuH saMsparSaH
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśena śūnyo	cakzuH saMsparSena SUnyaH Srotra saMsparSaH Srotra saMsparSena SUnyaH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśena śūnyo jihvāsaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśena	GrANa saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSena SUnyaH jihvA saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSena
   śūnyaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśena śūnyo manaḥsaṃsparśo	SUnyaH kAya saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSena SUnyaH manaH saMsparSaH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajayā	manaH saMsparSena SUnyaH cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA cakzuH saMsparSa jayA
   vedanayā śūnyā śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā	vedanayA SUnyA Srotra saMsparSa jA vedanA Srotra saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā	GrANa saMsparSa jA vedanA GrANa saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA
   jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā kāyasaṃsparśajā	jihvA saMsparSa jA vedanA jihvA saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA kAya saMsparSa jA
   vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā	vedanA kAya saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA
   manaḥsaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā svapnasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo	manaH saMsparSa jayA vedanayA SUnyA svapnasya sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH 
   'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet vistareṇa kartavyam evaṃ marīcyā	alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet vistareNa kartavyam evam marIcyA
   māyāyāḥ pratiśrutkāyāḥ pratibhāsasya pratibimbasya gandharvanagarasya	mAyAyAH pratiSrutkAyAH pratiBAsasya pratibimbasya ganDarvanagarasya
   tathāgatanirmitasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	taTAgata nirmitasya sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm
   niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte svapnasya svabhāvas	niryANam icCet tat kasya hetoH na hi suBUte svapnasya svaBAvaH 
   traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati evaṃ na marīcyāḥ	trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati evam na marIcyAH
   svabhāvaḥ na māyāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ na pratiśrutkāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ na	svaBAvaH na mAyAyAH svaBAvaH na pratiSrutkAyAH svaBAvaH na
   pratibhāsasya svabhāvaḥ na pratibimbasya svabhāvaḥ na gandharvasya	pratiBAsasya svaBAvaH na pratibimbasya svaBAvaH na ganDarvasya
   svabhāvaḥ na tathāgatanirmitasya svabhāvas traidhātukāt niryāsyati na	svaBAvaH na taTAgata nirmitasya svaBAvaH trEDAtukAt niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ (PSP1: 227) tathā hi subhūte	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya hetoH (PSP1: 227) taTA hi suBUte
   svapnasvabhāvaḥ svapnasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ marīcisvabhāvaḥ marīcisvabhāvena	svapna svaBAvaH svapna svaBAvena SUnyaH marIci svaBAvaH marIci svaBAvena
   śūnyaḥ māyāsvabhāvaḥ māyāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ pratiśrutkāsvabhāvaḥ	SUnyaH mAyA svaBAvaH mAyA svaBAvena SUnyaH pratiSrutka asvaBAvaH
   pratiśrutkāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ pratibhāsasvabhāvaḥ pratibhāsasvabhāvena	pratiSrutka asvaBAvena SUnyaH pratiBAsa svaBAvaH pratiBAsa svaBAvena
   śūnyaḥ pratibimbasvabhāvaḥ pratibimbasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ gandharvasvabhāvaḥ	SUnyaH pratibimba svaBAvaH pratibimba svaBAvena SUnyaH ganDarva svaBAvaH
   gandharvasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ tathāgatanirmitasvabhāvas	ganDarva svaBAvena SUnyaH taTAgata nirmita svaBAva H 
   tathāgatanirmitasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ iti darśanamārge	taTAgata nirmita svaBAvena SUnyaH iti darSana mArge
   prathamagrāhyavikalpapratipakṣaḥ dānapāramitāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam	praTama grAhya vikalpa pratipakzaH dAna pAramitAyAH sa suBUte niryANam
   icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ	icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet evam SIla pAramitAyAH
   kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ vīryapāramitāyāḥ dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sa	kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyAH prajQApAramitAyAH sa
   subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet tat kasya	suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet tat kasya
   hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yo dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān	hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH dAna pAramitAyAH svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn
   niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ	niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati evam SIla pAramitAyAH
   kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ tathā hi yaḥ	kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyAH taTA hi yaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na	prajQApAramitAyAH svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte
   dānapāramitāsvabhāvo dānapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ śīlapāramitāsvabhāvo	dAna pAramitA svaBAvaH dAna pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH SIla pAramitA svaBAvaH 
   śīlapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ kṣāntipāramitāsvabhāvo	SIla pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH kzAnti pAramitA svaBAvaH 
   kṣāntipāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ vīryapāramitāsvabhāvo	kzAnti pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH vIrya pAramitA svaBAvaH 
   vīryapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvo	vIrya pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH DyAna pAramitA svaBAvaH 
   dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ adhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam	DyAna pAramitA svaBAvena SUnyaH aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH sa suBUte niryANam
   icchet yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na	yaH aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte
   adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā	aDyAtma SUnyatA aDyAtma SUnya tayA SUnyA bahirDA SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatayA
   śūnyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā yāvat	SUnyAH aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayA SUnyA yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā smṛtyupasthānāni	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatayA SUnyA smRti upasTAnAni
   smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇair śūnyāni ṛddhipādā	smRti upasTAnEH SUnyAni samyak prahANAni samyak prahANEH SUnyAni RdDipAdA
   ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāḥ indriyāṇi indriyaiḥ śūnyāni balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni	RdDi pAdEH SUnyAH indriyANi indriyEH SUnyAni balAni balEH SUnyAni
   bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni mārgaḥ mārgeṇa śūnyo	boDi aFgAni boDi aFgEH SUnyAni mArgaH mArgeNa SUnyaH 
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattiBiH SUnyAH
   daśatathāgatabalāni daśatathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni caturvaiśāradyāni	daSa taTAgata balAni daSa taTAgata balEH SUnyAni catur vESAradyAni
   caturvaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ catasṛbhiḥ	catur vESAradyEH SUnyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH catasRBiH
   pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ tathā hi subhūte buddhadharmā buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ	pratisaMvidBiH SUnyAH taTA hi suBUte budDa DarmAH budDa DarmEH SUnyAH
   iti darśanamārge dvitīyagrāhyavikalpapratijpakṣaḥ arhataḥ sa subhūte	iti darSana mArge dvitIya grAhya vikalpa pratijpakzaH arhataH sa suBUte
   niryāṇam icchet yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ	niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi subhūte yo 'rhataḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na	taTA hi suBUte yaH arhataH svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte arhatsvabhāvo	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte arhat svaBAvaH 
   'rhataḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddhasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yo	arhataH svaBAvena SUnyaH pratyekabudDasya sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH 
   'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sa	alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya sa
   subhūte niryāṇam icchet yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet	suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet 
   tathāgatasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam	taTAgatasya sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam
   icchet srotaāpattiphalasya (PSP1: 228) sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo	icCet srotaApatti Palasya (PSP1: 228) sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH 
   'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya	alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet evam sakRdAgAmi Palasya
   anāgāmiphalasya arhattvasya pratyekabodher mārgajñatāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ	anAgAmi Palasya arhat tvasya pratyeka boDeH mArga jQa tAyAH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH
   sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet tat	sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya svabhāvo na sa	kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH srotaApatti Palasya svaBAvaH na sa
   traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ	trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi srotaāpattiphalasvabhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ evaṃ	taTA hi srotaApatti Pala svaBAvaH srotaApatti Pala svaBAvena SUnyaH evam
   sakṛdāgāmiphalasya yaḥ svabhāvo 'nāgāmiphalasya yaḥ svabhāvo 'rhattvasya	sakRdAgAmi Palasya yaH svaBAvaH anAgAmi Palasya yaH svaBAvaH arhat tvasya
   yaḥ svabhāvaḥ pratyekabuddhatvasya yaḥ svabhāvo mārgajñatāyā yaḥ svabhāvaḥ	yaH svaBAvaH pratyekabudDa tvasya yaH svaBAvaH mArga jQa tAyAH yaH svaBAvaH
   sarvākārajñatāyā yaḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH yaH svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na
   sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH
   svabhāvaḥ sarvākārajñatāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ iti darśanamārge	svaBAvaH sarva AkAra jQa tA svaBAvena SUnyaH iti darSana mArge
   prathamagrāhakavikalpapratipakṣaḥ nāmnaḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo	praTama grAhaka vikalpa pratipakzaH nAmnaH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH 
   'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet evaṃ nimittasya saṅketasya	alakzaNAnAm DarmANAm niryANam icCet evam nimittasya saFketasya
   vyavahārasya prajñapteḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ	vyavahArasya prajQapteH sa suBUte niryANam icCet yaH alakzaNAnAm
   dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yo nāmnaḥ	DarmANAm niryANam icCet tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH nAmnaH
   svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat	svaBAvaH na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte nāmasvabhāvo nāmasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ evaṃ	kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte nAma svaBAvaH nAma svaBAvena SUnyaH evam
   saṅketasya yaḥ svabhāvo vyavahārasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ prajñapter yaḥ svabhāvo	saFketasya yaH svaBAvaH vyavahArasya yaH svaBAvaH prajQapteH yaH svaBAvaH 
   na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati tat kasya	na sa trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati tat kasya
   hetoḥ tathā hi prajñaptisvabhāvaḥ prajñaptisvabhāvena śūnyaḥ	hetoH taTA hi prajQapti svaBAvaH prajQapti svaBAvena SUnyaH
   anutpādasvabhāvo 'nutpādasvabhāvena śūnyo anirodhasvabhāvo	anutpAda svaBAvaH anutpAda svaBAvena SUnyaH aniroDa svaBAvaH 
   'nirodhasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ tathā hi anabhisaṃskārasvabhāvo	aniroDa svaBAvena SUnyaH taTA hi anaBisaMskAra svaBAvaH 
   'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ evaṃ hi subhūte mahāyānam na sa	anaBisaMskAra svaBAvena SUnyaH evam hi suBUte mahAyAnam na sa
   traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati acalitaṃ tad yānam	trEDAtukAn niryAsyati na sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm sTAsyati acalitam tat yAnam
   iti darśanamārge dvitīyagrāhakavikalpapratipakṣaḥ yat punaḥ subhūtir evam	iti darSana mArge dvitIya grAhaka vikalpa pratipakzaH yat punar suBUtiH evam
   āha kva tad yānaṃ sthāsyatīti na tad yānaṃ kvacit (PSP1: 229) sthāsyati	Aha kva tat yAnam sTAsyati iti na tat yAnam kvacid (PSP1: 229) sTAsyati
   tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte asthitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ api tu subhūte	tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte asTitAH sarva DarmAH api tu suBUte
   asthānaṃ na sthānayogena tad yānaṃ sthāsyati tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	asTAnam na sTAna yogena tat yAnam sTAsyati tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   dharmadhātur na sthito nāsthitaḥ evam eva subhūte tat mahayānaṃ na sthitaṃ	DarmaDAtuH na sTitaH na AsTitaH evam eva suBUte tat mahayAnam na sTitam
   nāsthitam tad yathāpi nāma subhūte anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam	na AsTitam tat yaTA api nAma suBUte anutpAdaH aniroDaH asaMkleSaH avyavadAnam
   anabhisaṃskāro na sthito nāsthitaḥ evam eva subhūte tat mahāyānaṃ na	anaBisaMskAraH na sTitaH na AsTitaH evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na
   sthitaṃ nāsthitam tathā hi subhūte dharmadhtur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ tat	sTitam na AsTitam taTA hi suBUte Darma DtuH DarmaDAtunA SUnyaH tat 
   kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte dharmadhātusvabhāvaḥ sthito vā asthito vā tat	kasya hetoH na hi suBUte DarmaDAtu svaBAvaH sTitaH vA asTitaH vA tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte dharmadhātusvabhāvo dharmadhātusvabhāvena	kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte DarmaDAtu svaBAvaH DarmaDAtu svaBAvena
   śūnyaḥ evam anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam anabhisaṃskāro	SUnyaH evam anutpAdaH aniroDaH asaMkleSaH avyavadAnam anaBisaMskAraH 
   'nabhisaṃskāreṇa śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte	anaBisaMskAreNa SUnyaH tat kasya hetoH na hi suBUte
   anabhisaṃskārasvabhāvaḥ sthito vā asthito vā tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	anaBisaMskAra svaBAvaH sTitaH vA asTitaH vA tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   subhūte anabhisaṃskārasvabhāvo 'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ evaṃ hi	suBUte anaBisaMskAra svaBAvaH anaBisaMskAra svaBAvena SUnyaH evam hi
   subhūte tad yānaṃ na kvacit sthāsyati asthitam asthānayogena acālyayogena	suBUte tat yAnam na kvacid sTAsyati asTitam asTAna yogena acAlya yogena
   iti bhāvanāmārge prathamagrāhyavikalpapratipakṣaḥ yat punaḥ subhūtir evam	iti BAvanA mArge praTama grAhya vikalpa pratipakzaH yat punar suBUtiH evam
   āha kas tena yānena niryāsyatīti na kaścit tena yānena niryāsyati tat	Aha kaH tena yAnena niryAsyati iti na kaScid tena yAnena niryAsyati tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yac ca tad yānaṃ yena ca niryāsyati yaś ca	kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yat ca tat yAnam yena ca niryAsyati yaH ca
   niryāsyati yataś ca niryāsyati sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante evam	niryAsyati yatas ca niryAsyati sarve ete DarmAH na saMvidyante evam
   asaṃvidyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa	asaMvidyamAnAnAm sarva DarmANAm katamaH DarmaH katamena DarmeNa
   niryāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte nātmā upalabhyate na sattvo na	niryAsyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte na AtmA upalaByate na sattvaH na
   jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako	jIvaH na pozaH na puruzaH na pudgalaH na manujaH na mAnavaH na kArakaH na veda kaH 
   na jānako na paśyaka upalabhyate ātmano 'tyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ	na jAnakaH na paSyakaH upalaByate AtmanaH atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam
   yāvat paśyakasyātyantaviśuddhitām upādāya dharmadhātur nopalabhyate	yAvat paSyakasya atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya DarmaDAtuH na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evam anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam anutpAdaH aniroDaH asaMkleSaH avyavadAnam
   anabhisaṃskāro nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	anaBisaMskAraH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	skanDa DAtu AyatanAni na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   pratītyasamutpādo nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya dānapāramitā	pratItyasamutpAdaH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya dAna pAramitA
   nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya adhyātmaśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya aDyAtma SUnyatA na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām	upAdAya yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	upAdAya smRti upasTAnAni na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   samyakprahāṇāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya ṛddhipādā	samyak prahANAni na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya RdDipAdA
   nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya indriyāṇi nopalabhyante	na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya indriyANi na upalaByante
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya balāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya balAni na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   bodhyaṅgāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya mārgaḥ nopalabhyate	boDi aFgAni na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya mArgaH na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nopalabhyante	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH na upalaByante
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya daśatathāgatabalāni nopalabhyante	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya daSa taTAgata balAni na upalaByante
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya caturvaiśāradyāni nopalabhyante	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya catur vESAradyAni na upalaByante
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ nopalabhyante	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya catasraH pratisaMvidaH na upalaByante
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā nopalabhyante	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAH na upalaByante
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya arhan nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya arhan na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   pratyekabuddho nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya bodhisattvo	pratyekabudDaH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya tathāgato nopalabhyate	mahAsattvaH na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya taTAgataH na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya srotaāpattiphalo nopalabhyate	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya srotaApatti PalaH na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya sakṛdāgāmiphalo nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya sakRdAgAmiPalaH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya anāgāmiphalo nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya arhattvam	upAdAya anAgAmiPalaH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya arhat tvam
   nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya pratyekabodhir nopalabhyate	na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya pratyeka boDiH na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya mārgajñatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya mArga jQa tA na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya sarvākārajñātā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya pramuditā	upAdAya sarva AkAra jQAtA na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya pramuditA
   bhūmir nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ vimalā prabhākarī	BUmiH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam vimalA praBAkarI
   arciṣmatī sudurjayā abhimukhī duraṅgamā acalā sādhumatī dharmameghā bhūmir	arcizmatI su durjayA aBimuKI duraFgamA acalA sADumatI Darma meGAH BUmiH 
   nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya pūrvānto nopalabhyate	na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya pUrva antaH na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya aparānto nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya aparAntaH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm
   upādāya pratyutpanno nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evam agatir	upAdAya pratyutpannaH na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam agatiH 
   nopalabhyate gatir nopalabhyate sthitir nopalabhyate cyutir nopalabhyate	na upalaByate gatiH na upalaByate sTitiH na upalaByate cyutiH na upalaByate
   upapattir nopalabhyate hānir nopalabhyate ṛddhir nopalabhyate	upapattiH na upalaByate hAniH na upalaByate RdDiH na upalaByate
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya kasyānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate dharmadhātor	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya kasya anupalabDyA na upalaByate DarmaDAtoH 
   anupalabdhyā nopalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte dharmadhātur	anupalabDyA na upalaByate tat kasya hetoH na hi suBUte DarmaDAtuH 
   upalabhyate anupalabdhyā nopalabhyate anutpādasyānirodhasyāsaṃkleśasya	upalaByate anupalabDyA na upalaByate anutpAdasya aniroDasya asaMkleSasya
   avyavadānasya anabhisaṃskārasyānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate abhisaṃskāraḥ	avyavadAnasya anaBisaMskArasya anupalabDyA na upalaByate aBisaMskAraH
   skandhadhātvāyatanānupalabdhyā nopalabhyante skandhadhātvāyatanāni	skanDa DAtu Ayatana anupalabDyA na upalaByante skanDa DAtu AyatanAni
   pratītyasamutpādānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate pratītyasamutpādaḥ	pratItyasamutpAda anupalabDyA na upalaByate pratItyasamutpAdaH
   dānapāramitānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate dānapāramitā śīlapāramitānupalabdhyā	dAna pAramitA anupalabDyA na upalaByate dAna pAramitA SIla pAramitA anupalabDyA
   nopalabhyate śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate	na upalaByate SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA anupalabDyA na upalaByate
   kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate vīryapāramitā	kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA anupalabDyA na upalaByate vIrya pAramitA
   dhyānapāramitānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate dhyānapāramitā	DyAna pAramitA anupalabDyA na upalaByate DyAna pAramitA
   prajñāpāramitānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitA anupalabDyA na upalaByate prajQApAramitA
   adhyātmaśūnyatānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate adhyātmaśūnyatā	aDyAtma SUnyatA anupalabDyA na upalaByate aDyAtma SUnyatA
   bahirdhāśūnyatānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate bahirdhāśūnyatā	bahirDA SUnyatA anupalabDyA na upalaByate bahirDA SUnyatA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyata anupalabDyA na upalaByate aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA
   yāvat abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā	yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA anupalabDyA na upalaByate aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA
   smṛtyupasthānānupalabdhyā nopalabhyante smṛtyupasthānāni	smRti upasTAna anupalabDyA na upalaByante smRti upasTAnAni
   samyakprahāṇānupalabdhyā nopalabhyante samyakprahāṇāni	samyak prahANa anupalabDyA na upalaByante samyak prahANAni

   nopalabhyante indriyāṇi balānupalabdhyā nopalabhyante balāni	na upalaByante indriyANi bala anupalabDyA na upalaByante balAni
   bodhyaṅgānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate bodhyaṅgāni mārgānupalabdhyā	boDi aFga an upalabDyA na upalaByate boDi aFgAni mArga an upalabDyA
   nopalabhyate mārgaḥ apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyanupalabdhyā nopalabhyante	na upalaByate mArgaH apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApatti anupalabDyA na upalaByante
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ daśatathāgatabalānupalabdhyā nopalabhyante	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH daSa taTAgata bala anupalabDyA na upalaByante
   daśatathāgatabalāni caturvaiśāradyānupalabdhyā nopalabhyante	daSa taTAgata balAni catur vESAradyA anupalabDyA na upalaByante
   caturvaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidanupalabdhyā nopalabhyante catasraḥ	catur vESAradyAni pratisaMvid anupalabDyA na upalaByante catasraH
   pratisaṃvidaḥ buddhadharmānupalabdhyā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā	pratisaMvidaH budDa Darma anupalabDyA azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA
   nopalabhyante iti bhāvanāmārge dvitīyagrāhyavikalpapratipakṣaḥ	na upalaByante iti BAvanA mArge dvitIya grAhya vikalpa pratipakzaH
   srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpannānupalabdhyā nopalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ na hi	srotaApannaH srotaApanna anupalabDyA na upalaByate tat kasya hetoH na hi
   subhūte srotaāpanna upalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ	suBUte srotaApannaH upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam
   sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhann arhadanupalabdhyā nopalabhyate pratyekabuddhaḥ	sakRdAgAmi anAgAmi arhan arhat anupalabDyA na upalaByate pratyekabudDaH

   upalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya iti bhāvanāmārge	upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya iti BAvanA mArge

   nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya punar aparaṃ subhūte daśabhūmayo	na upalaByate atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya punar aparam suBUte daSa BUmayaH

   adhyātmaśūnyatayā prathamā bhūmir nopalabhyate (PSP1: 231)	aDyAtma SUnya tayA praTamA BUmiH na upalaByate (PSP1: 231)

   nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo	na upalaByante atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam hi suBUte boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena sarvadharmāṇāṃ mahāyānena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ	mahAsattvaH anupalamBa yogena sarva DarmANAm mahAyAnena sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm
   niryāsyati iti bhāvanāmārge dvitīyagrāhakavikalpapratipakṣaḥ ity uktā	niryAsyati iti BAvanA mArge dvitIya grAhaka vikalpa pratipakzaH iti uktA
   sambhārapratipattiḥ atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat	samBAra pratipattiH aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat 
   mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam itīdaṃ bhagavann ucyate sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	mahAyAnam mahAyAnam iti idam Bagavan ucyate sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati tenocyate mahāyānam iti ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam tad	aBiBUya niryAsyati tena ucyate mahAyAnam iti AkASa samam tat yAnam tat 
   yathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānam aparimāṇānāṃ	yaTA api nAma Bagavan AkASe aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnam aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ evam eva bhagavann asmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām	sattvAnAm avakASaH evam eva Bagavan asmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm
   asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ evaṃ hi bhagavann	asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH evam hi Bagavat = 
   bodhisattvasya mahāyānam tad yathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśasya nāpy āgamo	boDisattvasya mahAyAnam tat yaTA api nAma Bagavan AkASasya na api AgamaH 
   dṛśyate na nirgamo na sthānaṃ dṛśyate evam evāsya bhagavan mahāyānasya	dRSyate na nirgamaH na sTAnam dRSyate evam eva asya Bagavat mahAyAnasya
   nāpy āgamo dṛśyate na nirgamo na sthānam upalabhyate tad yathāpi nāma	na api AgamaH dRSyate na nirgamaH na sTAnam upalaByate tat yaTA api nAma
   bhagavann ākāśasya nāpi pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na	Bagavan AkASasya na api pUrva ante upalaByate na aparAntaH upalaByate na
   madhya upalabhyate adhvasamatām upādāya evam evāsya bhagavan mahāyānasya	maDye upalaByate aDvasama tAm upAdAya evam eva asya Bagavat mahAyAnasya
   nāpi pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate	na api pUrva ante upalaByate na aparAntaH upalaByate na maDye upalaByate
   adhvasamatām upādāya evam idaṃ bhagavan mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate	aDva sama tAm upAdAya evam idam Bagavat mahAyAnam mahAyAnam iti ucyate
   bhagavān āha evam etat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yad	BagavAn Aha evam etat suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat 
   imāḥ ṣaḍ pāramitā dānapāramitā (PSP1: 232) śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	imAH zaw pAramitA dAna pAramitA (PSP1: 232) SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA idam suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya mahāyānam punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam punar aparam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya

   bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṃgamārgā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś catvāri vaiśāradyāni	boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aMga mArgA catasraH pratisaMvidaH catvAri vESAradyAni
   ṣaḍabhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā idaṃ subhūte	zaxaBijQAH daSa taTAgata balAni azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmA idam suBUte
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya mahAyAnam yat punar suBUtiH evam Aha
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti katamaś ca	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya tat yAnam niryAsyati iti katamaH ca

   subhūte kāmadhātus tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ	suBUte kAmaDAtuH taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam
   tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan	tattvam yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan
   nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat	na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat

   kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ sandarśitam ayathāvat sarvam anityam adhruvam	kalpitam viWapitam sandarSitam ayaTAvat sarvam anityam aDruvam
   aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ	aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram

   vijñānaṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ	vijQAnam taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam
   yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte vijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ sandarśitam ayathāvat sarvam	tarhi suBUte vijQAnam kalpitam viWapitam sandarSitam ayaTAvat sarvam
   anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ	anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte cakṣuḥ tathatā	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte cakzuH taTatA
   avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ	avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH
   śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte cakṣuḥ	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte cakzuH
   kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ sandarśitam ayathāvat sarvam anityam adhruvam	kalpitam viWapitam sandarSitam ayaTAvat sarvam anityam aDruvam
   aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ	aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram
   lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaḥ sacet subhūte	lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH saced suBUte
   manaḥ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan	manaH taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvan
   nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	nityaH DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte manaḥ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ sandarśitam ayathāvat sarvam anityam	suBUte manaH kalpitam viWapitam sandarSitam ayaTAvat sarvam anityam
   adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ	aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte rūpaṃ tathatā	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte rUpam taTatA
   avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ	avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH
   śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte rUpam
   kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ sandarśitam ayathāvat sarvam anityam adhruvam	kalpitam viWapitam sandarSitam ayaTAvat sarvam anityam aDruvam
   aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ	aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram
   lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyam sacet	lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati evam SabdaH ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam saced 
   subhūte dharmaḥ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ	suBUte DarmaH taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam
   yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte dharmaḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ sandarśito 'yathāvat sarvam	tarhi suBUte DarmaH kalpitaH viWapitaH sandarSitaH ayaTAvat sarvam
   anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ	anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte cakṣurvijñānaṃ	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte cakzuH vijQAnam
   tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo	taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH 
   dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte cakṣurvijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ sandarśitam ayathāvat sarvam	suBUte cakzuH vijQAnam kalpitam viWapitam sandarSitam ayaTAvat sarvam
   anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ	anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati evam Srotra vijQAnam
   ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ sacet subhūte manovijñānaṃ	GrANa vijQAnam jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam saced suBUte manaH vijQAnam
   tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo	taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH 
   dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte manovijñānaṃ kalpitaṃ viṭhapitaṃ sandarśitam ayathāvat sarvam	suBUte manaH vijQAnam kalpitam viWapitam sandarSitam ayaTAvat sarvam
   anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ	anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte cakṣḥsaṃsparśaḥ	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte cakzH saMsparSaH
   tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo	taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH 
   dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ sandarśito 'yathāvat sarvam	suBUte cakzuH saMsparSaH kalpitaH viWapitaH sandarSitaH ayaTAvat sarvam
   anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ	anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati evam Srotra saMsparSaH
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ sacet subhūte	GrANa saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSaH saced suBUte
   manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ	manaH saMsparSaH taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam
   yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kalpito viṭhapitaḥ sandarśito 'yathāvat	tarhi suBUte manaH saMsparSaH kalpitaH viWapitaH sandarSitaH ayaTAvat 
   sarvam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ	sarvam anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ	cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam
   bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo	BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH 
   bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya	Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya
   nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā kalpitā viṭhapitā	nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA kalpitA viWapitA
   sandarśitā 'yathāvat sarvam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi	sandarSitA ayaTAvat sarvam anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi
   abhāvas tasmād idaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati	aBAvaH tasmAt idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati
   evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā	evam Srotra saMsparSa jA vedanA GrANa saMsparSa jA vedanA jihvA saMsparSa jA
   vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā sacet subhūte manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā	vedanA kAya saMsparSa jA vedanA saced suBUte manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA
   tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā aviparītaṃ bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ yathāvan nityo	taTatA avitaTa tA ananya taTatA aviparItam BUtam tattvam yaTAvat nityaH 
   dhruvaḥ śāśvato 'vipariṇāmadharmī bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ	DruvaH SASvataH avipariNAma DarmI BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya nirayāsyat yasmāt tarhi	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya nirayAsyat yasmAt tarhi
   subhūte manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā kalpitā viṭhapitā sandarśitā 'yathāvat	suBUte manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA kalpitA viWapitA sandarSitA ayaTAvat 
   sarvam anityam adhruvam aśāśvataṃ vipariṇāmadharmi abhāvas tasmād idaṃ	sarvam anityam aDruvam aSASvatam vipariNAma Darmi aBAvaH tasmAt idam
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte
   dharmadhātur bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ	DarmaDAtuH BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram
   lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte dharmadhātur abhāvo na	lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte DarmaDAtuH aBAvaH na
   bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ	BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati evam
   tathatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sacet subhūte acintyadhātur bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	taTatA BUtakowiH saced suBUte acintya DAtuH BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH 
   (PSP1: 233) naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat	(PSP1: 233) na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat 
   yasmāt tarhi subhūte acintyadhātur abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ	yasmAt tarhi suBUte acintya DAtuH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte dānapāramitā	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte dAna pAramitA
   bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte dānapāramitā abhāvo na bhāvas	aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte dAna pAramitA aBAvaH na BAvas
   tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet	tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced 
   subhūte śīlapāramitā bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	suBUte SIla pAramitA BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   śīlapāramitā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	SIla pAramitAH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte kṣāntipāramitā bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte kzAnti pAramitA BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte kṣāntipāramitā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ	tarhi suBUte kzAnti pAramitA aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte vīryapāramitā	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte vIrya pAramitA
   bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte vīryapāramitā abhāvo na bhāvas	aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte vIrya pAramitAH aBAvaH na BAvas
   tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet	tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced 
   subhūte dhyānapāramitā bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	suBUte DyAna pAramitA BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   dhyānapāramitā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	DyAna pAramitAH aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte prajñāpāramitā bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte prajQApAramitA BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt	na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt 
   tarhi subhūte prajñāpāramitā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ	tarhi suBUte prajQApAramitA aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte adhyātmaśūnyatā	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte aDyAtma SUnyatA
   bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte adhyātmaśūnyatā abhāvo na bhāvas	aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte aDyAtma SUnyatA aBAvaH na BAvas
   tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet	tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced 
   subhūte bahirdhāśūnyatā bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	suBUte bahirDA SUnyatA BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   bahirdhāśūnyatā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	bahirDA SUnyatA aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam
   abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā bhāvo bhaviṣyan	aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA BAvaH Bavizyan
   nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat	na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat 
   yasmāt tarhi subhūte adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt	yasmAt tarhi suBUte aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt 
   mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati yābat sacet subhūte	mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati yAbat saced suBUte
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram
   lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati sacet subhūte smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvo bhaviṣyan	lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati saced suBUte smRti upasTAnAni BAvaH Bavizyan
   nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat	na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat 
   yasmāt tarhi subhūte smṛtyupasthānāni abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ	yasmAt tarhi suBUte smRti upasTAnAni aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ catvāri samyakaprahāṇāni	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati evam catvAri samyaka prahANAni

   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte

   niryāsyat yasmāt tarhi subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyo 'bhāvo na	niryAsyat yasmAt tarhi suBUte apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattyaH aBAvaH na
   bhāvas tasmāt mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ	BAvaH tasmAt mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBUya niryAsyati evam
   daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sacet subhūte	daSa balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH saced suBUte
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvaḥ bhaviṣyan nābhāvo naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH na eva idam mahAyAnam

   234) jñānam abhāvo na bhāvas tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	234) jQAnam aBAvaH na BAvaH tasmAt boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH

   sarvajñajñānam anuprāpnoti evaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam	sarvajQa jQAnam anuprApnoti evam mahAyAnam sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam

   arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca śriyā	arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam tejasA ca SriyA

   sacet subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān	saced suBUte taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn

   samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphārati sacet	samyaksaMbudDaH gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn avaBAsena sPArati saced

   aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa abhivijñāpayati sacet subhūte	aprameya asaMKyeyAn lokaDAtUn svareNa aBivijQApayati saced suBUte
   tathāgatasya triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāradharmacakraṃ bhāvo bhaviṣyan nābhāvo	taTAgatasya tri parivartam dvAdaSa AkAra Darma cakram BAvaH Bavizyan na aBAvaH 
   naiva tathāgatas triparivartadvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ prāvartayiṣyat	na eva taTAgataH tri parivarta dvAdaSa AkAram Darma cakram prAvartayizyat 
   apravartanīyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā	apravartanIyam SramaNena vA brAhmaNena vA devena vA mAreNa vA brahmaNA vA

   anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyat yasmāt tarhi sattvā abhāvo na	anupaDi Seza nirvANa DAtO parinirvAsyat yasmAt tarhi sattvAH aBAvaH na

   trividham uddeśaniryāṇam yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam	triviDam uddeSa niryANam yat punar suBUtiH evam Aha AkASa samam tat yAnam
   iti evam etat subhūte evam etat ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam yathākāśasya na pūrvā	iti evam etat suBUte evam etat AkASa samam tat yAnam yaTA AkASasya na pUrvA
   dik prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik	diS prajQAyate na dakziNA na paScimA na uttarA na vidiSaH na aDas na UrDvA diS 
   prajñāyate evam eva (PSP1: 235) subhūte tasya yānasya na pūrvā dik	prajQAyate evam eva (PSP1: 235) suBUte tasya yAnasya na pUrvA diS 
   prajñāyate na dakṣiṇā na paścimā nottarā na vidiśo nādho nordhvā dik	prajQAyate na dakziNA na paScimA na uttarA na vidiSaH na aDas na UrDvA diS 
   prajñāyate tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	prajQAyate tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ	AkASam na dIrGam na hrasvam na vRttam na catur asram na samam na vizamam
   na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ nāvadātaṃ na mañjiṣṭhaṃ na	na nIlam na pItam na lohitam na avadAtam na maQjizWam na
   sphaṭikarajatavarṇam evam eva subhūe tat mahāyānaṃ na dīrghaṃ na hrasvaṃ	sPawika rajata varNam evam eva su BUe tat mahAyAnam na dIrGam na hrasvam
   na vṛttaṃ na caturasraṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na lohitaṃ	na vRttam na catur asram na samam na vizamam na nIlam na pItam na lohitam

   yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na	yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na atItam na anAgatam na

   pratyutpannam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	pratyutpannam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśasya na hāniḥ na vṛddhir evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na hāniḥ	AkASasya na hAniH na vRdDiH evam eva suBUte tasya mahAyAnasya na hAniH
   na vṛddhiḥ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	na vRdDiH tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśasya na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya na	AkASasya na saMkleSaH na vyavadAnam evam eva suBUte tasya mahAyAnasya na
   saṃkleśo na vyavadānam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma	saMkleSaH na vyavadAnam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma
   subhūte ākāśasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitina viṣṭhitir na sthiter	suBUte AkASasya na utpAdaH na niroDaH na sTitina vizWitiH na sTiteH 
   anyathātvam evam eva subhūte tasya mahāyānasya notpādo na nirodho na	anyaTAtvam evam eva suBUte tasya mahAyAnasya na utpAdaH na niroDaH na
   sthitina viṣṭhitir na sthiter anyathātvam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam	sTitina vizWitiH na sTiteH anyaTAtvam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam
   iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ na vyākṛtaṃ	iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na kuSalam na akuSalam na vyAkRtam
   nāvyākṛtam evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ na vyākṛtaṃ	na avyAkRtam evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na kuSalam na akuSalam na vyAkRtam
   nāvyākṛtam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	na avyAkRtam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ na mataṃ na vijñātam evam eva subhūte tad	AkASam na dRzwam na Srutam na matam na vijQAtam evam eva suBUte tat 
   mahāyānaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ na mataṃ na vijñātam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ	mahAyAnam na dRzwam na Srutam na matam na vijQAtam tena ucyate AkASa samam
   tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na jñeyaṃ nājñeyaṃ na	tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na jQeyam na AjQeyam na
   parijñeyaṃ na parijñātavyaṃ na prahātavyaṃ na sākṣātkartavyaṃ na	parijQeyam na parijQAtavyam na prahAtavyam na sAkzAtkartavyam na
   bhāvayitavyam evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na jñeyaṃ nājñeyaṃ na	BAvayitavyam evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na jQeyam na AjQeyam na
   parijñeyaṃ na parijñātavyaṃ na prahātavyaṃ na sākṣātkartavyaṃ na	parijQeyam na parijQAtavyam na prahAtavyam na sAkzAtkartavyam na
   bhāvayitavyam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	BAvayitavyam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśaṃ na vipāko na vipākadharmi evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na vipāko	AkASam na vipAkaH na vipAka Darmi evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na vipAkaH 
   na vipākadharmi tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma	na vipAka Darmi tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma
   subhūte ākāśaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ	suBUte AkASam na kAmaDAtu paryApannam na rUpa DAtu paryApannam
   nārūpyadhātuparyāpannam evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na	na arUpya DAtu paryApannam evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na
   kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ na rūpadhātuparyāpannaṃ nārūpyadhātuparyāpannam	kAmaDAtu paryApannam na rUpa DAtu paryApannam na ArUpya DAtu paryApannam
   tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na	tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na
   prathamacittotpādo na dvitīyo na tṛtīyo na caturtho na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭho	praTama citta utpAdaH na dvitIyaH na tRtIyaH na caturTaH na paQcamaH na zazWaH 
   na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādaḥ evam eva subhūte tad	na saptamaH na azwamaH na navamaH na daSamaH citta utpAdaH evam eva suBUte tat 
   mahāyānaṃ na prathamacittotpādo na dvitīyo na tṛtīyo na caturtho na	mahAyAnam na praTama citta utpAdaH na dvitIyaH na tRtIyaH na caturTaH na
   pañcamo na ṣaṣṭho na saptamo nāṣṭamo na navamo na daśamaś cittotpādaḥ	paQcamaH na zazWaH na saptamaH na azwamaH na navamaH na daSamaH citta utpAdaH
   tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na	tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASe na
   śuklavidarśanābūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na	Sukla vidarSana abUmiH na gotra BUmiH na azwamaka BUmiH na darSana BUmiH na
   tanubhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvibhūmiḥ evam eva subhūte tasmin	tanu BUmiH na vIta rAga BUmiH na kRta aviBUmiH evam eva suBUte tasmin
   mahāyāne na śuklavidarśanābūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na	mahAyAne na Sukla vidarSana abUmiH na gotra BUmiH na azwamaka BUmiH na
   darśanabhūmir na tanubhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvibhūmiḥ tenocyate	darSana BUmiH na tanu BUmiH na vIta rAga BUmiH na kRta aviBUmiH tena ucyate
   ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na	AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASe na
   srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na	srotaApatti Palam na sakRdAgAmi Palam nAnA gAmi Palam na arhat tvam na
   pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na buddhatvam evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne na	pratyekabudDa tvam na budDa tvam evam eva suBUte tasmin mahAyAne na
   srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na	srotaApatti Palam na sakRdAgAmi Palam nAnA gAmi Palam na arhat tvam na
   pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na buddhatvam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad	pratyekabudDa tvam na budDa tvam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat 
   yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na	yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASe na SrAvaka BUmiH na pratyekabudDa BUmiH na
   samyaksaṃbuddhabhūmiḥ evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne na śrāvakabhūmir na	samyaksaMbudDa BUmiH evam eva suBUte tasmin mahAyAne na SrAvaka BUmiH na
   pratyekabuddhabhūmir na samyaksaṃbuddhabhūmiḥ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad	pratyekabudDa BUmiH na samyaksaMbudDa BUmiH tena ucyate AkASa samam tat 
   yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na rūpi nārūpi (PSP1: 236) na	yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na rUpi na arUpi (PSP1: 236) na
   sanidarśanaṃ nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na	sa nidarSanam na anidarSanam na sa pratiGam na apratiGam na saMyuktam na
   visaṃyuktam evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na rūpi nārūpi na sanidarśanaṃ	visaMyuktam evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na rUpi na arUpi na sa nidarSanam
   nānidarśanaṃ na sapratighaṃ nāpratighaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktam	na anidarSanam na sa pratiGam na apratiGam na saMyuktam na visaMyuktam
   tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na	tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na
   nityaṃ nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ evam	nityam na anityam na suKam na duHKam na AtmA nAnA AtmA na SAntam nASa antam evam
   eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā	eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na nityam na anityam na suKam na duHKam na AtmA
   nānātmā na śāntaṃ nāśāntaṃ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi	nAnA AtmA na SAntam nASa antam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api
   nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na	nAma suBUte AkASam na SUnyam na aSUnyam na nimittam na animittam na
   praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitam evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyaṃ	praNihitam na apraNihitam evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na SUnyam na aSUnyam
   na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na praṇihitaṃ nāpraṇihitam tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad	na nimittam na animittam na praNihitam na apraNihitam tena ucyate AkASa samam tat 
   yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśaṃ na viviktaṃ nāviviktaṃ nāloko	yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASam na viviktam na aviviktam na alokaH 
   nāndhakāraḥ evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na viviktaṃ nāviviktaṃ nāloko	na anDakAraH evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na viviktam na aviviktam na alokaH 
   nāndhakāraḥ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	na anDakAraH tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśaṃ na labhyate nopalabhyate evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na labhyate	AkASam na laByate na upalaByate evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na laByate
   nopalabhyate tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	na upalaByate tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   ākāśaṃ na pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāraḥ evam eva subhūte tad mahāyānaṃ na	AkASam na pravyAhAraH na apravyAhAraH evam eva suBUte tat mahAyAnam na
   pravyāhāro nāpravyāhāraḥ tenocyate ākāśasamaṃ tad yānam iti iti	pravyAhAraH na apravyAhAraH tena ucyate AkASa samam tat yAnam iti iti
   samatāniryāṇam yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha yathākāśe 'prameyāṇām	samatA niryANam yat punar suBUtiH evam Aha yaTA AkASe aprameyANAm
   asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ evam eva tasmin mahāyāne	asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH evam eva tasmin mahAyAne
   'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśa iti evam etat	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH iti evam etat 
   subhūte evam etat yathā ākāśe 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	suBUte evam etat yaTA AkASe aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ evam eva tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām	sattvAnAm avakASaH evam eva tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśa iti tat kasya hetoḥ sattvāsattayā hi	aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH iti tat kasya hetoH sattva asat tayA hi
   subhūte ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā anenāpi	suBUte AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA veditavyA anena api
   subhūte paryāyeṇa tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	suBUte paryAyeNa tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac	sattvAnAm avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte ye ca sattvAH yat 
   cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ sarvam etan nopalabhyate punar aparaṃ subhūte	ca AkASam yat ca mahAyAnam sarvam etat na upalaByate punar aparam suBUte
   sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā	sattva asat tayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA veditavyA
   mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne	mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asattA veditavyAH evam hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne
   'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ tathā hi subhūte	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH taTA hi suBUte
   ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāprameyaṃ sarvam evaṃ	ye ca sattvAH yat ca AkASam yat ca mahAyAnam yat ca aprameyam sarvam evam
   nopalabhyate punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā	na upalaByate punar aparam suBUte sattva asat tayA AkASa asattA veditavyA
   ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā asaṃkhyeyāsattā	AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA asaMKyeya asattA
   veditavyā evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām	veditavyAH evam hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ	aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH taTA hi suBUte ye ca sattvAH yat ca AkASam
   yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāsaṃkhyeyaṃ sarvam evaṃ nopalabhyate (PSP1: 237)	yat ca mahAyAnam yat ca asaMKyeyam sarvam evam na upalaByate (PSP1: 237)
   punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā tathāgatāsattā veditavyā	punar aparam suBUte sattva asat tayA taTAgata asattA veditavyA
   tathāgatāsattayāṃ aparimāṇāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne	taTAgata asattayAm aparimANa asattA veditavyAH evam hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne
   'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ tathā hi subhūte	aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH taTA hi suBUte
   ye ca sattvā yac cākāśaṃ yac ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāparimāṇaṃ sarvam evaṃ	ye ca sattvAH yat ca AkASam yat ca mahAyAnam yat ca aparimANam sarvam evam
   nopalabhyate punar aparaṃ subhūte sattvāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā	na upalaByate punar aparam suBUte sattva asat tayA AkASa asattA veditavyA
   ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā asaṃskṛtāsattā	AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA asaMskRta asattA
   veditavyā asaṃskṛtāsattayāprameyāsattā veditavyā aprameyāsattayā	veditavyA asaMskRta asattayA aprameya asattA veditavyA aprameya asattayA
   asaṃkhyeyāsattā veditavyā asaṃkhyeyāsattayā aparimāṇāsattā veditavyā	asaMKyeya asattA veditavyA asaMKyeya asat tayA aparimANa asattA veditavyA
   aparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin	aparimANa asat tayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyAH evam hi suBUte tasmin
   mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat	mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte ye ca sattvā yaś ca tathāgato yac cākāśaṃ yac	kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte ye ca sattvAH yaH ca taTAgataH yat ca AkASam yat 
   ca mahāyānaṃ yac cāsaṃskṛtaṃ yac cāprameyaṃ yac cāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yac	ca mahAyAnam yat ca asaMskRtam yat ca aprameyam yat ca asaMKyeyam yat 
   cāparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante punar aparaṃ	ca aparimANam ye ca sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante punar aparam
   subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā	suBUte Atma sattva asat tayA
   sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāsattā	sattva jIva poza puruza pudgalam anujamAnavakAraka vedaka jAnaka paSyakA sattA
   veditavyā jānakapaśyakāsattayā bhūtakoṭyasattā veditavyā bhūtakoṭyasattayā	veditavyA jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA BUtakowyasattA veditavyA BUtakowyasat tayA
   aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā	aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA veditavyA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA
   sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām	sarva Darma asattA veditavyAH evam hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm
   asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   subhūte yaś cātmā yaś ca yāvaj jānakapaśyako yā ca bhūtakoṭiḥ yac	suBUte yaH ca AtmA yaH ca yAvat jAnakapaSyakaH yA ca BUtakowiH yat 
   cāprameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete	ca aprameyam asaMKyeyam aparimANam ye ca sarva DarmAH sarve ete
   nopalabhyante (PSP1: 238) punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj	na upalaByante (PSP1: 238) punar aparam suBUte Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattayā acintyadhātvasattā	jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA acintya DAtu asattA
   veditavyā acintyadhātvasattayā rūpaskandhāsattā veditavyā	veditavyA acintya DAtu asat tayA rUpa skanDA sattA veditavyA
   rūpaskandhāsattayā vedanāskandhāsattā veditavyā vedanāskandhasattayā	rUpa skanDA sattayA vedanA skanDA sattA veditavyA vedanA skanDa sattayA
   saṃjñāskandhāsattā veditavyā saṃjñāskandhāsattayā saṃskāraskandhāsattā	saMjQA skanDa asattA veditavyA saMjQA skanDA sattayA saMskAra skanDA sattA
   veditavyā saṃskāraskandhāsattayā vijñānaskandhāsattā veditavyā	veditavyA saMskAra skanDA sattayA vijQAna skanDA sattA veditavyA
   vijñānaskandhāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā	vijQAna skanDA sattayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA
   veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā	veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA veditavyA
   aprameyāsaṃkhyeyārimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi subhūte	aprameya asaMKyeya arimANA sattayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyA evam hi suBUte
   tasmin mahāyāne 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ	tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH
   tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva	tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca sarva DarmAH sarva
   ete nopalabhyante punar aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj	ete na upalaByante punar aparam suBUte Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattayā cakṣurasattā	jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA cakzuH asattA
   veditavyā cakṣurasattayā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamano 'sattā veditavyā mano	veditavyA cakzuH asat tayA Srotra GrANa jihvA kAyamanaH asattA veditavyA manaH 
   'sattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā	asat tayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA veditavyA
   mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā	mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA veditavyA
   aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi	aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyAH evam hi
   subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām	suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm
   avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca	avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca
   sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante punar aparaṃ subhūte	sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante punar aparam suBUte
   ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj	Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattayā dānapāramitāsattā veditavyā dānapāramitāsattayā	jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA dAna pAramitA sattA veditavyA dAna pAramitA sattayA
   śīlapāramitāsattā veditavyā śīlapāramitāsattayā kṣāntipāramitāsattā	SIla pAramitA sattA veditavyA SIla pAramitA sattayA kzAnti pAramitA sattA
   veditavyā kṣāntipāramitāsattayā vīryapāramitāsattā veditavyā	veditavyA kzAnti pAramitA sattayA vIrya pAramitA sattA veditavyA
   vīryapāramitāsattayā dhyānapāramitāsattā veditavyā dhyānapāramitāsattayā	vIrya pAramitA sattayA DyAna pAramitA sattA veditavyA DyAna pAramitA sattayA
   prajñāpāramitāsattā veditavyā prajñāpāramitāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā	prajQApAramitA sattA veditavyA prajQApAramitA sattayA AkASa asattA veditavyA
   ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā	AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA
   aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā	aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA veditavyA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA
   sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām	sarva Darma asattA veditavyAH evam hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm
   asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi	asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi
   subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante punar	suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante punar 
   aparaṃ subhūte ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj	aparam suBUte Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattayā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā	jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā veditavyā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA sattA veditavyA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA sattayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA
   mahāyānāsattā veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā	mahAyAna asattA veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA
   veditavyā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ	veditavyA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyA evam
   hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca	sattvAnAm avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca
   sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante punar aparaṃ subhūte	sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante punar aparam suBUte
   ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj	Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattayā smṛtyupasthānāsattā veditavyā smṛtyupasthānāsattayā	jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA smRti upasTAna asattA veditavyA smRti upasTAna asattayA
   samyakprahāṇāsattā veditavyā samyakprahāṇāsattayā ṛddhipādāsattā veditavyā	samyak prahANa asattA veditavyA samyak prahANa asat tayA RdDi pAda asattA veditavyA
   ṛddhipādāsattayā indriyāsattā veditavyā indriyāsattayā balāsattā veditavyā	RdDi pAda asat tayA indriya asattA veditavyA indriya asat tayA balA sattA veditavyA
   balāsattayā bodhyaṅgāsattā veditavyā bodhyaṅgāsattayā mārgāsattā veditavyā	balA sattayA boDi aFga asattA veditavyA boDi aFga asattayA mArga asattA veditavyA
   mārgāsattayā vaiśāradyāsattā veditavyā vaiśāradyāsattayā pratisaṃvidāsattā	mArgAsat tayA vESAradya asattA veditavyA vESAradyA sat tayA pratisaMvid AsattA
   veditavyā pratisaṃvidāsattayā pāramitāsattā veditavyā pāramitāsattayā	veditavyA pratisaMvid Asat tayA pAramitA sattA veditavyA pAramitA sattayA
   tathāgatabalāsattā veditavyā tathāgatabalāsattayā āveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā	taTAgata balA sattA veditavyA taTAgata balA sattayA AveNika budDa Darma asattA
   veditavyā āveṇikabuddhadharmāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā	veditavyA AveNika budDa Darma asattayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA
   mahāyānāsattā veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā	mahAyAna asattA veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA
   veditavyā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ	veditavyA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyA evam
   hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca	sattvAnAm avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca
   sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante punar aparaṃ subhūte	sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante punar aparam suBUte
