   ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj	Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattayā gotrabhūmyasattā veditavyā gotrabhūmyasattayā	jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA gotra BUmi asattA veditavyA gotra BUmi asat tayA
   aṣṭamakabhūmyasattā veditavyā aṣṭamakabhūmyasattayā darśanabhūmyasattā	azwamaka BUmi asattA veditavyA azwamaka BUmi asat tayA darSana BUmi asat tA
   veditavyā darśanabhūmyasattayā tanubhūmyasattā veditavyā tanubhūmyasattayā	veditavyA darSana BUmi asat tayA tanu BUmi asattA veditavyA tanu BUmi asat tayA
   vītarāgabhūmyasattā veditavyā vītarāgabhūmyasattayā kṛtāvibhūmyasattā	vIta rAga BUmi asattA veditavyA vIta rAga BUmi asat tayA kRta aviBUmi asattA
   veditavyā kṛtāvibhūmyasattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā	veditavyA kRta aviBUmi asat tayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA
   mahāyānāsattā veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā	mahAyAna asattA veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA
   veditavyā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ	veditavyA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyA evam
   hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca	sattvAnAm avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca
   sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante (PSP1: 239) punar aparaṃ subhūte	sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante (PSP1: 239) punar aparam suBUte
   ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj	Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattayā srotaāpannāsattā veditavyā srotaāpannāsattayā	jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA srotaApanna asattA veditavyA srotaApanna asattayA
   sakṛdāgāmyasattā veditavyā sakṛdāgāmyasattayā anāgāmyasattā veditavyā	sakRdAgAmi a sattA veditavyA sakRdAgAmi a sattayA anAgAmya sattA veditavyA
   anāgāmyasattayā arhadasattā veditavyā arhadasattayā pratyekabuddhāsattā	anAgAmya sattayA arhada sattA veditavyA arhada sat tayA pratyekabudDa asattA
   veditavyā pratyekabuddhāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā	veditavyA pratyekabudDa asat tayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA
   mahāyānāsattā veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā	mahAyAna asattA veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA
   veditavyā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ	veditavyA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyA evam
   hi subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	hi suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca	sattvAnAm avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca
   sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante punar aparaṃ subhūte	sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante punar aparam suBUte
   ātmasattvāsattayā yāvaj jānakapaśyakāsattā veditavyā yāvaj	Atma sattva asat tayA yAvat jAnaka paSyakA sattA veditavyA yAvat 
   jānakapaśyakāsattayā śrāvakayānāsattā veditavyā śrāvakayānāsattayā	jAnaka paSyakA sat tayA SrAvaka yAna asattA veditavyA SrAvaka yAna asattayA
   pratyekabuddhayānāsattā veditavyā pratyekabuddhayānāsattayā tathāgatāsattā	pratyekabudDa yAna asattA veditavyA pratyekabudDa yAna asat tayA taTAgata asattA
   veditavyā tathāgatāsattayā sarvākārajñatāsattā veditavyā	veditavyA taTAgata asattayA sarva AkAra jQa tA sattA veditavyA
   sarvākārajñatāsattayā ākāśāsattā veditavyā ākāśāsattayā mahāyānāsattā	sarva AkAra jQa tA sattayA AkASa asattA veditavyA AkASa asat tayA mahAyAna asattA
   veditavyā mahāyānāsattayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattā veditavyā	veditavyA mahAyAna asat tayA aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asattA veditavyA
   aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā evaṃ hi	aprameya asaMKyeya aparimANa asat tayA sarva Darma asattA veditavyAH evam hi
   subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām	suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm
   avakāśaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte yaś cātmā yāvad ye ca	avakASaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte yaH ca AtmA yAvat ye ca
   sarvadharmāḥ sarva ete nopalabhyante tad yathāpi nāma subhūte	sarva DarmAH sarve ete na upalaByante tat yaTA api nAma suBUte
   nirvāṇadhātāv aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ	nirvANa DAtO aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH
   evam eva subhūte tasmin mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	evam eva suBUte tasmin mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām avakāśaḥ tad yathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśe aprameyāṇām	sattvAnAm avakASaH tat yaTA api nAma suBUte AkASe aprameyANAm
   asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ evam eva subhūte tasmin	asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH evam eva suBUte tasmin
   mahāyāne aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām avakāśaḥ iti	mahAyAne aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm avakASaH iti
   sattvārthaniryāṇam yad api subhūtir evam āha nāpi tasya mahāyānasya āgatir	sattva arTa niryANam yat api suBUtiH evam Aha na api tasya mahAyAnasya AgatiH 
   dṛśyate nāpi gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyata iti evam etat subhūte tasya	dRSyate na api gatiH na sTAnam dRSyate iti evam etat suBUte tasya
   mahāyānasyāgatir na dṛśyate nāpi gatir na sthānaṃ dṛśyate tat kasya hetoḥ	mahAyAnasya AgatiH na dRSyate na api gatiH na sTAnam dRSyate tat kasya hetoH
   acalā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te na kvacid gacchanti na kutaścid	acalAH hi suBUte sarva DarmAH te na kvacid gacCanti na kutaScid 
   āgacchanti na kvacit tiṣṭhanti tat kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte rūpasya	AgacCanti na kvacid tizWanti tat kasya hetoH na hi suBUte rUpasya
   prakṛtiḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati	prakRtiH kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām na hi subhūte vijñānasya prakṛtiḥ kutaścid	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm na hi suBUte vijQAnasya prakRtiH kutaScid 
   āgacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na hi subhūte rūpasya tathatā kutaścid	AgacCati na kvacid tizWati na hi suBUte rUpasya taTatA kutaScid 
   āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ	AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH
   saṃskārāṇām na hi subhūte vijñānasya tathatā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacit	saMskArANAm na hi suBUte vijQAnasya taTatA kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid 
   tiṣṭhati na hi subhūte rūpasya svabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid	tizWati na hi suBUte rUpasya svaBAvaH kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid 
   gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām na hi subhūte	gacCati na kvacid tizWati vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm na hi suBUte
   vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na hi subhūte	vijQAnasya svaBAvaH kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid tizWati na hi suBUte
   rūpasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati	rUpasya lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām na hi subhūte vijñānasya lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm na hi suBUte vijQAnasya lakzaNam kutaScid 
   āgacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na subhūte cakṣuṣaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na	AgacCati na kvacid tizWati na suBUte cakzuzaH prakRtiH na taTatA na
   svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit	svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid 
   tiṣṭhati evaṃ na śrotrasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na subhūte	tizWati evam na Srotrasya na GrANasya na jihvAyAH na kAyasya na suBUte
   manasaḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na	manasaH prakRtiH na taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na
   kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na subhūte pṛthivīdhātoḥ prakṛtir na	kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati na suBUte pRTivI DAtoH prakRtiH na
   tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na	taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na
   kvacit tiṣṭhati evaṃ na abdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor na subhūte	kvacid tizWati evam na abDAtoH na tejaH DAtoH na vAyu DAtoH na suBUte
   ākāśadhātoḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati	AkASa DAtoH prakRtiH na taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati
   na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na subhūte dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtir na	na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati na suBUte DarmaDAtoH prakRtiH na
   tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na	taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na
   kvacit tiṣṭhati evaṃ na tathatāyā na bhūtakoṭer na subhūte (PSP1: 240)	kvacid tizWati evam na taTatAyAH na BUtakoweH na suBUte (PSP1: 240)
   acintyadhātoḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid	acintya DAtoH prakRtiH na taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid 
   āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na subhūte dānapāramitāyāḥ	AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati na suBUte dAna pAramitAyAH
   prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid	prakRtiH na taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid 
   gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyāḥ na kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ	gacCati na kvacid tizWati evam na SIla pAramitAyAH na kzAnti pAramitAyAH
   na vīryapāramitāyāḥ na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ na subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ	na vIrya pAramitAyAH na DyAna pAramitAyAH na suBUte prajQApAramitAyAH
   prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid	prakRtiH na taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid 
   gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na subhūte smṛtyupasthānānāṃ prakṛtir na	gacCati na kvacid tizWati na suBUte smRti upasTAnAnAm prakRtiH na
   tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na	taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na
   kvacit tiṣṭhati evaṃ na samyakprahāṇānāṃ na ṛddhipādānāṃ na indriyāṇāṃ na	kvacid tizWati evam na samyak prahANAnAm na RdDi pAdAnAm naH indriyANAm na
   balānāṃ na bodhyaṅgānāṃ na subhūte mārgasya prakṛtir na tathatā na	balAnAm na boDi aFgAnAm na suBUte mArgasya prakRtiH na taTatA na
   svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit	svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid 
   tiṣṭhati na subhūte apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ prakṛtir na tathatā na	tizWati na suBUte apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattInAm prakRtiH na taTatA na
   svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit	svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid 
   tiṣṭhati evaṃ na tathāgatabalānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ na	tizWati evam na taTAgata balAnAm na vESAradyAnAm na pratisaMvidAm na
   subhūte aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ na tathatā na svabhāvo na	suBUte azwAdaSa AveNikAnAm budDa DarmAnAm na taTatA na svaBAvaH na
   lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na	lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati na
   subhūte bodheḥ prakṛtir na tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid	suBUte boDeH prakRtiH na taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid 
   āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati na subhūte asaṃskṛtasya na	AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati na suBUte asaMskRtasya na
   tathatā na svabhāvo na lakṣaṇaṃ kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na	taTatA na svaBAvaH na lakzaNam kutaScid AgacCati na kvacid gacCati na
   kvacit tiṣṭhati ity anābhoganiryāṇam yad api tat subhūtir evam āha nāsya	kvacid tizWati iti anABoga niryANam yat api tat suBUtiH evam Aha na asya
   yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate madhya upalabhyate	yAnasya pUrva ante upalaByate na aparAntaH upalaByate maDye upalaByate
   tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmāt mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity ucyate evam etat	tri aDva samam tat yAnam tasmAt mahAyAnam mahAyAnam iti ucyate evam etat 
   subhūte evam etat nāsya yānasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate	suBUte evam etat na asya yAnasya pUrva ante upalaByate na aparAntaH upalaByate
   madhya upalabhyate tryadhvasamaṃ tad yānaṃ tasmāt mahāyānaṃ mahāyānam ity	maDye upalaByate tri aDva samam tat yAnam tasmAt mahAyAnam mahAyAnam iti 
   ucyate tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte atīto 'dhvātītenādhvanā śūnyaḥ	ucyate tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte atItaH aDvA atItena aDvanA SUnyaH
   anāgato 'dhvā anāgatenādhvanā śūnyaḥ pratyutpanno 'dhvā	anAgataH aDvA anAgatena aDvanA SUnyaH pratyutpannaH aDvA
   pratyutpannenādhvanā śūnyaḥ tryadhvasamatā tryadhvasamatayā śūnyā	pratyutpannena aDvanA SUnyaH tri aDva samatA tri aDva samatayA SUnyA
   mahāyānaṃ mahāyānena śūnyam bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ na subhūte	mahAyAnam mahAyAnena SUnyam boDisattvaH boDisattvena SUnyaH na suBUte
   śūnyatā ekā vā dve vā tisro vā catasro vā pañca vā ṣaṭ vā sapta vā aṣṭa vā	SUnyatA ekA vA dve vA tisraH vA catasraH vA paQca vA zaz vA sapta vE azwa vA
   nava vā daśa vā tasmāt tryadhvasamtayā samam idaṃ yānaṃ bodhisattvasya	nava vA daSa vA tasmAt tri aDva samtayA samam idam yAnam boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya nāpi tatra samam upalabhyate na viṣamaṃ nāpi tatra vā rāga	mahAsattvasya na api tatra samam upalaByate na vizamam na api tatra vA rAga
   upalabhyate na virāgaḥ na doṣa upalabhyate nādoṣaḥ na moha upalabhyate	upalaByate na virAgaH na dozaH upalaByate na adozaH na mohaH upalaByate
   nāmohaḥ na nāma upalabhyate nānāma yāvan na kuśalam upalabhyate nākuśalam	na amohaH na nAma upalaByate na anAma yAvat na kuSalam upalaByate na akuSalam
   na sāsravam upalabhyate nānāsravam na sāvadyam upalabhyate nānavadyam na	na sa Asravam upalaByate nAnA sravam na sAvadyam upalaByate na anavadyam na
   kleśa upalabhyate nākleśaḥ na kleśakṣaya upalabhyate nākleśakṣayaḥ na	kleSaH upalaByate na akleSaH na kleSa kzayaH upalaByate na akleSa kzayaH na
   laukikam upalabhyate na lokottaram na saṃkleśa upalabhyate na vyavadānam	lOkikam upalaByate na lokottaram na saMkleSaH upalaByate na vyavadAnam
   na saṃsāra upalabhyate na nirvāṇam nāpy atra nityam upalabhyate nānityam	na saMsAraH upalaByate na nirvANam na api atra nityam upalaByate na anityam
   na sukham upalabhyate na duḥkham nātmā upalabhyate nānātmā na śāntam	na suKam upalaByate na duHKam na AtmA upalaByate nAnA AtmA na SAntam
   upalabhyate nāśāntam na kāmadhātur upalabhyate na kāmadhātusamatikramaḥ na	upalaByate nASAntam na kAmaDAtuH upalaByate na kAmaDAtu samatikramaH na
   rūpadhātur upalabhyate na rūpadhātusamaikramaḥ nārūpyadhātur upalabhyate	rUpa DAtuH upalaByate na rUpa DAtu samEkramaH na ArUpya DAtuH upalaByate
   nārūpyadhātusamaikramaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya svabhāvo	na ArUpya DAtu samEkramaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi tasya svaBAvaH 
   nopalabhyate atītaṃ subhūte rūpam atītena rūpeṇa śūnyam anāgataṃ rūpam	na upalaByate atItam suBUte rUpam atItena rUpeNa SUnyam anAgatam rUpam
   anāgatena rūpeṇa śūnyam pratyutpannaṃ rūpaṃ pratyutpannena rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ	anAgatena rUpeNa SUnyam pratyutpannam rUpam pratyutpannena rUpeNa SUnyam
   evam atītā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ atītaṃ vijñānam atītena vijñānena	evam atItA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH atItam vijQAnam atItena vijQAnena
   śūnyam anāgataṃ vijñānam anāgatena vijñānena śūnyam pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam	SUnyam anAgatam vijQAnam anAgatena vijQAnena SUnyam pratyutpannam vijQAnam
   pratyutpannena vijñānena śūnyam tat kasya hetoḥ na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam	pratyutpannena vijQAnena SUnyam tat kasya hetoH na SUnyatAyAm atItam rUpam
   upalabhyate (PSP1: 241) śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate	upalaByate (PSP1: 241) SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate
   kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītaṃ rūpam upalapsyate na śūnyatāyām atītā vedanā	kutas punar SUnyatAyAm atItam rUpam upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm atItA vedanA
   upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ	upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar 
   śūnyatāyāṃ atītā vedanā upalapsyate na śūnyatāyām atītā saṃjñā upalabhyate	SUnyatAyAm atItA vedanA upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm atItA saMjQA upalaByate
   śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ	SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm
   atītā saṃjñā upalapsyate na śūnyatāyām atītāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyate	atItA saMjQA upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm atItAH saMskArAH upalaByate
   śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ	SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm
   atītāḥ saṃskārā upalapsyate na śūnyatāyām atītaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate	atItAH saMskArAH upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm atItam vijQAnam upalaByate
   śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ	SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm
   atītaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate evaṃ na śūnyatāyām anāgataṃ rūpaṃ	atItam vijQAnam upalapsyate evam na SUnyatAyAm anAgatam rUpam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vjñānam upalabhyate na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam	vedanA saMjQA saMskArA vjQAnam upalaByate na SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannam rUpam
   upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ	upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar 
   śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalapsyate na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā	SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannam rUpam upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannA
   vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ	vedanA upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas 
   punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā vedanā upalapsyate na śūnyatāyāṃ	punar SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannA vedanA upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm
   pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ	pratyutpannA saMjQA upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm
   nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannā saṃjñā upalapsyate na	na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannA saMjQA upalapsyate na
   śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā	SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannAH saMskArAH upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA
   śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannāḥ saṃskārā	SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannAH saMskArA
   upalapsyate na śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalabhyate śūnyataiva	upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannam vijQAnam upalaByate SUnyatA eva
   tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratyutpannaṃ	tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm pratyutpannam
   vijñānam upalapsyate na śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ rūpam	vijQAnam upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannam rUpam
   upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ	upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar 
   śūnyatāyāṃ atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ rūpam upalapsyate na śūnyatāyām	SUnyatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannam rUpam upalapsyate na SUnyatAyAm
   atītānāgatapratyutpannā vedanā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā	atIta anAgata pratyutpannA vedanA upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA
   śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā	SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannA
   vedanā upalapsyate na śūnytāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā saṃjñā upalabhyate	vedanA upalapsyate na SUnytAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannA saMjQA upalaByate
   śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyām	SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm
   atītānāgatapratyutpannā saṃjñā upalapsyate na śūnytāyām	atIta anAgata pratyutpannA saMjQA upalapsyate na SUnytAyAm
   atītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ saṃskārā upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAH saMskArAH upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA
   śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ atītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ	SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannAH
   saṃskārā upalapsyate na śūnytāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ vijñānam	saMskArAH upalapsyate na SUnytAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannam vijQAnam
   upalabhyate śūnyataiva tāvac chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ	upalaByate SUnyatA eva tAvat SUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar 
   śūnyatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ vijñānam upalapsyate śūnyataiva tāvac	SUnyatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannam vijQAnam upalapsyate SUnyatA eva tAvat 
   chūnyā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pūrvāntataḥ subhūte	CUnyA SUnyatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar SUnyatAyAm pUrva antataH suBUte
   dānapāramitā nopalabhyate aparāntato 'pi subhūte dānapāramitā nopalabhyate	dAna pAramitA na upalaByate apara antataH api suBUte dAna pAramitA na upalaByate
   pratyutpannato 'pi subhūte dānapāramitā nopalabhyate adhvasamatayā	pratyutpannataH api suBUte dAna pAramitA na upalaByate aDvasamatayA
   dānapāramitā nopalabhyate na subhūte adhvasamatāyām atītādhvā upalabhyate	dAna pAramitA na upalaByate na suBUte aDva sama tAyAm atIta aDvA upalaByate
   samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām	samatA eva tAvat samatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar samatAyAm
   atītānāgatapratyutpannā dānapāramitopalapsyate evaṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannA dAna pAramitA upalapsyate evam
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu śīlapāramitā nopalabhyate	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu SIla pAramitA na upalaByate
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu kṣāntipāramitā nopalabhyate	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu kzAnti pAramitA na upalaByate
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu vīryapāramitā nopalabhyate	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu vIrya pAramitA na upalaByate
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu dhyānapāramitā nopalabhyate	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu DyAna pAramitA na upalaByate
   pūrvāntataḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate aparāntato 'pi subhūte	pUrva antataH suBUte prajQApAramitA na upalaByate apara antataH api suBUte
   prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate pratyutpannato 'pi subhūte prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitA na upalaByate pratyutpannataH api suBUte prajQApAramitA
   nopalabhyate adhvasamatayā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate na subhūte	na upalaByate aDvasamatayA prajQApAramitA na upalaByate na suBUte
   adhvasamatāyām atītādhvā upalabhyate samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ	aDva samatAyAm atIta aDvA upalaByate samatA eva tAvat samatAyAm
   nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā	na upalaByate kutas punar samatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannA
   prajñāpāramitopalapsyate punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu	prajQApAramitA upalapsyate punar aparam suBUte pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu
   smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante tryadhvasamatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni	smRti upasTAnAni na upalaByante tri aDva samatAyAm smRti upasTAnAni
   nopalabhyante na subhūte samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā 'dhvāna	na upalaByante na suBUte samatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannAH aDvAna
   upalabhyante samataiva samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām	upalaByante samatA eva samatAyAm na upalaByate kutas punar samatAyAm
   atītānāgatapratyutpannāni (PSP1: 242) smṛtyupasthānāni upalapsyante evaṃ	atIta anAgata pratyutpannAni (PSP1: 242) smRti upasTAnAni upalapsyante evam
   samyakaprahāṇāni pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu nopalabhyante	samyaka prahANAni pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu na upalaByante
   ṛddhipādāḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu nopalabhyante indriyāṇi	RdDi pAdAH pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu na upalaByante indriyANi
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu nopalabhyante balāni	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu na upalaByante balAni
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu nopalabhyante bodhyaṅgāni	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu na upalaByante boDi aFgAni
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu nopalabhyante mārgaḥ	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu na upalaByante mArgaH
   pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu nopalabhyate	pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu na upalaByate
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu
   nopalabhyante tathāgatabalāni pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu	na upalaByante taTAgata balAni pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu
   nopalabhyante vaiśāradyāni pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu	na upalaByante vESAradyAni pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu
   nopalabhyante pratisaṃvidaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpanneṣv adhvasu	na upalaByante pratisaMvidaH pUrva anta apara anta pratyutpannezu aDvasu
   nopalabhyante kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā	na upalaByante kutas punar samatAyAm atIta anAgata pratyutpannA azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmā upalapsyante punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntataḥ pṛthagjano	budDa DarmAH upalapsyante punar aparam suBUte pUrva antataH pRTagjanaH 
   nopalabhyate aparāntataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate pratyutpannataḥ	na upalaByate apara antataH pRTagjanaH na upalaByate pratyutpannataH
   pṛthagjano nopalabhyate tryadhvasamatayā pṛthagjano nopalabhyate tat kasya	pRTagjanaH na upalaByate tri aDva samatayA pRTagjanaH na upalaByate tat kasya
   hetoḥ sattvānupaladhitām upādāya evaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvāḥ	hetoH sattva anupalaDitAm upAdAya evam SrAvaka pratyekabudDa boDisattvAH
   pūrvāntataḥ tathāgato nopalabhyate aparāntataḥ tathāgato nopalabhyate	pUrva antataH taTAgataH na upalaByate apara antataH taTAgataH na upalaByate
   madhyataḥ tathāgato nopalabhyate tryadhvasamatayā tathāgato nopalabhyate	maDyatas taTAgataH na upalaByate tri aDva samatayA taTAgataH na upalaByate
   tat kasya hetoḥ sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena	tat kasya hetoH sattva anupalabDi tAm upAdAya evam hi suBUte boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā triṣv adhvasu śikṣitvā	mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm sTitvA trizu aDvasu SikzitvA
   sarvākārajñatā paripūraitavyā idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	sarva AkAra jQa tA paripUra etavyAH idam suBUte boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   tryadhvasamatayā mahāyānam atra sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	tri aDva samatayA mahAyAnam atra sTitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati ity	sa deva mAnuza asuram lokam aBiBavan sarva AkAra jQa tAyAm niryAsyati iti 
   antaniryāṇam atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat sādhu	anta niryANam aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat sADu
   sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitam idaṃ bhagavato bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	sADu Bagavan suBAzitam idam BagavataH boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   mahāyānam atra bhagavan mahāyāne śikṣamāṇair atīte 'dhvani bodhisattvair	mahAyAnam atra Bagavat mahAyAne SikzamANEH atIte aDvani boDisattvEH 
   mahāsattvaiḥ sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā anāgatā api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā	mahAsattvEH sarva AkAra jQa tA anuprAptA anAgatAH api boDisattvAH mahAsattvA
   atra mahāyāne śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti ye 'pi bhagavan	atra mahAyAne SikzamANAH sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApsyanti ye api Bagavan
   daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ	daSa diSi loke asaMKyeyezu lokaDAtuzu boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH
   pratyutpannās te 'py atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti	pratyutpannAH te api atra mahAyAne SikzitvA sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprApnuvanti
   tasmāt tarhi bhagavan mahāyānam idaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta	tasmAt tarhi Bagavat mahAyAnam idam boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm yat uta
   tryadhvasamatānām atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat evam	tri aDva samatAnAm aTa Kalu BagavAn Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat evam
   etat subhūte evam etat atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā	etat suBUte evam etat atra mahAyAne SikzitvA atIta anAgata pratyutpannA
   bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptā anuprāpsyanti	boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sarva AkAra jQa tAm anuprAptAH anuprApsyanti
   anuprāpnuvanti ca atha khalu pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantam etad avocat	anuprApnuvanti ca aTa Kalu pUrNaH mEtrAyaNI putraH Bagavantam etat avocat 
   ayaṃ bhagavan (PSP1: 243) subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ	ayam Bagavan (PSP1: 243) suBUtiH sTaviraH taTAgatena prajQApAramitAyAH
   kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānam upadeṣṭāavyaṃ manyeta atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir	kRtaSas aDIzwaH mahAyAnam upadezwAavyam manyeta aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH 
   bhagavantam etad avocat mā haivāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya	Bagavantam etat avocat mA ha eva aham Bagavan prajQApAramitAm vyatikramya
   mahāyānam upadiśāmi bhagavān āha na hi subhūte anulomatvaṃ	mahAyAnam upadiSAmi BagavAn Aha na hi suBUte anuloma tvam
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānam upadiśasi tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte ye	prajQApAramitAyAm mahAyAnam upadiSasi tat kasya hetoH taTA hi suBUte ye
   kecit kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā	kecid kuSalAH boDi pakzAH DarmAH SrAvaka DarmA vA pratyekabudDa DarmA
   bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ	boDisattva DarmAH vA budDa DarmA vA sarve te prajQApAramitAyAm saMgraham
   samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti subhūtir āha katame bhagavan kuśalā bodhipakṣā	samavasaraNam gacCanti suBUtiH Aha katame Bagavan kuSalA boDi pakzA
   dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ vā pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā vā	DarmAH SrAvaka DarmAH vA pratyekabudDa DarmAH boDisattva DarmA vA
   buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ	budDa DarmA vA sarve te prajQApAramitAyAm saMgraham samavasaraNam
   gacchanti bhagavān āha tad yathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri	gacCanti BagavAn Aha tat yaTA catvAri smRti upasTAnAni catvAri
   samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta	samyak prahANAni catvAraH RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi paQca balAni sapta
   bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ catvāry	boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFga mArgAH SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKam catvAri 
   apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ dānapāramitā	apramANAni catvAri DyAnAni catasraH ArUpya samApattayaH dAna pAramitA
   śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā	SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA
   daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī	daSa taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH mahA mEtrI
   mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā	mahA karuNAH azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH asaMpramuzita Darma tA
   sadopekṣāvihāritā ime subhūte kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ	sadA upekzA vihAritAH ime suBUte kuSalAH boDi pakzAH DarmAH SrAvaka DarmAH
   pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te	pratyekabudDa DarmAH boDisattva DarmAH vA budDa DarmA vA sarve te
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti yac ca subhūte	prajQApAramitAyAm saMgraham samavasaraNam gacCanti yat ca suBUte
   mahāyānaṃ yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca vīryapāramitā yā ca kṣāntipāramitā yā	mahAyAnam yA ca DyAna pAramitA yA ca vIrya pAramitA yA ca kzAnti pAramitA yA
   ca śīlapāramitā yā ca dānapāramitā yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā	ca SIla pAramitA yA ca dAna pAramitA yat ca rUpam yA ca vedanA yA ca saMjQA
   ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ yac ca cakṣur yac ca śrotraṃ yac ca ghrāṇaṃ	ye ca saMskArAH yat ca vijQAnam yat ca cakzuH yat ca Srotram yat ca GrANam
   yā ca jihvā yaś ca kāyo yac ca mano yac ca rūpaṃṃ yaś ca śabdo yaś ca	yA ca jihvA yaH ca kAyaH yat ca manaH yat ca rUpamm yaH ca SabdaH yaH ca
   gandho yaś ca raso yac ca spraṣṭavyaṃ yaś ca dharmo yac ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ	ganDaH yaH ca rasaH yat ca sprazwavyam yaH ca DarmaH yat ca cakzuH vijQAnam
   yac ca śrotravijñānaṃ yac ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ yac ca jihvāvijñānaṃ yac ca	yat ca Srotra vijQAnam yat ca GrANa vijQAnam yat ca jihvA vijQAnam yat ca
   kāyavijñānaṃ yac ca manovijñānaṃ yaś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yaś ca	kAya vijQAnam yat ca manaH vijQAnam yaH ca cakzuH saMsparSaH yaH ca
   śrotrasaṃsparśo yaś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśo yaś ca jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca	Srotra saMsparSaH yaH ca GrANa saMsparSaH yaH ca jihvA saMsparSaH yaH ca
   kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca	kAya saMsparSaH yaH ca manaH saMsparSaH yA ca cakzuH saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca
   śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca	Srotra saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca GrANa saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca
   jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca	jihvA saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca kAya saMsparSa jA vedanA yA ca
   manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yāni ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāni ca catvāri	manaH saMsparSa jAH vedanA yAni ca catvAri smRti upasTAnAni yAni ca catvAri
   samyakprahāṇāni ye ca catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ yāni ca pañcendriyāṇi yāni ca	samyak prahANAni ye ca catvAraH RdDi pAdAH yAni ca paQca indriyANi yAni ca
   pañca balāni yāni ca sapta bodhyaṅgāni yaś ca āryāṣṭāṅgamārgo yāni	paQca balAni yAni ca sapta boDi aFgAni yaH ca Arya azwa aFga mArgaH yAni
   cāpramāṇāni yāni ca dhyānāni yāś cārūpyasamāpattayo yāni (PSP1: 244) ca	ca apramANAni yAni ca DyAnAni yAH ca ArUpya samApattayaH yAni (PSP1: 244) ca
   tathāgatabalāni yāni ca vaiśāradyāni yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāni ca	taTAgata balAni yAni ca vESAradyAni yAH ca catasraH pratisaMvidaH yAni ca
   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ye cāsaṃskṛtā dharmā yac ca duḥkhaṃ yaś ca	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitAni ye ca asaMskRtA DarmAH yat ca duHKam yaH ca
   samudayo yaś ca nirodho yaś ca mārgo yaś ca kāmadhātur yaś ca rūpadhātur	samudayaH yaH ca niroDaH yaH ca mArgaH yaH ca kAmaDAtuH yaH ca rUpa DAtuH 
   yaś cārūpyadhātur yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā	yaH ca ArUpya DAtuH yA ca aDyAtma SUnyatA yA ca bahirDA SUnyatA yA
   cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ye ca samādhayo	ca aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yA ca yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA ye ca samADayaH 
   yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ye ca yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yaś ca	yAni ca DAraNI muKAni ye ca yAvat azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH yaH ca
   tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayo yaś ca dharmadhātur yā ca tathatā yā ca	taTAgata praveditaH Darma vinayaH yaH ca DarmaDAtuH yA ca taTatA yA ca
   bhūtakoṭiḥ yaś cācintyadhātur yac ca nirvāṇam sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā	BUtakowiH yaH ca acintya DAtuH yat ca nirvANam sarve ete DarmAH na saMyuktA
   na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ	na visaMyuktAH arUpiNaH anidarSanAH apratiGAH eka lakzaNAH yat uta alakzaNAH
   anena paryāyeṇa subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ	anena paryAyeNa suBUte anuloma tvam prajQApAramitAyAm mahAyAnam
   vyapadiśasi tat kasya hetoḥ na hi subhūte anyat mahāyānam anyā	vyapadiSasi tat kasya hetoH na hi suBUte anyat mahAyAnam anyA
   prajñāpāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā	prajQApAramitA anyA DyAna pAramitA anyA vIrya pAramitA anyA kzAnti pAramitA
   anyā śīlapāramitā anyā dānapāramitā iti hi mahāyānañ ca prajñāpāramitā	anyA SIla pAramitAH anyAH dAna pAramitA iti hi mahAyAnan ca prajQApAramitA
   dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ na subhūte	DyAna vIrya kzAnti SIla dAna pAramitA ca advayam etat advEDIkAram na suBUte
   anyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni iti hi mahāyānaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni	anyat mahAyAnam anyAni smRti upasTAnAni iti hi mahAyAnam smRti upasTAnAni
   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram evaṃ nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni samyakprahāṇāni	ca advayam etat advEDIkAram evam na anyat mahAyAnam anyAni samyak prahANAni
   iti hi mahāyānaṃ samyakprahāṇāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram nānyat	iti hi mahAyAnam samyak prahANAni ca advayam etat advEDIkAram na anyat 
   mahāyānaṃ anye ṛddhipādā iti hi mahāyānam ṛddhipādāḥ cādvayam etad	mahAyAnam anye RdDipAdAH iti hi mahAyAnam RdDi pAdAH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni indriyāni iti hi mahāyānam indriyāni	advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anyAni indriyAni iti hi mahAyAnam indriyAni
   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni balāni iti hi	ca advayam etat advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anyAni balAni iti hi
   mahāyānam balāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni	mahAyAnam balAni ca advayam etat advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anyAni
   bodhyaṅgāni iti hi mahāyānam bodhyaṅgāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram	boDi aFgAni iti hi mahAyAnam boDi aFgAni ca advayam etat advEDIkAram
   nānyat mahāyānaṃ anye mārgā iti hi mahāyānam mārgāḥ cādvayam etad	na anyat mahAyAnam anye mArgAH iti hi mahAyAnam mArgAH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni apramāṇadhyānāni iti hi mahāyānam	advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anyAni apramANa DyAnAni iti hi mahAyAnam
   apramāṇadhyānāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyā	apramANa DyAnAni ca advayam etat advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anyA
   ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ iti hi mahāyānam ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ cādvayam etad	ArUpya samApattayaH iti hi mahAyAnam ArUpya samApattayaH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni daśabalāni iti hi mahāyānam	advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anyAni daSa balAni iti hi mahAyAnam
   daśabalāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāni	daSa balAni ca advayam etat advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anyAni
   vaiśāradyāni iti hi mahāyānam vaiśāradyāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram	vESAradyAni iti hi mahAyAnam vESAradyAni ca advayam etat advEDIkAram
   nānyat mahāyānaṃ anyāḥ pratisaṃvidāḥ iti hi mahāyānam vaiśāradyāni	na anyat mahAyAnam anyAH pratisaMvidAH iti hi mahAyAnam vESAradyAni
   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram nānyat mahāyānaṃ anye aṣṭādaśāveṇikā	ca advayam etat advEDIkAram na anyat mahAyAnam anye azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmā iti hi mahāyānam aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā cādvayam etad	budDa DarmAH iti hi mahAyAnam azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram anena kāraṇena subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	advEDIkAram anena kAraNena suBUte anuloma tvam prajQApAramitAyAm
   mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi iti prāptiniryāṇam subhūtir āha api tu khalu punar	mahAyAnam vyapadiSasi iti prApti niryANam suBUtiH Aha api tu Kalu punar 
   bhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti	Bagavan pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti apara antataH boDisattvaH na upEti
   madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā	maDyataH boDisattvaH na upEti rUpa aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA
   veditavyā evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāparyantatayā	veditavyA evam vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAna aparyanta tayA
   bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti evam api na vidyate	boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA rUpam boDisattvaH iti evam api na vidyate
   nopalabhyate evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti evam api	na upalaByate evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam boDisattvaH iti evam api
   na vidyate nopalabhyate evaṃ hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ	na vidyate na upalaByate evam hi Bagavan sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam
   bodhisattvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ	boDisattvam anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan katamam boDisattvam katamasyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi (PSP1: 245) api tu khalu punar	prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi (PSP1: 245) api tu Kalu punar 
   bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti yathā ātmā ātmeti	Bagavat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattvaH iti yaTA AtmA AtmA iti
   cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	ca ucyate atyanta tayA ca anaBinivRttaH AtmA evam aBAva svaBAvAnAm DarmANAm
   katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam evaṃ katame te vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ	katamat rUpam yat anaBinivRttam evam katame te vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
   katamt tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam ye cānabhinivṛttā na te	katamt tat vijQAnam yat anaBinivRttam ye ca anaBinivRttAH na te
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānam tat kiṃ	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH yat ca anaBinivRttam na tat vijQAnam tat kim
   anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi	anaBinivRttim anaBinivRttO prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi
   na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret saced	na ca anyatra anaBinivRtteH boDisattvaH upalaByate yaH boDAya caret sa ced 
   evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na	evam nirdiSyamAne boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya cittam na avalIyate na
   saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na	saMlIyate na vipratisArI Bavati mAnasam na uttrasyati na saMtrasyati na
   santrāsam āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām	santrAsam Apadyate carati boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   śāriputra āha kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi pūrvāntato	SAriputraH Aha kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi pUrva antataH 
   bodhisattvo nopaiti aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti madhyato bodhisattvo	boDisattvaH na upEti apara antataH boDisattvaH na upEti maDyatas boDisattvaH 
   nopaiti kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi rūpāparyantatayā	na upEti kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi rUpa aparyanta tayA
   bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā evaṃ	boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA evam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā	vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAna aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA
   kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti evam api na	kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi rUpam boDisattvaH iti evam api na
   vidyate nopalabhyate evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti	vidyate na upalaByate evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam boDisattvaH iti
   evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate evaṃ hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā	evam api na vidyate na upalaByate evam hi Bagavan sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA
   sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	sarvam boDisattvam anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan katamam boDisattvam
   katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi kena kāraṇenāyuṣman	katamasyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi kena kAraNena Ayuzman
   subhūte evaṃ vadasi yāvad eva nāmadheyamātram etat yad uta bodhisattva iti	suBUte evam vadasi yAvat eva nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattvaH iti
   yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā evam	yaTA AtmA AtmA iti ca ucyate atyanta tayA ca anaBinivRttaH AtmA evam
   abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam evaṃ katame	aBAva svaBAvAnAm DarmANAm katamat rUpam yat anaBinivRttam evam katame
   te vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ katamt tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam ye	te vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH katamt tat vijQAnam yat anaBinivRttam ye
   cānabhinivṛttā na te vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad	ca anaBinivRttAH na te vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH yat ca anaBinivRttam na tat 
   vijñānam tat kiṃ anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām	vijQAnam tat kim anaBinivRttim anaBinivRttO prajQApAramitAyAm
   avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi na	avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi na
   cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret kena	ca anyatra anaBinivRtteH boDisattvaH upalaByate yaH boDAya caret kena
   kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi saced evam upadiṣyamāne bodhisattvasya	kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi saced evam upadizyamAne boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati	mahAsattvasya cittam na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vipratisArI Bavati
   mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na santrāsam āpadyate carati	mAnasam na uttrasyati na saMtrasyati na santrAsam Apadyate carati
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām subhūtir āha sattvāsattayā	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm suBUtiH Aha sattva asat tayA
   āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti sattvaśūnyatayā āyuṣman	Ayuzman SAriputra pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti sattva SUnya tayA Ayuzman
   śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti sattvaviviktatayā āyuṣman	SAriputra pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti sattva vivikta tayA Ayuzman
   śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman	SAriputra pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti sattva asvaBAva tayA Ayuzman
   śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti evam aparāntato madhyataś ca	SAriputra pUrva antataH boDisattvaH na upEti evam apara antataH maDyatas ca
   vaktavyam tat kasya hetoḥ sattvāsattayā	vaktavyam tat kasya hetoH sattva asat tayA
   śūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatāpūrvāntādīnām anupalabdheḥ na cānyatra	SUnyatA viviktatA svaBAvatA pUrva anta AdInAm anupalabDeH na ca anyatra
   sattvāsattāśūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā (PSP1: 246) anyo bodhisattvo 'nyat	sattva asattA SUnyatA viviktatA svaBAva tA (PSP1: 246) anyaH boDisattvaH anyat 
   pūrvāntādi iti hi yā ca sattvāsattā yāvad yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad	pUrva anta Adi iti hi yA ca sattva asattA yAvat yat ca maDyam sarvam etat 
   advaidhīkāram rūpāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti	advEDIkAram rUpa asat tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti
   rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato	rUpa SUnyatayA rUpa vivikta tayA rUpa asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas 
   bodhisattvo nopaiti evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānāsattayā	boDisattvaH na upEti evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAna asat tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti vijñānaśūnyatayā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti vijQAna SUnya tayA
   vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo	vijQAna vivikta tayA vijQAna asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH 
   nopaiti evam āyataneṣu dhātuṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca	na upEti evam Ayatanezu DAtuzu pratItyasamutpAda aFgezu ca
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaitīti vaktavyam	pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti iti vaktavyam
   dānapāramitāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti	dAna pAramitA sattayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti
   dānapāramitāśūnyatayā dānapāramitāviviktatayā dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā	dAna pAramitA SUnyatayA dAna pAramitA vivikta tayA dAna pAramitA svaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti evaṃ śīlapāramitā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti evam SIla pAramitA
   kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattayā	kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA sattayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti prajñāpāramitāśūnyatayā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti prajQApAramitA SUnyatayA
   prajñāpāramitāviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatayā	prajQApAramitA vivikta tayA prajQApAramitA svaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti tat kasya hetoḥ na hy āyuṣman	pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti tat kasya hetoH na hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ	SAriputra dAna SIla kzAnti vIrya DyAna prajQApAramitA sattAyAm SUnyatAyAm
   viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante na ca	viviktatAyAm asvaBAva tAyAm pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni upalaByante na ca
   śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo	SAriputra anyA asattA anyA SUnyatA anyA vivikta tA anyAH asvaBAva tA anyaH 
   bodhisattvaḥ anyā dānapāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā	boDisattvaH anyA dAna pAramitA anyA SIla pAramitA anyA kzAnti pAramitA anyA
   vīryapāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā prajñāpāramitā anyāni	vIrya pAramitA anyA DyAna pAramitA anyA prajQApAramitA anyAni
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cāsattā yāvad	pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni iti hi Ayuzman SAriputra yA ca asattA yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvatā yāś ca ṣaṭ pāramitā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca	aBAva svaBAva tA yAH ca zaw pAramitA yaH ca boDisattvaH yAni ca
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram evaṃ hy āyuṣman	pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni sarvam etat advEDIkAram evam hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti	SAriputra pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti
   adhyātmaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā	aDyAtma SUnyatA sattayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti evaṃ yāvad	pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti evam yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA sattayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti tat kasya hetoḥ na hy āyuṣman	pUrva anta apara anta maDyatas boDisattvaH na upEti tat kasya hetoH na hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ	SAriputra aDyAtma SUnyatA sattAyAm SUnyatAyAm viviktatAyAm asvaBAva tAyAm
   ca abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ	ca aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA sattAyAm SUnyatAyAm viviktatAyAm asvaBAva tAyAm
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni upalaByante na ca SAriputra anyA asattA anyA
   śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyāni	SUnyatA anyA viviktatA anyAH asvaBAva tA anyaH boDisattvaH anyAni
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra (PSP1: 247) yā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni iti hi Ayuzman SAriputra (PSP1: 247) yA
   cādhyātmaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad	ca aDyAtma SUnyatA asattA SUnyatA viviktatA asvaBAva tA yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA asattA SUnyatA viviktatA asvaBAva tA yaH ca
   bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram	boDisattvaH yAni ca pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni sarvam etat advEDIkAram
   anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo	anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH 
   nopaiti punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthānāsattayā śūnyatayā	na upEti punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra smRti upasTAna asattayA SUnyatayA
   viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti	vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti
   samyakprahāṇāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā	samyak prahANa asat tayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti ṛddhipādānāsattayā śūnyatayā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti RdDi pAdAna asat tayA SUnyatayA
   viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti	vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti
   indriyāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu	indriya asat tayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu
   bodhisattvo nopaiti balāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā	boDisattvaH na upEti balA sattayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti bodhyaṅgāsattayā śūnyatayā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti boDi aFga asattayA SUnyatayA
   viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti	vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti
   mārgāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu	mArgAsat tayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu
   bodhisattvo nopaiti apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyasattayā śūnyatayā	boDisattvaH na upEti apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApatti asat tayA SUnyatayA
   viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti	vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti
   apramāṇadhyānāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā	apramANa DyAna asattayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti ārūpyasamāpattyasattayā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti ArUpya samApatti asat tayA
   śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo	SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH 
   nopaiti tathāgatabalāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā	na upEti taTAgata balA sattayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti vaiśāradyāsattayā śūnyatayā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti vESAradyA sat tayA SUnyatayA
   viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti	vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti
   pratisaṃvidasattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā	pratisaMvid asat tayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti buddhadharmāsattayā śūnyatayā	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti budDa Darma asattayA SUnyatayA
   viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti tat	vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti tat 
   kasya hetoḥ na hy āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthānāsattayāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ	kasya hetoH na hi Ayuzman SAriputra smRti upasTAna asattayAm SUnyatAyAm
   viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ ca buddhadharmāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ	viviktatAyAm asvaBAvatAyAm ca budDa Darma asattAyAm SUnyatAyAm
   viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante na ca	viviktatAyAm asvaBAva tAyAm pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni upalaByante na ca
   śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo	SAriputra anyA asattA anyA SUnyatA anyA vivikta tA anyAH asvaBAva tA anyaH 
   bodhisattvo 'nyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yāni	boDisattvaH anyAni pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni iti hi Ayuzman SAriputra yAni
   ca smṛtyupasthānāny asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad	ca smRti upasTAnAni asattA SUnyatA viviktatA asvaBAva tA yAvat 
   buddhadharmā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni	budDa DarmA asattA SUnyatA viviktatA asvaBAva tA yaH ca boDisattvaH yAni
   ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram anenāyuṣman śāriputra	ca pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni sarvam etat advEDIkAram anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti punar aparam āyuṣman	paryAyeNa pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti punar aparam Ayuzman
   śāriputra sarvasamādhyasattayā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāsattayā	SAriputra sarva samADya sat tayA sarva DAraNI muKa asattayA
   dharmadhātvasattayā tathatāsattayā bhūtakoṭyasattayā bhūtakoṭiśūnyatayā	DarmaDAtu asat tayA taTatA sat tayA BUtakowyasat tayA BUtakowi SUnyatayA
   bhūtakoṭiviviktatayā bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu	BUta kowi vivikta tayA BUta kowyasvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu
   bodhisattvo nopaiti tat kasya hetoḥ na hy āyuṣman śāriputra	boDisattvaH na upEti tat kasya hetoH na hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   samādhyasattāyāṃ yāvad bhūtakoṭyasattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām	samADi asattAyAm yAvat BUtakowyasattAyAm SUnyatAyAm viviktatAyAm
   asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante na ca śāriputra anyā	asvaBAva tAyAm pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni upalaByante na ca SAriputra anyA
   asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo	asattA anyA SUnyatA anyA viviktatA anyAH asvaBAva tA anyaH boDisattvaH 
   'nyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra ye ca samādhayaḥ	anyAni pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni iti hi Ayuzman SAriputra ye ca samADayaH
   asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad bhūtakoṭir asattā śūnyatā	asattA SUnyatA vivikta tA asvaBAva tA yAvat BUtakowiH asattA SUnyatA
   viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni	viviktatA asvaBAva tA yaH ca boDisattvaH yAni ca pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni
   sarvam etad advaidhīkāram anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa	sarvam etat advEDIkAram anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra
   śrāvakāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu	SrAvaka asat tayA SUnyatayA vivikta tayA asvaBAva tayA pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu
   bodhisattvo nopaiti pratyekabuddhāsattayā bodhisattvāsattayā	boDisattvaH na upEti pratyekabudDa asat tayA boDisattva asat tayA
   sarvajñāsattayā sarvajñaśūnyatayā sarvajñaviviktatayā sarvajñāsvabhāvatayā	sarvajQA sattayA sarvajQa SUnya tayA sarvajQa vivikta tayA sarvajQA svaBAva tayA
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti tat kasya hetoḥ na hy āyuṣman	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti tat kasya hetoH na hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra śrāvakāsattāyāṃ yāvad sarvajñatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām	SAriputra SrAvaka asattAyAm yAvat sarvajQa tA sattAyAm SUnyatAyAm viviktatAyAm
   asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante na ca śāriputra anyā	asvaBAva tAyAm pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni upalaByante na ca SAriputra anyA
   asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo	asattA anyA SUnyatA anyA viviktatA anyAH asvaBAva tA anyaH boDisattvaH 
   'nyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś ca śrāvako	anyAni pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni iti hi Ayuzman SAriputra yaH ca SrAvakaH 
   'sattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad sarvajñatā asattā śūnyatā	asattA SUnyatA viviktatA asvaBAva tA yAvat sarvajQa tA asattA SUnyatA
   viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni	viviktatA asvaBAva tA yaH ca boDisattvaH yAni ca pUrva anta apara anta maDyAni
   sarvam etad advaidhīkāram anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa	sarvam etat advEDIkAram anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa
   pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti iti	pUrva anta apara anta maDyezu boDisattvaH na upEti iti
   prāptiniryāṇaprāpyapratiṣedhaḥ yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi	prApti niryANa prApya pratizeDaH yat punar Ayuzman SAriputraH evam vadasi
   kena kāraṇena rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā	kena kAraNena rUpa aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti	vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAna aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA iti
   rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra ākaśasamam vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ ākāśasamam	rUpam Ayuzman SAriputraH AkaSa samam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH AkASa samam
   vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamam tat kasya hetoḥ tad yathāpi (PSP1:	vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputraH AkASa samam tat kasya hetoH tat yaTA api (PSP1:
   248) nāma āyuṣman śāriputra yathā ākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate	248) nAma Ayuzman SAriputra yaTA AkASasya na pUrva ante upalaByate
   nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti	na aparAntaH upalaByate na maDye upalaByate ananta aparyanta tayA AkASam iti
   ca vyavahriyate evam evāyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya naiva pūrvānta	ca vyavahriyate evam eva Ayuzman SAriputra rUpasya na eva pUrva anta
   upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ	upalaByate na aparAntaH upalaByate na maDyam upalaByate tat kasya hetoH
   rūpaśūnyatām upādāya na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ	rUpa SUnyatAm upAdAya na ca SUnyatAyAH pUrva antaH vA aparAntaH vA maDyam
   nopalabhyate vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya naiva pūrvānta	na upalaByate vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya na eva pUrva anta
   upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate madhyam upalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ	upalaByate na aparAntaH upalaByate maDyam upalaByate tat kasya hetoH
   vijñānaśūnyatām upādāya na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ	vijQAna SUnyatAm upAdAya na ca SUnyatAyAH pUrva antaH vA aparAntaH vA maDyam
   vopalabhyate śūnyateti ca vyavahriyate anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa	vA upalaByate SUnyatA iti ca vyavahriyate anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa
   rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ	rUpa aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
   vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu	vijQAna aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyAH evam vyasta samastezu
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu yāvaj	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu yAvat 
   jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāseṣu smṛtyupasthānāni	jarA maraNa Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAsezu smRti upasTAnAni
   samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādā indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā	samyak prahANAni RdDipAdAH indriyAni balAni boDi aFgAni mArgA
   apramāṇadhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidāḥ	apramANa DyAnAni ArUpya samApattayaH daSa balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidAH
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH Ayuzman SAriputraH AkASa samAH tat kasya hetoH
   tad yathāpi nāmāyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasya naivādir nānto na madhyam	tat yaTA api nAma Ayuzman SAriputraH AkASasya na eva AdiH na antaH na maDyam
   upalabhyate anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate evam evāyuṣman	upalaByate ananta aparyanta tayA AkASam iti ca vyavahriyate evam eva Ayuzman
   śāriputra buddhadharmāṇāṃ nādir nānto na madhyam upalabhyate	SAriputra budDa DarmANAm na AdiH na antaH na maDyam upalaByate
   buddhadharmaśūnyatām upādāya na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā	budDa Darma SUnyatAm upAdAya na ca SUnyatAyAH pUrva antaH vA aparAntaH vA
   madhyaṃ nopalabhyate aneāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa	maDyam na upalaByate anea Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa
   buddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā yat punar āyuṣman	budDa Darma aparyanta tayA boDisattva aparyanta tA veditavyA yat punar Ayuzman
   śāriputra evaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattvaity evam api na	SAriputraH evam vadasi kena kAraNena rUpam boDisattva eti evam api na
   vidyate nopalabhyate vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam	vidyate na upalaByate vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam boDisattvaH iti evam
   api na vidyate nopalabhyate iti rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra rūpeṇa śūnyam	api na vidyate na upalaByate iti rUpam Ayuzman SAriputra rUpeNa SUnyam
   vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānena śūnyam tat kasya	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputra vijQAnena SUnyam tat kasya
   hetoḥ na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate nāpi śūnyatāyāṃ	hetoH na hi Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyatAyAm rUpam saMvidyate na api SUnyatAyAm
   bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyate vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ na śūnyatāyāṃ (PSP1: 249)	boDisattvaH saMvidyate vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH na SUnyatAyAm (PSP1: 249)
   vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate nāpi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyate anenāyuṣman	vijQAnam saMvidyate na api SUnyatAyAm boDisattvaH saMvidyate anena Ayuzman
   śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate	SAriputra paryAyeNa rUpam boDisattvaH iti evam api na vidyate na upalaByate
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti evam api na vidyate	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam boDisattvaH iti evam api na vidyate
   nopalabhyate punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā	na upalaByate punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra dAna pAramitA dAna pAramitayA
   śūnyā śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitayā	SUnyA SIla pAramitA SIla pAramitayA SUnyA kzAnti pAramitA kzAnti pAramitayA
   śūnyā vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayā	SUnyA vIrya pAramitA vIrya pAramitayA SUnyA DyAna pAramitA DyAna pAramitayA
   śūnyā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā tat kasya hetoḥ na hi	SUnyA prajQApAramitA prajQApAramitayA SUnyA tat kasya hetoH na hi
   śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate evaṃ	SUnyatAyAm dAna pAramitA vidyate na SUnyatAyAm boDisattvaH vidyate evam
   śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā na śūnyatāyāṃ	SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA na SUnyatAyAm
   prajñāpāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate adhyātmaśūnyatā	prajQApAramitA vidyate na SUnyatAyAm boDisattvaH vidyate aDyAtma SUnyatA
   āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā	Ayuzman SAriputra aDyAtma SUnya tayA SUnyA evam yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatayA SUnyA smRti upasTAnAni smRti upasTAnEH SUnyAni
   evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā	evam samyak prahANAni RdDi pAdAH indriyAni balAni boDi aFgAni mArgA
   apramāṇadhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidāḥ	apramANa DyAnAni ArUpya samApattayaH daSa balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidAH
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikaiḥ buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH azwAdaSa AveNikEH budDa DarmEH SUnyA
   dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyaḥ dhāraṇīmukhāni	DarmaDAtuH DarmaDAtunA SUnyaH samADiH samADinA SUnyaH DAraNI muKAni
   dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā mārgajñatā	DAraNI muKEH SUnyAni sarvajQa tA sarvajQa tayA SUnyA mArga jQa tA
   mārgajñatayā śūnyā sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā śrāvakayānaṃ	mArga jQa tayA SUnyA sarva AkAra jQa tA sarva AkAra jQa tayA SUnyA SrAvaka yAnam
   śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyaṃ	SrAvaka yAnena SUnyam pratyekabudDa yAnam pratyekabudDa yAnena SUnyam
   buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyaṃ śrāvakatvena śrāvakaḥ śūnyaḥ	budDa yAnam budDa yAnena SUnyam SrAvaka tvena SrAvakaH SUnyaH
   pratyekabuddhatvena pratyekabuddhaḥ śūnyas tathāgatatvena tathāgataḥ	pratyekabudDa tvena pratyekabudDaH SUnyaH taTAgata tvena taTAgataH
   śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgato vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ	SUnyaH tat kasya hetoH na hi SUnyatAyAm taTAgataH vidyate na SUnyatAyAm
   bodhisattvo vidyate anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti	boDisattvaH vidyate anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa rUpam boDisattvaH iti
   evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ	evam api na vidyate na upalaByate vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam
   bodhisattva iti evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate yad apy āyuṣmān śāriputra	boDisattvaH iti evam api na vidyate na upalaByate yat api AyuzmAn SAriputra
   āha kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa	Aha kena kAraNena evam vadasi evam aham boDisattvam mahAsattvam sarveNa
   sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ	sarvam sarvaTA sarvam anupalaBamAnaH asam anupaSyan katamam boDisattvam
   katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti rūpam āyuṣman	katamasyAm prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi iti rUpam Ayuzman
   śāriputra rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate rūpaṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate	SAriputra rUpe na saMvidyate na upalaByate rUpam vedanAyAm na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate vedanā vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate vedanā rūpe na	na upalaByate vedanA vedanAyAm na saMvidyate na upalaByate vedanA rUpe na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate rūpaṃ vedanā ca saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate	saMvidyate na upalaByate rUpam vedanA ca saMjQAyAm na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate saṃjñā saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate saṃjñā rūpe na	na upalaByate saMjQA saMjQAyAm na saMvidyate na upalaByate saMjQA rUpe na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate saṃjñā rūpavedanayor na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	saMvidyate na upalaByate saMjQA rUpa vedanayoH na saMvidyate na upalaByate
   rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate saṃskārāḥ	rUpam vedanA saMjQA saMskArezu na saMvidyate na upalaByate saMskArAH
   saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante saṃskārā rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsu na	saMskArezu na saMvidyante na upalaByante saMskArAH rUpa vedanA saMjQAsu na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñāne na (PSP1: 250)	saMvidyate na upalaByate rUpa vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAne na (PSP1: 250)
   saṃvidyante nopalabhyante vijñānaṃ vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	saMvidyante na upalaByante vijQAnam vijQAne na saMvidyate na upalaByate
   vijñānaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate cakṣuḥ	vijQAnam rUpa vedanA saMjQA saMskArezu na saMvidyate na upalaByate cakzuH
   cakṣusi saṃvidyate nopalabhyate śrotraṃ śrotre saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	cakzusi saMvidyate na upalaByate Srotram Srotre saMvidyate na upalaByate
   ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇe saṃvidyate nopalabhyate jihvā jihvāyāṃ saṃvidyate	GrANam GrANe saMvidyate na upalaByate jihvA jihvAyAm saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate kāyaḥ kāye saṃvidyate nopalabhyate mano manasi saṃvidyate	na upalaByate kAyaH kAye saMvidyate na upalaByate manaH manasi saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate tatrāpītarāny itareṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante rūpaṃ	na upalaByate tatra api itarAni itarezu ca na saMvidyante na upalaByante rUpam
   rūpe saṃvidyate nopalabhyate śabdaḥ śabde saṃvidyate nopalabhyate gandho	rUpe saMvidyate na upalaByate SabdaH Sabde saMvidyate na upalaByate ganDaH 
   gandhe saṃvidyate nopalabhyate raso rase saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	ganDe saMvidyate na upalaByate rasaH rase saMvidyate na upalaByate
   spraṣṭavyaṃ spraṣṭavye saṃvidyate nopalabhyate dharmo dharme saṃvidyate	sprazwavyam sprazwavye saMvidyate na upalaByate DarmaH Darme saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate tatrāpītare itareṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	na upalaByate tatra api itare itarezu ca na saMvidyate na upalaByate
   cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñāne saṃvidyate nopalabhyate śrotravijñānaṃ	cakzuH vijQAnam cakzuH vijQAne saMvidyate na upalaByate Srotra vijQAnam
   śrotravijñāne saṃvidyate nopalabhyate ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñāne	Srotra vijQAne saMvidyate na upalaByate GrANa vijQAnam GrANa vijQAne
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñāne saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	saMvidyate na upalaByate jihvA vijQAnam jihvA vijQAne saMvidyate na upalaByate
   kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñāne saṃvidyate nopalabhyate manovijñānaṃ manovijñāne	kAya vijQAnam kAya vijQAne saMvidyate na upalaByate manaH vijQAnam manaH vijQAne
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate tatrāpītarāny itareṣu ca na saṃvidyante	saMvidyate na upalaByate tatra api itarAni itarezu ca na saMvidyante
   nopalabhyante cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	na upalaByante cakzuH saMsparSaH cakzuH saMsparSe saMvidyate na upalaByate
   śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe saṃvidyate nopalabhyate ghrāṇasaṃsparśo	Srotra saMsparSaH Srotra saMsparSe saMvidyate na upalaByate GrANa saMsparSaH 
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśe saṃvidyate nopalabhyate jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ jihvāsaṃsparśe	GrANa saMsparSe saMvidyate na upalaByate jihvA saMsparSaH jihvA saMsparSe
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe saṃvidyate	saMvidyate na upalaByate kAya saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSe saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ manaḥsaṃsparśe saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	na upalaByate manaH saMsparSaH manaH saMsparSe saMvidyate na upalaByate
   tatrāpītara itarasmin ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā	tatra api itaraH itarasmin ca na saMvidyate na upalaByate cakzuH saMsparSa jA
   vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	vedanA cakzuH saMsparSa jAyAm vedanAyAm saMvidyate na upalaByate
   śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃvidyate	Srotra saMsparSa jAH vedanA Srotra saMsparSa jAyAm vedanAyAm saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ	na upalaByate GrANa saMsparSa jAH vedanA GrANa saMsparSa jAyAm vedanAyAm
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajāyāṃ	saMvidyate na upalaByate jihvA saMsparSa jA vedanA jihvA saMsparSa jAyAm
   vedanāyāṃ saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā	vedanAyAm saMvidyate na upalaByate kAya saMsparSa jAH vedanA
   kāyasaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃvidyate nopalabhyate manaḥsaṃsparśajā	kAya saMsparSa jAyAm vedanAyAm saMvidyate na upalaByate manaH saMsparSa jA
   vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃvidyate nopalabhyate tatrāpītara	vedanA manaH saMsparSa jAyAm vedanAyAm saMvidyate na upalaByate tatra api itara
   itarasmin ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate tatrāpītarā itarāsu ca sā na	itarasmin ca na saMvidyate na upalaByate tatra api itarAH itarAsu ca sA na
   saṃvidyante nopalabhyante smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthāneṣu na saṃvidyante	saMvidyante na upalaByante smRti upasTAnAni smRti upasTAnezu na saMvidyante
   nopalabhyate evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni	na upalaByate evam samyak prahANAni RdDi pAdAH indriyAni balAni boDi aFgAni
   mārgā apramāṇadhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni	mArgAH apramANa DyAnAni ArUpya samApattayaH daSa balAni vESAradyAni
   pratisaṃvidāḥ aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu	pratisaMvidAH azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu
   na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante tatrāpītare itareṣu ca te na saṃvidyante	na saMvidyante na upalaByante tatra api itare itarezu ca te na saMvidyante
   nopalabhyante adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate	na upalaByante aDyAtma SUnyatA aDyAtma SUnyatAyAm na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na	na upalaByate yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAm na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate samādhiḥ samādhau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	saMvidyate na upalaByate samADiH samADO na saMvidyate na upalaByate
   dhāraṇī dhāraṇīyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate pṛthagjanabhūmiḥ gotrabhūmir	DAraNI DAraNIyAm na saMvidyate na upalaByate pRTagjana BUmiH gotra BUmiH 
   aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanubhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvibhūmiḥ	azwamaka BUmiH darSana BUmiH tanu BUmiH vIta rAga BUmiH kRta aviBUmiH
   pratyekabuddhabhūmir bodhisattvabhūmis tathāgatabhūmiḥ savajñatābhūmiḥ	pratyekabudDa BUmiH boDisattva BUmiH taTAgata BUmiH sa vajQa tA BUmiH
   srotaāpanna srotaāpannatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī	srotaApan na srotaApanna tve na saMvidyate na upalaByate evam sakRdAgAmI
   anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	anAgAmI arhan pratyekabudDaH pratyekabudDa tve na saMvidyate na upalaByate
   bodhisattvo bodhisattvatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate tathāgatas	boDisattvaH boDisattva tve na saMvidyate na upalaByate taTAgata s
   tathāgatatve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	taTAgata tve na saMvidyate na upalaByate prajQApAramitA prajQApAramitAyAm
   na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate prajñāpāramitāyām avavādānuśāsanī na saṃvidyate	na saMvidyate na upalaByate prajQApAramitAyAm avavAda anuSAsanI na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate avavādānuśāsanyāṃ prajñāpāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	na upalaByate avavAda anuSAsanyAm prajQApAramitA na saMvidyate na upalaByate
   evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra sarvadharmā saṃvidyamānatvena anupalambhena	evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra sarva DarmA saMvidyamAna tvena anupalamBena
   bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate iti prāptiniryāṇe	boDisattvaH na saMvidyate na upalaByate iti prApti niryANe
   prāpakapratiṣedhaḥ yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena	prApaka pratizeDaH yat punar Ayuzman SAriputraH evam vadasi kena kAraNena
   nāmadheyamātram etat yad uta bodhisattva iti kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte	nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattvaH iti kena kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte
   evaṃ vadasi āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti	evam vadasi Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat uta boDisattvaH iti
   tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāma daśabhyo digbhyo na kutaścid āgacchati na	taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra nAma daSaByaH digByaH na kutaScid AgacCati na
   kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati sarvadharmāṇām eva bodhisattvānāṃ	kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati sarva DarmANAm eva boDisattvAnAm
   nāmāpi na kutaścid eti na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati āgantukam	nAma api na kutaScid eti na kvacid gacCati na kvacid tizWati Agantukam
   etan nāmadheyaṃ tathā hi yadrūpaṃ yadvedanā yatsaṃjñā yatsaṃskārā	etat nAmaDeyam taTA hi yat rUpam yat vedanA yat saMjQA yad saMskArA
   yadvijñānam iti nāmadheyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na	yat vijQAnam iti nAmaDeyam na tat rUpam na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na
   vijñānam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāmasvabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ	vijQAnam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi nAma SUnyam nAma svaBAvena yat ca SUnyam
   na tan nāma tena kāraṇena (PSP1: 251) nocyate bodhisattva iti	na tat nAma tena kAraNena (PSP1: 251) na ucyate boDisattvaH iti
   nāmadheyamātram etad iti punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmadheyamātram	nAmaDeya mAtram etat iti punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra nAmaDeya mAtram
   etad yad uta dānapāramiteti na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni	etat yat uta dAna pAramitA iti na ca dAna pAramitAyAm nAma na ca nAmni
   dānapāramitā tat kasya hetoḥ yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan	dAna pAramitA tat kasya hetoH yat ca nAma yA ca dAna pAramitA uBayam etat 
   na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva	na saMvidyate na upalaByate tasmAt nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattva
   iti evaṃ nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	iti evam nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramitā	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta prajQApAramitA
   iti na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā tat kasya	iti na ca prajQApAramitAyAm nAma na ca nAmni prajQApAramitA tat kasya
   hetoḥ yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate	hetoH yat ca nAma yA ca prajQApAramitA uBayam etat na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti āgantukam	na upalaByate tasmAt nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattvaH iti Agantukam
   etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti nāmadheyamātram etad yad	etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattvaH iti nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat 
   uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad	uta aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cādhyātmanyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA na ca aDyAtmanyatAyAm nAma na ca nAmni
   adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad	aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat 
   bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi yac ca nāma yā	BAva svaBAva SUnyatA tat kasya hetoH taTA hi yat ca nAma yA
   cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca	ca aDyAtma SUnyatA yA ca bahirDA SUnyatA yA ca aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yA ca
   yāvad bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarva ete na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante	yAvat BAva svaBAva SUnyatA sarve ete na saMvidyante na upalaByante
   anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nāmadheyamātram etat yad uta bodhisattva	anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDisattva
   iti āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta smṛtyupasthānāni na ca	iti Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta smRti upasTAnAni na ca
   smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛtyupasthānāni tat kasya hetoḥ tatha	smRti upasTAnezu nAma na ca nAmni smRti upasTAnAni tat kasya hetoH taTa
   hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāny ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyante	hi yat ca nAma yAni ca smRti upasTAnAni uBayam etat na saMvidyante
   nopalabhyante āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta samyakprahāṇāni	na upalaByante Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta samyak prahANAni
   na ca samyakprahāṇeṣu nāma na ca nāmni samyakprahāṇāni tat kasya hetoḥ	na ca samyak prahANezu nAma na ca nAmni samyak prahANAni tat kasya hetoH
   tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāny ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate	taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni ca smRti upasTAnAni uBayam etat na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta ṛddhipādā na ca	na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta RdDipAdAH na ca
   ṛddhipādeṣu nāma na ca nāmni ṛddhipādāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca	RdDi pAdezu nAma na ca nAmni RdDipAdAH tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca
