   nāma ye ca ṛddhipādāḥ ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam	nAma ye ca RdDi pAdAH uBayam etat na saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam
   etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta indriyāni na ca indriyeṣu nāma na ca	etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta indriyAni na ca indriyezu nAma na ca
   nāmni indriyāni tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni ca indriyāny	nAmni indriyAni tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni ca indriyAni 
   ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram	uBayam etat na saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram
   etad yad uta balāni na ca baleṣu nāma na ca nāmni balāni tat kasya hetoḥ	etat yat uta balAni na ca balezu nAma na ca nAmni balAni tat kasya hetoH
   tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni ca balāny ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate	taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni ca balAni uBayam etat na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhyaṅgāni na ca	na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta boDi aFgAni na ca
   bodhyaṅgeṣu nāma na ca nāmni bodhyaṅgāni tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca	boDi aFgezu nAma na ca nAmni boDi aFgAni tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca
   nāma yāni ca bodhyaṅgāny ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam	nAma yAni ca boDi aFgAni uBayam etat na saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam
   etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta mārgā na ca mārgeṣu nāma na ca nāmni	etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta mArgAH na ca mArgezu nAma na ca nAmni
   mārgāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma ye ca mārgā ubhayaṃ etan na	mArgAH tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma ye ca mArgAH uBayam etat na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta	saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta
   apramāṇadhyānāni na ca apramāṇadhyāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni apramāṇadhyānāni	apramANa DyAnAni na ca apramANa DyAnezu nAma na ca nAmni apramANa DyAnAni
   tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni ca apramāṇadhyānāny ubhayaṃ etan	tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni ca apramANa DyAnAni uBayam etat 
   na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta	na saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta
   ārūpyasamāpattayo na ca ārūpyasamāpattiṣu nāma na ca nāmni	ArUpya samApattayaH na ca ArUpya samApattizu nAma na ca nAmni
   ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāś ca	ArUpya samApattayaH tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma yAH ca
   ārūpyasamāpattaya ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam etan	ArUpya samApattayaH uBayam etat na saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam etat 
   nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta daśabalāni na ca daśabaleṣu nāma na ca nāmni	nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta daSa balAni na ca daSa balezu nAma na ca nAmni
   daśabalāni tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni ca daśabalāny ubhayaṃ	daSa balAni tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni ca daSa balAni uBayam
   etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad	etat na saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat 
   uta vaiśāradyāni na ca vaiśāradyeṣu nāma na ca nāmni vaiśāradyāni tat	uta vESAradyAni na ca vESAradyezu nAma na ca nAmni vESAradyAni tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni ca vaiśāradyāny ubhayaṃ etan na	kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni ca vESAradyAni uBayam etat na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta	saMvidyate na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta
   pratisaṃvidā na ca pratisaṃvidāsu nāma na ca nāmni pratisaṃvidāḥ tat kasya	pratisaMvidA na ca pratisaMvidAsu nAma na ca nAmni pratisaMvidAH tat kasya
   hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāś ca pratisaṃvidā ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate	hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma yAH ca pratisaMvidA uBayam etat na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta aṣṭādaśāveṇikā	na upalaByate Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmā na ca aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu nāma na ca nāmni	budDa DarmA na ca azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu nAma na ca nAmni
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma ye ca	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH tat kasya hetoH taTa hi yat ca nAma ye ca
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH uBayam etat na saMvidyate na upalaByate
   āgantukam etan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta samādhir iti yāvat	Agantukam etat nAmaDeya mAtram etat yat uta samADiH iti yAvat 
   sarvajñateti na ca sarvajñatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvajñatā tat kasya	sarvajQa tA iti na ca sarvajQa tAyAm nAma na ca nAmni sarvajQa tA tat kasya
   hetoḥ tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvajñatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate	hetoH taTA hi yat ca nAma yA ca sarvajQa tA uBayam etat na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇenocyate	na upalaByate yat punar Ayuzman SAriputraH evam vadasi kena kAraNena ucyate
   yathā ātmātmeti cocyate atyāntatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmeti ātmā śāriputra	yaTA AtmA AtmA iti ca ucyate atyAnta tayA ca anaBinivRttaH AtmA iti AtmA SAriputra
   atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir	atyanta tayA na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH 
   bhaviṣyati atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra sattvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ	Bavizyati atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra sattvaH jIvaH pozaH puruzaH
   pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārako vedako jānakaḥ paśyako na saṃvidyate	pudgalaH manujaH mAnavaH kArakaH vedakaH jAnakaH paSyakaH na saMvidyate
   nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā āyuṣman	na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Ayuzman
   śāriputra rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir	SAriputra rUpam na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH 
   bhaviṣyati vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānaṃ	Bavizyati vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra vijQAnam
   na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati	na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati
   atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣur na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ	atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra cakzuH na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas 
   punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaḥ	punar asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH
   atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra mano na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar	atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra manaH na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar 
   asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ na	asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra rUpam na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ śabdo	saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati evam SabdaH 
   gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyam atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra dharmo na	ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra DarmaH na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā	saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA
   āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣurvijñānaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar	Ayuzman SAriputra cakzuH vijQAnam na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar 
   asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ	asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati evam Srotra vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam
   jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānam atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra manovijñānaṃ na	jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra manaH vijQAnam na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā	saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA
   āyuṣman śāriputra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar	Ayuzman SAriputra cakzuH saMsparSaH na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar 
   asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo	asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati evam Srotra saMsparSaH GrANa saMsparSaH 
   jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra	jihvA saMsparSaH kAya saMsparSaH atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra
   manaḥsaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir	manaH saMsparSaH na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH 
   bhaviṣyati atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra (PSP1: 252) cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā	Bavizyati atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra (PSP1: 252) cakzuH saMsparSa jA
   vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati	vedanA na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asyE aBinivRttiH Bavizyati
   evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā	evam Srotra saMsparSa jA vedanA GrANa saMsparSa jA vedanA jihvA saMsparSa jA
   vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra	vedanA kAya saMsparSa jAH vedanAH atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra
   manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyā	manaH saMsparSa jA vedanA na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya a
   abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā na	aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra dAna pAramitA na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ	saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asyE aBinivRttiH Bavizyati evam
   śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā atyantatayā	SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA atyanta tayA
   āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar	Ayuzman SAriputra prajQApAramitA na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar 
   asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatā	asyE aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra aDyAtma SUnyatA
   na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ	na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asyE aBinivRttiH Bavizyati evam
   śīlapāramitā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad atyantatayā	SIla pAramitA bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat atyanta tayA
   āyuṣman śāriputra abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ	Ayuzman SAriputra aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA na saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas 
   punar asyā abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra	punar asyE aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra
   smṛtyupasthānāni na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante kutaḥ punar eṣām	smRti upasTAnAni na saMvidyante na upalaByante kutas punar ezAm
   abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādā indriyāni balāni	aBinivRttiH Bavizyati evam samyak prahANAni RdDipAdAH indriyAni balAni
   bodhyaṅgāni mārgā apramāṇadhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo daśabalāni	boDi aFgAni mArgAH apramANa DyAnAni ArUpya samApattayaH daSa balAni
   vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidāḥ atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra aṣṭādaśāveṇikā	vESAradyAni pratisaMvidAH atyanta tayA Ayuzman SAriputra azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir	budDa DarmAH na saMvidyante na upalaByante kutas punar ezAm aBinivRttiH 
   bhaviṣyati atyantatayā samādhayo dhāraṇīmukhāni na saṃvidyante	Bavizyati atyanta tayA samADayaH DAraNI muKAni na saMvidyante
   nopalabhyante kutaḥ punar eṣām abhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati atyantatayā	na upalaByante kutas punar ezAm aBinivRttiH Bavizyati atyanta tayA
   śrāvakaḥ pratyekabuddho bodhisattvas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na	SrAvakaH pratyekabudDaH boDisattvaH taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH na
   saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati anenāyuṣman	saMvidyate na upalaByate kutas punar asya aBinivRttiH Bavizyati anena Ayuzman
   śāriputra paryāyeṇa ātmātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā	SAriputra paryAyeNa AtmA AtmA iti ca ucyate atyanta tayA ca anaBinivRttaH AtmA
   punar aparaṃ yad āyuṣmān śāriputra evam āha abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā	punar aparam yat AyuzmAn SAriputraH evam Aha aBAva svaBAvAH sarva DarmA
   iti evam etat tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ	iti evam etat tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH
   svabhāvaḥ śāriputra āha kasyāyuṣman subhūte nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ	svaBAvaH SAriputraH Aha kasya Ayuzman suBUte na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH
   subhūtir āha rūpasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ vedanāyāḥ	suBUtiH Aha rUpasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH vedanAyAH
   saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ	saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH
   svabhāvaḥ cakṣusa āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ śrotrasya	svaBAvaH cakzusaH Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH Srotrasya
   ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manasa āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ	GrANasya jihvAyAH kAyasya manasaH Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH
   svabhāvaḥ rūpasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ śabdasya	svaBAvaH rUpasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH Sabdasya
   gandhasya rasasya spraṣṭavyasya dharmasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ	ganDasya rasasya sprazwavyasya Darmasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH
   svabhāvaḥ cakṣurvijñānasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ	svaBAvaH cakzuH vijQAnasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH
   śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya	Srotra vijQAnasya GrANa vijQAnasya jihvA vijQAnasya kAya vijQAnasya
   manasovijñānasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ	manasaH vijQAnasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ	cakzuH saMsparSasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH
   śrotrasaṃsparśasya ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya jihvāsaṃsparśasya kāyasaṃsparśasya	Srotra saMsparSasya GrANa saMsparSasya jihvA saMsparSasya kAya saMsparSasya
   manaḥsaṃsparśasyāyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ	manaH saMsparSasya Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH
   cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ	cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH
   svabhāvaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā	svaBAvaH Srotra saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH GrANa saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH 
   jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā	jihvA saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH kAya saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH 
   manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ	manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanAyAH Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH
   svabhāvaḥ dānapāramitāyā āyuṣman śāriputra nāsti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ	svaBAvaH dAna pAramitAyAH Ayuzman SAriputra na asti sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH
   śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ nāsti	SIla pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyAH na asti
   prajñāpāramitāyā sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ anenāyuṣman śāriputra	prajQApAramitAyAH sAMyogikaH svaBAvaH anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇāsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra anityāḥ	paryAyeNa asvaBAvAH sarva DarmAH punar aparam Ayuzman SAriputra anityAH
   sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena śāriputra āha katame te āyuṣman subhūte	sarva DarmAH na kasyacid vigamena SAriputraH Aha katame te Ayuzman suBUte
   anityāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena subhūtir āha rūpam āyuṣman	anityAH sarva DarmAH na kasyacid vigamena suBUtiH Aha rUpam Ayuzman
   śāriputra anityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam	SAriputra anityam na kasyacid vigamena vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam
   āyuṣman śāriputra anityaṃ na kasyacid vigamena tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy	Ayuzman SAriputra anityam na kasyacid vigamena tat kasya hetoH taTA hi 
   āyuṣman śāriputra yad anityaṃ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś ca evaṃ duḥkhāḥ anātmānaḥ	Ayuzman SAriputra yat anityam saH aBAvaH kzayaH ca evam duHKAH anAtmAnaH
   śāntāḥ śūnyā animittā apraṇihitā na kasyacid vigamena sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā	SAntAH SUnyAH animittAH apraNihitA na kasyacid vigamena sarva DarmAH kuSalA
   anavadyā anāsravā niḥkleśā lokottarā avyavadānā asaṃskṛtāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ	anavadyAH anAsravAH niHkleSAH loka uttarAH avyavadAnAH asaMskRtAH tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yo 'saṃskṛtaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś cāneāyuṣman	taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra yaH asaMskRtaH saH aBAvaH kzayaH ca aneAyuzman
   śāriputra paryāyeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā na kasyacid vigamena punar	SAriputra paryAyeNa niHsvaBAvAH sarva DarmAH na kasyacid vigamena punar 
   aparaṃ śāriputra akūṭasthā avināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śāriputra āha kena	aparam SAriputra akUwa sTAH avinASinaH sarva DarmAH SAriputraH Aha kena
   kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte akūṭasthā 'vināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ (PSP1: 253)	kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte akUwa sTAH avinASinaH sarva DarmAH (PSP1: 253)
   subhūtir āha rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra akūṭastham avināśi tat kasya hetoḥ	suBUtiH Aha rUpam Ayuzman SAriputra akUwa sTam avinASi tat kasya hetoH
   prakṛtir asyaiṣā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra	prakRtiH asya ezA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputra
   akūṭastham avināśi tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā evaṃ kuśalam akuśalaṃ	akUwa sTam avinASi tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA evam kuSalam akuSalam
   sāvadyam anavadyaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ saṃkleśaṃ niḥkleśaṃ laukikaṃ	sAvadyam anavadyam sa Asravam anAsravam saMkleSam niHkleSam lOkikam
   lokottaraṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ	loka uttaram saMskRtam asaMskRtam saMkleSaH vyavadAnam saMsAraH nirvANam
   akūṭastham avināśi tat kasya hetoḥ prakṛtir asyaiṣā anenāyuṣman śāriputra	akUwa sTam avinASi tat kasya hetoH prakRtiH asya ezA anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇābhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha	paryAyeNa aBAva svaBAvAH sarva DarmAH yat punar Ayuzman SAriputra evam Aha
   kena kāraṇena rūpam anabhisaṃskṛtam evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kena	kena kAraNena rUpam anaBisaMskRtam evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH kena
   kāraṇena vijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam iti subhūtir āha tathā hy āyuṣman	kAraNena vijQAnam anaBisaMskRtam iti suBUtiH Aha taTA hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra rūpam anabhinivṛttaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam	SAriputra rUpam anaBinivRttam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam
   anabhinivṛttam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra abhisaṃskarttā	anaBinivRttam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra aBisaMskarttA
   nāsti cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputra anabhisaṃskṛtam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy	na asti cakzuH Ayuzman SAriputra anaBisaMskRtam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi 
   āyuṣman śāriputra abhisaṃskarttā nāsti evaṃ śrotram ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo	Ayuzman SAriputra aBisaMskarttA na asti evam Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH 
   mano 'nabhisaṃskṛtam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra	manaH anaBisaMskRtam tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   abhisaṃskarttā nāsti punar aparaṃ śāriputra rūpam śabdo gandho rasaḥ	aBisaMskarttA na asti punar aparam SAriputra rUpam SabdaH ganDaH rasaH
   spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy abhisaṃskarttā	sprazwavyam DarmAH anaBisaMskRtAH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi aBisaMskarttA
   nopalabhyate yāvat sarvadharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy	na upalaByate yAvat sarva DarmAH anaBisaMskRtAH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi 
   abhisaṃskarttā nopalabhate anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa	aBisaMskarttA na upalaBate anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa
   rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāny anabhinivṛttāni yat punar āyuṣman	rUpa vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAnAni anaBinivRttAni yat punar Ayuzman
   śāriputra evaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena yad anabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ na	SAriputraH evam vadasi kena kAraNena yat anaBinivRttam na tat rUpam na
   vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam iti subhūtir āha tathā hy āyuṣman	vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam iti suBUtiH Aha taTA hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyam yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ na tasyotpādo na vyayaḥ	SAriputra rUpam prakRti SUnyam yat ca prakRti SUnyam na tasya utpAdaH na vyayaH
   yasya ca notpādo na vyayo na tasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate vedanā saṃjñā	yasya ca na utpAdaH na vyayaH na tasya anyaTAtvam prajQAyate vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārā vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ na tasyotpādo na	saMskArAH vijQAnam prakRti SUnyam yat ca prakRti SUnyam na tasya utpAdaH na
   vyayaḥ yasya ca notpādo na vyayo na tasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate evaṃ yāvat	vyayaH yasya ca na utpAdaH na vyayaH na tasya anyaTAtvam prajQAyate evam yAvat 
   sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyā na teṣām utpādo na vyayaḥ	sarva DarmAH prakRti SUnyAH ye ca prakRti SUnyA na tezAm utpAdaH na vyayaH
   yeṣāṃ ca notpādo na vyayo na teṣām anyathātvaṃ prajñāyate anenāyuṣman	yezAm ca na utpAdaH na vyayaH na tezAm anyaTAtvam prajQAyate anena Ayuzman
   śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhinivṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā	SAriputra paryAyeNa yat anaBinivRttam na tat rUpam vedanA saMjQA saMskArA
   na vijñānam (PSP1: 254) yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha kena	na vijQAnam (PSP1: 254) yat punar Ayuzman SAriputra evam Aha kena
   kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau	kAraNena evam vadasi tat kim anaBinivRttim anaBinivRttO
   prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti yathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra	prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi iti yaTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra
   yā anabhinivṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā sā anabhinivṛttiḥ	yA anaBinivRttiH sA prajQApAramitA yA prajQApAramitA sA anaBinivRttiH
   iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānabhinivṛttiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram	iti hi prajQApAramitA ca anaBinivRttiH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram
   anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmi tat kim anabhinivṛttim	anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa evam vadAmi tat kim anaBinivRttim
   anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti yat punar	anaBinivRttO prajQApAramitAyAm avavadizyAmi anuSAsizyAmi iti yat punar 
   āyuṣman śāriputra evam āha na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva	Ayuzman SAriputra evam Aha na ca anyatra anaBinivRtteH boDisattva
   upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo	upalaByate yaH boDAya caret iti taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nānyām anabhinivṛttim anyaṃ	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAn caran na anyAm anaBinivRttim anyam
   bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś cādvayam	boDisattvam samanupaSyati iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca boDisattvaH ca advayam
   etad advaidhīkāraṃ nānyatrānabhinivṛtteḥ rūpaṃ samanupaśyati iti hy	etat advEDIkAram na anyatra anaBinivRtteH rUpam samanupaSyati iti hi 
   anabhinivṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ iti hy anabhinivṛttiś	anaBinivRttiH ca rUpam ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH 
   ca vedanā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca saṃjñā	ca vedanA ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca saMjQA
   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cādvayam	ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca saMskArAH ca advayam
   etad advaidhīkāraṃ iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cādvayam etad	etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca vijQAnam ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāraṃ iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣuś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram	advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca cakzuH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram
   iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotraṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy	iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca Srotram ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi 
   anabhinivṛttiś ca ghrāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy	anaBinivRttiH ca GrANam ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi 
   anabhinivṛttiś ca jihvā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy anabhinivṛttiś	anaBinivRttiH ca jihvA ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH 
   ca kāyaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca manaś	ca kAyaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca manaH 
   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cādvayam etad	ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca rUpam ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śabdaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram	advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca SabdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram
   iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca gandhaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy	iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca ganDaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi 
   anabhinivṛttiś ca rasaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy anabhinivṛttiś	anaBinivRttiH ca rasaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH 
   ca spraṣṭavyaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca	ca sprazwavyam ca advayam etat advEDIkAram iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca

   etad advaidhīkāram yāvad iti hy anabhinivṛttiś ca sarvadharmāś cādvayam	etat advEDIkAram yAvat iti hi anaBinivRttiH ca sarva DarmAH ca advayam
   etad advaidhīkāram anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinivṛtter	etat advEDIkAram anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa na anyatra anaBinivRtteH

   āha kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evam	Aha kena kAraNena evam vadasi saced boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evam
   upadiśyamāne cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ	upadiSyamAne cittam na avalIyate na saMlIyate na vipratisArI Bavati mAnasam

   prajñapayati kāyavijñānam etad iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati kAya vijQAnam etat iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye manovijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye manaH vijQAnam na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati manovijñānam etad iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati manaH vijQAnam etat iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye dAna pAramitAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati dānapāramitā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati dAna pAramitA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye śīlapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye SIla pAramitAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati śīlapāramitā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati SIla pAramitAH ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin

   samaye vīryapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye vIrya pAramitAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati vīryapāramitā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati vIrya pAramitAH ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye dhyānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye DyAna pAramitAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati dhyānapāramitā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati DyAna pAramitAH ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye prajQApAramitAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati prajñāpāramitā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati prajQApAramitA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye aDyAtma SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayaty adhyātmaśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati aDyAtma SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye bahirDA SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati bahirdhāśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati bahirDA SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati	samaye aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati
   nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin	na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin
   samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān	samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn
   dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti	DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye SUnyatA SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti
   nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati śūnyatāśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin	na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati SUnyatA SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin
   samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān	samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn
   dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye mahāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti	DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye mahA SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti
   nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahāśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin	na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati mahA SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin
   samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān	samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn
   dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti	DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye parama arTa SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti
   nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati paramārthaśūnyatā eṣā iti	na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati parama arTa SUnyatA ezA iti
   yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann	yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran= 
   imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti	imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye saMskRta SUnyatAm na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati saṃskṛtaśūnyatā eṣā	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati saMskRta SUnyatA ezA
   iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye atyanta SUnyatAm na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty atyantaśūnyatā eṣā	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati atyanta SUnyatA ezA
   iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye anavara agra SUnyatAm na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty anavarāgraśūnyatā	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati anavara agra SUnyatA
   eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye prakRti SUnyatAm na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati prakṛtiśūnyatā eṣā	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati prakRti SUnyatA ezA
   iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye sarva Darma SUnyatAm na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati sarvadharmaśūnyatā	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati sarva Darma SUnyatA
   eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye sva lakzaNa SUnyatAm na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati sva lakzaNa SUnyatA
   eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye anupalamBa SUnyatAm na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty anupalambhaśūnyatā	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati anupalamBa SUnyatA
   eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAm
   nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty	na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati 
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye bhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye BAva SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati bhāvaśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati BAva SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye aBAva SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayaty abhāvaśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati aBAva SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye svaBAva SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati svabhāvaśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati svaBAva SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye parabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye para BAva SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati parabhāvaśūnyatā eṣā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati para BAva SUnyatA ezA iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye smṛtyupasthānāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye smRti upasTAnAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānāny etānīti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati smRti upasTAnAni etAni iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye samyakprahāṇāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye samyak prahANAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati samyakprahāṇāny etānīti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati samyak prahANAni etAni iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye ṛddhipādān nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye RdDi pAdAt na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati ṛddhipādā eta iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati RdDipAdAH ete iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaya indriyāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samayaH indriyAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayatīndriyāny etānīti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	prajQapayati indriyAni etAni iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye balāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye balAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na
   prajñapayati balāny etānīti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	prajQapayati balAni etAni iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye
   bodhyaṅgāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati	boDi aFgAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati
   bodhyaṅgāny etānīti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	boDi aFgAni etAni iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye mārgān	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye mArgAn
   nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mārgā eta	na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati mArgAH eta
   iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye 'pramāṇadhyānāni nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye apramANa DyAnAni na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty apramāṇadhyānāni	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati apramANa DyAnAni
   etānīti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	etAni iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye ārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye ArUpya samApattIH na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty ārūpyasamāpattaya	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati ArUpya samApattaya
   etā iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	etAH iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm
   carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye daśabalāni nopaiti	caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye daSa balAni na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati daśabalāny etānīti	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati daSa balAni etAni iti
   yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann	yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran= 
   imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye vaiśāradyāni nopaiti nopādadāti	imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye vESAradyAni na upEti na upAdadAti
   nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati vaiśāradyāny etānīti yasmin	na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati vESAradyAni etAni iti yasmin
   samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān	samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn
   dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye pratisaṃvidāḥ nopaiti nopādadāti	DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye pratisaMvidAH na upEti na upAdadAti
   nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati pratisaṃvidā etā iti yasmin	na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati pratisaMvidA etAH iti yasmin
   samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān	samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn
   dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān nopaiti	DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAn na upEti
   nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty	na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati 
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā eta iti yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo	azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAH ete iti yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin
   samaye samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati	samaye samADi DAraNI muKAni na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati
   nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhidhāraṇīmukhānīmāni tat kasya hetoḥ	na aBiniviSate na prajQapayati samADi DAraNI muKAni imAni tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na	taTA hi Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran rUpam na
   samanupaśyati yāvad vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni	samanupaSyati yAvat vyasta samastAni skanDa DAtu AyatanAni
   pratītyasamutpādaṃ na samanupaśyati saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān na	pratItyasamutpAdam na samanupaSyati saptatriMSat boDi pakzAn DarmAn na
   samanupaśyati pāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati	samanupaSyati pAramitAm na samanupaSyati
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApatti daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid azwAdaSa AveNika budDa DarmAn
   yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na samanupaśyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bhagavan	yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tAm na samanupaSyati tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Bagavan
   yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yo	yaH rUpasya anutpAdaH na tat rUpam yaH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm yaH 
   vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad	vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na tat vijQAnam iti hi vijQAnam ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram yo bhagavan cakṣuro 'nutpādo na tad cakṣuḥ yo śrotrasya	advEDIkAram yaH Bagavan cakzuraH anutpAdaH na tat cakzuH yaH Srotrasya
   ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya yo manaso 'nutpādo na tad mana iti hi manaś	GrANasya jihvAyAH kAyasya yaH manasaH anutpAdaH na tat manaH iti hi manaH 
   cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo na tad	ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram yaH Bagavan rUpasya anutpAdaH na tat 
   rūpam yo śabdasya gandhasya rasasya spraṣṭavyasya yo dharmasyānutpādo na	rUpam yaH Sabdasya ganDasya rasasya sprazwavyasya yaH Darmasya anutpAdaH na
   sa dharma iti hi dharmaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram yo	sa DarmaH iti hi DarmaH ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram yaH 
   bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tad cakṣurvijñānam yo śrotravijñānasya	Bagavan cakzuH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na tat cakzuH vijQAnam yaH Srotra vijQAnasya
   ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya yo manovijñānasyānutpādo	GrANa vijQAnasya jihvA vijQAnasya kAya vijQAnasya yaH manaH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH 
   na tad manovijñānam iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad	na tat manaH vijQAnam iti hi manaH vijQAnam ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā yo	advEDIkAram yaH Bagavan dAna pAramitAyAH anutpAdaH na sA dAna pAramitA yaH 
   śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā yaḥ	SIla pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyAH yaH
   prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā	prajQApAramitAyAH anutpAdaH na sA prajQApAramitA iti hi prajQApAramitA
   cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram yo bhagavan adhyātmaśūnyatāyā	ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram yaH Bagavan aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH 
   anutpādo na tad adhyātmaśūnyatā yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā	anutpAdaH na tat aDyAtma SUnyatA yaH bahirDA SUnyatAyA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā mahāśūnyatāyāḥ	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH mahA SUnyatAyAH
   paramārthaśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā atyantaśūnyatāyā	parama arTa SUnyatAyAH saMskRta SUnyatAyAH atyanta SUnyatAyAH 
   anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anavakāraśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ	anavara agra SUnyatAyAH anavakAra SUnyatAyAH prakRti SUnyatAyAH
   sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anupalambhaśūnyatāyā	sarva Darma SUnyatAyAH sva lakzaNa SUnyatAyAH anupalamBa SUnyatAyA
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā bhāvaśūnyatāyā abhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH BAva SUnyatAyAH aBAva SUnyatAyAH svaBAva SUnyatAyA
   yaḥ parabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā parabhāvaśūnyatā iti hi	yaH para BAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na sA para BAva SUnyatA iti hi
   parabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram yo bhagavan	para BAva SUnyatA ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram yaH Bagavan
   smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni yo samyakprahāṇānām	smRti upasTAnAnAm anutpAdaH na tAni smRti upasTAnAni yaH samyak prahANAnAm
   ṛddhipādānām indriyānāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ mārgānām apramāṇadhyānānām	RdDi pAdAnAm indriyAnAm balAnAm boDi aFgAnAm mArgAnAm apramANa DyAnAnAm
   ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ daśabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidānāṃ yo	ArUpya samApattInAm daSa balAnAm vESAradyAnAm pratisaMvidAnAm yaH 
   'ṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānām anutpādo na te buddhadharmā iti hi	azwAdaSa AveNikAnAm budDa DarmAnAm anutpAdaH na te budDa DarmAH iti hi
   buddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram yo bhagavan	budDa DarmAH ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram yaH Bagavan
   dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ yas tathatāyā ākāśadhātor	DarmaDAtoH anutpAdaH na sa DarmaDAtuH yaH taTatAyAH AkASa DAtoH 
   bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor bodher yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā	BUtakoweH acintya DAtoH boDeH yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH anutpAdaH na sA
   sarvākārajñateti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram	sarva AkAra jQa tA iti hi sarva AkAra jQa tA ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram
   tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi anutpādo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād	tat kasya hetoH taTA hi anutpAdaH na ekaH na dvO na bahavaH na pRTak tasmAt 
   yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā yo bhagavan rūpasya	yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH anutpAdaH na sA sarva AkAra jQa tA yaH Bagavan rUpasya
   vyayo na tad rūpam yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasya vyayo	vyayaH na tat rUpam yAH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm yaH vijQAnasya vyayaH 
   na tad vijñānam iti hi skandhāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram tat	na tat vijQAnam iti hi skanDAH ca vyayaH ca advayam etat advEDIkAram tat 
   kasya hetoḥ tathā hi vyayo na eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛtahk tasmād yaḥ	kasya hetoH taTA hi vyayaH naH ekaH na dvO na bahavaH na pRtahk tasmAt yaH
   pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ vyayo na te pañca skandhāḥ yo bhagavan (PSP1: 256)	paQcAnAm skanDAnAm vyayaH na te paQca skanDAH yaH Bagavan (PSP1: 256)
   dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā vyayo	dAna pAramitAyAH vyayaH na sA dAna pAramitA yaH Bagavan SIla pAramitAyAH vyayaH 
   na sā dānapāramitā yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā	na sA dAna pAramitA yaH Bagavan kzAnti pAramitAyAH vyayaH na sA dAna pAramitA
   yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā yo bhagavan	yaH Bagavan vIrya pAramitAyAH vyayaH na sA dAna pAramitA yaH Bagavan
   dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā	DyAna pAramitAyAH vyayaH na sA dAna pAramitA yaH Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAH 
   vyayo na sā dānapāramitā yo bhagavan adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā	vyayaH na sA dAna pAramitA yaH Bagavan aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA
   adhyātmaśūnyatā yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā	aDyAtma SUnyatA yaH Bagavan bahirDA SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA bahirDA SUnyatA
   yo bhagavan adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā	yaH Bagavan aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA
   yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā yo bhagavan	yaH Bagavan SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA SUnyatA SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā	mahA SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA mahA SUnyatA yaH Bagavan parama arTa SUnyatAyAH 
   vyayo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā yo bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā	vyayaH na sA parama arTa SUnyatA yaH Bagavan saMskRta SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA
   saṃskṛtaśūnyatā yo bhagavan atyantaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā atyantaśūnyatā yo	saMskRta SUnyatA yaH Bagavan atyanta SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA atyanta SUnyatA yaH 
   bhagavan anavarāgraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā anavarāgraśūnyatā yo bhagavan	Bagavan anavara agra SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA anavara agra SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   anavakāraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā anavakāraśūnyatā yo bhagavan	anavakAra SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA anavakAra SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   prakṛtiśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā yo bhagavan	prakRti SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA prakRti SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā yo bhagavan	sarva Darma SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA sarva Darma SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā yo bhagavan	sva lakzaNa SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA sva lakzaNa SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   anupalambhaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā anupalambhaśūnyatā yo bhagavan	anupalamBa SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA anupalamBa SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā yo bhagavan	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA yaH Bagavan
   bhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bhāvaśūnyatā yo bhagavan abhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo	BAva SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA BAva SUnyatA yaH Bagavan aBAva SUnyatAyAH vyayaH 
   na sā abhāvaśūnyatā yo bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā	na sA aBAva SUnyatA yaH Bagavan svaBAva SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA
   svabhāvaśūnyatā yo bhagavan parabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā	svaBAva SUnyatA yaH Bagavan para BAva SUnyatAyAH vyayaH na sA
   parabhāvaśūnyatā yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni	para BAva SUnyatA yaH Bagavan smRti upasTAnAnAm vyayaH na tAni
   smṛtyupasthānāni yo bhagavan samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni	smRti upasTAnAni yaH Bagavan samyak prahANAnAm vyayaH na tAni
   samyakprahāṇāni yo bhagavan ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na te ṛddhipādāḥ yo	samyak prahANAni yaH Bagavan RdDi pAdAnAm vyayaH na te RdDi pAdAH yaH 
   bhagavan indriyānāṃ vyayo na tānīndriyāni yo bhagavan balānāṃ vyayo na	Bagavan indriyAnAm vyayaH na tAni indriyAni yaH Bagavan balAnAm vyayaH na
   tāni balāni yo bhagavan bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni yo bhagavan	tAni balAni yaH Bagavan boDi aFgAnAm vyayaH na tAni boDi aFgAni yaH Bagavan
   mārgānāṃ vyayo na te mārgāḥ yo bhagavan apramāṇadhyānānāṃ vyayo na tāny	mArgAnAm vyayaH na te mArgAH yaH Bagavan apramANa DyAnAnAm vyayaH na tAni 
   apramāṇadhyānāni yo bhagavan ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā	apramANa DyAnAni yaH Bagavan ArUpya samApattInAm vyayaH na tA
   ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ yo bhagavan daśabalānāṃ vyayo na tāni daśabalāni yo	ArUpya samApattayaH yaH Bagavan daSa balAnAm vyayaH na tAni daSa balAni yaH 
   bhagavan vaiśāradyānāṃ vyayo na tāni vaiśāradyāni yo bhagavan	Bagavan vESAradyAnAm vyayaH na tAni vESAradyAni yaH Bagavan
   pratisaṃvidānāṃ vyayo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidāḥ yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ	pratisaMvidAnAm vyayaH na tAH pratisaMvidAH yaH Bagavan smRti upasTAnAnAm
   vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni yo bhagavan aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ	vyayaH na tAni smRti upasTAnAni yaH Bagavan azwAdaSa AveNikAnAm
   buddhadharmānāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmāḥ iti hi buddhadharmāś ca vyayaś	budDa DarmAnAm vyayaH na te budDa DarmAH iti hi budDa DarmAH ca vyayaS
   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi vyayo na eko na dvau	ca advayam etat advEDIkAram tat kasya hetoH taTA hi vyayaH naH ekaH na dvO
   na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmāḥ	na bahavaH na pRTak tasmAt yaH budDa DarmANAm vyayaH na te budDa DarmAH
   yat punar bhagavan ucyate rūpam ity advayasyaiṣāgaṇanākṛtā vedanā saṃjñā	yat punar Bagavan ucyate rUpam iti advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārā yat punar ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣāgaṇanākṛtā yat kasyeti	saMskArAH yat punar ucyate vijQAnam iti advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA yat kasya iti
   punar ucyate rūpaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣāgaṇanākṛtā iti	punar ucyate rUpam yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tA iti advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtAH iti
   prāptiniryāṇe prāpyaprāpakasambandhapratiṣedhaḥ atha khalv āyuṣman	prApti niryANe prApya prApaka sambanDa pratizeDaH aTa Kalu Ayuzman
   śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat katham āyuṣman subhūte	SAriputraH Ayuzmantam suBUtim etat avocat kaTam Ayuzman suBUte
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate
   katama āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ katamā prajñāpāramitā katamā	katamaH Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvaH katamA prajQApAramitA katamA
   upaparīkṣamāṇā subhūtir āha yad āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi katamo	upaparIkzamANA suBUtiH Aha yat Ayuzman SAriputraH evam vadasi katamaH 
   bodhisattva iti bodhir eva sattvas tenocyate bodhisattva iti tayā ca	boDisattvaH iti boDiH eva sattvaH tena ucyate boDisattvaH iti tayA ca
   bodhyā sarvadharmāṇām ākāraṃ jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate katameṣāṃ	boDyA sarva DarmANAm AkAram jAnAti na ca atra aBiniviSate katamezAm
   dharmāṇām ākārān jānāti rūpasyākārān jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate vedanāyā	DarmANAm AkArAn jAnAti rUpasya AkArAn jAnAti na ca atra aBiniviSate vedanAyAH 
   ākārān jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate saṃjñāyā ākārān jānāti na	AkArAn jAnAti na ca atra aBiniviSate saMjQAyAH AkArAn jAnAti na
   cātrābhiniviśate saṃskārānām ākārān jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate	ca atra aBiniviSate saMskArAnAm AkArAn jAnAti na ca atra aBiniviSate
   vijñānasyākārān jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ	vijQAnasya AkArAn jAnAti na ca atra aBiniviSate evam vyasta samastAnAm
   skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣāṇāṃ	skanDa DAtu AyatanAnAm pratItyasamutpAdasya saptatriMSat boDi pakzANAm
   dharmāṇām ākārān jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate evam	DarmANAm AkArAn jAnAti na ca atra aBiniviSate evam
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pāramitānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattInAm pAramitAnAm balAnAm vESAradyAnAm
   pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām ākārān jānāti na cātrābhiniviśate	pratisaMvidAm AveNikAnAm budDa DarmANAm AkArAn jAnAti na ca atra aBiniviSate
   śāriputra āha katame te subhūte sarvadharmāṇām ākārāḥ subhūtir āha yair	SAriputraH Aha katame te suBUte sarva DarmANAm AkArAH suBUtiH Aha yEH 
   āyuṣman śāriputra ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ	Ayuzman SAriputraH AkArEH yEH liFgEH yEH nimittEH
   rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā vā ādhyātmikabāhyā vā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā	rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya DarmAH vA ADyAtmika bAhyAH vA DarmAH saMskRtA
   asaṃskṛtā vā ākārair yair te ima ucyante sarvadharmāṇām ākārāḥ yat punar	asaMskRtAH vA AkArEH yEH te ime ucyante sarva DarmANAm AkArAH yat punar 
   āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi katamā prajñāpāramiteti (PSP1: 257) āratā	Ayuzman SAriputra evam vadasi katamA prajQApAramitA iti (PSP1: 257) AratA
   āramitaiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti kuta āratā āramitā	AramitA ezA Ayuzman SAriputra tena ucyate prajQApAramitA iti kutas AratA AramitA
   skandhebhyo dhātubhya āyatanebhya pratītyasamutpādād dānapāramitāyāḥ	skanDeByaH DAtuByaH AyataneByaH pratItyasamutpAdAt dAna pAramitAyAH
   śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ	SIla pAramitAyAH kzAnti pAramitAyAH vIrya pAramitAyAH DyAna pAramitAyAH
   prajñāpāramitāyā āratā āramitā adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā	prajQApAramitAyAH AratAH AramitA aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH bahirDA SUnyatAyA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā āratā āramitā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH AratA AramitA
   smṛtyupasthānebhya āratā āramitā samyakprahāṇebhya ṛddhipādebhya	smRti upasTAneByaH AratA AramitA samyak prahANeByaH RdDipAdeBya
   indriyebhyo balebhyo bodhyaṅgebhyo mārgebhyo 'pramāṇadhyānebhya	indriyeByaH baleByaH boDi aFgeByaH mArgeByaH apramANa DyAneByaH

   āramitā eṣā tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa	AramitA ezA tena ucyate prajQApAramitA iti anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa
   āratā āramitā eṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ	AratA AramitA ezA yat uta prajQApAramitA yat punar Ayuzman SAriputra evam
   vadasi katamā upaparīkṣaṇeti ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	vadasi katamA upaparIkzaNa iti iha Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na nityam ity upaparīkṣate nānityam iti na	prajQApAramitAyAm caran rUpam na nityam iti upaparIkzate na anityam iti na
   sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na	suKam iti na duHKam iti na AtmA iti na anA AtmA iti na SAntam iti nASAntam iti na
   śūnyam iti nāśāunyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti	SUnyam iti na aSAunyam iti na nimittam iti na animittam iti na praNihitam iti
   nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate	na apraNihitam iti upaparIkzate na viviktam iti na aviviktam iti upaparIkzate
   na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nityam ity upaparīkṣate	na vedanAm na saMjQAm na saMskArAt na vijQAnam nityam iti upaparIkzate
   nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti	na anityam iti na suKam iti na duHKam iti na AtmA iti na anA AtmA iti na SAntam iti
   nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśāunyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na	nASAntam iti na SUnyam iti na aSAunyam iti na nimittam iti na animittam iti na

   ity upaparīkṣate evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano na nityam	iti upaparIkzate evam cakzuH Srotram GrANam jihvAm kAyam manaH na nityam
   iti upaparīkṣate nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti	iti upaparIkzate na anityam iti na suKam iti na duHKam iti na AtmA iti
   nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśāunyam iti na	na anA AtmA iti na SAntam iti nASAntam iti na SUnyam iti na aSAunyam iti na
   nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam ity	nimittam iti na animittam iti na praNihitam iti na apraNihitam iti 
   upaparīkṣate na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate evaṃ	upaparIkzate na viviktam iti na aviviktam iti upaparIkzate evam
   rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmā na nityā iti upaparīkṣante nānityā iti	rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya DarmAH na nityAH iti upaparIkzante na anityAH iti

   iti na śūnyā iti nāśāunyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā	iti na SUnyAH iti na aSAunyAH iti na nimittAH iti na animittAH iti na praNihitA

   duḥkha iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānta iti nāśānta iti na śūnya iti	duHKaH iti na AtmA iti na anA AtmA iti na SAntaH iti nASa antaH iti na SUnyaH iti

   nitya ity upaparīkṣate nānitya iti na sukha iti na duḥkha iti nātmeti	nityaH iti upaparIkzate na anityaH iti na suKaH iti na duHKaH iti na AtmA iti

   nānityānīti na sukhānīti na duḥkhānīti nātmānīti nānātmānīti na śāntānīti	na anityAni iti na suKAni iti na duHKAni iti na AtmAni iti nAnA AtmAni iti na SAntAni iti
