   sarvajñatā na nityeti upaparīkṣate nānityeti na sukheti na duḥkheti	sarvajQa tA na nitya iti upaparIkzate na anitya iti na suKa iti na duHKa iti
   nātmeti nānātmeti na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśāunyeti na nimitteti	na AtmA iti na anA AtmA iti na SAntA iti na aSa anta iti na SUnyA iti na ASAunyA iti na nimitta iti
   nānimitteti na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihitety upaparīkṣate na vivikteti	na animittA iti na praNihitA iti na apraNihitA iti upaparIkzate na viviktA iti
   nāviviktety upaparīkṣate evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	na aviviktA iti upaparIkzate evam hi Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate śāriputra āha kena	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate SAriputraH Aha kena
   kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam yo	kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi yaH rUpasya anutpAdaH na tat rUpam yaH 
   vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam evaṃ	vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm yaH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na tat vijQAnam evam
   vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pāramitāsu	vyasta samastezu skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu pAramitAsu
   sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvabodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu	sarva SUnyatAsu sarva boDi pakzezu Darmezu apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu
   baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu (PSP1: 258) pratisaṃvitsu samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣv	balezu vESAradyezu (PSP1: 258) pratisaMvitsu samADi DAraNI muKezu 
   abhijñāsu aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na	aBijQAsu azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH anutpAdaH na
   sā sarvākārajñateti subhūtir āha rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yā	sA sarva AkAra jQa tA iti suBUtiH Aha rUpam Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyam rUpeNa yA
   cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ anenāyuṣman śāriputra	ca Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyatA na tat rUpam na utpAdaH anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ	paryAyeNa yaH rUpasya anutpAdaH na tat rUpam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam
   śūnyaṃ vijñānena yā cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ	SUnyam vijQAnena yA ca Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyatA na tat vijQAnam na utpAdaH
   anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam	anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa yaH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na tat vijQAnam
   dānapāramitā āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyā dānapāramitā yā cāyuṣman śāriputra	dAna pAramitA Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyA dAna pAramitA yA ca Ayuzman SAriputra
   śūnyatā na sā dānapāramitā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo	SUnyatA na sA dAna pAramitA na utpAdaH anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa yaH 
   dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā	dAna pAramitAyAH anutpAdaH na sA dAna pAramitA SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA
   vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā śūnyā prajñāpāramitayā yā	vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA SUnyA prajQApAramitayA yA
   cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na sā prajñāpāramitā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣman	ca Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyatA na sA prajQApAramitA na utpAdaH anena Ayuzman
   śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā	SAriputra paryAyeNa yaH prajQApAramitAyAH anutpAdaH na sA prajQApAramitA
   adhyātmaśūnyatā āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyā adhyātmaśūnyatā yā cāyuṣman	aDyAtma SUnyatA Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyAH aDyAtma SUnyatA yA ca Ayuzman
   śāriputra śūnyatā na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣman śāriputra	SAriputra SUnyatA na sA aDyAtma SUnyatA na utpAdaH anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇa yo adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā	paryAyeNa yaH aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na sA aDyAtma SUnyatA
   bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā	bahirDA SUnyatA aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA SUnyatA SUnyatA mahA SUnyatA
   paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā	parama arTa SUnyatA saMskRta SUnyatA atyanta SUnyatA anavara agra SUnyatA
   anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā	anavakAra SUnyatA prakRti SUnyatA sarva Darma SUnyatA sva lakzaNa SUnyatA
   anupalambhaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā	anupalamBa SUnyatA aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA BAva SUnyatA aBAva SUnyatA
   svabhāvaśūnyatā parabhāvaśūnyatā śūnyā parabhāvaśūnyatayā yā cāyuṣman	svaBAva SUnyatA para BAva SUnyatA SUnyA para BAva SUnya tayA yA ca Ayuzman
   śāriputra śūnyatā na sā parabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣman śāriputra	SAriputra SUnyatA na sA para BAva SUnyatA na utpAdaH anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇa yo parabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā parabhāvaśūnyatā	paryAyeNa yaH para BAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na sA para BAva SUnyatA
   smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānāni yā cāyuṣman	smRti upasTAnAni Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyAni smRti upasTAnAni yA ca Ayuzman
   śāriputra śūnyatā na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni notpādaḥ anenāyuṣman śāriputra	SAriputra SUnyatA na tAni smRti upasTAnAni na utpAdaH anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇa yo smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni	paryAyeNa yaH smRti upasTAnAnAm anutpAdaH na tAni smRti upasTAnAni
   samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādā indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā	samyak prahANAni RdDipAdAH indriyAni balAni boDi aFgAni mArgA
   apramāṇadhyānāny ārūpyasamāpattayo daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidā	apramANa DyAnAni ArUpya samApattayaH daSa balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidA
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā śūnyā sarvākārajñatayā yā	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH sarva AkAra jQa tA SUnyA sarva AkAra jQa tayA yA
   cāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatā na sā sarvākārajñatā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣman	ca Ayuzman SAriputra SUnyatA na sA sarva AkAra jQa tA na utpAdaH anena Ayuzman
   śāriputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā	SAriputra paryAyeNa yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH anutpAdaH na sA sarva AkAra jQa tA
   śāriputra āha kiṃ kāraṇam āyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi yo rūpasya vyayo na	SAriputraH Aha kim kAraNam Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi yaH rUpasya vyayaH na
   tad rūpam yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad	tat rUpam yaH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm yaH vijQAnasya vyayaH na tat 
   vijñānam iti evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu	vijQAnam iti evam vyasta samastezu skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu
   pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvabodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu	pAramitAsu sarva SUnyatAsu sarva boDi pakzezu Darmezu
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu balezu vESAradyezu pratisaMvitsu 
   aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā	azwAdaSasu AveNikezu budDa Darmezu yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH vyayaH na sA
   sarvākārajñatā subhūtir āha tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś ca vyayo yac ca	sarva AkAra jQa tA suBUtiH Aha taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra yaH ca vyayaH yat ca
   rūpaṃ yac cādvaidhīkāraṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca	rUpam yat cAdvEDIkAram yA ca vedanA yA ca saMjQA ye ca saMskArAH yat ca
   vijñānaṃ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā	vijQAnam sarve ete DarmAH na saMyuktAH na visaMyuktAH arUpiNaH anidarSanA
   apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu	apratiGAH eka lakzaNAH yat uta alakzaNAH evam vyasta samastezu
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu pAramitAsu sarva SUnyatAsu
   sarvabodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu baleṣu	sarva boDi pakzezu Darmezu apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu balezu
   vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu buddhadharmasamādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu yaś ca vyayo	vESAradyezu pratisaMvitsu budDa Darma samADi DAraNI muKezu yaH ca vyayaH 
   yāvat sarvākārajñatā yac cādvaidhīkāraṃ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktāḥ	yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tA yat cAdvEDIkAram sarve ete DarmAH na saMyuktAH
   arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ anenāyuṣman	arUpiNaH anidarSanAH apratiGAH eka lakzaNAH yat uta alakzaNAH anena Ayuzman
   śāriputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ	SAriputra paryAyeNa yaH rUpasya vyayaH na tat rUpam evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH
   saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu	saMskArANAm yaH vijQAnasya vyayaH na tat vijQAnam evam vyasta samastezu
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaśūnyatāsu samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu yāvad	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAda SUnyatAsu samADi DAraNI muKezu yAvat 
   yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā śāriputra āha kena	yaH sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH vyayaH na sA sarva AkAra jQa tA SAriputraH Aha kena
   kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi yad idam ucyate rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā	kAraNena Ayuzman suBUte evam vadasi yat idam ucyate rUpam iti advayasya ezA
   gaṇanā kṛteti vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ yad idam ucyate vijñānam ity	gaNanA kRtA iti vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH yat idam ucyate vijQAnam iti 
   advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti yāvad yad idam ucyate sarvākārajñatety	advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA iti yAvat yat idam ucyate sarva AkAra jQa tA iti 
   advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛteti subhūtir āha tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra nānyo	advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA iti suBUtiH Aha taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra na anyaH 
   'nutpādo 'nyad rūpam anutpāda eva (PSP1: 259) rūpam rūpam evānutpādaḥ	anutpAdaH anyat rUpam anutpAdaH eva (PSP1: 259) rUpam rUpam eva anutpAdaH
   vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ nānyo 'nutpādo 'nyad vijñānam vijñānam evānutpādo	vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH na anyaH anutpAdaH anyat vijQAnam vijQAnam eva anutpAdaH 
   'nutpāda eva vijñānam anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate	anutpAdaH eva vijQAnam anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa yat etat ucyate
   rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ yad etad ucyate	rUpam iti advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH yat etat ucyate
   vijñānam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu	vijQAnam iti advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtAH evam vyasta samastezu
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu pAramitAsu sarva SUnyatAsu
   sarvabodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu baleṣu	sarva boDi pakzezu Darmezu apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu balezu
   vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu tathā hy āyuṣman	vESAradyezu pratisaMvitsu samADi DAraNI muKezu taTA hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra nānyo 'nutpādo 'nyā sarvākārajñatā anutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā	SAriputra na anyaH anutpAdaH anyA sarva AkAra jQa tA anutpAdaH eva sarva AkAra jQa tA
   sarvākārajñataivānutpādaḥ anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate	sarva AkAra jQa tA eva anutpAdaH anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa yat etat ucyate
   sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā punar aparam āyuṣmān subhūtir	sarva AkAra jQa tA iti advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA punar aparam AyuzmAn suBUtiH 
   bhagavantam etad avocat yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ	Bagavantam etat avocat yasmin samaye Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate tasmin samaye	prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate tasmin samaye
   rūpasyānutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya vedanā saṃjñā	rUpasya anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya vedanA saMjQA
   saṃskārāḥ vijñānasyānutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	saMskArAH vijQAnasya anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   ātmano 'nutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ	AtmanaH anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam
   sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakasyānutpādaṃ	sattva jIva poza puruza pudgalam anujamAnavakAraka vedaka jAnaka paSyakasya anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam vyasta samastAnAm
   skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādābhijñānām anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAda aBijQAnAm anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya dānapāramitāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya dAna pAramitAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya śīlapāramitāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya SIla pAramitAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya kzAnti pAramitAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya vīryapāramitāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya vIrya pAramitAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya DyAna pAramitAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya prajQApAramitAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya bahirDA SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati
   atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya mahA SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya parama arTa SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya saMskRta SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya atyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya atyanta SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya anavara agra SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya anavakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya anavakAra SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya prakRti SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya sarva Darma SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya sva lakzaNa SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya anupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya anupalamBa SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya bhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya BAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya abhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya aBAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya svaBAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya parabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya para BAva SUnyatAyAH anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya smRti upasTAnAnAm anutpAdam
   samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya evaṃ	samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya evam
   samyakprahāṇasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ	samyak prahANa samyak prahANa RdDi pAda indriya bala boDi aFga mArga apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApatti daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid azwAdaSa AveNika bu
   sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	sarva AkAra jQa tAyAH anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   pṛthagjanasyānutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	pRTagjanasya anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   pṛthagjanadharmāṇām anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya	pRTagjana DarmANAm anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya
   evaṃ srotaāpannasya srotaāpannadharmāṇāṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇām	evam srotaApannasya srotaApanna DarmANAm sakRdAgAminaH sakRdAgAmi DarmANAm
   anāgāmino 'nāgāmidharmāṇām arhato arhaddharmāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhasya	anAgAminaH anAgAmi DarmANAm arhataH arhat DarmANAm pratyekabudDasya
   pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ	pratyekabudDa DarmANAm boDisattvasya boDisattva DarmANAm
   buddhasyānutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya buddhadharmāṇām	budDasya anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya budDa DarmANAm
   anutpādaṃ samanupaśyati atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya śāriputra āha yathāham	anutpAdam samanupaSyati atyanta viSudDi tAm upAdAya SAriputraH Aha yaTA aham
   āyuṣmataḥ subhūter bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā rūpam anutpādo vedanā	AyuzmataH suBUteH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi taTA rUpam anutpAdaH vedanA
   saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anutpādo yāvad vyastasamastā skandhā anutpādā	saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam anutpAdaH yAvat vyasta samastA skanDA anutpAdA
   dhātavo 'nutpādāḥ ātmānutpādadaḥ sattvo 'nutpādo jīvo 'nutpādo poṣo	DAtavaH anutpAdAH Atma anutpAda daH sattvaH anutpAdaH jIvaH anutpAdaH pozaH 
   'nutpādo puruṣo 'nutpādo pudgalo 'nutpādo manujo 'nutpādo mānavo 'nutpādo	anutpAdaH puruzaH anutpAdaH pudgalaH anutpAdaH manujaH anutpAdaH mAnavaH anutpAdaH 
   kārako 'nutpādo vedako 'nutpādo jānakao 'nutpādo paśyako 'nutpādo evaṃ	kArakaH anutpAdaH vedakaH anutpAdaH jAnakaaH anutpAdaH paSyakaH anutpAdaH evam
   vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādābhijñā anutpādāḥ	vyasta samastAH skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAda aBijQAH anutpAdAH
   dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo	dAna pAramitA anutpAdaH SIla pAramitA anutpAdaH kzAnti pAramitA anutpAdaH 
   vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādo	vIrya pAramitA anutpAdaH DyAna pAramitA anutpAdaH prajQApAramitA anutpAdaH 
   adhyātmaśūnyatānutpādo bahirdhāśūnyatānutpādo	aDyAtma SUnyatA anutpAdaH bahirDA SUnyata anutpAdaH 
   'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānutpādaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatānutpādo mahāśūnyatānutpādaḥ	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyata anutpAdaH SUnyatA SUnyatA anutpAdaH mahA SUnyatA anutpAdaH
   paramārthaśūnyatnutpādaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'tyantaśūnyatānutpādo	parama arTa SUnyatnutpAdaH saMskRta SUnyatA anutpAdaH atyanta SUnyatA anutpAdaH 
   'navarāgraśūnyatānutpādo 'navakāraśūnyatānutpādaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatānutpādaḥ	anavara agra SUnyatA anutpAdaH anavakAra SUnyatA anutpAdaH prakRti SUnyatA anutpAdaH
   sarvadharmaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatānutpādo	sarva Darma SUnyatA anutpAdaH sva lakzaNa SUnyatA anutpAdaH 
   'nupalambhaśūnyatānutpādo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānutpādo bhāvaśūnyatānutpādo	anupalamBa SUnyatA anutpAdaH aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA anutpAdaH BAva SUnyatA anutpAdaH 
   'bhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ parabhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ	aBAva SUnyatA anutpAdaH svaBAva SUnyatA anutpAdaH para BAva SUnyatA anutpAdaH
   smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādāḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpādā ṛddhipādā anutpādāḥ	smRti upasTAnAni anutpAdAH samyak prahANAni anutpAdAH RdDi pAdAH anutpAdAH
   indriyāny anutpādāḥ balāny anutpādāḥ bodhyaṅgāny anutpādāḥ mārgā anutpādā	indriyAni anutpAdAH balAni anutpAdAH boDi aFgAni anutpAdAH mArgAH anutpAdA
   apramāṇadhyānāny anutpādā ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādā daśabalāny anutpādā	apramANa DyAnAni anutpAdAH ArUpya samApattayaH anutpAdAH daSa balAni anutpAdA
   vaiśāradyāny anutpādāḥ pratisaṃvidā anutpādā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā	vESAradyAni anutpAdAH pratisaMvidA anutpAdAH azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA
   anutpādāḥ sarvākārajñatāanutpādaḥ pṛthagjano 'nutpādaḥ pṛthagjanadharmā	anutpAdAH sarva AkAra jQa tAa nud pAdaH pRTagjanaH anutpAdaH pRTagjana DarmA
   anutpādāḥ srotaāpanno 'nutpādaḥ srotaāpannadharmā anutpādāḥ sakṛdāgāmy	anutpAdAH srotaApannaH anutpAdaH srotaApanna DarmAH anutpAdAH sakRdAgAmi 
   anutpādaḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anutpādā anāgāmy anutpādo 'nāgāmidharmā	anutpAdaH sakRdAgAmi DarmA anutpAdAH anAgAmi anutpAdaH anAgAmi DarmA
   anutpādā arhan anutpādo 'rhaddharmā anutpādā pratyekabuddho 'nutpādaḥ	anutpAdAH arhan anutpAdaH arhat DarmAH anutpAdA pratyekabudDaH anutpAdaH
   pratyekabuddhadharmā anutpādā bodhisattvo 'nutpādo bodhisattvadharmā	pratyekabudDa DarmAH anutpAdAH boDisattvaH anutpAdaH boDisattva DarmA
   anutpādāḥ buddho 'nutpādo buddhadharmā anutpādāḥ yadi cāyuṣman subhūte	anutpAdAH budDaH anutpAdaH budDa DarmAH anutpAdAH yadi ca Ayuzman suBUte
   rūpam apy anutpādo yāvad buddhadharmā apy anutpādāḥ nanv āyuṣman subhūte	rUpam api anutpAdaH yAvat budDa DarmAH api anutpAdAH nanu Ayuzman suBUte
   prāptaiva śrāvakeṇa śrāvakabodhiḥ pratyekabuddhayānikena	prAptA eva SrAvakeNa SrAvaka boDiH pratyekabudDa yAnikena
   pratyekabuddhabodhiḥ bodhisattvena prāptaiva sarvākārajñatā bhavati	pratyekabudDa boDiH boDisattvena prAptA eva sarva AkAra jQa tA Bavati
   pañcānāñ ca gatīnāṃ bhedo na bhaviṣyati prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena	paQcAnAn ca gatInAm BedaH na Bavizyati prAptA eva Bavati boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena pañcavidhā bodhir yadi cāyuṣman subhūte sarvadharmā anutpādāḥ	mahAsattvena paQcaviDAH boDiH yadi ca Ayuzman suBUte sarva DarmAH anutpAdAH
   kim arthaṃ srotaāpannena (PSP1: 260) trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo	kim arTam srotaApannena (PSP1: 260) trayANAm saMyojanAnAm prahANAya mArgaH 
   bhāvayitavyaḥ sakṛdāgāminā rāgadoṣamohānāṃ tanutāyai mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ	BAvayitavyaH sakRdAgAminA rAga doza mohAnAm tanu tAyE mArgaH BAvayitavyaH
   anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo	anAgAminA paQcAnAm avaraBAgIyAnAm saMyojanAnAm prahANAya mArgaH 
   bhāvayitavyaḥ arhatā pañcordhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo	BAvayitavyaH arhatA paQca UrDva BAgIyAnAm saMyojanAnAm prahANAya mArgaH 
   bhāvayitavyaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ pratyekabodhiprāptaye mārgo	BAvayitavyaH pratyekabudDa yAnikEH pratyeka boDi prAptaye mArgaH 
   bhāvayitavyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati yāni tāni	BAvayitavyaH kim kAraNam boDisattvaH duzkara cArikAm carati yAni tAni
   sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhāni pratyanubhavati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatenārhatā	sattvAnAm kRtaSas duHKAni pratyanuBavati kim kAraNam taTAgatena arhatA
   samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ	samyaksaMbudDena anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbudDA kim kAraNam
   tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ pravartitam subhūtir āha	taTAgatena arhatA samyaksaMbudDena Darma cakram pravartitam suBUtiH Aha
   nāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi nāpy	na aham Ayuzman SAriputra anutpannasya Darmasya prAptim icCAmi na api 
   abhisamayaṃ nāham anutpādasya srotaāpannam icchāmi na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na	aBisamayam na aham anutpAdasya srotaApannam icCAmi na srotaApatti Palam na
   sakṛdāgāminaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāminaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhatvaṃ	sakRdAgAminam na sakRdAgAmi Palam nAnA gAminam nAnA gAmi Palam na arhatvam
   nārhatvaphalaṃ nānutpādasya pratyekāṃ bodhim icchāmi na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ	na arhatva Palam na anutpAdasya pratyekAm boDim icCAmi na pratyekabudDa tvam
   nāham āyuṣman śāriputra icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantaṃ nāpi	na aham Ayuzman SAriputraH icCAmi boDisattvam duzkara cArikAm carantam na api
   bodhisattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śakya āyuṣman	boDisattvaH duzkara saMjQayA carati tat kasya hetoH na hi SakyaH Ayuzman
   śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāyāṃ sthitvā aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ	SAriputra duzkara saMjQAyAm sTitvA aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm
   sattvānām arthaṃ kartum api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra mātṛsaṃjñāṃ	sattvAnAm arTam kartum api tu Kalu punar Ayuzman SAriputra mAtR saMjQAm
   sarvasattveṣu janayitvā pitṛsaṃjñāṃ bhrātṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñām ātmasaṃjñāṃ	sarva sattvezu janayitvA pitR saMjQAm BrAtR saMjQAm putra saMjQAm Atma saMjQAm
   janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām artham	janayitvA SakyaH aprameyANAm asaMKyeyAnAm aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm arTam
   kartum api tu khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	kartum api tu Kalu punar Ayuzman SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā anutpanna	evam cittam utpAdayitavyam yaTA AtmA AtmA iti ca ucyate atyanta tayA anutpanna
   ātmā evaṃ sarveṣv ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃjñotpādayitavyā saced evaṃ	AtmA evam sarvezu ADyAtmika bAhyezu Darmezu saMjQA utpAdayitavyA saced evam
   saṃjñām utpādayiṣyati na duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetoḥ tathā	saMjQAm utpAdayizyati na duzkara saMjQAm Bavizyati tat kasya hetoH taTA
   hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ kañcid dharmaṃ	hi te boDisattvAH sarveNa sarvam sarvaTA sarvam kaQcid Darmam
   notpādayante nopalabhante nāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādatathāgatam	na utpAdayante na upalaBante na aham Ayuzman SAriputra anutpAda taTA gatam
   icchāmi nāpy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nāpi dharmacakrapravartanaṃ	icCAmi na api anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim na api Darma cakra pravartanam
   nāpīcchāmi anutpannena dharmeṇānutpannāṃ prāptiṃ prāpyamāṇām śāriputra āha	na api icCAmi anutpannena DarmeNa anutpannAm prAptim prApyamANAm SAriputraH Aha
   kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa utpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate	kim punar Ayuzman suBUte anutpannena DarmeNa utpannA prAptiH prApyate
   atha utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate (PSP1: 261) subhūtir	aTa utpannena DarmeNa anutpannA prAptiH prApyate (PSP1: 261) suBUtiH 
   āha nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannena dhameṇānutpannāṃ prāptiṃ prāpyamāṇām	Aha na aham Ayuzman SAriputraH utpannena DameNa anutpannAm prAptim prApyamANAm
   icchāmi nāpy anutpannenotpannāṃ prāptiṃ prāpyamāṇām śāriputra āha kiṃ	icCAmi na api anutpannena utpannAm prAptim prApyamANAm SAriputraH Aha kim
   punar āyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi atha votpannena	punar Ayuzman suBUte anutpannena DarmeNa prAptim icCasi aTa vA utpannena
   dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi subhūtir āha nāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannena	DarmeNa prAptim icCasi suBUtiH Aha na aham Ayuzman SAriputra anutpannena
   dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi nāpy utpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi śāriputra	DarmeNa prAptim icCAmi na api utpannena DarmeNa prAptim icCAmi SAriputra
   āha kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ subhūtir āha	Aha kim punar Ayuzman suBUte na asti prAptiH na asti aBisamayaH suBUtiH Aha
   asty āyuṣman śāriputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punar dvayam api tu	asti Ayuzman SAriputra prAptiH asti aBisamayaH na punar dvayam api tu
   khalu punar āyuṣman śāriputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca	Kalu punar Ayuzman SAriputra loka vyavahAreNa prAptiH ca aBisamayaH ca
   prajñapyate lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan	prajQapyate loka vyavahAreNa srotaApannaH vA sakRdAgAmI vA anAgAmI vE arhan
   vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate na punaḥ	vA pratyekabudDaH vA boDisattvaH vA budDaH vA prajQapyate na punar 
   paramāthena prāptir nābhisamayo na srotaāpanno na sakṛdāgāmī nānāgāmī	paramATena prAptiH nABi samayaH na srotaApannaH na sakRdAgAmI nAnA gAmI
   nārhan na pratyekabuddho na bodhisattvo na buddhaḥ śāriputra āha anutpanno	na arhan na pratyekabudDaH na boDisattvaH na budDaH SAriputraH Aha anutpannaH 
   dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum subhūtir āha anutpanno	DarmaH iti Ayuzman suBUte pratiBAti mantrayitum suBUtiH Aha anutpannaH 
   dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman śāriputra yad vadasi pratibhāti	DarmaH anutpannaH DarmaH iti Ayuzman SAriputra yat vadasi pratiBAti
   mantrayitum iti anutpādo 'pi ye āyuṣman śāriputra pratibhāti mantrayitum	mantrayitum iti anutpAdaH api ye Ayuzman SAriputra pratiBAti mantrayitum
   tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yac ca	tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra yaH ca anutpannaH DarmaH yat ca
   pratibhānaṃ ye ca mantrā yā cānutpattiḥ sarve ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na	pratiBAnam ye ca mantrA yA ca anutpattiH sarve ete DarmAH na saMyuktAH na
   visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ	visaMyuktAH arUpiNaH anidarSanAH apratiGAH eka lakzaNAH yat uta alakzaNAH
   śāriputra āha anutpādo 'py āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ anutpādaḥ pratibhānam	SAriputraH Aha anutpAdaH api Ayuzman suBUte mantraH anutpAdaH pratiBAnam
   anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya pratibhāti	anutpAdaH DarmaH te api DarmAH anutpannAH yAn AraBya pratiBAti
   mantrayitum subhūtir āha evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādo mantraḥ	mantrayitum suBUtiH Aha evam etat Ayuzman SAriputra anutpAdaH mantraH
   anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya	anutpAdaH pratiBAnam anutpAdaH DarmaH te api DarmAH anutpannAH yAn AraBya
   pratibhāti mantrayitum tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam	pratiBAti mantrayitum tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra rUpam
   anutpādaḥ evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam anutpādaḥ evaṃ	anutpAdaH evam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam anutpAdaH evam
   vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātavaḥ āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāḥ pāramitāḥ	vyasta samastAH skanDa DAtavaH AyatanAni pratItyasamutpAdAH pAramitAH
   sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo balāni	sarva SUnyatAH sarva boDi pakzAH DarmAH apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH balAni
   vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ samādhidhāraṇīmukhāny abhijñā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā	vESAradyAni pratisaMvidaH samADi DAraNI muKAni aBijQA azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmā anutpādāḥ (PSP1: 262) srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan	budDa DarmAH anutpAdAH (PSP1: 262) srotaApannaH sakRdAgAmi anAgAmi arhan
   pratyekabuddho bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvākārajñatā 'py	pratyekabudDaH boDisattvaH sarvajQaH sarva AkAra jQaH sarva AkAra jQa tA api 
   anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha evam etad āyuṣman subhūte anutpādo mantraḥ	anutpAdaH SAriputraH Aha evam etat Ayuzman suBUte anutpAdaH mantraH
   anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya	anutpAdaH pratiBAnam anutpAdaH DarmaH te api DarmAH anutpannAH yAn AraBya
   pratibhāti mantrayitum yāvat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ	pratiBAti mantrayitum yAvat skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdAH
   pāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣā dharmā	pAramitAH sarva SUnyatAH sarva boDi pakzAH DarmA
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayaH balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidaH
   samādhidhāraṇīmukhāny abhijñā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ peyālam yāvat	samADi DAraNI muKAni aBijQAH azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH peyAlam yAvat 
   sarvākārajñatāpy anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte	sarva AkAra jQa tA api anutpAdaH SAriputraH Aha kim punar Ayuzman suBUte
   yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca evaṃ pañcāṇāṃ gatīnāṃ	yaTA eva loka vyavahAreNa prAptiH ca aBisamayaH ca evam paQcANAm gatInAm
   saṃbhedo bhavati lokavyavahāreṇa paramārthato na bhavati subhūtir āha evam	saMBedaH Bavati loka vyavahAreNa paramArTataH na Bavati suBUtiH Aha evam
   etad āyuṣman śāriputra evam etat yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś	etat Ayuzman SAriputra evam etat yaTA eva loka vyavahAreNa prAptiH 
   cābhisamayaś ca evaṃ pañcāṇāṃ gatīnāṃ saṃbhedo bhavati lokavyavahāreṇa	ca aBisamayaH ca evam paQcANAm gatInAm saMBedaH Bavati loka vyavahAreNa
   paramārthato na bhavati nātra khalu punaḥ paramārthena tat kasya hetoḥ	paramArTataH na Bavati na atra Kalu punar parama arTena tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra paramārthe na karma na vipāko notpādo na	taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra parama arTe na karma na vipAkaH na utpAdaH na
   nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam śāriputra āha kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte	niroDaH na saMkleSaH na vyavadAnam SAriputraH Aha kim punar Ayuzman suBUte
   anutpanno dharma utpadyate utāho utpanno dharma utpadyate subhūtir āha	anutpannaH DarmaH utpadyate uta aho utpannaH DarmaH utpadyate suBUtiH Aha
   nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasya utpādam icchāmi nāpy	na aham Ayuzman SAriputraH utpannasya Darmasya utpAdam icCAmi na api 
   anutpannasya dharmasya utpādam icchāmi śāriputra āha katamasyāyuṣman	anutpannasya Darmasya utpAdam icCAmi SAriputraH Aha katamasya Ayuzman
   subhūte anutpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchāmi subhūtir āha rūpasyāham	suBUte anutpannasya Darmasya utpAdam na icCAmi suBUtiH Aha rUpasya aham
   āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya svabhāvaśūnyotpādaṃ necchāmi	Ayuzman SAriputra anutpannasya Darmasya svaBAva SUnya utpAdam na icCAmi
   vedanayā saṃjñayā saṃskārānām vijñānasyāham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya	vedanayA saMjQayA saMskArAnAm vijQAnasya aham Ayuzman SAriputra anutpannasya
   dharmasya svabhāvaśūnyotpādaṃ necchāmi evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ	Darmasya svaBAva SUnya utpAdam na icCAmi evam vyasta samastAnAm
   skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ	skanDa DAtu AyatanAnAm pratItyasamutpAdAnAm pAramitAnAm sarva SUnyatAnAm
   sarvabodhipakṣānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ balānāṃ	sarva boDi pakzAnAm DarmANAm apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattInAm balAnAm
   vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ samādhidhāraṇīmukhānām abhijñānāṃ	vESAradyAnAm pratisaMvidAm samADi DAraNI muKAnAm aBijQAnAm
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ bodher apy aham āyuṣman śāriputra	azwAdaSa AveNikAnAm budDa DarmANAm boDeH api aham Ayuzman SAriputra
   anutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi śāriputra āha kiṃ punar	anutpannAyAH svaBAva SUnyAyAH utpAdam na icCAmi SAriputraH Aha kim punar 
   āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate athānutpāda utpadyate subhūtir āha na hy	Ayuzman suBUte utpAdaH utpadyate aTa anutpAdaH utpadyate suBUtiH Aha na hi 
   āyuṣman śāriputra utpāda utpadyate nāpy anutpāda utpadyate tat kasya hetoḥ	Ayuzman SAriputraH utpAdaH utpadyate na api anutpAdaH utpadyate tat kasya hetoH
   tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra yaś cotpādo yaś cānutpādo dvāv apy etau dharmau	taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra yaH ca utpAdaH yaH ca anutpAdaH dvO api etO DarmO
   na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau anidarśanau apratighau ekalakṣaṇau	na saMyuktO na visaMyuktO arUpiNO anidarSanO apratiGO eka lakzaNO
   yad utālakṣaṇau anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate nāpy	yat uta alakzaNO anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa na utpAdaH utpadyate na api 
   anutpāda utpadyate anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa anutpādo mantro	anutpAdaH utpadyate anena Ayuzman SAriputra paryAyeNa anutpAdaH mantraH 
   'nutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmas te 'pi dharmā anutpannā yān ārabhya	anutpAdaH pratiBAnam anutpAdaH DarmaH te api DarmAH anutpannAH yAn AraBya
   pratibhāti mantrayitum (PSP1: 263) śāriputra āha dharmakāyikānām āyuṣmān	pratiBAti mantrayitum (PSP1: 263) SAriputraH Aha Darma kAyikAnAm AyuzmAn
   subhūtir agratāyāṃ sthāpayitavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi āyuṣmān	suBUtiH agra tAyAm sTApayitavyaH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi AyuzmAn
   subhūtir yad yad eva paripraśnīkriyate tatas tata eva niḥsarati subhūtir	suBUtiH yat yat eva paripraSnIkriyate tatas tatas eva niHsarati suBUtiH 
   āha dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgataśrāvakāṇām	Aha DarmatA ezA Ayuzman SAriputra taTAgata SrAvakANAm
   aniśritasarvadharmāṇāṃ te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante tatas tata eva	aniSrita sarva DarmANAm te yatas yatas eva paripRcCyante tatas tatas eva
   niḥsaranti tat kasya hetoḥ yathāpi nāmāniśritatvāt sarvadharmāṇām	niHsaranti tat kasya hetoH yaTA api nAma aniSrita tvAt sarva DarmANAm
   śāriputra āha katham āyuṣman subhūte aniśritāḥ sarvadharmāḥ subhūtir āha	SAriputraH Aha kaTam Ayuzman suBUte aniSritAH sarva DarmAH suBUtiH Aha
   rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na	rUpam Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyam tam na aDyAtma niSritam na
   bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ	bahirDAni Sritam na uBayam antareNa upalaByate vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH
   vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na	vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyam tam na aDyAtma niSritam na
   bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate cakṣur āyuṣman śāriputra	bahirDAni Sritam na uBayam antareNa upalaByate cakzuH Ayuzman SAriputra
   prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam	prakRti SUnyam tam na aDyAtma niSritam na bahirDAni Sritam na uBayam
   antareṇopalabhyate śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyaḥ mana āyuṣman śāriputra	antareNa upalaByate Srotram GrANam jihvA kAyaH manaH Ayuzman SAriputra
   prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam	prakRti SUnyam tam na aDyAtma niSritam na bahirDAni Sritam na uBayam
   antareṇopalabhyate rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ	antareNa upalaByate rUpam Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyam tam
   nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate śabdo	na aDyAtma niSritam na bahirDAni Sritam na uBayam antareNa upalaByate SabdaH 
   gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyam dharma āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa	ganDaH rasaH sprazwavyam DarmaH Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyaH sa
   nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate	na aDyAtma niSritaH na bahis DAni SritaH na uBayam antareNa upalaByate
   cakṣurvijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na	cakzuH vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyam tam na aDyAtma niSritam na
   bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ	bahirDAni Sritam na uBayam antareNa upalaByate Srotra vijQAnam GrANa vijQAnam
   jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānam manovijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ	jihvA vijQAnam kAya vijQAnam manaH vijQAnam Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyam
   taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate	tam na aDyAtma niSritam na bahirDAni Sritam na uBayam antareNa upalaByate
   smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni	smRti upasTAnAni Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyAni tAni na aDyAtma niSritAni
   na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante samyakprahāṇāny	na bahis DAni SritAni na uBayam antareNa upalaByante samyak prahANAni 
   ṛddhipādā indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgā apramāṇadhyānāny	RdDipAdAH indriyAni balAni boDi aFgAni mArgAH apramANa DyAnAni 
   ārūpyasamāpattayo daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidāḥ aṣṭādaśāveṇikā	ArUpya samApattayaH daSa balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidAH azwAdaSa AveNikA
   buddhadharmā āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyāḥ te nādhyātmaniśritā na	budDa DarmAH Ayuzman SAriputra prakRti SUnyAH te na aDyAtma niSritAH na
   bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyante anenāyuṣman śāriputra	bahis DAni SritAH na uBayam antareNa upalaByante anena Ayuzman SAriputra
   paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā aniśritāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya evaṃ hi āyuṣman	paryAyeNa sarva DarmAH aniSritAH prakRti SUnyatAm upAdAya evam hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carato rūpaṃ	SAriputra boDisattvena mahAsattvena zawsu pAramitAsu carataH rUpam
   pariśodhayitavyam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ pariśodhayitavyam evaṃ	pariSoDayitavyam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam pariSoDayitavyam evam
   vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātavaḥ āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāḥ pāramitāḥ	vyasta samastAH skanDa DAtavaH AyatanAni pratItyasamutpAdAH pAramitAH
   sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣāni dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo	sarva SUnyatAH sarva boDi pakzAni DarmAH apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattayo
   balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ samādhidhāraṇīmukhāny abhijñā	balAni vESAradyAni pratisaMvidaH samADi DAraNI muKAni aBijQA
   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pariśodhayitavyāḥ yāvat sarvākārajñatā	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH pariSoDayitavyAH yAvat sarva AkAra jQa tA
   pariśodhayitavyā iti sarvākārajñatāniryāṇam śāriputra āha katham āyuṣman	pariSoDayitavyAH iti sarva AkAra jQa tA niryANam SAriputraH Aha kaTam Ayuzman
   subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvamārgaṃ	suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu caran boDisattva mArgam
   pariśodhayati subhūtir āha asti āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā laukikī	pariSoDayati suBUtiH Aha asti Ayuzman SAriputra dAna pAramitA lOkikI
   asti lokottarā evaṃ śīlapāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā	asti lokottarA evam SIla pAramitA lOkikI asti lokottarA kzAnti pAramitA
   laukikī asti lokottarā vīryapāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā dhyānapāramitā	lOkikI asti lokottarA vIrya pAramitA lOkikI asti lokottarA DyAna pAramitA
   laukikī lokottarā asti prajñāpāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā śāriputra āha	lOkikI lokottarA asti prajQApAramitA lOkikI asti loka uttarA SAriputraH Aha
   katamā āyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā subhūtir āha	katamA Ayuzman suBUte dAna pAramitA lOkikI katamA loka uttarA suBUtiH Aha
   laukikī āyuṣman śāriputra dānapāramitā iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dāyako	lOkikI Ayuzman SAriputra dAna pAramitA iha boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH dAyakaH 
   bhavati dānapatiḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakādhvagebhyo yācanakebhyo	Bavati dAnapatiH SramaNa brAhmaNa kRpaNavanIpaka aDva geByaH yAcanakeByaH 
   dātā bhavati annārthikebhyo 'nnaṃ dadāti	dAtA Bavati anna arTikeByaH annam dadAti
   pānayānavasanagandhamālyavilepanapuṣpadhūpacūrṇavāsopāśrayapratiśrayajīvitapariṣkāropakaraṇaśayanāsanabhaiṣajyārthikebhyo	pAna yAna vasana ganDa mAlya vilepana puzpa DUpa cUrNa vAsa upASraya pratiSraya jIvita parizkAra upakaraNa Sayana Asana BEzajya arTikeByaH 
   (PSP1: 264)	(PSP1: 264)
   'nnapānayānavasanagandhamālyavilepanapuṣpadhūpacūrṇavāsopāśrayapratiśrayānyatarānyatarajīvitapariṣkāropakaraṇabhaiṣajyadātā	anna pAna yAna vasana ganDa mAlya vilepana puzpa DUpa cUrNa vAsa upASraya pratiSraya anyatara anyatara jIvita parizkAra upakaraNa BEzajya dAtA
   bhavati putrārthikebhyaḥ putraṃ dadāti duhitryarthikebhyo duhitaraṃ dadāti	Bavati putra arTikeByaH putram dadAti duhitri arTikeByaH duhitaram dadAti
   bhāryārthikebhyo bhāryāṃ dadāti rāṣṭrārthikebhyo rājyāni dadāti	BAryA arTikeByaH BAryAm dadAti rAzwra arTikeByaH rAjyAni dadAti
   śirorthikebhyaḥ śiro dadāti aṅgārthikebhyo 'ṅgāni dadāti	SirorTikeByaH SiraH dadAti aFga arTikeByaH aFgAni dadAti
   māṃsaśoṇitamajjārthikebhyo māṃsaśoṇitamajjāno dadāti tac ca sanniśritaṃ	mAMsa SoNita majja arTikeByaH mAMsa SoNita majjAnaH dadAti tat ca sanniSritam
   parityajati tasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ dadāmi eṣa parigṛhṇīte idaṃ dānam ahaṃ	parityajati tasya evam Bavati aham dadAmi eza parigRhNIte idam dAnam aham
   nirmatsaraḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajāmi ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi ahaṃ	nirmatsaraH sarva svam parityajAmi aham budDa AjQAm karomi aham
   dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi aham etad dānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā	dAna pAramitAyAm carAmi aham etat dAnam sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA
   anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmi tac cānupalambhayogena anena ca	anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayAmi tat ca anupalamBa yogena anena ca
   dānena dānaphalena ca sarvasattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavantu	dAnena dAna Palena ca sarva sattvAH dRzwaH eva Darme suKitAH Bavantu
   anupādāya parinirvāntu sa tribhiḥ saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti katamais	anupAdAya parinirvAntu sa triBiH saFgEH saktaH dAnam dadAti katamEH 
   tribhir yad uta ātmasaṃjñayā parasaṃjñayā dānasaṃjñayā ca ebhis tribhiḥ	triBiH yat uta Atma saMjQayA para saMjQayA dAna saMjQayA ca eBiH triBiH
   saṅgaiḥ sakto dānaṃ dadāti iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramiteti tathā hi	saFgEH saktaH dAnam dadAti iyam ucyate lOkikI dAna pAramitA iti taTA hi
   āyuṣman śāriputra lokato na calati noccalati na saṃkrāmati tenocyate	Ayuzman SAriputra lokataH na calati na uccalati na saMkrAmati tena ucyate
   laukikī dānapāramitā iti tatra katamā lokottarā dānapāramitā yad uta	lOkikI dAna pAramitA iti tatra katamA loka uttarA dAna pAramitA yat uta
   trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ tatra katamā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ iha bodhisattvo	tri maNxala pariSudDiH tatra katamA tri maNxala pariSudDiH iha boDisattvaH 
   mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat nātmānam upalabhate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhate dānañ	mahAsattvaH dAnam dadat na AtmAnam upalaBate pratigrAhakam na upalaBate dAnaQ
   ca nopalabhate tad vipākañ ca nopalabhate iyam āyuṣman śāriputra	ca na upalaBate tat vipAkan ca na upalaBate iyam Ayuzman SAriputra
   bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ punar aparam āyuṣman	boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya tri maNxala pariSudDiH punar aparam Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat na sarvasattvebhyas tad dānaṃ	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH dAnam dadat na sarva sattveByaH tat dAnam
   niryātayati sattvāṃś ca nopalabhate ātmānaṃ ca nopalabhate tac ca dānam	niryAtayati sattvAn ca na upalaBate AtmAnam ca na upalaBate tat ca dAnam
   anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati na ca bodhim upalabhate iyam	anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati na ca boDim upalaBate iyam
   ucyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti (PSP1: 265) kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā	ucyate loka uttarA dAna pAramitA iti (PSP1: 265) kena kAraNena ucyate lokottarA
   dānapāramiteti tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra lokāc calati uccalati saṃkrāmati	dAna pAramitA iti taTA hi Ayuzman SAriputra lokAt calati uccalati saMkrAmati
   tena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti evaṃ śīlapāramitā	tena kAraNena ucyate lokottarA dAna pAramitA iti evam SIla pAramitA
   kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā śāriputra āha katamā āyuṣman	kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA SAriputraH Aha katamAH Ayuzman
   subhūte prajñāpāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā subhūtir āha laukikī	suBUte prajQApAramitA lOkikI katamA lokottarA suBUtiH Aha lOkikI
   āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadāti	Ayuzman SAriputra prajQApAramitA iha boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH dAnam dadAti
   upalambhaniśrito mātsaryacittaṃ mayā nigrahītavyam iti tac	upalamBa niSritaH mAtsarya cittam mayA nigrahItavyam iti tat 
   cātmasattvadānasaṃjñāniśritaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajati bāhyaṃ vā ādhyātmikaṃ	ca Atma sattva dAna saMjQA niSritaH sarva svam parityajati bAhyam vA ADyAtmikam
   vā vastu upāttaṃ vā anupāttaṃ vā nāsti kiñcid yat na parityajati tac ca	vA vastu upAttam vA anupAttam vA na asti kiQcid yat na parityajati tat ca
   kuśalamūlaṃ bodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā	kuSala mUlam boDaye pariNAmayati sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA
   upalambhaniśritaḥ sa śīlaṃ sevate dhūtaguṇapratiṣṭhitaḥ	upalamBa niSritaH sa SIlam sevate DUta guNa pratizWitaH
   kāyavākcittopalambhaniśritas tāṃś ca daśakuśalān karmapathān sevamānaḥ	kAya vAc citta upalamBa niSritaH tAn ca daSa kuSalAn karma paTAn sevamAnaH
   ātmadṛṣṭyāṃ sattvadṛṣṭyāṃ kuśaladṛṣṭyāṃ niśritaḥ bodhim upalabhya	Atma dRzwyAm sattva dRzwyAm kuSala dRzwyAm niSritaH boDim upalaBya
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni śīlāni bodhaye pariṇāmayati tac copalambhena	sarva sattva sADAraNAni SIlAni boDaye pariNAmayati tat ca upalamBena
   ātmānam utkarṣayati parān paṃsayati sa sarvasattvānāṃ duṣkṛtāni kṣamate	AtmAnam utkarzayati parAn paMsayati sa sarva sattvAnAm duzkRtAni kzamate
   ātmasattvakṣāntidṛṣṭiniśritas tac ca kuśalam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye	Atma sattva kzAnti dRzwi niSritaH tat ca kuSalam anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye
   pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogena sa vīryam	pariNAmayati sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA upalamBa yogena sa vIryam
   ārabhate kāyam upalambhamānaḥ cittam upalambhamānaḥ puṇyasambhāram	AraBate kAyam upalamBamAnaH cittam upalamBamAnaH puNya samBAram
   upalambhamāno jñānasambhāram upalambhamāna ātmānam upalambhamāno bodhim	upalamBamAnaH jQAna samBAram upalamBamAnaH AtmAnam upalamBamAnaH boDim
   upalambhamānaḥ tena ca vīryārambhena manyate tac ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ	upalamBamAnaH tena ca vIrya AramBena manyate tat ca sarva sattva sADAraNam
   kṛtvā upalambhayogenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati sa	kRtvA upalamBa yogena anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati sa
   maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṃ bhāvayati dhyānasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate	mEtrI karuNAm udita upekzAm BAvayati DyAna samApattIH samApadyate
   vyuttiṣṭhate ca tā āsvādayati tā āsvādayan manyate sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni	vyuttizWate ca tAH AsvAdayati tAH AsvAdayat manyate sarva sattva sADAraNAni
   ca kuśalamūlāni upalambhadṛṣṭiko bodhaye pariṇāmayati iyam ucyate laukikī	ca kuSala mUlAni upalamBa dRzwikaH boDaye pariNAmayati iyam ucyate lOkikI
   prajñāpāramitā sa śūnyatāṃ bhāvayan rūpaṃ śūnyam iti upalabhate vedanā	prajQApAramitA sa SUnyatAm BAvayan rUpam SUnyam iti upalaBate vedanA
   saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti upalabhate yāvad buddhabodhiṃ	saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam SUnyam iti upalaBate yAvat budDa boDim
   copalabhate upalambhayogena tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā	ca upalaBate upalamBa yogena tAni kuSala mUlAni sarva sattva sADAraNAni kRtvA
   anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati taṃ (PSP1: 266) copalambhayogena	anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati tam (PSP1: 266) ca upalamBa yogena
   sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayaty upalambhayogena ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca puṇyam	sarva pApam pratideSayati upalamBa yogena AtmanaH ca parezAm ca puNyam
   anumodate ātmanaś ca parasya cārthāya upalabhamānaḥ sarvabuddhān	anumodate AtmanaH ca parasya ca arTAya upalaBamAnaH sarva budDAn
   adhyeṣayate anupāyena triḥkṛtvaḥ puṇyaṃ sarvajñatāyai pariṇāmayati	aDyezayate anupAyena tris kRtvas puNyam sarvajQa tAyE pariNAmayati
   sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā iyam ucyate laukikī prajñāpāramitā tatra	sarva sattva sADAraNam kRtvA iyam ucyate lOkikI prajQApAramitA tatra
   katamā lokottarā prajñāpāramitā ātmasattvadeyabodhyanupalabdhyā	katamA lokottarA prajQApAramitA Atma sattva deya boDi anupalabDyA
   trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dānapāramitāṃ pariśodhayati bodhāya	tri maNxala pariSudDyA dAna pAramitAm pariSoDayati boDAya
   ātmasattvaśīlabodhyanupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā śīlapāramitāṃ	Atma sattva SIla boDi anupalabDyA tri maNxala pariSudDyA SIla pAramitAm
   pariśodhayati bodhāya ātmasattvakṣamābodhyanupalabdhyā	pariSoDayati boDAya Atma sattva kzamA boDi anupalabDyA
   trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā kṣāntipāramitāṃ pariśodhayati bodhāya	tri maNxala pariSudDyA kzAnti pAramitAm pariSoDayati boDAya
   cātmakāyacittavīryapuṇyajñānabodhyanupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā	ca AtmakAya citta vIrya puNya jQAna boDi anupalabDyA tri maNxala pariSudDyA
   vīryapāramitāṃ pariśodhayati bodhāya	vIrya pAramitAm pariSoDayati boDAya
   ātmasattvadhyānasamādhisamāpattibodhyanupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā	Atma sattva DyAna samADi samApatti boDi anupalabDyA tri maNxala pariSudDyA
   dhyānapāramitāṃ pariśodhayati bodhāya ātmasattvasarvadharmānupalabdhyā	DyAna pAramitAm pariSoDayati boDAya Atma sattva sarva Darma anupalabDyA
   trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā prajñāpāramitāṃ pariśodhayati bodhāya	tri maNxala pariSudDyA prajQApAramitAm pariSoDayati boDAya
   sarvakuśalamūlāni cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati	sarva kuSala mUlAni ca anuttarAyE samyaksaMboDaye pariNAmayati
   nirviśeṣapariṇāmenānuttarapariṇāmena asamasamapariṇāmena	nirviSeza pariNAmena anuttara pariNAmena asama sama pariNAmena
   acintyātulyapariṇāmena aprameyapariṇāmena iyam ucyate lokottarā	acintya atulya pariNAmena aprameya pariNAmena iyam ucyate lokottarA
   prajñāpāramitā kena kāraṇena laukikī loko yābhir bhavati lokaṃ vā yābhir	prajQApAramitA kena kAraNena lOkikI lokaH yABiH Bavati lokam vA yABiH 
   nivartayati lokena vā yāḥ samāḥ lokāya vā yābhir dīyate lokāt vā yābhir	nivartayati lokena vA yAH samAH lokAya vA yABiH dIyate lokAt vA yABiH 
   niḥsarati lokasya vā yā bhavāya loke vā bhavā yās tā laukikyaḥ tatra	niHsarati lokasya vA yA BavAya loke vA BavAH yAH tAH lOkikyaH tatra
   katamā lokottarā loko yābhir uttārayati lokaṃ yābhir uttārayati lokena vā	katamA lokottarA lokaH yABiH uttArayati lokam yABiH uttArayati lokena vA
   yābhir uttāryate ālokāya vā yā bhavati lokāt vā yābhir niḥsarati lokasya	yABiH uttAryate AlokAya vA yA Bavati lokAt vA yABiH niHsarati lokasya
   vā yā uttaraṇāya loke vā yā uttarās tā lokottarā iti evaṃ hy āyuṣman	vA yAH uttaraNAya loke vA yAH uttarAH tAH loka uttarAH iti evam hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ	SAriputra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH zawsu pAramitAsu caran boDi mArgam
   pariśodhayati śāriputra āha katama āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya	pariSoDayati SAriputraH Aha katamaH Ayuzman suBUte boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ (PSP1: 267) subhūtir āha catvāry āyuṣman	mahAsattvasya boDi mArgaH (PSP1: 267) suBUtiH Aha catvAri Ayuzman
   śāriputra smṛtyupasthānāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ	SAriputra smRti upasTAnAni boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya boDi mArgaH
   catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni	catvAri samyak prahANAni catvAraH RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi paQca balAni
   bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukham animittavimokṣamukham	boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH SUnyatA vimokza muKam animitta vimokza muKam
   apraṇihitavimokṣamukham adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā	apraNihita vimokza muKam aDyAtma SUnyatA bahirDA SUnyatA
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA yAvat aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA sarva samADayaH
   sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra	sarva DAraNI muKAni catvAri apramANAni catvAri DyAnAni catasra
   ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ	ArUpya samApattayaH daSa taTAgata balAni catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH
   pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahākaruṇā ayam ucyate āyuṣman	pratisaMvidaH azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA mahA karuNA ayam ucyate Ayuzman
   śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ śāriputra āha katamasyā	SAriputra boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya boDi mArgaH SAriputraH Aha katamasyA
   āyuṣman subhūte pāramitāyā ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ subhūtir āha prajñāpāramitāyā	Ayuzman suBUte pAramitAyAH ayam puruzakAraH suBUtiH Aha prajQApAramitAyAH 
   āyuṣman śāriputra ayaṃ puruṣakāraḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman	Ayuzman SAriputra ayam puruzakAraH tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman
   śāriputra prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	SAriputra prajQApAramitA janayitrI sarvezAm kuSalAnAm DarmANAm
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇām	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa DarmANAm boDisattva DarmANAm budDa DarmANAm
   prajñāpāramitā āyuṣman śāriputra pratigrāhikā sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ	prajQApAramitA Ayuzman SAriputra pratigrAhikA sarvezAm kuSalAnAm DarmANAm
   śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇām prajñāpāramitāyām	SrAvaka pratyekabudDa DarmANAm boDisattva DarmANAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   āyuṣman śāriputra śikṣitvā taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ	Ayuzman SAriputra SikzitvA tEH pOrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH
   samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā anāgatā apy	samyaksaMbudDEH anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH aBisaMbudDAH anAgatAH api 
   āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ihaiva	Ayuzman SAriputra taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH iha eva
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante ye	prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyante ye
   'py etarhi āyuṣman śāriputra daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ	api etarhi Ayuzman SAriputra daSasu dikzu loke taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti te 'pi	samyaksaMbudDAH tizWanti Driyante yApayanti Darmam deSayanti te api
   sarve ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim	sarve iha eva prajQApAramitAyAm SikzitvA anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   abhisaṃbuddhāḥ sacet punar āyuṣman śāriputra asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	aBisaMbudDAH saced punar Ayuzman SAriputra asyAm prajQApAramitAyAm
   bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na bhavati kāṃkṣāyitatvaṃ na	BAzyamANAyAm boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya na Bavati kAMkzAyita tvam na
   bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ veditavyam etad āyuṣman śāriputra viharaty ayaṃ	Bavati DanvAyita tvam veditavyam etat Ayuzman SAriputra viharati ayam
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena manasikāreṇa yad uta	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anena vihAreNa avirahitaH ca anena manasikAreNa yat uta
   sarvasattvaparitrāṇāya sarvasattvāparityāgamanasikāreṇa	sarva sattva paritrANAya sarva sattva aparityAga mana sikAreNa
   mahākaruṇāmanasikāreṇa śāriputra āha yad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha	mahA karuNA manasikAreNa SAriputraH Aha yat AyuzmAn suBUtiH evam Aha
   viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena	viharati ayam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH anena vihAreNa avirahitaH ca anena
   manasikāreṇeti evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā api (PSP1: 268)	manasikAreNa iti evam sati Ayuzman suBUte sarva sattvAH api (PSP1: 268)
   bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte	boDisattvAH Bavizyanti tat kasya hetoH taTA hi Ayuzman suBUte
   sarvasattvā avirahitā manasikāreṇa subhūtir āha sādhu sādhu āyuṣman	sarva sattvAH avirahitA manasikAreNa suBUtiH Aha sADu sADu Ayuzman
   śāriputra upālapsye tvāṃ artha evāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena	SAriputraH upAlapsye tvAm arTaH eva AyuzmatA SAriputreNa BUta pada aBiDAnena
   parigṛhītaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ sattvāsattayāyuṣman śāriputra manasikārāsattā	parigRhItaH tat kasya hetoH sattva asat tayA Ayuzman SAriputra manasikAra asattA
   veditavyā sattvaśūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā sattvāsvabhāvatayā	veditavyA sattva SUnyatayA manasikAra SUnyatA veditavyA sattva asvaBAva tayA
   manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā sattvaviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā	manasikAra asvaBAva tA veditavyA sattva vivikta tayA manasikAra vivikta tA
   veditavyā sattvānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā	veditavyA sattva anaBisaMboDana tayA manasikAra anaBisaMboDana tA veditavyA
   rūpāsattayā rūpaśūnyatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā rūpaviviktatayā	rUpa asat tayA rUpa SUnyatayA rUpa asvaBAva tayA rUpa vivikta tayA
   rūpānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā vedanā	rUpa anaBisaMboDana tayA manasikAra anaBisaMboDana tA veditavyA vedanA
   saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānāsattayā vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā	saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAna asat tayA vijQAna SUnya tayA vijQAna asvaBAva tayA
   vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā	vijQAna vivikta tayA vijQAna anaBisaMboDana tayA manasikAra anaBisaMboDana tA
   veditavyā evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu	veditavyAH evam vyasta samastezu skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratItyasamutpAdezu
   pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvabodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu	pAramitAsu sarva SUnyatAsu sarva boDi pakzezu Darmezu
   apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu	apramANa DyAna ArUpya samApattizu balezu vESAradyezu pratisaMvitsu
   samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣv abhijñāsu aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu	samADi DAraNI muKezu aBijQAsu azwAdaSa AveNikezu budDa Darmezu
   sarvākārajñatāsattayā sarvākārajñatāśūnyatayā sarvākārajñatāsvabhāvatayā	sarva AkAra jQa tA sattayA sarva AkAra jQa tA SUnya tayA sarva AkAra jQa tA svaBAva tayA
   sarvākārajñatāviviktatayā sarvākārajñatānabhisaṃbodhanatayā	sarva AkAra jQa tA vivikta tayA sarva AkAra jQa tA anaBisaMboDana tayA
   manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā anenāyuṣman śāriputra vihāreṇānena	manasikAra anaBisaMboDana tA veditavyAH anena Ayuzman SAriputra vihAreNa anena
   ca manasikāreṇa avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti atha khalu bhagavān	ca manasikAreNa avirahitaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH iti aTa Kalu BagavAn
   āyuṣmate shūtaye sādhukāram adāt sādhu sādhu subhūte evaṃ hi subhūte	Ayuzmate shUtaye sADu kAram adAt sADu sADu suBUte evam hi suBUte
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā yathā tvam upadiśasi	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitA upadezwavyA yaTA tvam upadiSasi
   yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvenaivaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	yaTA api nAma taTAgata anuBAvena evam boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ yathā tvam upadiśasi asmin khalu punaḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm caritavyam yaTA tvam upadiSasi asmin Kalu punar 
   prajñāpāramitāparivarte āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇe	prajQApAramitA parivarte AyuzmatA suBUtinA BAzyamANe
   trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampito yāvat	tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH zaz vikAram prakampitaH yAvat 
   pūrvottaradakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ vidiśy unnāmāvanāmaṃ gacchati sma atha khalu	pUrva uttara dakziNa paScimAyAm vidiSi unnAma avanAmam gacCati sma aTa Kalu
   bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir	BagavAn tasyAm velAyAm smitam akarot aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH 
   bhagavantam etad avocat ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya	Bagavantam etat avocat kaH Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH smitasya
   prādurbhāvāya bhagavān āha yathaiva subhūte iha lokadhātau tathāgataḥ	prAdurBAvAya BagavAn Aha yaTA eva suBUte iha lokaDAtO taTAgataH
   prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśati tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu	prajQApAramitAm nirdiSati taTA eva pUrvasyAm diSi asaMKyeyezu aprameyezu
   lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ	lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDAH boDisattvAnAm
   mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhgāṣante evaṃ samantād daśasu dikṣv	mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm BgAzante evam samantAt daSasu dikzu 
   asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā	asaMKyeyezu aprameyezu lokaDAtuzu taTAgatAH arhantaH samyaksaMbudDA
   bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśanti (PSP1: 269) asmin	boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm nirdiSanti (PSP1: 269) asmin
   khalu punaḥ subhūtinā prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvādaśānām	Kalu punar suBUtinA prajQApAramitA nirdeSe nirdiSyamAne dvAdaSAnAm
   ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt	ayutAnAm deva mAnuzikAyAH prajAyAH anutpattika Darma kzAnti pratilamBaH aBUt 
   teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu imāṃ	tezAm api budDAnAm BagavatAm samantAt daSasu dikzu lokaDAtuzu imAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām	prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm BAzamANAnAm asaMKyeyAnAm
   aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni iti	aparimANAnAm sattvAnAm anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittAni utpannAni iti
   mārganiryāṇam ity uktā niryāṇapratipattir ity uktā sarvākārajñatā	mArga niryANam iti uktA niryANa pratipattiH iti uktA sarva AkAra jQa tA
   āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ bhavatyāṃ	Arya paQcaviMSati sAhasrikAyAm boDisattva DarmANAm BavatyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṅkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm aBisamaya alaFkAra anusAreNa saMSoDitAyAm
   sarvākārajñatādhikāraḥ subhūtiparivartaḥ prathamaḥ	sarva AkAra jQa tA aDikAraH suBUti parivartaH praTamaH
